cobblemon.species.epochferaligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.epochferaligatr.desc: It adds a tattoo to its skin for every foe it takes out in combat to constantly bask in its combat superiority.
cobblemon.species.epochchikoritaone.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.epochchikoritaone.desc: This Pokemon has electrical currents swirling from its antennae that it can channel and redirect in any direction it chooses.
cobblemon.species.epochbayleefone.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.epochbayleefone.desc: When it thunder storms, this Pokemon can use the electrical rod on its head to attract certain electrical attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochmeganiumone.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.epochmeganiumone.desc: This Pokemon is able to redirect electrical attacks using the circular field around its neck or absorb it to empower itself.
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquilone.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.epochcyndaquilone.desc: Because of this Pokemon's small stature, it tries to keep a low profile. If it is startled, the ice on its back glistens brightly.
cobblemon.species.epochquilavaone.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.epochquilavaone.desc: It can curl into a ball such that it is able to present itself as a natural formation of ice crystals.
cobblemon.species.epochtyphlosionone.des: The crystal on its body is hardened to be almost as tough as diamonds.
cobblemon.species.epochtotodileone.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.epochtotodileone.desc: It is said that this Pokemon abounds in the underworld and its fire is from an ethereal plane.
cobblemon.species.epochcroconawone.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.epochcroconawone.desc: It is unclear if the flame on its back is really fire, or a malicious force that has manifested.
cobblemon.species.epochferaligatrone.des: When the fire on its body flares, you can distinctly hear wailing noises.
cobblemon.species.epochsteelix.name: Steelix
cobblemon.species.epochsteelix.desc: It has mastered the power of the ice around it that it can materialize large ice projectiles and launch them at its foes.
cobblemon.species.epochslugma.name: Slugma
cobblemon.species.epochslugma.desc: It is a species of Pokmon that lives and feeds in areas full of toxic waste. It can ooze into multiple several autonomous parts, albeit slowly.
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargo.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargo.desc: The shell on its back is made of discarded material that it has absorbed into its skin while feeding. Its greatest threat is its ability to multiply.
cobblemon.species.epochnatu.name: Natu
cobblemon.species.epochnatu.desc: Aerial Tactical Unit, Model N, or N-ATU. is used by espionage and military for small surveillance and reconnaissance missions.
cobblemon.species.epochxatu.name: Xatu
cobblemon.species.epochxatu.desc: Far deadlier than Model N, Model X-ATU is an offensive drone, capable of carrying multiple payloads used for destroying remote bases from a distance.
cobblemon.species.epochspinarak.name: Spinarak
cobblemon.species.epochspinarak.desc: It can spin elaborate webs with different pictures in the webs. It uses these pictures to attract prey where it traps them and then allows them to be consumed.
cobblemon.species.epochariados.name: Ariados
cobblemon.species.epochariados.desc: Its most terrifying quality is its ability to vanish into darkness and surprise its foe by sinking its poisonous fangs into its target.
cobblemon.species.epochstantler.name: Stantler
cobblemon.species.epochstantler.desc: Various berries form a key element of a Stantler's diet. They enjoy them so much that their antlers grow some of their own during the autumn season.
cobblemon.species.epochledyba.name: Ledyba
cobblemon.species.epochledyba.desc: Due to their small size and bug-like appearance, they are often used by spy agencies to remotely observe targets or persons of interest.
cobblemon.species.epochledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.epochledian.desc: When discovered, they can beat its wings to emit a high-frequency screeching noise to deafen and distract to allow it enough time to escape.
cobblemon.species.epochgligar.name: Gligar
cobblemon.species.epochgligar.desc: It can enter into a state of perfect stillness that it can fool people into thinking it is really a statue.
cobblemon.species.epochsudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.epochsudowoodo.desc: It masquerades as a cactus and its thorns can pierce skin with just the smallest poke.
cobblemon.species.epochhoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.epochhoothoot.desc: Found most often in wintry climates, it keeps itself warm with its lunar aura it emits rather than its feathers.
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowl.desc: It uses its psychic powers to replicate the auroras that can be seen in northern areas of the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochelekid.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.epochelekid.desc: Its antennae hum when a predator is nearby. Its natural inclination is to fight the predator rather than flee.
cobblemon.species.epochmagby.name: Magby
cobblemon.species.epochmagby.desc: It can often be found swimming about near glaciers and melting ice caps. It is able to dive deep into the ocean floor.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvitar.name: Larvitar
cobblemon.species.epochlarvitar.desc: It is frequently posted as sentries around high-security zones. It uses a mix of antennae and sonar signals to reveal hidden enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochpupitar.name: Pupitar
cobblemon.species.epochpupitar.desc: When it gets angry, it starts to overheat. Its inventor anticipated the need to create several exhaust vents to provide it ample avenues to let off heat.
cobblemon.species.epochtyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.epochtyranitar.desc: It moves slowly and finds it difficult to navigate due to its reinforced steel plating. Its shielding is almost impenetrable.
cobblemon.species.epochmareep.name: Mareep
cobblemon.species.epochmareep.desc: Its wool actually makes it weigh less overall eventually allowing it to become airborne.
cobblemon.species.epochflaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.epochflaaffy.desc: Its wool is made of cotton candy. It is said that if you eat some, it will give you wings.
cobblemon.species.epochampharos.name: Ampharos
cobblemon.species.epochampharos.desc: Its wings are also made of cotton candy, and will often give passengers some of them to cheer them up.
cobblemon.species.epochheracross.name: Heracross
cobblemon.species.epochheracross.desc: During mating season, the more shapelier one's ball of dung is, the more impressive it is to potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.epochteddiursa.desc: The degree of transparency in its body follows the lunar cycle. During full moons, it is fully corporeal while during new moons, it is fully ethereal.
cobblemon.species.epochursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.epochursaring.desc: It is said that when this Pokemon passes away, its body rejoins the cosmos as a new star.
cobblemon.species.epochespeon.name: Espeon
cobblemon.species.epochespeon.desc: Its tail is drenched in highly corrosive poison, and it is unable to control when to poison anyone that touches it, rendering it untouchable to many.
cobblemon.species.epochumbreon.name: Umbreon
cobblemon.species.epochumbreon.desc: It has been trained as a vigilante and seeks out justice for those that have been subjected to cruelty or misfortune at the hands of others.
cobblemon.species.epochaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.epochaipom.desc: Despite the appearance of being asleep, its psychic powers allow it to behave and function perfectly normally.
cobblemon.species.epochslowking.name: Slowking
cobblemon.species.epochslowking.desc: The bees that inhabit the hive on its head have actually crowned this Pokemon as their royalty. An added benefit is that it always has honey within reach.
cobblemon.species.epochbellossom.name: Bellossom
cobblemon.species.epochbellossom.desc: During the lunar cycle, they come out at night to dance in groups and sing in harmony as a sort of ritual to the moon.
cobblemon.species.epochsunkern.name: Sunkern
cobblemon.species.epochsunkern.desc: It is a toss-up whether the Sunkern will sprout and grow into a Sunflora or whether the fire it emits will consume it.
cobblemon.species.epochsunflora.name: Sunflora
cobblemon.species.epochsunflora.desc: It has matured to be able to control the flame it emits, to prevent it from consuming itself.
cobblemon.species.epochkingdra.name: Kingdra
cobblemon.species.epochkingdra.desc: The light emitted by their tail fins change based on the temperature of the water in which they are swimming.
cobblemon.species.epochchinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.epochchinchou.desc: It is found in the darkest waters even if they are not very deep. The light source they emit are often helpful to other species within the ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.epochlanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.epochlanturn.desc: This Pokmon is often found in deep waters due to its size. They emit light sources as a means of finding food at the bottom of the body of water they inhabit.
cobblemon.species.epochmarill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.epochmarill.desc: As it has continued to be punched, its seams have started to come undone that the material it is made from has started to poke through.
cobblemon.species.epochazumarill.name: Azumarill
cobblemon.species.epochazumarill.desc: It has become fed up with taking hits from others and is now ready to return in kind. The hits it has taken has made it stronger.
cobblemon.species.epochdunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.epochdunsparce.desc: Its strategy is to perpetually find hosts, infest them, and siphon energy to strengthen itself and then move onto the next host and continue the cycle.
cobblemon.species.epochcorsola.name: Corsola
cobblemon.species.epochcorsola.desc: The waste that humans create eventually end up making its way to oceans and open seas, where the marine life such as Corsola have to pay the price.
cobblemon.species.epochmantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.epochmantine.desc: The faster it swims, the more electrical current it gathers. It can then channel the electrical current it has accumulated and shoot it like a projectile.
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrow.name: Murkrow
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrow.desc: It is not clear where it found the leaf that it constantly chews on, but if you attempt to take it from the Murkrow, it will peck you relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochblissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.epochblissey.desc: The inventor of the B.L.I.S.S.E.Y allegedly installed a Terminator mode but its not clear how to trigger this mode.
cobblemon.species.epochpichu.name: Pichu
cobblemon.species.epochpichu.desc: It often gets lost because it is too busy listening to its music to take note of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuff.name: Igglybuff
cobblemon.species.epochigglybuff.desc: This Pokemon can manifest wherever water can be found... from the depths of the ocean, to a kitchen sink. They are very small in size so almost unnoticeable.
cobblemon.species.epochswinub.name: Swinub
cobblemon.species.epochswinub.desc: Rubbing its fur first can make you give off static electricity.
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswine.name: Piloswine
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswine.desc: Its fur is exceptionally warm and are often found in rocky areas where they graze on small grassy patches.
cobblemon.species.epochphanpy.name: Phanpy
cobblemon.species.epochphanpy.desc: This Pokemon likes to curl into a ball and toboggan down snowy hills in races against others of its herd.
cobblemon.species.epochdonphan.name: Donphan
cobblemon.species.epochdonphan.desc: Their woolly coat is highly sought after in the fashion world, but this has driven them to the point of near extinction because of irresponsible poachers.
cobblemon.species.epochsmeargle.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.epochsmeargle.desc: It is often found in alleyways or urban centres experimenting with different art styles. It is considered a nuisance by local authorities.
cobblemon.species.epochslugmaone.name: Slugma
cobblemon.species.epochslugmaone.desc: This Pokemon is very small and found along the sea floor or in small ponds. It will suck up dead algae that have fallen to the bottom of the sea floor as food.
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargoone.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.epochmagcargoone.desc: Apparently, the slime that this Pokemon oozes can create some serious hallucinations. People often use it as an inexpensive way of getting high.
cobblemon.species.epochstantlerone.name: Stantler
cobblemon.species.epochstantlerone.desc: It is constantly channeling an electrical current between the two nodes on its head, even when it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.epochsmoochum.name: Smoochum
cobblemon.species.epochsmoochum.desc: Its voice cracks easily when it tries to reach high notes. It is still training its voice but it has a long way to go.
cobblemon.species.epochyanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.epochyanma.desc: You know you can find them when you hear a loud, persistent buzzing noise in swampy areas.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmaone.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.epochyanmaone.desc: This Pokemon is made of a fine aluminum alloy. If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
cobblemon.species.epochremoraid.name: Remoraid
cobblemon.species.epochremoraid.desc: This Pokemon can zip around in water because it is able to use the electrical energy it generates to give it a speed boost.
cobblemon.species.epochoctillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.epochoctillery.desc: This Pokemon is able to latch on to prey and use its electrically charged tentacles to electrocute its prey into submission.
cobblemon.species.epochmisdreavus.name: Misdreavus
cobblemon.species.epochmisdreavus.desc: This Pokemon is able to sing heavenly choirs. Once you have heard its refrains, you feel more pure.
cobblemon.species.epochpolitoed.name: Politoed
cobblemon.species.epochpolitoed.desc: Politoed wields the legendary sword, Masamune. It seeks to avenge its fallen comrade by defeating Lucario.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrogue.name: Tyrogue
cobblemon.species.epochtyrogue.desc: This Pokemon is said to be the alter-ego and secret identity of a famous superhero...
cobblemon.species.epochhitmontop.name: Hitmontop
cobblemon.species.epochhitmontop.desc: This Pokemon is a superhero that has the ability to throw bolts of lightning with a bow.
cobblemon.species.epochscizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.epochscizor.desc: Developed in an underground lab, this Pokemon has offensive power, but development was rushed as it is prone to overheating.
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrowone.name: Murkrow
cobblemon.species.epochmurkrowone.desc: They are often used as familiars to wizards so they pick up a fair bit of magical skill by themselves from their wizard masters.
cobblemon.species.epochcleffa.name: Cleffa
cobblemon.species.epochcleffa.desc: They are very small and often confused with ordinary butterflies. They are responsible for casting certain enchantments in forests.
cobblemon.species.epochhoundour.name: Houndour
cobblemon.species.epochhoundour.desc: It was a noble animal in life, and the best friend that humans can have. What? Can you not see its halo?
cobblemon.species.epochhoundoom.name: Houndoom
cobblemon.species.epochhoundoom.desc: It is said that man's best friend will meet you in heaven when it passes on. It's actually quite a tragic story.
cobblemon.species.epochsneasel.name: Sneasel
cobblemon.species.epochsneasel.desc: A Sneasel adorns its face with face painting in hunting parties to appear more threatening. In groups, they can quickly surround and overwhelm their prey.
cobblemon.species.epochmiltank.name: Miltank
cobblemon.species.epochmiltank.desc: It is often raised by farmers to produce highly nutritious milk. It sometimes has a bad habit of grazing on the wreath that grows on its neck.
cobblemon.species.epochswinubone.name: Swinub
cobblemon.species.epochswinubone.desc: If you must pet this Pokemon, it prefers that the leaves on its head are scratched versus being rubbed on its belly.
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswineone.name: Piloswine
cobblemon.species.epochpiloswineone.desc: When grazing, it can keep perfectly still that it is often mistaken as a hedge or a small bush.
cobblemon.species.epochporygon2.name: Porygon2
cobblemon.species.epochporygon2.desc: Once it is able to access a computer, it can quickly spread across other connected systems. It lies in wait to sabotage at the right moment.
cobblemon.species.epochwooper.name: Wooper
cobblemon.species.epochwooper.desc: This Pokemon is viewed as a lucky charm. It tends to play near geysers and can sense when they are about to erupt.
cobblemon.species.epochquagsire.name: Quagsire
cobblemon.species.epochquagsire.desc: This Pokemon is viewed as very wise in folk tales, but in reality, it actually has very low intelligence.
cobblemon.species.epochdelibird.name: Delibird
cobblemon.species.epochdelibird.desc: The log that you commonly find them sleeping on is actually their tail. Despite their size they can swing it very adeptly in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochhoppip.name: Hoppip
cobblemon.species.epochhoppip.desc: When it blows around in the wind, it is able to attract and collect snowflakes to its body eventually creating a small trail.
cobblemon.species.epochskiploom.name: Skiploom
cobblemon.species.epochskiploom.desc: When the snowflakes it attracts accumulates in size, Skiploom are able to make them almost orbit around its body when it chimes.
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluff.name: Jumpluff
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluff.desc: During particularly fierce winter storms, when the wind blows, it is able to channel that breeze into a pleasant melody.
cobblemon.species.epochkingdraone.name: Kingdra
cobblemon.species.epochkingdraone.desc: When it flaps its wings, it is able to pollinate an entire field of flowers all at once, as such they are often used to repair damage ecosystems.
cobblemon.species.epochpineco.name: Pineco
cobblemon.species.epochpineco.desc: Miners need to be careful not to hit a Pineco as precious ores and gems are often found encrusted in the rocky surface of its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochforretress.name: Forretress
cobblemon.species.epochforretress.desc: When you see a collection of precious minerals encrusted in the surface of the cave, it is a tell-tale sign that it is really a Forretress.
cobblemon.species.epochhoothootone.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.epochhoothootone.desc: It is able to tilt its head 270 degrees. It uses this as a means of being able to scan its full surroundings.
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowlone.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.epochnoctowlone.desc: Its eyes are trained to be able to easily see through snow storms and strong blizzards.
cobblemon.species.epochhoppipone.name: Hoppip
cobblemon.species.epochhoppipone.desc: Due to its small stature, a light gust is usually enough to blow it away.
cobblemon.species.epochskiploomone.name: Skiploom
cobblemon.species.epochskiploomone.desc: When it is eating, the lights on its antenna flicker periodically.
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluffone.name: Jumpluff
cobblemon.species.epochjumpluffone.desc: It is able to produce its own light source significant enough that it does not need to chase other lights like other moth Pokemon do.
cobblemon.species.epochskarmory.name: Skarmory
cobblemon.species.epochskarmory.desc: A Pokmon that has wings made of jagged rocks. While it is unable to fly, these wings give it an aerodynamic boost, allowing it to run very fast.
cobblemon.species.epochsentret.name: Sentret
cobblemon.species.epochsentret.desc: It stalks the roadway where it was killed in hopes of exacting its vengeance on the motorist that took its life.
cobblemon.species.epochfurret.name: Furret
cobblemon.species.epochfurret.desc: It is decaying such that it exhibits a foul odour and has managed to attract flies that constantly hover around it.
cobblemon.species.epochcrobat.name: Crobat
cobblemon.species.epochcrobat.desc: The edges of its wings are as sharp as steel and when it dives headfirst after reaching maximum velocity, it is capable of slicing its target clean in half.
cobblemon.species.africanusanslowking.de: Slowking es el resultado del reconocimiento por parte de los esclavistas a Slowbro, dndole una evolucin ms inteligente capaz de manejar a varios Slowking, quedndose por encima suya en la cadena de mando.
cobblemon.species.africanusanphanpy.name: Phanpy
cobblemon.species.africanusanphanpy.desc: Las enormes orejas que tiene Phanpy le sirven para abanicarse. Cuando tiene calor, las usa para refrescarse. Ya desde pequeo es entrenado para que tenga mucha fuerza y la use en beneficio del ejrcito cartagins.
cobblemon.species.africanusandonphan.des: Donphan es tan fuerte que puede arrasarr fcilmente varias filas de legionarios. Su piel se ha endurecido, ganando el tipo roca. Para hacerle dao, no bastan los ataques comunes.
cobblemon.species.lagoonanremoraid.name: Remoraid
cobblemon.species.lagoonanoctillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.ionosianchikorita.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.ionosianbayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.ionosianmeganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.ionosiancyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.ionosianquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.ionosiantotodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.ionosiancroconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.ionosiannatu.name: Natu
cobblemon.species.ionosiannatu.desc: Unlike its Johtonian relative, Ionian Natu has a long pair of legs to make easier for it to spy on the vast, open landscapes where it resides. The stilt-like legs may also save it time when sinking into quicksand; as it often dozes off during long days of admiring the horizon. The former psychic ability of this Pokmon has blown away by the wind; a away of preparing it for its demise without knowing the cause of it.
cobblemon.species.ionosianxatu.name: Xatu
cobblemon.species.ionosiangirafarig.name: Girafarig
cobblemon.species.ionosiangranbull.name: Granbull
cobblemon.species.ionosianshuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.ionosiansmoochum.name: Smoochum
cobblemon.species.avalossianaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.avalossianaipom.desc: Avalossian Aipoms have a particular obsession with bones, and the sound they make when knocked together. Entire bands of Aipom will gather to smack bones on each other's skull helmets to make a grim, yet funky, beat.
cobblemon.species.avalossianblissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.avalossianqwilfish.des: Qwilfish suck in water to shoot out toxic quills when feeling threatened, though unfortunately their body shape that enables this is cumbersome for swimming. Avalossian Qwilfish have a different lip color than typical breeds.
cobblemon.species.enjinnianhoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.enjinnianhoothoot.desc: Hoothoot will spend a majority of its time asleep. Experts suggest that while asleep, it can sense the world around it more effectively than otherwise.
cobblemon.species.enjinniannoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.enjinniannoctowl.desc: Foregoing its predator nature, Noctowl prefer to conserve its energy, only hunting when its body demands nutrients to continue functioning.
cobblemon.species.novransudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.novransudowoodo.desc: It creates a stockpile of snowballs to defend itself. These snowballs often have sharp chunks of rock within them that do major damage.
cobblemon.species.novranslowking.name: Slowking
cobblemon.species.novranslowking.desc: When a Novraian Slowpoke eats a special royal honey, its vestigial psychic powers reactivate. This form of Slowking rules over Combee hives in tandem with Vespiquen.
cobblemon.species.qamorantyrogue.name: Tyrogue
cobblemon.species.qamorantyrogue.desc: In Qamor, Tyrouge are much more attracted to the musical and dancing scene of the region. They would rather solve their problems via dance battle rather than with an actual battle.
cobblemon.species.qamoranhitmontop.name: Hitmontop
cobblemon.species.varitasiantogepi.name: Togepi
cobblemon.species.varitasiantogepi.desc: Something in Varitan Togepi's diet caused its shell to harden and take on a golden color. It is rarely found and highly sought-after.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantogetic.name: Togetic
cobblemon.species.varitasiantogetic.desc: Upon evolving, its shell forms into magnificent armor. It is a slightly clumsier flier than standard Togetic because the armor makes it heavier, but has a hardened head to compensate.
cobblemon.species.varitasianwobbuffet.de: It cannot attack on its own, yet its glaring tail intimidates others into doing what it says. The main body seems to be unaware of this and simply thinks it's tougher than it actually is.
cobblemon.species.varitasianporygon2.des: Continued tampering allowed Porygon to successfully evolve. It still exhibits many glitches but is now well-made enough to pass Silph Co. software compatibility checks which can make it potentially dangerous.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantyrogue.name: Tyrogue
cobblemon.species.varitasiantyrogue.desc: Tyrogue of Varitas adapted to hone their minds rather than their bodies. However, they are often inexperienced and will act clumsy or foolish.
cobblemon.species.varitasianhitmontop.de: For some reason they use psychic energy to suspend themselves in midair. They can hypnotize foes by swinging their entire bodies back and forth.
cobblemon.species.varitasianraikou.name: Raikou
cobblemon.species.varitasianraikou.desc: Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of this Pokemon send shock waves shuddering through the air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come crashing down.
cobblemon.species.varitasianentei.name: Entei
cobblemon.species.varitasianentei.desc: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokemon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
cobblemon.species.varitasiansuicune.name: Suicune
cobblemon.species.varitasiansuicune.desc: Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water. It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokemon has the power to purify dirty water.
cobblemon.species.hubiantogepi.name: Togepi
cobblemon.species.hubiantogepi.desc: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
cobblemon.species.hubiantogetic.name: Togetic
cobblemon.species.hubiantogetic.desc: Easter Island Togetic is an elusive Pokemon that is responsible for golden eggs appearing all over the island. It likes to remain hidden, and only appears under special circumstances.
cobblemon.species.hubiansmeargle.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.hubiansmeargle.desc: Smeargle on Easter Island is just as artistic as its Johto counterpart, filling the walls of its cave home with hundreds of colorful chalk drawings. It is unable to learn any move, instead it is born capable of an endless possibility of potential.
cobblemon.species.hiziangligar.name: Gligar
cobblemon.species.hiziangligar.desc: As it glides through the air, the floor bellow it is covered with rime. Its long icy claws allow it to pick up slippery frozen objects with ease.
cobblemon.species.hizianmurkrow.name: Murkrow
cobblemon.species.hizianmurkrow.desc: Many Murkrow can be seem circling crop fields in the morning, it is a sign that there are high quality crops ready to be harvested.
cobblemon.species.hizianmisdreavus.name: Misdreavus
cobblemon.species.hizianmisdreavus.desc: Their burning flames can be seen through nights and blizzards. They inhabit areas with colder climate as they enjoy startling ice-type Pokemon with their hot flames.
cobblemon.species.norheimanunown.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.norheimanhoundour.name: NorheimanHoundour
cobblemon.species.aristosiansentret.name: Sentret
cobblemon.species.aristosiansentret.desc: Sentret's mosslike fur perfectly blends with foliage, so it's difficult to spot it as it camouflages itself in leaves. It won't sleep until it's sure its body is hidden entirely.
cobblemon.species.aristosianfurret.name: Furret
cobblemon.species.aristosianfurret.desc: Plants growing on Furret's mossy cloak absorb nutrients from its body, and nourish it in return when they photosynthesize. Small Bug Pokemon sometimes hide in its fur.
cobblemon.species.aristosianspinarak.des: Its body is covered with thick white fur. Spinarak hides inside it, only leaving its sparkling eyes out to attract prey close.
cobblemon.species.aristosianmareep.name: Mareep
cobblemon.species.aristosianflaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.aristosianflaaffy.desc: Sand Attack Ground Body Slam Normal Take Down Normal Agility Psychic Screech Normal Flatter Dark Charge Electric Odor Sleuth Normal Eerie Impulse Electric Electric Terrain Electric
cobblemon.species.eghochikorita.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.eghochikorita.desc: Chikorita's thick, spiky exterior protects it from most predators. The tips of the spikes are coated in a sweet and sticky substance that humans love, but repulses most Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.eghobayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.eghobayleef.desc: The red part of Bayleef is leathery hard, where the white bottom half of Bayleef is quite soft. Being vulnerable here requires Bayleef to be constantly vigilant of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.eghomeganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.eghomeganium.desc: The black dots scattered around the white portion of Meganium are seeds. They get scattered around when it battles, eventually leading to the growth of fruit-bearing trees.
cobblemon.species.eghocyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.eghocyndaquil.desc: Cyndaquil is always producing a small cloud of volcanic ash, which is electrically charged. It can be tough to handle for new trainers.
cobblemon.species.eghoquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.eghoquilava.desc: As Quilava gets stronger, it is able to better control its volcanic ash cloud. It has learned to store and use the electricity generated by the cloud.
cobblemon.species.eghotyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.eghotyphlosion.desc: Typhlosion is very dangerous to be around if it is not in a good mood. The energy that is generated from the heat and electricity matches that of a nuclear reactor.
cobblemon.species.eghototodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.eghototodile.desc: The saliva in Totodile's mouth is corrosive to most materials. That, combined with its strong jaw, allows it to eat almost anything it gets its mouth on.
cobblemon.species.eghocroconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.eghocroconaw.desc: Croconaw's hunched stance appears to be an adaptation to aid it in traversing cramped sewer tunnels. Rattata and Grimer are not safe in the territory of this species.
cobblemon.species.eghoferaligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.eghoferaligatr.desc: This form of Feraligatr thrives in the dark murky waters of swamps and sewers. These Pokemon can cause problems in sewers because their strong jaws can rip through pipes with ease.
cobblemon.species.eghohoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.eghohoothoot.desc: The crescent on its head glows brightest when the moon is full. It can confuse prey by convincing them that the moon is coming right at them when it's really just bird.
cobblemon.species.eghonoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.eghonoctowl.desc: Noctowl use the crest on its head to reflect light into the eyes of its prey. On moonless nights, one may mistake the crest as the actual moon.
cobblemon.species.eghomarill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.eghomarill.desc: It uses its tail to swing around the rock end with ease. When not in combat, it uses the rock as a perch to see above tall grass and watch for enemies.
cobblemon.species.eghoazumarill.name: Azumarill
cobblemon.species.eghoazumarill.desc: In battle, Azumarill uses its tail as a flail or war hammer, swinging and smashing it into opponents. Outside of battle, it swings its tail fancily to attract a worthy partner.
cobblemon.species.eghoblissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.eghoblissey.desc: Because of the strong bond with their trainer, Blissey will do anything in its power to keep the trainer safe. Blissey are often considered too overbearing.
cobblemon.species.deltacyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.deltacyndaquil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. When placed in darkness, it will automatically generate more and more electricity from its tesla coil.
cobblemon.species.deltaquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.deltaquilava.desc: Its DNA continuously changes and reconstructs its body into a machine. As it becomes more dependent on electricity, it makes its home in power plants.
cobblemon.species.deltatyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.deltatyphlosion.desc: On stormy nights it ventures outdoors and pulsates in response to lightning strikes. When calm, it can induce macroshock in humans from 100 feet away.
cobblemon.species.deltahoothoot.name: Hoothoot
cobblemon.species.deltahoothoot.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. Its ears are sensitive enough to hear a snowflake fall upon the snow on the ground from across the forest.
cobblemon.species.deltanoctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.deltanoctowl.desc: Rather than flee from physical attacks, at times it will stare down the opponent's attack head on, startling them, and then freezing them to the bone.
cobblemon.species.deltachinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.deltachinchou.desc: A Delta Species discovered by CommanderPhoenix. When it senses danger, it emits bright flames and fades into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.deltalanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.deltalanturn.desc: The flames it produces are extraordinarily hot. Due to its reclusive nature, lost travelers that stumble upon it may mistake its presence for the gateway to hell.
cobblemon.species.deltapichu.name: Pichu
cobblemon.species.deltapichu.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. As it is still inept at flying, it practices gliding from high altitudes at incredible speed.
cobblemon.species.deltaaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.deltaaipom.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SixteenDraws and EchoTheThird. It sneakily places the end of its tail on people's shoulders, making others wonder if they saw a white hand.
cobblemon.species.deltasunkern.name: Sunkern
cobblemon.species.deltasunkern.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit and EchoTheThird. It is able to emit a purple fire that poisons its enemies.
cobblemon.species.deltasunflora.name: Sunflora
cobblemon.species.deltasunflora.desc: Sunflora convert fire and poison into nutrition. It purges its enemy's uncleanliness with fire.
cobblemon.species.deltayanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.deltayanma.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SapphirePhoenix. Though it specializes in camouflage, it is also a great flier capable of quickly chasing down lured prey.
cobblemon.species.deltawooper.name: Wooper
cobblemon.species.deltawooper.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. This mischievous Pokemon likes to surprise people on Halloween with tons of candy.
cobblemon.species.deltaquagsire.name: Quagsire
cobblemon.species.deltaquagsire.desc: Despite its appearance, this Delta Species is kind to every Pokemon it meets. It glows with Halloween spirit.
cobblemon.species.deltamisdreavus.name: Misdreavus
cobblemon.species.deltamisdreavus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. This Pokemon does its best to bring everyone into the holiday spirit. It's only happy when everyone else is.
cobblemon.species.deltagirafarig.name: Girafarig
cobblemon.species.deltagirafarig.desc: A Delta Species discovered by nico. The tail's insults temper the Pokemon's iron will, becoming stronger as the Pokemon grows.
cobblemon.species.deltadunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.deltadunsparce.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. Despite having a menacing appearance, it is quite friendly and skates across ponds' surfaces.
cobblemon.species.deltascizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.deltascizor.desc: Its exoskeleton is coated with a thick layer of ice. The layer of ice reforms once per year.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltascizor.name: DeltaScizor
cobblemon.species.deltashuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.deltashuckle.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zazulitao. Every punch that it takes causes its crank to turn; when its limit is reached, it bashes into foes with its head.
cobblemon.species.deltaremoraid.name: Remoraid
cobblemon.species.deltaremoraid.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Missingo_OP. The farther it goes away from pools of lava, the more rapidly the magma on its head cools down and hardens.
cobblemon.species.deltaoctillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.deltaoctillery.desc: It hides its tentacles behind its beard-like smokescreen and attacks without warning. Against stronger foes, it will grab them and submerge them in lava.
cobblemon.species.deltaelekid.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.deltaelekid.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. Though it tries to remain as still as possible around humans, it cannot withstand heavy rain, causing it to flee indoors.
cobblemon.species.deltamagby.name: Magby
cobblemon.species.deltamagby.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. Though it is a Water-type Pokemon, it is incapable of breathing underwater and aims to hold its breath longer everyday.
cobblemon.species.unownearth.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.unownearth.desc: Their appearance resembles the symbol in Dragalisk's mouth, which is why the Cardinals have considered them profane since time immemorial.
cobblemon.species.unownxenoverse.name: Unown
cobblemon.species.unownxenoverse.desc: For centuries they have been considered sacred as their appearance resembles the symbol on the Luxflon's gem.
cobblemon.species.smearglex.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.smearglex.desc: It produces a delicious low-calory cream, but it becomes rancid if not kept cool.
cobblemon.species.elekidx.name: Elekid
cobblemon.species.elekidx.desc: The sparks it scatters from its head can easily cause fires or explosions. It is a real ticking bomb!
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.tyranitarx.desc: The Tyranitar owned by Dimension General Victor. It generates a defeaning buzz by vibrating its wings.
cobblemon.species.hoennianchinchou.name: Chinchou
cobblemon.species.hoennianchinchou.desc: It lives in depth beyond sunlight's reach, waiting patiently for prey to swim by. The lights on its antennae can cause intense hallucinations.
cobblemon.species.hoennianlanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.hoennianlanturn.desc: The light-emitting flame on its head is used to lure in unsuspecting prey on the seafloor. It ensnares its victims within its body and siphons their life force.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandunsparce.name: Dunsparce
cobblemon.species.hoenniandunsparce.desc: This Pokemon's eyesight is so poor that it can barely see objects directly in front of it. It escapes predators by shocking them with its electric tail.
cobblemon.species.hoennianqwilfish.name: Qwilfish
cobblemon.species.hoennianqwilfish.desc: Qwilfish latch their tails to rocks on the seafloor and wait for unsuspecting prey to swim by. When it spots a target, it unleashes an explosion of toxic fumes.
cobblemon.species.hoennianshuckle.name: Shuckle
cobblemon.species.hoennianshuckle.desc: A Shuckle hides under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its shell while eating stored berries. The berries mix with its body fluids to become juice.
cobblemon.species.hoennianteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.hoennianteddiursa.desc: It's palms constantly give off a warm glow. When in distress, the heat from it's palms can become so intense that they burn through even solid metal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.hoennianursaring.desc: Ursaring gather food from trees using their lengthy, extendable tongues. It's fearsome claws are actually intended to aid in peeling hard-skinned fruits.
cobblemon.species.hoennianskarmory.name: Skarmory
cobblemon.species.hoennianskarmory.desc: A Pokemon that has a body and wings of molten steel. In the heat of battle, the blades on its wings glow white-hot and emit clouds of burning steam.
cobblemon.species.seviianteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.seviianursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.seviianmantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.mythianmareep.name: Mareep
cobblemon.species.mythianmareep.desc: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.
cobblemon.species.mythianflaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.mythianflaaffy.desc: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
cobblemon.species.mythianampharos.name: Ampharos
cobblemon.species.mythianampharos.desc: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
cobblemon.species.mythianscizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.mythianscizor.desc: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.
cobblemon.species.alteranledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.alteranledian.desc: LEDIAN in Altera display unique patterns and behavior. It recklessly charges into battle, channeling star energy into its kicks and punches.
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.armirantyranitar.desc: A Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in volcanic areas seeking new opponents to fight.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogepi.name: Togepi
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogepi.desc: This rare bird Pokemon hatches at the top of the coldest peaks, as its fire burns bright even at negative temperatures.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogetic.name: Togetic
cobblemon.species.ayreiantogetic.desc: Its highly curious, but its incapability of flying holds it back from exploring new places. Its fire burns bright when its happy.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoppip.name: Hoppip
cobblemon.species.ayreianhoppip.desc: The eye motifs on its wings have similar properties to hypnotizing devices. It feeds off of dreams.
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiploom.name: Skiploom
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiploom.desc: The 'planteye' on top of its head releases a somniferous powder. This property is used in narcotics.
cobblemon.species.ayreianjumpluff.name: Jumpluff
cobblemon.species.ayreianjumpluff.desc: By flashing bright lights from its limbs, it causes powerful headaches that eventually knock out its opponents. It flies lowly in the night, hunting for people's dreams.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantine.desc: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
cobblemon.species.ayreianphanpy.name: Phanpy
cobblemon.species.ayreianphanpy.desc: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandonphan.name: Donphan
cobblemon.species.ayreiandonphan.desc: An internal organ transmutes the outside moisture into warm water, which acts as a substitute to its blood in extremely cold temperatures.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmontop.name: Hitmontop
cobblemon.species.ayreianhitmontop.desc: The energy of the Shiny Stone enlightened this Pokemon to never before seen levels of serenity. It is almost impossible to distract.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansmoochum.name: Smoochum
cobblemon.species.ayreiansmoochum.desc: It waltzes around kissing anyone that it comes into contact with, while leaving nasty injuries that look like leech bites.
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.name: Chikorita
cobblemon.species.ayreianchikorita.desc: Said to have gone extinct shortly after the war, a few specimen have been found in the natural caves of Citrine Jungle.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.ayreianbayleef.desc: The many buds decorating this Pokemon's neck are a fashion icon in a faraway region. Records found after the war imply that this Pokemon may have originated from that land.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeganium.desc: These incredibly rare Pokemon form natural shrines in the secluded jungles they live in, adorning them with the pink leaves of its tail.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
cobblemon.species.ayreiancyndaquil.desc: It flares flames from its back to protect itself. The fire burns vigorously if the Pokemon is angry. When it is tired, it sputters with incomplete combustion.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.ayreianquilava.desc: It intimidates foes with intense gusts of flames and superheated air. Its quick nimbleness lets it dodge attacks even while scorching an enemy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.ayreiantyphlosion.desc: In the wild, humans are highly advised to stay clear of these Pokemon. They hunt other predators and take their skull upon victory.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.name: Totodile
cobblemon.species.ayreiantotodile.desc: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.ayreiancroconaw.desc: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.ayreianferaligatr.desc: This Pokemon lives to fight, it does not hold personal grudges, it just wants to destroy everything in its path.
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.name: Spinarak
cobblemon.species.ayreianspinarak.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.name: Ariados
cobblemon.species.ayreianariados.desc: It can blast a blinding light from its back to scare away predators.
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.name: Stantler
cobblemon.species.ayreianstantler.desc: The flames that burn on it's back are similar to Ponyta's, in the sense that they wont burn you if it trusts you.
cobblemon.species.relicledyba.name: Ledyba
cobblemon.species.relicledyba.desc: Relic Ledyba are often seen training with a Relic Ledian counterpart. It is said that they form close bonds with their mentors, and gift them with tarts made of Combee honey to gain favour.
cobblemon.species.relicledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.relicledian.desc: In exchange for their ability to fly, Ledian were gifted steel armor to battle along side their human comrades. Relic Ledian seem to have a strong sense of justice and protect those weaker than themselves.
cobblemon.species.relicaipom.name: Aipom
cobblemon.species.relicaipom.desc: Relic Aipom are known for their throwing skills. Trees, and occasionally an unfortunate Trevenant, are their usual targets for practice.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianmarill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.kaskadianmarill.desc: Unlike its Johto counterpart, Kaskadian Marill live underwater and use their algae like hair to absorb sunlight for energy. They are kind and gentle creatures.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianazumarill.des: The little orbs on its head are filled with oxygen and they contract when Azumarill dive underwater, then expand quickly to allow it to rise.
cobblemon.species.amazeallsudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.kaskadianyanma.name: Yanma
cobblemon.species.cefiranteddiursa.name: Teddiursa
cobblemon.species.cefiranteddiursa.desc: It licks its palms that are sweetened by being soaked in honey. A Teddiursa makes its own honey by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.
cobblemon.species.cefiranursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.cefiranursaring.desc: In forests, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where an Ursaring gathers food. It walks through its forest collecting food every day.
cobblemon.species.cefiranslugma.name: Slugma
cobblemon.species.cefiranmagcargo.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.cefirandelibird.name: Delibird
cobblemon.species.cefiransmeargle.name: Smeargle
cobblemon.species.aromianchimecho.name: Chimecho
cobblemon.species.fabelianralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.fabeliankirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.fabeliansableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.fabelianswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.fabeliansnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.fabelianbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.fabelianmetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.fabelianmetagross.name: Metagross
cobblemon.species.mahaliantorkoal.name: Torkoal
cobblemon.species.mahalianpoochyena.name: Poochyena
cobblemon.species.mahalianmightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.elbianslakoth.name: Slakoth
cobblemon.species.elbianvigoroth.name: Vigoroth
cobblemon.species.elbiangulpin.name: Gulpin
cobblemon.species.elbianswalot.name: Swalot
cobblemon.species.ferranianbarboach.name: Barboach
cobblemon.species.ferranianwhiscash.name: Whiscash
cobblemon.species.ferranianslakoth.name: Slakoth
cobblemon.species.ferranianvigoroth.name: Vigoroth
cobblemon.species.ferranianwailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.ferranianbagon.name: Bagon
cobblemon.species.ferranianshelgon.name: Shelgon
cobblemon.species.raianianwhismur.name: Whismur
cobblemon.species.raianianloudred.name: Loudred
cobblemon.species.raianianexploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.raianianabsol.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.raianiansalamence.name: Salamence
cobblemon.species.trizoranabsol.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.norseabsol.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.formantreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.formantorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.formanmudkip.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mastenianbreloom.name: Breloom
cobblemon.species.mastenianvolbeat.name: Volbeat
cobblemon.species.epochtreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.epochtreecko.desc: It is able to lay perfectly still for hours and blend into the environment. It lies in wait until its prey steps upon its trap and then handily disposes of its foe.
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.epochgrovyle.desc: It has a long tongue that it uses to quickly swallow up smaller insects and has the ability to fan the spikes on its body out at predators.
cobblemon.species.epochsceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.epochsceptile.desc: It is able to shimmer its tail in a rhythmic pattern to distract foes. During the night time, its compound eyes allow it to increase its vision range.
cobblemon.species.epochmudkip.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.epochmudkip.desc: The surface of its skin is exceptionally hot and unstable. It periodically gives off bursts of energy so it is not recommended to pet it.
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtomp.name: Marshtomp
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtomp.desc: The flares that come off the surface of its head resemble ears but it is actually just a very unstable part of its body that is constantly combusting.
cobblemon.species.epochswampert.name: Swampert
cobblemon.species.epochswampert.desc: There are massive bursts of energy that are constantly flaring on this its skin, which makes it very irritable and very aggressive.
cobblemon.species.epochmudkipone.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.epochmudkipone.desc: It has very precious crystals encrusted in its skin. As it is the weakest of its evolutionary line, poachers often hunt these Pokemon first.
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtompone.name: Marshtomp
cobblemon.species.epochmarshtompone.desc: When deep in a cave, if you see a light where you don not know where its source is coming from, it is likely from a T.Marshtomp.
cobblemon.species.epochswampertone.name: Swampert
cobblemon.species.epochswampertone.desc: It can send a barrage of jagged crystals at its enemies if sent into a rage.
cobblemon.species.epochwailmer.name: Wailmer
cobblemon.species.epochwailmer.desc: It was young and defenseless when it was killed by poachers. Now it roams the seas, always crying out in anguish as it relives its pain.
cobblemon.species.epochwailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.epochwailord.desc: Its body has started to decompose, exuding a foul odour which betrays its ability to hunt down the poachers that killed it and seek vengeance.
cobblemon.species.epochnosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.epochnosepass.desc: It travels in small hunting parties and use shrill voices to signal when it finds trouble. They mutter to each other in unintelligible growls.
cobblemon.species.epochgulpin.name: Gulpin
cobblemon.species.epochgulpin.desc: This Pokmon's small stature and colour allows it to camoflage in desert environments to protect itself from predators.
cobblemon.species.epochswalot.name: Swalot
cobblemon.species.epochswalot.desc: It is much larger than it appears. That is because it can disperse and consume the sand around it to grow in mass.
cobblemon.species.epochbaltoy.name: Baltoy
cobblemon.species.epochbaltoy.desc: It is jointly powered by both an electrical current and its psychic potential. It emanates an aura of psychic prowess.
cobblemon.species.epochclaydol.name: Claydol
cobblemon.species.epochclaydol.desc: Because it is able to detach itself using its psychic powers, but still control its limbs, it is able to mitigate damage to it and use surprise attacks.
cobblemon.species.epochlunatone.name: Lunatone
cobblemon.species.epochlunatone.desc: It is said to have come from a comet that breached the Earth's atmosphere. It emits a powerful frozen aura when it senses danger.
cobblemon.species.epochsolrock.name: Solrock
cobblemon.species.epochsolrock.desc: It was formed in the heart of a volcano. It emanates a flame aura that can scorch anyone that wanders nearby.
cobblemon.species.epochshroomish.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.epochshroomish.desc: It was used in civil wars and planted in the jungle where rebels would hide. Due to its unsuspecting appearance, many rebels would step on them and set off the mine.
cobblemon.species.epochbreloom.name: Breloom
cobblemon.species.epochbreloom.desc: It is frequently used as security because when intruders are identified, it emits a loud screeching noise.
cobblemon.species.epochcarvanha.name: Carvanha
cobblemon.species.epochcarvanha.desc: It is capable of breaking the speed of sound quite easily. It is able to dodge and evade enemy missiles easily.
cobblemon.species.epochsharpedo.name: Sharpedo
cobblemon.species.epochsharpedo.desc: It is capable of close combat or attacking from afar. It depends on the commander's purpose and whether the Pokemon is expendable or not.
cobblemon.species.epochsnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.epochsnorunt.desc: It is found in large numbers in tombs and crypts. They will often remain motionless and then mass attack grave robbers.
cobblemon.species.epochglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.epochglalie.desc: It gets incredibly agitated when it is confused for a rock.
cobblemon.species.epochsableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.epochsableye.desc: It lives in volcanic environments. The hotter the environment, the more at home it feels.
cobblemon.species.epochswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.epochswablu.desc: After flying through sulfuric clouds, it slowly became infected with them, which has made it sluggish when flying.
cobblemon.species.epochaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.epochaltaria.desc: It is a mystery whether it is the cause of the pollution or just happens to have absorbed the pollution within its habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochduskull.name: Duskull
cobblemon.species.epochduskull.desc: The flame that burns in its soul is enough to absorb the life force of anyone that wanders too close to it.
cobblemon.species.epochdusclops.name: Dusclops
cobblemon.species.epochdusclops.desc: It is said that anyone that manages to touch its eye will be maimed with third degree burns.
cobblemon.species.epocharon.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.epocharon.desc: It is capable of burrowing deep underground and building large, sprawling nests where they breed and can quickly spread.
cobblemon.species.epochlairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.epochlairon.desc: It works co-operatively in well-defined colonies with each unit reprising a unique role towards the construction, defense or sustainment of the colony.
cobblemon.species.epochaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.epochaggron.desc: When the previous lair king passes on, two Lairons fight each other to assert dominance. The winner evolves and becomes king of the lair.
cobblemon.species.epochwurmple.name: Wurmple
cobblemon.species.epochwurmple.desc: It is able to telepathically sense small insects that it can feed on making its ability to hunt for prey very easy.
cobblemon.species.epochsilcoon.name: Silcoon
cobblemon.species.epochsilcoon.desc: While it is in the cocoon stage, it uses its budding psychic powers to camouflage itself from predators.
cobblemon.species.epochbeautifly.name: Beautifly
cobblemon.species.epochbeautifly.desc: It spreads colourful dust all about from its wings and can use its psychic powers to form dazzling imagery to impress potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochwurmpleone.name: Wurmple
cobblemon.species.epochwurmpleone.desc: Its carapace allows it to shelter from cold temperatures so it is often found in snowy forests and tundras.
cobblemon.species.epochcascoon.name: Cascoon
cobblemon.species.epochcascoon.desc: During its cocoon stage, one of its strategies is to stay perfectly still to blend into snow and avoid predators until it evolves.
cobblemon.species.epochdustox.name: Dustox
cobblemon.species.epochdustox.desc: It flutters its wings to scatter snowflakes when attacked to blind its foe and make its escape.
cobblemon.species.epochfeebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.epochfeebas.desc: Although unattractive and unpopular, its marvelous vitality has made it a subject of research.
cobblemon.species.epochmilotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.epochmilotic.desc: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokmon of all.
cobblemon.species.epochseedot.name: Seedot
cobblemon.species.epochseedot.desc: They hunt in small groups as their small stature allows them to go unnoticed until it is too late when they are able to quickly outnumber their prey.
cobblemon.species.epochnuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
cobblemon.species.epochnuzleaf.desc: The torch it holds is precious to it. When it evolves from a Seedot, it finds and bonds with a torch and treats it as an extension of its body.
cobblemon.species.epochshiftry.name: Shiftry
cobblemon.species.epochshiftry.desc: It is feared by rangers because an upset Shiftry is able to create bushfires simply by fiercely fanning its leaf arms together.
cobblemon.species.epochralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.epochralts.desc: It tries to keep to itself and stays in secluded environments away from other people because of trust issues.
cobblemon.species.epochkirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.epochkirlia.desc: It can channel its negative emotions into its attacks adding a level of intensity that would otherwise not be present.
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.epochgardevoir.desc: It has managed to overcome its insecurities and triumph over those who attempted to suppress or belittle it when it was in its earlier stages.
cobblemon.species.epochnumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.epochnumel.desc: When it is happy, it can trigger a fountain of steam to come out from the pool on its back.
cobblemon.species.epochcamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.epochcamerupt.desc: Due to the reservoir on its back, it is able to endure for long periods without water. Consequently, it is often used as a beast of burden.
cobblemon.species.epochazurill.name: Azurill
cobblemon.species.epochazurill.desc: It is surprisingly resilient and can take a lot of punishment because of the foam material it is made from.
cobblemon.species.epochpoochyena.name: Poochyena
cobblemon.species.epochpoochyena.desc: It is a scavenger on tundras and open snowy fields. Its fur blends well into its environment that it seemingly shows up out of no where because of its agility.
cobblemon.species.epochmightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.epochmightyena.desc: It acts as an alpha for a pack of other smaller Poochyena. It can coordinate and direct small hunting groups to close in on weaker prey like Stantler.
cobblemon.species.epochabsol.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.epochabsol.desc: Its speed is unparalleled, that rumours have begun to swirl that it is actually a favoured pet or messenger of the Gods.
cobblemon.species.epochbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.epochbeldum.desc: It is said to be an alien inhabiting an interstellar object that crash landed in the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochmetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.epochmetang.desc: It was sent to the Orion Region to adapt, evolve and study the local population. It transmits knowledge to its interstellar owner seamlessly.
cobblemon.species.epochmetagross.name: Metagross
cobblemon.species.epochmetagross.desc: As it has studied its surroundings, it has gradually adapted its form into a format that has a 98.6% chance of success in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochmeditite.name: Meditite
cobblemon.species.epochmeditite.desc: It is found in mountainous areas as it believes that by enduring harsh climates and adversity, it can find true salvation and inner peace.
cobblemon.species.epochmedicham.name: Medicham
cobblemon.species.epochmedicham.desc: Its dedication to a balanced diet, meditation, and sacrifice has allowed it to manifest power in the metaphysical realm.
cobblemon.species.epochnincada.name: Nincada
cobblemon.species.epochnincada.desc: It harbours two conflicting energies deep within its body, that are in constant battle with one another, vying for escape.
cobblemon.species.epochninjask.name: Ninjask
cobblemon.species.epochninjask.desc: It represents a demonic energy that was condemned to Nincada's shell. Following its evolution, it was able to manifest in its true form.
cobblemon.species.epochshedinja.name: Shedinja
cobblemon.species.epochshedinja.desc: It represents the vacant shell of the Nincada that was left behind following the release of the cursed energy within it that eventually became a Ninjask.
cobblemon.species.epochlileep.name: Lileep
cobblemon.species.epochlileep.desc: This Pokmon can be restored from a fossil. It is said that the centrifugal force it was able to generate allowed it to become airborne.
cobblemon.species.epochcradily.name: Cradily
cobblemon.species.epochcradily.desc: When it is in danger, it is able to use the gale force winds it can create to blow away potential predators, discouraging them from chasing it.
cobblemon.species.epochcacnea.name: Cacnea
cobblemon.species.epochcacnea.desc: There is a story for small children that says that Cacnea came to life when a child gave it a carrot for a nose.
cobblemon.species.epochcacturne.name: Cacturne
cobblemon.species.epochcacturne.desc: It is constantly at risk of turning into a lifeless object if the carrot is removed from its nose, so it is very protective of it.
cobblemon.species.epochtaillow.name: Taillow
cobblemon.species.epochtaillow.desc: They are considered pests by many urban dwellers as they often perch themselves on the rooftops or balconies of tall urban buildings.
cobblemon.species.epochswellow.name: Swellow
cobblemon.species.epochswellow.desc: It is able to produce a laugh that resembles a cackle. It often harasses urban dwellers and then will retreat back to their perches on tall buildings.
cobblemon.species.epochspheal.name: Spheal
cobblemon.species.epochspheal.desc: This Pokmon's body is covered in blubber and is impressively round. Despite its tuft of hair, it's faster for Spheal to roll around than walk.
cobblemon.species.epochsealeo.name: Sealeo
cobblemon.species.epochsealeo.desc: This Pokmon enjoys having its mane brushed and will happily clap when you play with its ears.
cobblemon.species.epochwalrein.name: Walrein
cobblemon.species.epochwalrein.desc: Walrein's tusks are incredibly valued by poachers. However, they are very aggressive and poachers do not find the hunt for these Pokemon's tusks easy.
cobblemon.species.epochsurskit.name: Surskit
cobblemon.species.epochsurskit.desc: It is often found hovering around ponds and large reeds so that it can surprise other water-dwelling Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerain.name: Masquerain
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerain.desc: In the absence of any strong winds, it flies closely to the surface of water to create shimmers that travel throughout the body of water.
cobblemon.species.epochwingull.name: Wingull
cobblemon.species.epochwingull.desc: It frequents beaches and steals food from vacationers. Allegedly, they have a cove somewhere where they hoard all of their finds.
cobblemon.species.epochpelipper.name: Pelipper
cobblemon.species.epochpelipper.desc: It often travels with groups of Wingull as their quasi-leader. They are highly organized and can order the Wingulls to attack in unison.
cobblemon.species.epochelectrike.name: Electrike
cobblemon.species.epochelectrike.desc: It wears a skull of an animal it scavenged as a sort of trophy to protect itself. No one has actually seen what it looks like under the skull.
cobblemon.species.epochmanectric.name: Manectric
cobblemon.species.epochmanectric.desc: When it evolved, the skull it scavenged as an Electrike became a part of its features, that they can no longer be independently removed.
cobblemon.species.epochtorkoal.name: Torkoal
cobblemon.species.epochtorkoal.desc: Despite being a storm cloud, it is often found hovering around high altitude environments such as mountainous regions.
cobblemon.species.epochroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.epochroselia.desc: It can execute moves and dances with eloquence that invokes confidence and inspiration among those privileged to watch it fight.
cobblemon.species.epochabsolone.name: Absol
cobblemon.species.epochabsolone.desc: Rumour has it that this Pokemon is able to see the future and uses it for combat superiority.
cobblemon.species.epochsableyeone.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.epochsableyeone.desc: This Pokmon scrounges on dead algae on the sea floor or in dark underwater caves because it is incapable of hunting well for itself.
cobblemon.species.epochswabluone.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.epochswabluone.desc: When these Pokemon giggle, it will create a nearby thunderclap, so whatever you do, do not tickle them!
cobblemon.species.epochaltariaone.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.epochaltariaone.desc: These Altaria fly into stormy clouds to attract lightning as a means of healing themselves and boosting their own power.
cobblemon.species.epochsurskitone.name: Surskit
cobblemon.species.epochsurskitone.desc: It masks itself as a seed of a larger fruit but it is actually a scavenger that likes to eat a lot of that fruit.
cobblemon.species.epochmasquerainone.des: The leaves on its wings remain as an autumn colour, regardless of the season.
cobblemon.species.epochclamperl.name: Clamperl
cobblemon.species.epochclamperl.desc: This Pokemon is in a perpetual state of fear that it has sealed itself off in a psychic bubble. It is terrified of bugs and of the darkness in particular.
cobblemon.species.epochhuntail.name: Huntail
cobblemon.species.epochhuntail.desc: This Pokemon lives in the abyssal depths of the ocean; put your hand too close to its mouth and you risk losing it.
cobblemon.species.epochgorebyss.name: Gorebyss
cobblemon.species.epochgorebyss.desc: This pokemon lives in vast schools consisting of thousands of members. It is the common prey of Wailmer and Wailord.
cobblemon.species.epochskittyone.name: Skitty
cobblemon.species.epochskittyone.desc: A T. Skitty is very protective of the weed on its tail. It is rumoured that if a strong breeze blows it away, the Skitty will also perish.
cobblemon.species.epochdelcattyone.name: Delcatty
cobblemon.species.epochdelcattyone.desc: While the weed always remains aesthetically pleasing, larger ones can start to slow down and cause back problems for certain older T. Delcatties.
cobblemon.species.epochnumelone.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.epochnumelone.desc: Its breath can crystallize the air around it into snowflakes.
cobblemon.species.epochcameruptone.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.epochcameruptone.desc: The mountain on its back is able to create small localized snow squalls that make it snow around it.
cobblemon.species.epochzigzagoon.name: Zigzagoon
cobblemon.species.epochzigzagoon.desc: Zigzagoons are ordinarily not strong enough to hunt by themselves and instead feast on what is discarded by stronger predators in their habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochlinoone.name: Linoone
cobblemon.species.epochlinoone.desc: The spots that form on its skin are from its poor dietary choices it made as a Zigzagoon.
cobblemon.species.epochtrapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.epochtrapinch.desc: It allows the small snow structure on its nose act as a trap. When potential prey approach, it will quickly snap at them.
cobblemon.species.epochvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.epochvibrava.desc: It frequently comes out in the early morning to feast on the bugs and other small critters that come out from the snow.
cobblemon.species.epochflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.epochflygon.desc: This Pokmon hides in the heart of blizzards it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
cobblemon.species.epochshuppet.name: Shuppet
cobblemon.species.epochshuppet.desc: This Pokemon is used to cheer up sick children in hospitals, however, many children have developed a fear of them instead.
cobblemon.species.epochbanette.name: Banette
cobblemon.species.epochbanette.desc: This Pokemon is used to produce entertainment for entitled royalty. It harbours a seething hatred for the court in which it performs.
cobblemon.species.epochwhismur.name: Whismur
cobblemon.species.epochwhismur.desc: It just enjoys vibing. Nothing and no one will stop it from having a good time.
cobblemon.species.epochloudred.name: Loudred
cobblemon.species.epochloudred.desc: This Pokemon is the life of the party. It can drop a sick beat and has better moves than most humans.
cobblemon.species.epochexploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.epochexploud.desc: This Pokemon likes to constantly yell 'Turn down for what?!' for some reason.
cobblemon.species.epochcorphish.name: Corphish
cobblemon.species.epochcorphish.desc: It congregates along beaches and show off by crushing progressively larger rocks in its pincers to attract potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochcrawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
cobblemon.species.epochcrawdaunt.desc: It often groups in small bands along seashores and coves. In large enough groups, they are used to raid local fishing villages.
cobblemon.species.epochanorith.name: Anorith
cobblemon.species.epochanorith.desc: Despite their small stature, the venom from its pincers were said to be able to incapacitate much larger predators.
cobblemon.species.epocharmaldo.name: Armaldo
cobblemon.species.epocharmaldo.desc: In prehistoric times, Armaldo would use the boulders on their back to provide them with shelter from the scorching sun.
cobblemon.species.epochbagon.name: Bagon
cobblemon.species.epochbagon.desc: This Pokemon is a playful creature by nature, but it needs to be reined in because it can inadvertently start large fires if it gets up to too much trouble.
cobblemon.species.epochshelgon.name: Shelgon
cobblemon.species.epochshelgon.desc: The molten shell on its body should not be allowed to cool otherwise it will become significantly weighed down and immobilize it under the weight.
cobblemon.species.epochsalamence.name: Salamence
cobblemon.species.epochsalamence.desc: It is rumoured that this is not even its final form, and it can transform into a much more fearsome multi-headed creature.
cobblemon.species.epochnosepassone.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.epochnosepassone.desc: It is often used as a portable light source but its stubby legs means it often needs to be carried around since it can't usually keep up with walking speed.
cobblemon.species.epochslakoth.name: Slakoth
cobblemon.species.epochslakoth.desc: This Pokemon is said to hibernate throughout the year. It's not clear how this is possible.
cobblemon.species.epochvigoroth.name: Vigoroth
cobblemon.species.epochvigoroth.desc: When this Pokemon was first fed a Chople Berry, it said in response fam, this berry tastes low key sus af tho fr ong
cobblemon.species.epochslaking.name: Slaking
cobblemon.species.epochslaking.desc: This Pokemon is quick to anger when it is awoken from its sleep or hungry. Many dare not to disturb it.
cobblemon.species.epochchimecho.name: Chimecho
cobblemon.species.epochchimecho.desc: It emits its electrical field whenever it meets a stranger to protect itself. It will only lower the field when it trusts that person.
cobblemon.species.epochroseliaone.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.epochroseliaone.desc: The thorns on this Pokemon can cause very deep gashes. Even experienced florists need to be very careful when handling this Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochlotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.epochlotad.desc: This Pokmon lives in deserts and masquerades as an ordinary cactus to hide from predators while is is still young.
cobblemon.species.epochlombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.epochlombre.desc: This Pokemon thrives in intense sunlight. It retains fresh water so lost wanderers in the desert will typically ask it for water when they are thirsty.
cobblemon.species.epochludicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.epochludicolo.desc: This Pokemon can launch its barbs in a volley at an enemy when annoyed. Its happy-go-lucky attitude should not be taken for granted.
cobblemon.species.epochfeebasone.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.epochfeebasone.desc: This Pokemon enjoys frolicking in hot lava, as a result, its population has grown significantly because it has no natural predators in this habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochmiloticone.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.epochmiloticone.desc: This Pokemon tends to attract lava to its skin that will rapidly cool and slow it down when it sleeps, so it tends to only take quick naps.
cobblemon.species.epochskitty.name: Skitty
cobblemon.species.epochskitty.desc: An evil spirit that was being hunted quickly possessed a nearby Skitty due to the latter being a relatively easy target.
cobblemon.species.epochdelcatty.name: Delcatty
cobblemon.species.epochdelcatty.desc: When the Skitty that was possessed by an evil spirit evolved, this made the latent spirit stronger and more demonic.
cobblemon.species.ionosiantrapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.ionosianvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.ionosianflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.avalossiantreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.avalossiantreecko.desc: Living in the rocky mountains of Fliga, Treecko prefer to snack on minerals to provide nutrients to its sturdy skin.
cobblemon.species.avalossiangrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.avalossianralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.avalossianralts.desc: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokmon, its body warms up slightly.
cobblemon.species.avalossiankirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.avalossiankirlia.desc: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
cobblemon.species.avalossiangardevoir.de: Avalossian Gardevoir are still protectors by nature, but rather than bond with trainers, it seems to have sworn itself to an ancient order of sorts. They can grant the sword in their chest to worthy warriors, or use it themselves.
cobblemon.species.avalossianslakoth.name: Slakoth
cobblemon.species.avalossianvigoroth.des: Avalossian Vigoroth are just as energetic as their cousins in the Hoenn region, though due to their odd diet of poisonous fruits and berries, they appear more sluggish. Along with their stumbling gait, they possess a potent anger paired with a sluggish brain.
cobblemon.species.avalossiannincada.name: Nincada
cobblemon.species.avalossianduskull.name: Duskull
cobblemon.species.enjinnianelectrike.des: Static electricity builds up all over its body as strands of its long fur rub together. This Pokmon boasts incredible speed.
cobblemon.species.enjinnianmanectric.des: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
cobblemon.species.enjinniansableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.neocacnea.name: Cacnea
cobblemon.species.neocacnea.desc: They ram into cliff faces to toughen up their bodies, growing round bumps on their heads from the impact. A telltale rattling sound inside a Cacnea's arms warns that it's readying a painful spiked punch.
cobblemon.species.novranhuntail.name: NovranHuntail
cobblemon.species.novranhuntail.desc: A terrifying predator of the abyss, often called a sea monster. Sailors tell stories of massive Huntail surfacing at night to swallow seafaring vessels whole.
cobblemon.species.novrangorebyss.name: NovranGorebyss
cobblemon.species.novrangorebyss.desc: The thick slime coating its body numbs its prey. It moves with such grace that its prey stays charmed by it even as it drains their fluids with a kiss.
cobblemon.species.qamoranspoink.name: Spoink
cobblemon.species.qamoranspoink.desc: Spoink use their hard, spikey tail to bash their enemies. They stick together in packs and gang up on weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.qamorangrumpig.name: Grumpig
cobblemon.species.qamorangrumpig.desc: Grumpig act like admins to Spoink, making them do the hard work as they nap lazily on beaches. But even they have to report to their Boss when it calls for them.
cobblemon.species.norheimanwailmer.name: Wailmer
cobblemon.species.norheimannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.norheimancorphish.name: Corphish
cobblemon.species.varitasianswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.varitasianswablu.desc: Living in ponds among water plants caused its cottony wings to become filled with seeds and plant matter over time. It uses its new appearance to help camouflage itself.
cobblemon.species.varitasianaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.varitasianaltaria.desc: As they swim, their cottony wings soak up water which helps sustain them. Many people enjoy their company and set up special ponds dedicated to housing them and feeding them.
cobblemon.species.avorianroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.avorianroselia.desc: It flaunts its glowing flowers while dancing in a flaming manner. It has adapted to transforming solar light energy into chemical energy that ignites when it comes into contact with air.
cobblemon.species.hiziannosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.hiziannosepass.desc: This Nosepass variant's body is composed of out of a unique mineral. It is highly magnetic allowing it to walk on cave walls and ceillings.
cobblemon.species.hizianskitty.name: Skitty
cobblemon.species.hizianskitty.desc: They are extremely playful and full of energy, once all that energy is burned they fall asleep for many hours.
cobblemon.species.hiziandelcatty.name: Delcatty
cobblemon.species.hiziandelcatty.desc: It will actively groom itself whenever it thinks its dirty. If another Pokemon touches their fur, they will spend most of the day cleaning themselves.
cobblemon.species.hizianaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.hizianaron.desc: Its horns are used to defend itself since it doesn't live in groups unlike its mountain counterparts. When the night comes, it buries itself in the sand to avoid the freezing temperatures.
