cobblemon.species.hizianlairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.hizianlairon.desc: Other Pokemon refrain from attacking Lairon due to its large intimidating horns. Because of that, it usually ends up growing lazy and unfazed by danger.
cobblemon.species.hizianaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.hizianaggron.desc: Their large curved horns are used to grab and toss their opponents. Not even the most dense and powerful sandstorm can scratch its rock hard armor.
cobblemon.species.hizianlileep.name: Lileep
cobblemon.species.hizianlileep.desc: Reanimated from an unusually light Root Fossil. Its glowing tentacles are extremely sticky and captures anything that comes close to it.
cobblemon.species.hiziancradily.name: Cradily
cobblemon.species.hiziancradily.desc: Its tentacles rotate in a vortex motion attracting anything that sets eyes on them, it then suffocates its prey by wrapping them with its tentacles.
cobblemon.species.hiziananorith.name: Anorith
cobblemon.species.hiziananorith.desc: Reanimated from an unusually large Claw Fossil, it has powerful serrated claws capable of crushing even the hardest shell.
cobblemon.species.hizianarmaldo.name: Armaldo
cobblemon.species.hizianarmaldo.desc: Its believed to be one of the first apex predators. Terrible dragon energy courses its body, scaring away anything that might challenge it.
cobblemon.species.hiziantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.hiziantropius.desc: Large and heavy fruit grow out of its neck and back making it very exausting to walk around, so it spends most of time partially submerged in the water.
cobblemon.species.hizianluvdisc.name: Luvdisc
cobblemon.species.hizianluvdisc.desc: Its said to appear to those who lost their loved ones. Its sight was dreaded by sailors with family at home.
cobblemon.species.aristosiantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.aristosiantropius.desc: This rare Pokemon hides from people in dense forests as it's targeted by poachers for its spikes and sweet tail.
cobblemon.species.egholotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.egholotad.desc: Lotad were used to carry ingredients for chefs many years ago, eventually adapting to serve other purposes in the kitchen. Lotad is a naturally occurring stove top.
cobblemon.species.egholombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.egholombre.desc: The flat surface on top of its head sits at a constant 350 degrees Fahrenheit, making it perfect for frying almost any dish a chef could dream up.
cobblemon.species.egholudicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.egholudicolo.desc: Anything cooked atop its head gains a unique flavor, which is different for each individual Ludicolo. Some restaurants main attraction is a specific Ludicolo flavoring.
cobblemon.species.eghoazurill.name: Azurill
cobblemon.species.eghoazurill.desc: At birth, the tip of Azurill's tail holds a pebble no larger than a grain of sand. Over time, the pebble grows into a rock too large for Azurill to carry, forcing it to evolve.
cobblemon.species.eghoswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.eghoswablu.desc: Swablu tuck themselves into the cottony feathers they have to keep warm during blizzards. Flocks hum in unison as they're bundled up.
cobblemon.species.eghoaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.eghoaltaria.desc: Altaria's body is so cold that it sometimes freezes the moisture in the air around it into crystals. If you hear an Altaria's song, you can be sure a hail storm is coming.
cobblemon.species.deltatreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.deltatreecko.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SixteenDraws. It takes up residence within dojos where it trains against humans and Pokemon alike.
cobblemon.species.deltagrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.deltagrovyle.desc: As its skill grows, so does its fighting spirit. Its strength is great enough to stand on par with black belts.
cobblemon.species.deltasceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.deltasceptile.desc: After becoming a master of its dojo, it begins to regain its primal instincts. Its draconic traits cause it to have no equal within the karate world.
cobblemon.species.deltatorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.deltatorchic.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. From birth it has the ability to give orders to other wild Pokemon and have them obey without question.
cobblemon.species.deltacombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.deltacombusken.desc: It lazes about while giving its underlings commands. Its power is believed by some to have been bestowed upon it by gods of unknown origin.
cobblemon.species.deltablaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.deltablaziken.desc: It soars to amazing heights, storing power that it draws from the sun. Even when it cannot be seen from the ground below, it keeps a watchful eye on those it protects.
cobblemon.species.deltalotad.name: Lotad
cobblemon.species.deltalotad.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Kalorian. It is known to entertain small Pokemon by performing magic tricks for them.
cobblemon.species.deltalombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.deltalombre.desc: From morning until night, it trains and practices its magic. During the evening it puts on magic shows for large crowds.
cobblemon.species.deltaludicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.deltaludicolo.desc: Its knowledge and strength make it a common source of advice for its community. It produces massive barriers to protect those important to it.
cobblemon.species.deltaseedot.name: Seedot
cobblemon.species.deltaseedot.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SketchyGamer. Its face flashes at varying frequencies depending on its mood at time.
cobblemon.species.deltanuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
cobblemon.species.deltanuzleaf.desc: Though it has a cloud around its waist, it is still too heavy to levitate. It clings to its cloud desperately whenever someone gets too close to it.
cobblemon.species.deltashiftry.name: Shiftry
cobblemon.species.deltashiftry.desc: It is said to appear suddenly during thunderstorms. When it needs to feed, it will insert its arms into electrical outlets.
cobblemon.species.deltaralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.deltaralts.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird and Zero_Breaker. It uses its own ice and electricity to help make its trainer's life easier.
cobblemon.species.deltakirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.deltakirlia.desc: This Pokemon loves dancing to swing music. As it grows more excited from dancing, it generates sparks and snow begins to fall within the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.deltagardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.deltagardevoir.desc: To protect its trainer, it can drop the temperature of itself and its surroundings to 0K. It discharges sparks when nuzzling trainers to keep them from freezing.
cobblemon.species.deltasableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.deltasableye.desc: A Delta Species discovered by SketchyGamer. It digs deep holes into the earth in search of charcoal and molten rocks, which it uses for food.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltasableye.name: DeltaSableye
cobblemon.species.deltamawile.name: Mawile
cobblemon.species.deltamawile.desc: A Delta Species discovered by spimission. Luring foes with its innocence and sweet appearance, it devours them and sends nutrients through the vines on its head.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltamawile.name: DeltaMawile
cobblemon.species.deltaaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.deltaaron.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Draexzhan. Cracks in its armor allow more and more flames to escape as it takes damage.
cobblemon.species.deltalairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.deltalairon.desc: A territorial Pokemon that defends its land by releasing bursts of flames from within its armor. Deafening explosions can be heard when it collides with objects.
cobblemon.species.deltaaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.deltaaggron.desc: It aggressively pursues stronger opponents each and every day. The gouges in its armor generate more flames and allow it to boast more of its strength.
cobblemon.species.deltameditite.name: Meditite
cobblemon.species.deltameditite.desc: A Delta Species discovered by ensentiumseraph. Its powerful, goat-like legs allow it to scale steep mountain walls with little to no difficulty.
cobblemon.species.deltamedicham.name: Medicham
cobblemon.species.deltamedicham.desc: A deep love for nature runs through this Pokemon's veins. It will immediately begin dancing to music featuring pipes or cymbals.
cobblemon.species.deltaplusle.name: Plusle
cobblemon.species.deltaplusle.desc: A Delta Species discovered by powerpow. It is cheerful and warms up its friends using its fiery power.
cobblemon.species.deltaminun.name: Minun
cobblemon.species.deltaminun.desc: A Delta Species discovered by powerpow. It is quite jovial and cools down its friends using its icy power.
cobblemon.species.deltaroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.deltaroselia.desc: This Pokemon can be found on clear nights, dancing before the moon. If discovered, it puts onlookers to sleep and flees into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.deltawailmer.name: Wailmer
cobblemon.species.deltawailmer.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. Currently, it is still unknown how this Pokemon manages to keep itself in the air despite its weight.
cobblemon.species.deltawailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.deltawailord.desc: Hail falls over the land below as this Pokemon flies. It is suspected that the phrase 'the sky is falling' originated due to its shadow blanketing the ground.
cobblemon.species.deltanumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.deltanumel.desc: A Delta Species discovered by bradleyinabox. The first of its kind was known to have appeared at the ground zero of a nuclear explosion.
cobblemon.species.deltacamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.deltacamerupt.desc: This Pokemon feeds on nuclear radiation. It has been shown that atoms within its vicinity become more and more unstable as its temper reaches its peak.
cobblemon.species.deltafeebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.deltafeebas.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. Though it desires to scare strangers, it is timid and oftentimes ends up frightening itself instead.
cobblemon.species.deltamilotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.deltamilotic.desc: It is known to lurk within graveyards. Memories from the life of its skeleton inspire it to ruthlessly protect a worthy master.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltamilotic.name: DeltaMilotic
cobblemon.species.deltasnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.deltasnorunt.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. It is said that this Pokemon helps to guard volcanoes and deep caves from intruders.
cobblemon.species.deltaglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.deltaglalie.desc: This Pokemon has the power to evaporate entire oceans with a single breath.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltaglalie.name: DeltaGlalie
cobblemon.species.deltaclamperl.name: Clamperl
cobblemon.species.deltaclamperl.desc: A Delta Species discovered by yungbro. It catches prey in its jaws by pretending to be an unassuming shellfish.
cobblemon.species.deltahuntail.name: Huntail
cobblemon.species.deltahuntail.desc: A savage creature which prefers to live in solitude within dark caves. If another organism ventures into its domain, it will assault them relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.deltagorebyss.name: Gorebyss
cobblemon.species.deltagorebyss.desc: A friendly creature which prefers to share its living space with other cave-dwelling Pokemon. It prefers the warmth of tropical climates.
cobblemon.species.deltaspiderbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.deltaspiderbeldum.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. It builds webs in trees, ensnaring prey, and then subdues them with its venom.
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetang.desc: The string it produces is both unnaturally thin and impossibly strong. Clothing weaved together using its silk is flexible yet stronger than titanium.
cobblemon.species.deltaspidermetagross.d: Rather than resorting to capturing prey using webs, it resorts to other trickery. Foes entering its domain may see it as a tiger, a demon, or a giant spider.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinbeldum.name: Beldum
cobblemon.species.deltaruinbeldum.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk and Cowctus. It is said that beneath its rough exterior exists a crystal shard of unimaginable value.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetang.desc: As multiple altered Beldums come into contact with each other, their crystals resonate, causing their cores to fuse. They then reconstruct into a single entity.
cobblemon.species.deltaruinmetagross.des: After two altered Metang fuse into this Pokemon, all but the exterior of its body is composed of crystal. Additional crystals allow it to break free of its rocky shell.
cobblemon.species.deltaregirock.name: Regirock
cobblemon.species.deltaregirock.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Being made of sand, it can easily replenish itself and in some cases ward off Water-type attacks with ease.
cobblemon.species.deltaregice.name: Regice
cobblemon.species.deltaregice.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Though its entire body is composed of water, it is unable to alter its molecules into that of a gas or a solid.
cobblemon.species.deltaregisteel.name: Registeel
cobblemon.species.deltaregisteel.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Lucci85. Its emergence from pools of magma is said to be blinding due to its core glowing with extreme heat.
cobblemon.species.roseliax.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.roseliax.desc: Using the auricular organs on its arms, Roselia amplifies the range of its voice. It can even break rocks at full volume.
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.name: Carvanha
cobblemon.species.carvanhax.desc: It perpetually floats upside down on the surface of the water. Apparently, it doesn't feed on anything to survive.
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.name: Sharpedo
cobblemon.species.sharpedox.desc: This Pokemon may have appeared long time ago, since very ancient sailors' tales already told of a creature used to devour ships to make them its den.
cobblemon.species.cacneax.name: Cacnea
cobblemon.species.cacneax.desc: Because its appearance resembles a severed head, everyone who fights this Cacnea is scared to death.
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.name: Cacturne
cobblemon.species.cacturnex.desc: Its internal body is made of a straw-like material. It shoots its needles to cast cursed spell against enemies.
cobblemon.species.seviianfeebas.name: Feebas
cobblemon.species.seviianmilotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.alteranshroomish.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.alteranshroomish.desc: With its striking red cap, it sticks out in its forest habitat. Because it carries such a potent toxin, predators know to leave it alone.
cobblemon.species.alteranbreloom.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.alteranbreloom.desc: Its strikes have less force behind them than its cousins from Hoenn. However, the deadly spores it delivers with each blow definitely pack a punch!
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.armiransceptile.desc: It recides by itself, and is extremely competitive. This Pokemon disintergrates trees and plants.
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.name: Swellow
cobblemon.species.armiranswellow.desc: It can induce thunderstorms to create attacks. It often targets fishing ships to steal food from netting.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.ayreiantreecko.desc: Quite skittish, its diet primarily consists of twigs and leaves. It mimetizes with the environment to escape danger.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrovyle.desc: The sheer power gained from evolution changed this Pokemon's metabolism, as it now behaves like an ambush predator.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.ayreiansceptile.desc: It can adapt to any and all environments, sitting at the top of the food chain. Because of this, they are an invasive species in most areas of the world.
cobblemon.species.ayreianzigzagoon.name: Zigzagoon
cobblemon.species.ayreianzigzagoon.desc: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlinoone.name: Linoone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlinoone.desc: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
cobblemon.species.ayreianshroomish.name: Shroomish
cobblemon.species.ayreianshroomish.desc: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbreloom.name: Breloom
cobblemon.species.ayreianbreloom.desc: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
cobblemon.species.ayreianralts.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.ayreianralts.desc: Its black plumage is said to bring misfortune to others near it.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.ayreiankirlia.desc: It uses wind currents to dance about in the night sky, even while hunting.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.ayreiangardevoir.desc: It has a latent power to read minds. A folktale tells that, long ago, this Pokemon and its 'mirrored image' served a malicious king.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.ayreiantropius.desc: The bunch of fruit around its neck, while delicious, is fiercely guarded by Tropius. They nest in the secluded depths of jungles.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnorunt.desc: It attaches itself to the ceiling of volcanic caves to absorb heat, which it then releases to fly around.
cobblemon.species.ayreianglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.ayreianglalie.desc: It can shoot concentrated energy waves from its horns. Its fire burns with a bright blue when it's enraged.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.ayreiantorchic.desc: Their immense ghostly energy allows them to summon additional limbs for a short time, but their inexperience makes them quite clumsy.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.desc: They blend in seemlessly with the shadows, which enable an easy ambush. When ignored, they will sometimes attack their own trainer.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.desc: Wild and unpredictable, their legs kick the life out of their opponents. The floating limbs disappear if they stray too far from the main body.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.desc: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.desc: When Aron evolves, it leaves behind molten pebbles. In ancient times, people would collect Aron's shed rocks to warm themselves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon emits high amounts of steam. Close inspection of their magma armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.desc: The temperature inside Aggron's core can be compared to that of an industrial furnace. When threatened, it blows molten rock out of the pores on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.desc: It will fire rapid strikes from the toxic flowers on its hands if it feels threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.desc: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.desc: While cute and seemingly docile, it angers really quickly. They nest in areas most often hit by thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.desc: Only seen during thunderstorms, they brave the dark skies uncontested in both ferocity and boldness.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.name: Lunatone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.desc: Different types of music can be heard coming from it, depending on the mood it's in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.name: Relicanth
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.desc: Said to be an incredibly old species gone extinct, a few specimen have begun appearing near the shores of Ayrei. They look lifeless at a glance.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.name: Luvdisc
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.desc: It floats about pretending to be dead, waiting for its prey to approach before attacking.
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.desc: A warrior in training, Roselia hone their skills, becoming fearsome despite their short size. They are known for their excellent offensive and defensive capabilities.
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.name: Spinda
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.desc: By the grace of Ho-Ohs ashes, Spinda walked the wheel of life and attained enlightenment. Strategists and sages alike sought out its guidance.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.desc: It enjoys blasting Grunge music everywhere it goes. The orange patterns on its body are similar to guitar strings and ripped jeans.
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.windycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.windycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.

cobblemon.species.smoggycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.

cobblemon.species.zennycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.desc: Tropius thrives in Kaskade's ever-changing weather because the ground in which it roots is rich in nutrients. They are quiet pokemon, but when furious, their roots transform into powerful weapons that can swiftly overwhelm enemies.
cobblemon.species.mystictreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.mysticgrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.desc: After becoming a master of its dojo, it begins to regain its primal instincts. Its draconic traits cause it to have no equal within the karate world.
cobblemon.species.mystictorchic.name: Torchic

cobblemon.species.trizorangible.name: Gible

cobblemon.species.trizorangarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.norsegible.name: Gible
cobblemon.species.norsegabite.name: Gabite
cobblemon.species.norsegarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.epochturtwig.name: Turtwig
cobblemon.species.epochturtwig.desc: The volcanic formation on its back is relatively immature so the embers that are still hardening are very hot and occasionally smoke.
cobblemon.species.epochgrotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.epochgrotle.desc: The volcanic formation on its back has hardened but there are small vents that have created that allow the built in heat to periodically escape.
cobblemon.species.epochtorterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.epochtorterra.desc: It is recommended to keep a short distance away as the volcanic formation on its back periodically releases short bouts of lava and smoke.
cobblemon.species.epochchimchar.name: Chimchar
cobblemon.species.epochchimchar.desc: Because of its size and speed, it can dash very quickly that it almost appears to be teleporting from one place to another.
cobblemon.species.epochmonferno.name: Monferno
cobblemon.species.epochmonferno.desc: Due to its speed, it is able to create illusions of itself that can encircle and confuse a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochinfernape.name: Infernape
cobblemon.species.epochinfernape.desc: It uses its bo staff to enable it to land multiple blows on its foe. When the foe comes to retaliate, it is able to zap away.
cobblemon.species.epochpiplup.name: Piplup
cobblemon.species.epochpiplup.desc: It is not very good at walking and falls over easily. When it falls behind its group, it needs to quickly waddle to catch up.
cobblemon.species.epochprinplup.name: Prinplup
cobblemon.species.epochprinplup.desc: They are strong divers and often hunt for small fish Pokemon in freezing waters.
cobblemon.species.epochempoleon.name: Empoleon
cobblemon.species.epochempoleon.desc: It is the leader of a small colony of Piplup and Prinplup. Each colony usually only has one male Empoleon as the king and one female as the queen.
cobblemon.species.epochprobopass.name: Probopass
cobblemon.species.epochprobopass.desc: It is seen as a spiritual elder within its local tribe because its psychic potential allows it to command the respect and obedience of its compatriots.
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.epochtangrowth.desc: After constantly being tossed around in the harsh desert winds, it has grown in mass and can sometimes found to be holding water.
cobblemon.species.epochfinneon.name: Finneon
cobblemon.species.epochfinneon.desc: Depending on the temperature of the water it swims in, the colour of its body and fins will change accordingly.
cobblemon.species.epochlumineon.name: Lumineon
cobblemon.species.epochlumineon.desc: It changes the colour of the eye design that it has on its sides to attract mates. This pattern can also be used to blind pursuing predators.
cobblemon.species.epochgliscor.name: Gliscor
cobblemon.species.epochgliscor.desc: Late at night, they are known to congregate on rooftops, but do not count on seeing them move during the daytime.
cobblemon.species.epochdrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.epochdrifloon.desc: The fact that it is filled with helium makes it very lightweight and prone to fly off into the wind unless restrained down to the ground.
cobblemon.species.epochdrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.epochdrifblim.desc: The hot air that is used to power it and help it move can burn a person if they get too close.
cobblemon.species.epochbonsly.name: Bonsly
cobblemon.species.epochbonsly.desc: It can be found near other cacti as a flower growing in an otherwise desolate environment.
cobblemon.species.epochelectivire.name: Electivire
cobblemon.species.epochelectivire.desc: It will fight any foe as every fight, regardless of the outcome, is a learning moment that it uses to get stronger.
cobblemon.species.epochmagmortar.name: Magmortar
cobblemon.species.epochmagmortar.desc: It likes to sink ice breaker ships by blasting them with solid chunks of ice. It has caused millions in damages to local governments.
cobblemon.species.epochhippopotas.name: Hippopotas
cobblemon.species.epochhippopotas.desc: It is able to jump into puddles and rapidly absorb the water up. For this reason, they are used frequently to clean up spills.
cobblemon.species.epochhippowdon.name: Hippowdon
cobblemon.species.epochhippowdon.desc: The tree on its back renders its ability to hide from predators moot, so it has learned to defend itself by being very aggressive.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzor.name: Bronzor
cobblemon.species.epochbronzor.desc: It was once used to guard sacred temples and ruins. Over time, the effects of weather have worn away at it and vines have grown over it.
cobblemon.species.epochbronzong.name: Bronzong
cobblemon.species.epochbronzong.desc: Some say this Pokemon was once an idol that early civilizations prayed to so it would bring rain and crops would be allowed to grow.
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoir.name: Dusknoir
cobblemon.species.epochdusknoir.desc: It is capable of basking its entire body in flame and recklessly charging the enemy.
cobblemon.species.epochleafeon.name: Leafeon
cobblemon.species.epochleafeon.desc: Its wing-like membrane is sticky, allowing it to fly through the air and catch smaller insects in them for it to feed on.
cobblemon.species.epochglaceon.name: Glaceon
cobblemon.species.epochglaceon.desc: It adorns itself in gems in a futile attempt to deceive trainers into loving it. This however has led to it being hunted for its valuable minerals.
cobblemon.species.epochshellos.name: Shellos
cobblemon.species.epochshellos.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodon.name: Gastrodon
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodon.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?

cobblemon.species.epochshellosone.desc: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.

cobblemon.species.epochgastrodonten.desc: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochshelloseleven.des: It is an invasive species from another universe. Apparently, it is able to mimic the appearance of popular Dragon-type Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochgastrodoneleven.d: It's unclear what Dragon-type Pokemon these mimic Dragons are supposed to resemble because they don't exist in the Orion Region?
cobblemon.species.epochambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.epochambipom.desc: It is rumoured that due to its psychic powers being constantly engaged, experienced Ambipoms are able to reach a transcendent state.
cobblemon.species.epochstarly.name: Starly
cobblemon.species.epochstarly.desc: When they sing in small bands while perched on tree branches, they can improvise off one another to create various pleasing harmonies.
cobblemon.species.epochstaravia.name: Staravia
cobblemon.species.epochstaravia.desc: They often vie among one another to create the best solo performance or improvisation to attract potential mates.
cobblemon.species.epochstaraptor.name: Staraptor
cobblemon.species.epochstaraptor.desc: It acts as a conductor for many Starly and often train them to learn how to create pleasing melodies with their combination of chirps.
cobblemon.species.epochkricketot.name: Kricketot
cobblemon.species.epochkricketot.desc: During the evening, they will put on concerts for other wild Pokemon in the habitat.
cobblemon.species.epochkricketune.name: Kricketune
cobblemon.species.epochkricketune.desc: It is adamant about having the best musical performance so will not hesitate to throw out unruly members for insubordination or being off-key.
cobblemon.species.epochstunky.name: Stunky
cobblemon.species.epochstunky.desc: If the foul-smelling liquid it sprays gets on you, there is no salvaging or cleaning your outfit, and it may as well be incinerated.
cobblemon.species.epochskuntank.name: Skuntank
cobblemon.species.epochskuntank.desc: Law enforcement often use the vile-smelling toxic spray this Pokemon produces to disperse crowds, particularly environmental protesters.
cobblemon.species.epochcroagunk.name: Croagunk
cobblemon.species.epochcroagunk.desc: Rumour has it that if you lick one, you can achieve a trance-like high but you might also contract an incurable disease.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxicroak.name: Toxicroak
cobblemon.species.epochtoxicroak.desc: Squeezing one of the poisonous sacs on its skin can cause it to explode, which could trigger a corrosive reaction.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmega.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.epochyanmega.desc: This Pokemon is able to drain other enemy Pokemon of its life essence if it is able to successfully make contact and bite them.
cobblemon.species.epochskorupi.name: Skorupi
cobblemon.species.epochskorupi.desc: It buries into the sand awaiting potential prey and when they are exactly above, will jump out and sting them to immobilize and disable their target.
cobblemon.species.epochdrapion.name: Drapion
cobblemon.species.epochdrapion.desc: It is able to wallop any prey with a swing of the pincers or grip and crush them like boulders.
cobblemon.species.epochspiritomb.name: Spiritomb
cobblemon.species.epochspiritomb.desc: It is incredibly dense and has accumulated a lot of mass that results in certain objects falling into an orbit around it.
cobblemon.species.epochcherubi.name: Cherubi
cobblemon.species.epochcherubi.desc: Contrary to popular belief, it actually thrives in freezing environments and being covered in snow or frost actually helps it grow faster.
cobblemon.species.epochcherrim.name: Cherrim
cobblemon.species.epochcherrim.desc: While it is perfectly content to sit in warmth with its leaves closed in on itself, it flourishes in hail storms and will actually transform.
cobblemon.species.epochmantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.epochmantyke.desc: When hunting for prey, they like to swim quickly and create small electrically charged whirlpools that will shock anything caught within it.
cobblemon.species.epochhappiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.epochhappiny.desc: The H.A.P.P.I.N.Y model 700 was invented to provide its owner with expedient access to healing facilities while travelling.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezone.desc: When it has found a planet worth studying, it will instruct smaller Magnemite and Magnetons to surveil and relay information back to it.
cobblemon.species.epochshinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.epochshinx.desc: It is unable to use its wings to fly long distances quite yet, but they are able to float in the air for short periods by flapping them fiercely.
cobblemon.species.epochluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.epochluxio.desc: Because its wings are not fully developed, it relies on its speed and toxic fangs to protect itself from would-be predators.
cobblemon.species.epochluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.epochluxray.desc: Their wings are strong and fully developed so they can fly large distances with a single flap. Their toxic fangs are similarly exceptionally deadly.
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswine.name: Mamoswine
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswine.desc: Because of the charges on its fur, its tusks are always sparking with a degree of residual static electricity as the charges seek out a way to escape.
cobblemon.species.epochbuneary.name: Buneary
cobblemon.species.epochbuneary.desc: This little bunny is headed for stardom! It practices every day until it perfects its technique, which then allows it to evolve into a real star.
cobblemon.species.epochlopunny.name: Lopunny
cobblemon.species.epochlopunny.desc: This Pokemon is very competitive by nature. Do not try to steal its thunder as they become enraged very easily!
cobblemon.species.epochbuizel.name: Buizel
cobblemon.species.epochbuizel.desc: This Pokemon is able to use the small turbine on its tail to quickly wade through polluted waters and cleanse them of impurities.
cobblemon.species.epochfloatzel.name: Floatzel
cobblemon.species.epochfloatzel.desc: Designed to help filter out pollution from water, the blue sphere at the centre of its stomach turns to brown when its filter is full and requires emptying.
cobblemon.species.epochbudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.epochbudew.desc: This Pokmon is reluctant to fight, and when confronted, it would rather run away quickly than get its outfit dirty.
cobblemon.species.epochroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.epochroserade.desc: This Pokemon prefers to conceal its identity and prefers to pose with its face covered as much as possible.
cobblemon.species.epochgible.name: Gible
cobblemon.species.epochgible.desc: When travelers complain about a spectral force or report hearing growling noises or some sort of sinister aura, it was likely that of a Gible.
cobblemon.species.epochgabite.name: Gabite
cobblemon.species.epochgabite.desc: It has a range of possible habitats because it is the manifestation of a sinister force or aura and wherever that can be found, a Gabite likely will manifest.
cobblemon.species.epochgarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.epochgarchomp.desc: Some people report that based on recollections of their nightmares, a Garchomp was in the distance observing the subject suffer before they awaken.
cobblemon.species.epochmimejr.name: Mimejr
cobblemon.species.epochmimejr.desc: It busks on the side streets of large urban centres. The irony is that it is mute despite being a Sound type.
cobblemon.species.epochshieldon.name: Shieldon
cobblemon.species.epochshieldon.desc: Its head is said to be made of an ancient crystal that is as hard as steel.
cobblemon.species.epochbastiodon.name: Bastiodon
cobblemon.species.epochbastiodon.desc: Despite its unfortunate typing, the crystal wall on its head is able to be used to break almost any other naturally formed surface.
cobblemon.species.epochsnover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.epochsnover.desc: It is often mistaken for a smaller palm tree. Attempting to take the berries that it grows will result in it swiftly biting your fingers off.
cobblemon.species.epochabomasnow.name: Abomasnow
cobblemon.species.epochabomasnow.desc: The long leaves it grows can provide comfortable shade against the harshest sun. They are often found on beaches and desert oases alike.
cobblemon.species.epochgibleone.name: Gible
cobblemon.species.epochgibleone.desc: T.Gibles are able to speed through the water faster than most other Pokemon at its level.
cobblemon.species.epochgabiteone.name: Gabite
cobblemon.species.epochgabiteone.desc: T.Gabites are able to perform various tricks and often included as part of circus troupes for aquatic stunts.
cobblemon.species.epochgarchompone.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.epochgarchompone.desc: When a T.Garchomp is chasing prey, it is able to charge through rocks and cleanly cut them in half because of their jagged fins.
cobblemon.species.epochyanmegaone.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.epochyanmegaone.desc: This Pokmon is able to beat its wings quickly that it can create sound waves with such force that can actually knock back a person.
cobblemon.species.epochmismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.epochmismagius.desc: It is said that this Pokemon is able to sing certain songs that have healing properties and can cure certain diseases.
cobblemon.species.epochriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.epochriolu.desc: This Pokemon trains daily in honing its power in the mystic arts. It is thought that Riolu first appeared after falling from a wormhole to another dimension.
cobblemon.species.epochlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.epochlucario.desc: Lucario is from a civilisation of the distant past where magic was commonplace. It practices its dark arts with no mercy for others.
cobblemon.species.epochcranidos.name: Cranidos
cobblemon.species.epochcranidos.desc: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
cobblemon.species.epochrampardos.name: Rampardos
cobblemon.species.epochrampardos.desc: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrow.name: Honchkrow
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrow.desc: It likes to perch itself on tall buildings and observe passerbys. When it is feeling extra menacing, it likes to squawk, spit and harass certain passerbys.
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrowone.name: Honchkrow
cobblemon.species.epochhonchkrowone.desc: They have become adept at magic all by themselves that they are now wizard masters themselves and willing to take on apprentices.
cobblemon.species.epochbidoof.name: Bidoof
cobblemon.species.epochbidoof.desc: It likes to build small structures on water using logs, tree branches, and leaves.
cobblemon.species.epochbibarel.name: EpochBibarel
cobblemon.species.epochbibarel.desc: If you tickle the male species, it will drop a bunch of the shiny things it has collected. If you tickle the female, the baby in its pouch will likely bite you.
cobblemon.species.epochcarnivine.name: Carnivine
cobblemon.species.epochcarnivine.desc: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
cobblemon.species.epochmunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.epochmunchlax.desc: Its fur is very thick that despite living in very cold habitats, it doesn't feel cold.
cobblemon.species.epochprobopassone.name: Probopass
cobblemon.species.epochprobopassone.desc: Using its cable arms, it is capable of plugging itself into electrical appliances to recharge them.
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswineone.name: Mamoswine
cobblemon.species.epochmamoswineone.desc: This Pokemon will often bash its head against larger trees in an effort to knock down the fruits that grow on them.
cobblemon.species.epochchingling.name: Chingling
cobblemon.species.epochchingling.desc: It emits a small electromagnetic charge that can cause signal disturbances to nearby electrical devices.
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezoneone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.epochmagnezoneone.desc: T.Magnezone act as colony protectors of smaller T.Magnemites. They will often attempt to blind any attackers with violent beams of light.
cobblemon.species.epochbudewone.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.epochbudewone.desc: This Pokmon attempts to stay hidden or tries to camouflage itself near densely populated trees until it is ready to bloom as that is when it evolves.
cobblemon.species.epochroseradeone.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.epochroseradeone.desc: This Pokemon exudes an entrancing aroma that can cause a number of side effects ranging from lulling targets to sleep or causing seizures!
cobblemon.species.epochporygonz.name: Porygonz
cobblemon.species.epochporygonz.desc: Its ability to distort and corrupt data allows it to warp spacetime around itself, causing glitches in the fabric of reality.
cobblemon.species.epochfroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.epochfroslass.desc: It hovers around tombs and crypts in search of any visitors, hoping to drain its soul and add the corpse to the graveyard.
cobblemon.species.epochgallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.epochgallade.desc: Keen to seek out vengeance on those who harmed it during its earlier stages, it has become very focused and unforgiving on seeking its revenge.
cobblemon.species.epochweavile.name: Weavile
cobblemon.species.epochweavile.desc: Scientists are able to evaluate the age of a subject Weavile simply by assessing the length of its branches.
cobblemon.species.africanusanbronzor.des: Se descubrieron herramientas con su forma en tumbas antiguas, pero se desconoce si tiene relacin.
cobblemon.species.africanusanbronzong.de: Se produjo un gran revuelo cuando encontraron uno en una obra despus de 2000 aos durmiendo.
cobblemon.species.africanusancherubi.des: La pequea esfera, dulce y sabrosa, contiene los nutrientes necesarios para evolucionar.
cobblemon.species.africanusancherrim.des: Baco bendijo a los Cherrim como agradecimiento al pueblo de Occidentis por su gran devocin a este en todos los actos pblicos y privados de sus habitantes.
cobblemon.species.africanusankricketot.d: Los pueblos galos usaron a los Kricketot cmo instrumento durante generaciones, adaptndose estos a sus brbaras costumbres.
Tras siglos de convivencia con los galos, Kricketune es capaz de luchar cmo un galo ms.
cobblemon.species.lagoonanfinneon.name: Finneon
cobblemon.species.lagoonanlumineon.name: Lumineon
cobblemon.species.ionosianmunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.avalossianshellos.name: Shellos
cobblemon.species.avalossianshellos.desc: Avalossian Shellos, specifically the moist variant, dwell deep in dank caves, munching on moss and the remains of deceased Pokemon alike. Their teeth are blade-like in nature, capable of being sharpened on the stone walls of it's home.
cobblemon.species.avalossiangastrodon.de: Long ago, it had a shell on its back. There's now a vestigial plate on its back that's hard but thin.
cobblemon.species.avalossianhappiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.avalossianhappiny.desc: When it sees something round and white, Happiny puts it into the pouch on its stomach. It sometimes becomes overloaded and can't move.
cobblemon.species.avalossiangallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.avalossiangallade.desc: Avalossian Gallade are stalwart defenders of justice, and are often seen defending weaker Pokmon from cruel predators and trainers alike. They are known to gather in places that hold ancient importance.
cobblemon.species.ricanshellos.name: Shellos
cobblemon.species.ricanshellos.desc: When it senses danger, a purple liquid oozes out of it. The liquid is thought to be something like greasy sweat.
cobblemon.species.ricangastrodon.name: Gastrodon
cobblemon.species.ricangastrodon.desc: It has strong regenerative capabilities. Even if parts of it are bitten off by fish Pokmon, it will return to normal within a few hours.
cobblemon.species.novrancranidos.name: Cranidos
cobblemon.species.novrancranidos.desc: This form of Cranidos adapted to live near ancient volcanoes and gained flaming-hot headbutts. It can keep its footing even in the midst of an eruption.
cobblemon.species.novranrampardos.name: Rampardos
cobblemon.species.novranrampardos.desc: When two collided, the resulting explosion could be heard for miles. It sometimes launched itself directly off of cliffs and caught fire, making it look like an asteroid.
cobblemon.species.novranbonsly.name: Bonsly
cobblemon.species.novranbonsly.desc: Its body has developed to imitate the trees indigenous to Novrai. It buries itself in snow, leaving only its tough, prickly cap exposed.
cobblemon.species.novrancherubi.name: Cherubi
cobblemon.species.novrancherubi.desc: Cherubi in Novrai have specially-adapted leaves that let them fly on gusts of wind. This lets them escape predators and get closer to the sun.
cobblemon.species.novrancherrim.name: Cherrim
cobblemon.species.novrancherrim.desc: Exposure to too much sunlight caused it to burn up completely. Now it emerges only at night, the flame on its stem providing a light source for it.
cobblemon.species.qamorancombee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.qamorantangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.norheimanmismagius.des: Norheiman Mismagius wanders south as winter approaches. When the cold has passed, it greets spring with harmonic music. It hypnotizes families with children, making them gather around it; and they all begin to dance.
cobblemon.species.varitasianmunchlax.des: They compete viciously for food. If you have something it wants to eat, it will chase you down relentlessly until it gets it.
cobblemon.species.interianpiplup.name: Piplup
cobblemon.species.interianprinplup.name: Prinplup
cobblemon.species.interianempoleon.name: Empoleon
cobblemon.species.interianarceus.name: Arceus
cobblemon.species.hubiantogekiss.name: Togekiss
cobblemon.species.hubiantogekiss.desc: Togekiss on Easter Island is an incredibly revered Pokemon. It is the protector of the island, and upon growing too old, it will appoint a new successor.
cobblemon.species.hizianmismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.hizianmismagius.desc: Its flames don't weaken even against the coldest winds, it is seen as a symbol of hope in the harsh frigid mountains.
cobblemon.species.hizianhonchkrow.name: Honchkrow
cobblemon.species.hizianhonchkrow.desc: When it challenges other Honchkrow to a duel, the winner earns the respect of all the Murkrow, while the loser has to leave the region forever.
cobblemon.species.hiziangliscor.name: Gliscor
cobblemon.species.hiziangliscor.desc: It freezes its food with its icy breath inside cave walls, so other Pokemon are unable to take it. When hungry it uses its sharp claws and fangs to easily break through those fronzen walls.
cobblemon.species.hizianskorupi.name: Skorupi
cobblemon.species.hizianskorupi.desc: Their nests are commonly found in steep cliffsides. Swarms of Skorupis can be seem climbing up mountains as the sun sets.
cobblemon.species.hiziandrapion.name: Drapion
cobblemon.species.hiziandrapion.desc: What it lacks in venom it makes up in strength. Drapion is capable of tossing a rock twice its own size, using nothing but its tail.
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.desc: In order to adapt to an environment of egg-stealing predators, Happiny has become hyper-aggressive and territorial. It carries an egg-shaped rock in its pouch.
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.desc: This Magnezone is a result of a sudden mutation causing one of the Magneton's bodies to absorb the other two and grow rapidly in power.
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.desc: Tangrowth has the ability to absorb and supply electricity through the prongs on the ends of its arms, enabling it to act as a sort of living battery.
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.name: Turtwig
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. Made from sand, the shell on its back hardens as it floats along the ocean's surface. As it dives, the shell softens.
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.desc: It lives along the water's surface in oceans. During the day, it dives underwater regularly to refresh the sea life taking shelter on its back.
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.desc: As it moves in the ocean continuously, pirates store their loot in its back for safekeeping. It oftentimes participates in treasure hunts for younger Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. A single scratch from it is toxic enough to faint targets as it flees into the wild.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.desc: This Pokemon's poison is potent enough to cause fainting just from standing downwind of it.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.desc: One drop of its venom is potent enough to incapacitate 2000 Rattata.
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros and EchoTheThird. It hides itself from the sun during the day and stares longingly at the moon at night.
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.desc: Its fans are capable of whipping up vicious gales. Though shy, it will become aggressive if its dance is interrupted.
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. The middle body hosts a reactor; it uses this to power up its Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.name: Vespiquen
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.desc: It hovers in the air with electromagnetic force produced from its reactor. If it doesn't consume enough food for fuel, it will be unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.desc: It plays pranks by frightening people with its detachable head. If its spirit leaves its body, its body is left without arms.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.desc: A Delta Species discovered by yungbro. It is formed by the passionate spirits of people and Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.desc: Though it is drowsy during the daytime, it flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.name: Buneary
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.desc: A Delta Species discovered by nico. It uses its techniques to rob the weak, causing its parents to scold it constantly.
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.name: Lopunny
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.desc: Having found inner peace, it fights for the future. As a parent, it never seems to be able to take its eyes off of its mischievous children.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalopunny.name: DeltaLopunny
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.desc: This Pokemon loves making snow-ghosts with humans. It has an unquenchable love for the holidays.
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Sparrows413. This Pokemon lays in the fields all day after eating, absorbing nutrients from the sun.
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. It practices sanitizing and preserving the bodies of the deceased, showing them one final form of respect.
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.desc: The afterlife and rebirth of souls are sacred to this Pokemon. It will fiercely guard any tomb or cemetery that it comes across from graverobbers.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalucario.name: DeltaLucario
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.name: Croagunk
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.desc: A Delta Species discovered by pokefan1241. Its cheeks hold large amounts of fire. It generates thick smog to sneak up behind its opponents and attack them.
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.name: Toxicroak
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.desc: Its knuckles generate flames so intense that they can be used as fiery knives. Stabbing with these flames can easily melt holes in steel.
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.desc: A vicious Pokemon which spreads its tendrils beneath the ground, ensnaring unsuspecting trespassers. It uses their cries for help to lure more prey.
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.name: Electivire
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.desc: After midnight they can be seen congregating on rooftops. However, they always make sure to return to their original positions before morning.
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.name: Magmortar
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.desc: With additional armor, this Pokemon can easily endure pressures at the bottom of the ocean. Its cannons serve as defense from lurking dangerous opponents.
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.desc: Using its wings to generate massive gusts, it blends in with surrounding foliage and tricks prey into seeking shelter beneath its leaves.
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.desc: A master swordfighter, it uses both Electric- and Ice-type attacks to defeat opponents. Over time it numbs its opponents and decreases their reaction speeds.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltagallade.name: DeltaGallade
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.desc: This Pokemon has the power to evaporate entire oceans with a single breath.
cobblemon.species.budewx.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.budewx.desc: If you put your ear to its sound organ, you will hear the sound of a soft breathing. When it's fired up, the sound becomes deafening.
cobblemon.species.roseradex.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.roseradex.desc: It waves its stings to modify any sound wave at will. If it interferes with its opponent's heartbeat, it will cause them irreparable harm.
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.name: Spiritomb
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.desc: Some theories assert that this is Spiritomb's real appearence--it's the one we already know who comes from the Xenoverse.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.desc: This Pokemon will resort to any means necessary to win in a fight. It stands upright on it's vines to appear larger and more menacing.
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.name: Regigigas
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.desc: After eons of being sealed away, all that remains of Regigigas is its skeletal structure. In its prime, this Pokemon was capable of reshaping the world.
cobblemon.species.seviiancarnivine.name: Carnivine
cobblemon.species.seviianmantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.desc: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.desc: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.desc: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.name: Hippopotas
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.desc: It enshrouds itself with water to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy being dry.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.name: Hippowdon
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.desc: It blasts internally stored water from ports on its body to create a towering whirlpool for attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpachirisu.name: Pachirisu
cobblemon.species.ayreianpachirisu.desc: The two sides of Pachirisu are a perfect parallel to each other. While the pale one barely looks alive, the other is hyperactive and dangerous.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.ayreianmunchlax.desc: It feels immense joy from harassing others. You'll often find them in the wild, throwing rocks or snow at people and Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.ayreianriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.ayreianriolu.desc: Still new to the concept of Cyberspace, this Pokemon is the bioproduct of superfluous files from Lucario.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.ayreianlucario.desc: By controlling the virtual realm, it can mess with its opponent's data values. However, a virus may find its way inside Lucario when its guard is down.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.ayreianmantyke.desc: It burrows underground and shocks it's enemy from below as a surprise attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.ayreiangallade.desc: With its latent powers, it can force anyone to do its bidding. A folktale tells that, long ago, this Pokemon and its 'mirrored image' served a malicious king.
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.desc: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.desc: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.desc: When in danger, the pattern on its forehead shines brightly. Its retractable claws are overcharged with high voltage electricity.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.desc: Rarely seen in the wild, these pokemon remain particularly buried to gain nutrients. What looks like a mask is in reality a hardened shell that gives its soft body protection. When panicked it releases a spore that reduces agression, but can be very poisonous.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.desc: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.desc: They are very fond of people and the positivity they can express. They are often found parading large festivals and parties.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.desc: This Pokemon always radiates with bright colors. Lost travelers or adventurers who follow it always find their way home.
cobblemon.species.relicbudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.relicbudew.desc: Relic Budew appreciates the traditional aspects of warfare, and despite its young age, enjoys an entertaining duel. It claps on the victor using the buds on its head.
cobblemon.species.relicroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.relicroserade.desc: Ho-OH's ashes caused rapiers to grow out of Relic Roserade's flower buds. It will only take off its mask to a dying opponent and hides its identity at all other times.
cobblemon.species.relicambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.relicambipom.desc: Ho-Ohs ashes awakened Ambipoms hidden martial spirit. Its karate chops are said to crush a steel cuirass like paper.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbidoof.name: Bidoof
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbidoof.desc: With a more iron rich diet, Bidoof's teeth become much stronger, allowing it to chomp through trees in seconds. It was brought to the region to help with construction back when Kaskade was young.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbibarel.name: Bibarel
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbibarel.desc: Through its antenna like whiskers, Bibarel can pick up on radio waves, making it highly intelligent. Its rumored that spies use Bibarel but it has never been confirmed.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianshinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.kaskadianluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.kaskadianluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.kaskadianambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.amazealldrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.amazealldrifblim.desc: Driftblim enjoys being of service, frequently foregoing sleep and food to fulfill duties for its trainer. Because of its kind nature, it's an excellent pokemon for package delivery, but they grow enraged if anything gets in the way of performing their mission.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianskuntank.name: Skuntank
cobblemon.species.kaskadianskuntank.desc: Being surrounded by Histameanie swarms, it has adapted to the 'vibes' or nature. Mellowing out its previous dark ways and just enjoying the world around it. However, it does still smell awful.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansnover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansnover.desc: They gather near footsteps they discover on snowy mountains, having interested about people. They keep a close eye on travelers and drop berries as gifts on the trails.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianabomasnow.des: Originally thought to be a regional evolution of Snover, it is now understood to be the form Abomasnow adopts in warmer climates. It loses its mastery over ice by shedding its snowy coat, but gains access to strong earth-shattering attacks.
cobblemon.species.solrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.swayrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.brawlrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.webrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.junkrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.homerotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.bassrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.twirlrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.mixrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.mysticriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.mysticlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.cefiransnover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.cefiranabomasnow.name: Abomasnow
cobblemon.species.cefiranfroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.aromianklink.name: Klink
cobblemon.species.aromianklang.name: Klang
cobblemon.species.aromianvanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.aromianvanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.fabelianyamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.fabelianlillipup.name: Lillipup
cobblemon.species.fabelianherdier.name: Herdier
cobblemon.species.fabelianboldore.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.fabeliantimburr.name: Timburr
cobblemon.species.fabeliangurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.fabelianwoobat.name: Woobat
cobblemon.species.fabelianlitwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.fabelianlampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.fabeliandeino.name: Deino
cobblemon.species.mahaliantornadus.name: Tornadus
cobblemon.species.mahalianthundurus.name: Thundurus
cobblemon.species.mahalianlandorus.name: Landorus
cobblemon.species.mahalianlarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.mahaliantrubbish.name: Trubbish
cobblemon.species.mahaliangarbodor.name: Garbodor
cobblemon.species.sahliancobalion.name: Cobalion
cobblemon.species.sahlianterrakion.name: Terrakion
cobblemon.species.sahlianvirizion.name: Virizion
cobblemon.species.ferranianpatrat.name: Patrat
cobblemon.species.ferranianwatchog.name: Watchog
cobblemon.species.ferranianyamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.ferranianvirizion.name: Virizion
cobblemon.species.ferraniancobalion.name: Cobalion
cobblemon.species.palmianpawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.palmianbisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.epochsnivy.name: Snivy
cobblemon.species.epochsnivy.desc: This friendly spirit wants nothing but to reach afterlife. It poses no threat whatsoever.
cobblemon.species.epochservine.name: Servine
cobblemon.species.epochservine.desc: People over the centuries have grown afraid for naught of this Pokemon. It is slowly, but surely losing its friendly demeanor.
cobblemon.species.epochserperior.name: Serperior
cobblemon.species.epochserperior.desc: This enraged Pokemon is sick and tired of people causing harm to its species, so now it reacts violently to anything that approaches its kin.
cobblemon.species.epochtepig.name: Tepig
cobblemon.species.epochtepig.desc: This Pokemon couldn't be happier than when it's frolicking in a puddle of mud.
cobblemon.species.epochpignite.name: Pignite
cobblemon.species.epochpignite.desc: This Pokemon loves cannonballing into large pools of mud. It attempts to curl up and make as big a splash as it can right after a rainfall.
cobblemon.species.epochemboar.name: Emboar
cobblemon.species.epochemboar.desc: This Pokemon has jagged rocks that are encrusted into its skin around its torso. It can take these jagged rocks and fling them at enemies.
cobblemon.species.epochsolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.epochsolosis.desc: They do not like light and are found in dark waters. They use their remote psychic ability to find food to sustain itself.
cobblemon.species.epochduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.epochduosion.desc: It exhibited significant psychic potential when it was just a single-celled organism. Imagine the power it possesses now that it has evolved.
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclus.desc: These Pokemon are capable of bending water to its will and forming fantastic water sculptures with its mind.
cobblemon.species.epochrufflet.name: Rufflet
cobblemon.species.epochrufflet.desc: It is just learning to spit fire. As it matures, the fire becomes hotter and more intense.
cobblemon.species.epochbraviary.name: Braviary
cobblemon.species.epochbraviary.desc: When they are reaching the end of its life, this Pokemon will fly away to be reborn into an egg in isolation. No one has seen this to confirm though.
cobblemon.species.epochtympole.name: Tympole
cobblemon.species.epochtympole.desc: It has spent too much time near the water's edge such that it has started to grow mushrooms.
cobblemon.species.epochpalpitoad.name: Palpitoad
cobblemon.species.epochpalpitoad.desc: As it started to migrate further inland into swamp areas, mushrooms began to grow on its damp body and has now become inseparable from its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochseismitoad.name: Seismitoad
cobblemon.species.epochseismitoad.desc: The mushrooms have become so prevalent and grown in potency that simply touching them can render a person incapacitated.
cobblemon.species.epochzorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.epochzorua.desc: They are very loyal creatures and can hunt in small packs. Due to their loyalty, they are subservient to the alpha of each pack.
cobblemon.species.epochzoroark.name: Zoroark
cobblemon.species.epochzoroark.desc: The strongest and fastest hunter becomes the alpha and then eventually evolves into the Zoroark leader of the pack.
cobblemon.species.epochducklett.name: Ducklett
cobblemon.species.epochducklett.desc: It is said that its feathers bring good luck. It honks several times if it is happy similar to a dog wagging its tail.
cobblemon.species.epochswanna.name: Swanna
cobblemon.species.epochswanna.desc: It is endangered because its feathers allegedly grant you a wish, but only if it gives you the feather of its own volition.
cobblemon.species.epochgolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.epochgolett.desc: These Pokmon are thought to have come to the Orion Region through a meteorite from outer space as evidenced by their extra-terrestrial colour.
cobblemon.species.epochgolurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.epochgolurk.desc: It is said that their cores are time capsules and if anyone opens them, they could unlock secrets that were stored there by a destroyed civilization.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.epochlarvesta.desc: You can often find this Pokemon nibbling on electric wires to siphon the electrical current within as food.
cobblemon.species.epochvolcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.epochvolcarona.desc: When it flaps its wings furiously, it can send electrical currents through the air which it uses to hunt down and chase its prey.
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrola.name: Roggenrola
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrola.desc: Each one that forms is said to have come from massive glaciers that existed several hundred years ago.
cobblemon.species.epochboldore.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.epochboldore.desc: Due to the ongoing climate crisis, parts of icebergs that have since melted and separated away turn into Boldores.
cobblemon.species.epochgigalith.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.epochgigalith.desc: Many inattentive sailors have come to their doom when their ships have collided with these Pokemon out on the frozen seas.
cobblemon.species.epochlillipup.name: Lillipup
cobblemon.species.epochlillipup.desc: Left to fend for itself, its vital spirit and resilience allowed it to survive but it lacks trust in humans after initially being abandoned.
cobblemon.species.epochherdier.name: Herdier
cobblemon.species.epochherdier.desc: Forced to survive on its own, it has submitted fully to its feral instinct and can be difficult to tame.
cobblemon.species.epochstoutland.name: Stoutland
cobblemon.species.epochstoutland.desc: The spirit of a Stoutland that passed away after abuse and starvation. Even death will not give this Pokemon peace and rest.
cobblemon.species.epochminccino.name: Minccino
cobblemon.species.epochminccino.desc: After this Minccino was abused during its life, its spirit has come back and taken up a doll as its host in hopes of finding a better owner.
cobblemon.species.epochcinccino.name: Cinccino
cobblemon.species.epochcinccino.desc: This Cinccino uses any random buttons it can find to cover up its eye because it still thinks it is alive and needs to conceal its abuse.
cobblemon.species.epochdruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.epochdruddigon.desc: It has forgone its ability to fly in exchange for developing jagged spikes on its back and as such, now largely resides in dark caves.
cobblemon.species.epochwoobat.name: Woobat
cobblemon.species.epochwoobat.desc: Its fangs are extra sharp to enable this Pokemon to pierce the skin of its target and drain its blood quickly.
cobblemon.species.epochswoobat.name: Swoobat
cobblemon.species.epochswoobat.desc: It is very sensitive to light. Some say that it does not produce a reflection, but most people say that is just a myth.
cobblemon.species.epochtimburr.name: Timburr
cobblemon.species.epochtimburr.desc: The stuff of nightmares; this Pokemon has affixed a blunt instrument on the end of its slab of wood to use as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurr.desc: It changes its makeup to match the same as what was worn by its last victim.
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurr.desc: This Pokmon was part of the circus and abused by the circus master. The trails of blood on its columns are of the deceased circus master.
cobblemon.species.epochlitwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.epochlitwick.desc: When a Litwick possesses a lightbulb, it is said that it drains its power more rapidly to heal itself.
cobblemon.species.epochlampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.epochlampent.desc: It possesses street lights and pranks municipal workers into thinking the lamp light has fused. It then scares the workers when they come to repair them.
cobblemon.species.epochchandelure.name: Chandelure
cobblemon.species.epochchandelure.desc: The spirit possessed a chandelier and now pranks people by turning on and off rapidly to create a more menacing atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.epochvanillite.desc: Whether this Pokemon was created from raw toxic waste found in dumping grounds or was already there is a mystery.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.epochvanillish.desc: It's unknown where exactly the Pokemon ends and the trail of sludge begins. There is a suspicion that it varies from one to another.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxe.desc: The suspicion is that the mass of toxic waste belonging to this Pokemon is much larger than originally believed.
cobblemon.species.epochjoltik.name: Joltik
cobblemon.species.epochjoltik.desc: It is said these Pokemon don't actually appear in real life but are mere instances of your worst nightmares manifesting in reality.
cobblemon.species.epochgalvantula.name: Galvantula
cobblemon.species.epochgalvantula.desc: This creature represents one's deepest and darkest fears made real. Its stinger can lull people into a deep sleep where it feasts on their sanity.
cobblemon.species.epochcubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cobblemon.species.epochcubchoo.desc: It is in constant competition with Slowpoke for honey and other shiny things. Its cuteness allows it to dodge consequences from its theft.
cobblemon.species.epochbeartic.name: Beartic
cobblemon.species.epochbeartic.desc: It is very irritable when it is awoken from sleep. It can go on rampages when it is hungry.
cobblemon.species.epochvenipede.name: Venipede
cobblemon.species.epochvenipede.desc: A Venipede happened upon a meteorite that had special powers thereby giving it extraterrestrial powers.
cobblemon.species.epochwhirlipede.name: Whirlipede
cobblemon.species.epochwhirlipede.desc: The meteorite that it discovered has enabled it to move things with its mind. The rock is now more in control of the host body than the original Whirlipede.
cobblemon.species.epochscolipede.name: Scolipede
cobblemon.species.epochscolipede.desc: The original meteorite that controlled this Pokemon becomes simultaneously aware and is able to act in unison with other Scolipedes.
cobblemon.species.epochdeerling.name: Deerling
cobblemon.species.epochdeerling.desc: Its flames flare up when it is either in distress or very happy, making it difficult to properly understand and care for.
cobblemon.species.epochsawsbuck.name: Sawsbuck
cobblemon.species.epochsawsbuck.desc: Its footsteps can easily start a fire, which make it a serious danger to forest habitats where it is most prevalent.
cobblemon.species.epochtynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.epochtynamo.desc: Due to its weak, undeveloped form, it only surfaces for food, preferring to stay underground for as long as it can because it cannot defend itself well.
cobblemon.species.epocheelektrik.name: Eelektrik
cobblemon.species.epocheelektrik.desc: These Pokmon come out of their burrows to feed on smaller bugs and insects within caves and sandy dunes.
cobblemon.species.epocheelektross.name: Eelektross
cobblemon.species.epocheelektross.desc: It is rumoured that some of the largest Eelektrosses have jaws that can open so large that they can consume an entire fridge in one gulp.
cobblemon.species.epochbasculin.name: Basculin
cobblemon.species.epochbasculin.desc: They can be very damaging to sensitive ecosystems because they are able to devour a lot of the available food supply very quickly.
cobblemon.species.epochpidove.name: Pidove
cobblemon.species.epochpidove.desc: Where people go, these Pokmon follow. They do not like to be left alone and forms bonds with other pokemon very easily.
cobblemon.species.epochtranquill.name: Tranquill
cobblemon.species.epochtranquill.desc: A protective bunch, it rushes to aid its injured allies no matter what danger surrounds it.
cobblemon.species.epochunfezant.name: Unfezant
cobblemon.species.epochunfezant.desc: Through the use of their psychic abilities, they can sense when an ally or owner is in danger and teleport them to safety.
cobblemon.species.epochdwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.epochdwebble.desc: It collects various small articles found on the sea floor to append to its shell as a means of showing off.
cobblemon.species.epochcrustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.epochcrustle.desc: When a Crustle finds its soul mate, it exchanges its most prized article on its shell as a token of its commitment.
cobblemon.species.epochdurant.name: Durant
cobblemon.species.epochdurant.desc: They are instrumental in volcanic environments as they act in cohesion to steer the flow of lava away around like beavers with water.
cobblemon.species.epochmeloetta.name: Meloetta
cobblemon.species.epochmeloetta.desc: It is a famous Pokemon known for its perfect pitch and ability to sing captivating melodies that get stuck in people's heads.
cobblemon.species.epochdeino.name: Deino
cobblemon.species.epochdeino.desc: It harbours a deep psychic energy that you can see emitting from the spike on its head.
cobblemon.species.epochzweilous.name: Zweilous
cobblemon.species.epochzweilous.desc: Their psychic power has allowed it to telepathically have two floating heads however the heads cannot drift too far away from its body.
cobblemon.species.epochhydreigon.name: Hydreigon
cobblemon.species.epochhydreigon.desc: Its psychic powers allows it to create a shield around its smaller heads and instruct them to go out in smaller, scouting missions.
