cobblemon.species.epochyamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.epochyamask.desc: It rhythmically pounds away at its drum in a consistent pattern. It is not clear what the rhythm relates to or what it means.
cobblemon.species.epochcofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.epochcofagrigus.desc: It continues to drum a steady rhythm to provide a form of encouragement to its ally in battle. It sometimes does it for entertainment purposes.
cobblemon.species.epochthroh.name: Throh
cobblemon.species.epochthroh.desc: This golem is magically enchanted to provide it with a level of hardiness that far exceeds many other golem Pokemon creations.
cobblemon.species.epochsawk.name: Sawk
cobblemon.species.epochsawk.desc: An old fable says that this golem was brought to life through the wish of an ill child, so it came to life to help them battle the disease they were facing.
cobblemon.species.epochsandile.name: Sandile
cobblemon.species.epochsandile.desc: It likes attacking seafaring vessels and raiding them of food and other treasures. They are often found congregating in coves or islands.
cobblemon.species.epochkrokorok.name: Krokorok
cobblemon.species.epochkrokorok.desc: It leads small raiding groups in the ocean to attack ships and other marine vessels. They are very aggressive if confronted.
cobblemon.species.epochkrookodile.name: Krookodile
cobblemon.species.epochkrookodile.desc: This Pokmon lets its minions do the dirty work of raiding marine vessels. It prefers to stay behind and await the spoils.
cobblemon.species.epochpatrat.name: Patrat
cobblemon.species.epochpatrat.desc: This Pokemon always seems to be hearing things that its hair is always standing on end. It is unclear if this is the result of their psychic powers or their paranoia.
cobblemon.species.epochwatchog.name: Watchog
cobblemon.species.epochwatchog.desc: They are often used as security guards because they have an enhanced sense of hearing that allows them to detect the faintest noise or disruption.
cobblemon.species.epochgothita.name: Gothita
cobblemon.species.epochgothita.desc: This Pokemon is very nimble and agile. It is able to pull off weird gymnastic stunts because of its small stature and flexibility.
cobblemon.species.epochgothorita.name: Gothorita
cobblemon.species.epochgothorita.desc: This Pokemon likes to pull pranks on people. Its laugh is intoxicating and able to readily disable a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelle.name: Gothitelle
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelle.desc: This Pokemon enjoys using various clown-themed gag weapons such as an oversized mallet, explosives and even has immunity to certain toxins.
cobblemon.species.epochvullaby.name: Vullaby
cobblemon.species.epochvullaby.desc: It does not matter that a Vullaby may have hatched many months ago, it still carries the egg shell that it was born in around as pants.
cobblemon.species.epochmandibuzz.name: Mandibuzz
cobblemon.species.epochmandibuzz.desc: They circle around dying Pokemon in rough terrain. When the Pokemon finally dies, the Mandibuzz are first to help themselves to the remains.
cobblemon.species.epochferroseed.name: Ferroseed
cobblemon.species.epochferroseed.desc: It camouflages well into its surroundings. It uses its beautiful flowers to attract prey and will then bring them down through a volley of thorns.
cobblemon.species.epochferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
cobblemon.species.epochferrothorn.desc: It subtly uses the flowers on its head to attract certain prey. When the prey close in, it can jump up and consume them in a single gulp.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitaone.name: Gothita
cobblemon.species.epochgothitaone.desc: When it is angered, it will hiss and shoot petrifying gazes at the subject of their anger to temporarily immobilize them.
cobblemon.species.epochgothoritaone.name: Gothorita
cobblemon.species.epochgothoritaone.desc: The rattling sound its tail produces will often intensify when it finds prey, betraying its ability to hunt effectively.
cobblemon.species.epochgothitelleone.des: It spits venomous fluid at its enemies that can corrode and slow down their foe. If it makes eye contact with you, it could also turn you to stone.
cobblemon.species.epochpurrloin.name: Purrloin
cobblemon.species.epochpurrloin.desc: Some say that if you cross its path, you will be doomed to bad luck for a day. However, its halo suggests otherwise.
cobblemon.species.epochliepard.name: Liepard
cobblemon.species.epochliepard.desc: This Pokemon is very limber and climb high elevations with ease. Its fur reflects the night sky.
cobblemon.species.epochtrubbish.name: Trubbish
cobblemon.species.epochtrubbish.desc: Have you ever thrown away your batteries in the garbage instead of recycling properly? Well guess what, youre to blame for the rise of these nasty Trubbish!
cobblemon.species.epochgarbodor.name: Garbodor
cobblemon.species.epochgarbodor.desc: This Pokmon eats electrical waste. For this reason, much of its body exhibits a persistent electrical current that hovers around it.
cobblemon.species.epochklink.name: Klink
cobblemon.species.epochklink.desc: This Pokemon has an internal clock that allows it to keep time so you do not need to carry around a watch or check your phone to confirm the time.
cobblemon.species.epochklang.name: Klang
cobblemon.species.epochklang.desc: It is able to synchronize its attacks based on the internal clock that allows it to amplify its damage.
cobblemon.species.epochklinklang.name: Klinklang
cobblemon.species.epochklinklang.desc: When it is perfectly synchronized, the bells on Klinklang will ring to let you know.
cobblemon.species.epochdarumaka.name: Darumaka
cobblemon.species.epochdarumaka.desc: It is known for starting noisy riots in the jungle whether it be from pounding its chest or screeching from the treetops.
cobblemon.species.epochdarmanitan.name: Darmanitan
cobblemon.species.epochdarmanitan.desc: It is known for getting into screeching matches with the Primeape family. Get ear protection and take cover when you see this happen.
cobblemon.species.epochroggenrolaone.des: This Pokemon moves by using its built in static energy to propel it in the direction it wants to go.
cobblemon.species.epochboldoreone.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.epochboldoreone.desc: Its energy is dangerously unstable and it periodically gives off charged electrical novas that can fry electrical appliances.
cobblemon.species.epochgigalithone.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.epochgigalithone.desc: This Pokemon carries so much latent energy that it is able to seamlessly connect multiple rocks together through an electrical current.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilliteone.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.epochvanilliteone.desc: Its body can get so hot that sometimes, simple water is rendered ineffective against it and will just evaporate on contact.
cobblemon.species.epochvanillishone.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.epochvanillishone.desc: The top of its head is constantly erupting and spewing out hot lava. Maintaining a safe distance from it is strongly advised.
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxeone.name: Vanilluxe
cobblemon.species.epochvanilluxeone.desc: One of its heads spews only sulfur whereas the other spews lava. They are constantly competing with one another to see which substance is produced most.
cobblemon.species.epocharchen.name: Archen
cobblemon.species.epocharchen.desc: This Pokmon was successfully restored from a fossil. It was said that its wing flaps could cause thunder claps in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.epocharcheops.name: Archeops
cobblemon.species.epocharcheops.desc: Its feathers carry a significant amount of static electricity. In sufficient quantities, these feathers can be used to create chain lightning.
cobblemon.species.epochtirtouga.name: Tirtouga
cobblemon.species.epochtirtouga.desc: Its shell is nigh impenetrable, but its underbelly is vulnerable. If flipped over, this Pokemon will flail about trying to reposition itself.
cobblemon.species.epochcarracosta.name: Carracosta
cobblemon.species.epochcarracosta.desc: This Pokemon is extremely defensive, being able to take explosions head-on without a scratch. A downside of this is that it struggles with mobility.
cobblemon.species.epochmunna.name: Munna
cobblemon.species.epochmunna.desc: This Pokemon needs regular security updates uploaded every Tuesday to ensure that it is protected against viruses on the Internet.
cobblemon.species.epochmusharna.name: Musharna
cobblemon.species.epochmusharna.desc: This Pokemon is reaching terminal failure and its hard drive is now regularly crashing due to a virus infection.
cobblemon.species.epochdrilbur.name: Drilbur
cobblemon.species.epochdrilbur.desc: While it is blind, it uses sonic waves to find its way and navigate through caves and deep tunnels.
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrill.name: Excadrill
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrill.desc: As it uses sound waves when digging, its spines help shield it from danger in case the sound waves it sends out misleads it.
cobblemon.species.epochdrilburone.name: Drilbur
cobblemon.species.epochdrilburone.desc: When light beams bounce off this Pokemon, it can produce and warp the colours into colourful displays.
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrillone.name: Excadrill
cobblemon.species.epochexcadrillone.desc: It uses the crystals on its head and arms to help it dig through caves. They are capable of emitting their own light to help it navigate.
cobblemon.species.epochsolosisone.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.epochsolosisone.desc: They are small parasites from interstellar space. They lie in wait underground until they can evolve.
cobblemon.species.epochduosionone.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.epochduosionone.desc: When it has siphoned enough energy from its surroundings, it evolves and migrates to continue its parasitic lifecycle.
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclusone.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.epochreuniclusone.desc: It is actually an interstellar parasite that consume the resources from the planet and then summarily migrate onto the next world.
cobblemon.species.epochsewaddle.name: Sewaddle
cobblemon.species.epochsewaddle.desc: It observes from a distance and studies its foes. When it is ready, it will adapt and change its form to perfectly replicate its enemy.
cobblemon.species.epochswadloon.name: Swadloon
cobblemon.species.epochswadloon.desc: Dark energies swirl beneath the cowl of its robe, undetectable by most. It harbours sinister energy from a galaxy far far away.
cobblemon.species.epochleavanny.name: Leavanny
cobblemon.species.epochleavanny.desc: Its arm blades are composed completely of laser energy. They are raised from youth to become adept warriors.
cobblemon.species.epochtimburrone.name: Timburr
cobblemon.species.epochtimburrone.desc: It is small and stupid. It often bashes its head against tree trunks for amusement.
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurrone.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.epochgurdurrone.desc: They are big and bulky because of constantly carrying around large logs of wood. They are able to effortlessly bench press the log.
cobblemon.species.epochconkeldurrone.des: It is very lovable but it must be taught to restrain its affection because it doesn't realize that squeezing a person between its logs can kill them.
cobblemon.species.epochlarvestaone.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.epochlarvestaone.desc: It is said to be a Pokemon from a different galaxy altogether, and it actually managed to travel here by opening a wormhole.
cobblemon.species.epochvolcaronaone.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.epochvolcaronaone.desc: Rumour has it that its wings each provide a snapshot of a nearby galaxy, and every pair of wings on a T.Volcarona are a unique part of the universe.
cobblemon.species.epochfrillish.name: Frillish
cobblemon.species.epochfrillish.desc: They are very mischievous Pokemon because they often like to expel their spores when people wander by to infect them with a poison or paralyzing agent.
cobblemon.species.epochjellicent.name: Jellicent
cobblemon.species.epochjellicent.desc: The gunk that accumulates under its mushroom head mix with the Pokemon's natural spores to make it extremely poisonous. It should be handled with care.
cobblemon.species.epochblitzle.name: Blitzle
cobblemon.species.epochblitzle.desc: Blitzle's fur is freeing and lightweight, allowing them to have an extra aerodynamic boost and reach incredible speeds when running.
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrika.name: Zebstrika
cobblemon.species.epochzebstrika.desc: Its mane is soft and highly coveted by poachers. However, poachers have been unsuccessful in being able to catch it because of how fast it is.
cobblemon.species.epochemolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.epochemolga.desc: They are very naughty Pokemon and enjoy nosediving from steep heights and swarming lost travellers and hikers.
cobblemon.species.epochelgyem.name: Elgyem
cobblemon.species.epochelgyem.desc: This Pokmon is supposed to represent a soldier sent by an advanced civilization to study a species and evaluate them to eventually become a subservient colony.
cobblemon.species.epochbeheeyem.name: Beheeyem
cobblemon.species.epochbeheeyem.desc: The eye on its head is supposed to act as a one-way camera that allows its masters from another planet to surveil and study the Orion Region.
cobblemon.species.epochscraggy.name: Scraggy
cobblemon.species.epochscraggy.desc: This Pokemon often inhabits the urban centres and hideaway areas. It is often sharing its mix tape with others in hopes of catching its big break.
cobblemon.species.epochscrafty.name: Scrafty
cobblemon.species.epochscrafty.desc: This Pokemon has been recognized for its skill in hip-hop that it adorns itself in the best looking urban streetwear there is to be found.
cobblemon.species.africanusangothita.des: Cuando Perseo derrot a la Gorgona, esta puso varios pequeos huevos de los que sali este Pokmon.
cobblemon.species.africanusangothorita.d: La luz de las estrellas origina su poder. De noche, marca su posicin haciendo levitar piedras con su poder psquico.
En su fase de mayor poder, es capaz de utilizar el poder petrificante de su madre, la Gorgona.
cobblemon.species.lagoonanlitwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.lagoonanlampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.ionosiandruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.avalossianvanillite.de: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
cobblemon.species.avalossianvanillish.de: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
cobblemon.species.novranherdier.name: Herdier
cobblemon.species.novranherdier.desc: This ancestral form of Herdier is well-adapted to the cold. It used to be trained to pull sleds across the snow, and many people continue this practice today.
cobblemon.species.novranstoutland.name: Stoutland
cobblemon.species.novranstoutland.desc: Though its fur covers its eyes, with its fantastic sense of smell, it can track down survivors lost in snowstorms and quickly bring them back to safety.
cobblemon.species.novranvanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.novranvanillite.desc: It migrated south to avoid predators like Sneasel and became herbivorous. The leaves it eats make it body taste awful to its former predators, but now it is targeted by Minsect.
cobblemon.species.novranvanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.novranvanillish.desc: It strips tree bark to form a protective shell for itself. It's a glutton that hoards Berries and leaves inside its shell to eat later, preserved by its naturally cold body.
cobblemon.species.novranvanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe
cobblemon.species.novranvanilluxe.desc: Its shell overflows with chilled fruit, which its two heads devour ravenously. Anyone that tries to steal even a single Berry from its stash will be attacked by howling blizzards.
cobblemon.species.novrandruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.novrandruddigon.desc: Living in the cold mountains of Novrai has caused it to lose its wings. When it hibernates, it covers itself in a thick layer of frost that makes it impossible to disturb.
cobblemon.species.qamorancubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cobblemon.species.qamoranbeartic.name: Beartic
cobblemon.species.varitasianyamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.varitasianyamask.desc: It's bound to a mirror, possibly as a punishment for extreme vanity when alive. It constantly gazes at itself, sometimes appearing to show discomfort, yet it never looks away. Legends say that the mirror has the power to steal one's soul if looked into.
cobblemon.species.varitasianklink.name: Klink
cobblemon.species.varitasianklink.desc: At the price of one minigear atrophying, it has now developed a somewhat soft, flexible outer membrane. Though it often floats, its seems to enjoy rolling along the ground, as it helps it both move faster and generate energy faster.
cobblemon.species.varitasianklang.name: Klang
cobblemon.species.varitasianklang.desc: Given its increase in weight, Klang can now easily bowl over small obstacles with its large wheel. It can also swing either part of itself around by its joint to cause major damage.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.varitasiantynamo.desc: Generations of living in muddy water neutralized its electrical charge. It instead began to focus more on swimming and burrowing through swampy terrain.
cobblemon.species.varitasianeelektrik.de: It's so slippery that it can comfortably swim through muddy ground as if it's liquid. It swallows vast amounts of mud, absorbs any nutrients or plant matter in it and then spits up what's left.
cobblemon.species.varitasianeelektross.d: It lurks in murky swamps, digging complex tunnel systems. It feeds mainly on plant matter and will occasionally hunt down grass type pokemon to latch onto and drain their life force with its powerful gaping mouth.
cobblemon.species.interiangenesect.name: Genesect
cobblemon.species.norheimansigilyph.name: Sigilyph
cobblemon.species.norheimansigilyph.desc: Norheiman Sigilyph works as a compass for lost souls. It may lead them astray into the darkness however. Like its Unovan counterpart, its odd shape makes its appearance from mystical shapes seen from the sky.
cobblemon.species.norheimanfoongus.name: Foongus
cobblemon.species.hizianheatmor.name: Heatmor
cobblemon.species.hizianheatmor.desc: It spills flammable gas and strikes its claws together to ignite fires. Using this strategy, Heatmor lures Termunch out of their underground nests.
cobblemon.species.hiziandruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.hiziandruddigon.desc: The various crystals growing on its body absorb and store heat, allowing it to live in colder climates without freezing.
cobblemon.species.avorianmaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.avorianmaractus.desc: Once every fall, groups of this Pokemon gather and dance in unison throughout the entire night. Other Ghost-type Pokemon are invited to dance along with them. The bone-chilling rattling in their hollow bodies is enough to paralyze adults with fear.
cobblemon.species.eghotrubbish.name: Trubbish
cobblemon.species.eghotrubbish.desc: As a result of urban clean-up initiatives, many Trubbish were mistakenly thrown into garbage cans. Being too weak to escape, they instead repurpose the cans as armor.
cobblemon.species.eghogarbodor.name: Garbodor
cobblemon.species.eghogarbodor.desc: When Trubbish eat enough to get too big for their can, they will evolve into a Garbodor. They get larger with the more waste they stuff in their dumpster.
cobblemon.species.deltasnivy.name: Snivy
cobblemon.species.deltasnivy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. They usually form small colonies in the midst of raging seas, where they are protected from predators.
cobblemon.species.deltaservine.name: Servine
cobblemon.species.deltaservine.desc: Despite rarely coming up above the water's surface, on rainy days they use the cover of clouds to laze about on rocks and take in the fresh sea air.
cobblemon.species.deltaserperior.name: Serperior
cobblemon.species.deltaserperior.desc: Though they viciously protect their domains from outsiders, they admire and welcome the company of trainers who brave the oceans to meet them.
cobblemon.species.deltapurrloin.name: Purrloin
cobblemon.species.deltapurrloin.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. This Pokemon wanders the city streets while scaring people with its illusions.
cobblemon.species.deltaliepard.name: Liepard
cobblemon.species.deltaliepard.desc: This Pokemon makes use of illusions and trickery to catch its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltavenipede.name: Venipede
cobblemon.species.deltavenipede.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. It is highly aggressive and will attempt to set its surroundings on fire when agitated.
cobblemon.species.deltawhirlipede.name: Whirlipede
cobblemon.species.deltawhirlipede.desc: Though it prefers to remain still and blend in with its surroundings, when threatened it bursts forward at high speed and then crashes into its opponent explosively.
cobblemon.species.deltascolipede.name: Scolipede
cobblemon.species.deltascolipede.desc: Though it prefers to remain still and blend in with its surroundings, when threatened it bursts forward at high speed and then crashes into its opponent explosively.
cobblemon.species.deltawaterpetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.deltawaterpetilil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. It can be seen from within submarines, frolicking along the deep sea floor.
cobblemon.species.deltawaterlilligant.de: The flame atop its head burns so intensely that not even water can douse it. It has been know to help guide diving humans to safety.
cobblemon.species.deltafairypetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.deltafairypetilil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by shadowsofme. It gracefully descends upon weary travelers, restoring their morale and energy in the process.
cobblemon.species.deltafairylilligant.de: Capable of producing massive barriers that provide weaker Pokemon with a sanctuary, it observed the Torren Region from afar during its greatest times of crisis.
cobblemon.species.deltadarumaka.name: Darumaka
cobblemon.species.deltadarumaka.desc: A Delta Species discovered by potatoking12. Being quite mischievous, it runs through streets at night while making strange noises.
cobblemon.species.deltadarmanitan.name: Darmanitan
cobblemon.species.deltadarmanitan.desc: When facing weakened foes, it can sometimes possess them by passing through them. It still tries to use doors despite passing straight through them.
cobblemon.species.deltamaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.deltamaractus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by mushgloom. They move systematically, causing their gears and motors to produce an almost musical sound effect.
cobblemon.species.deltaberrydwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.deltaberrydwebble.desc: A Delta Species discovered by MorallyIncorrect. It makes homes in various berry bushes until they stop producing fruit.
cobblemon.species.deltaberrycrustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.deltaberrycrustle.desc: With its powerful pincers, it tills the earth and plants berries from the hedge on its back, creating future homes for itself and its offspring.
cobblemon.species.deltacakedwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.deltacakedwebble.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. It entices strangers with its sweet scent, taking offense if they do not immediately attempt to taste its frosting.
cobblemon.species.deltacakecrustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.deltacakecrustle.desc: While it does not mind sharing its pastry with others, it will stab thieves with its fork. Its body is quite cold in order to preserve the freshness of its cake.
cobblemon.species.deltascraggy.name: Scraggy
cobblemon.species.deltascraggy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. Despite being a Grass-type, it is quite adept at hunting Bug-types for food.
cobblemon.species.deltascrafty.name: Scrafty
cobblemon.species.deltascrafty.desc: The tuft of grass on its head is surprisingly hard; it can be used to break through rocks.
cobblemon.species.deltayamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.deltayamask.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Palfi. This Pokemon formed from radioactive waste that was carelessly dumped in landfills.
cobblemon.species.deltacofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.deltacofagrigus.desc: This Pokemon frequents nuclear landfills in order to keep surrounding areas free from radiation. Destroying its exterior would produce an explosion exceeding 720 kilotons.
cobblemon.species.deltasolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.deltasolosis.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. Its survival is dependent upon its soul remaining bound to its rock.
cobblemon.species.deltaduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.deltaduosion.desc: As its power grows, so do the number of rocks under its control. Each rock appears to have a mind of its own.
cobblemon.species.deltareuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.deltareuniclus.desc: Extraordinarily cunning, it can survive any attack so long as a fragment of itself remains within a rock.
cobblemon.species.deltaemolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.deltaemolga.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. On cold nights they spit hot embers on their tails and feet to ignite them. The ensuing blaze can be seen for miles.
cobblemon.species.deltakarrablast.name: Karablast
cobblemon.species.deltakarrablast.desc: A Delta Species discovered by bradleyinabox. For unknown reasons, this Pokemon is extremely friendly towards Shelmet.
cobblemon.species.deltaescavalier.name: Escavalier
cobblemon.species.deltaescavalier.desc: It drenches the shell of a Shelmet in its own saliva before wearing it, creating a sugary, white coating. The steel armor is then resistant to Fire-type attacks.
cobblemon.species.deltafoongus.name: Foongus
cobblemon.species.deltafoongus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. It disguises itself as a harmless umbrella and then frightens people attempting to grab it by licking their hand.
cobblemon.species.deltaamoonguss.name: Amoonguss
cobblemon.species.deltaamoonguss.desc: Though not always malicious in nature, they offer to shield Pokemon from the rain using their arms only to play pranks once the Pokemon's guard has dropped.
cobblemon.species.deltalitwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.deltalitwick.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. It shares its flames with others by occupying dark spaces and illuminating its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.deltalampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.deltalampent.desc: It has been known to appear next to children having nightmares, basking them in its warmth and eliminating all negative thoughts and emotions.
cobblemon.species.deltachandelure.name: Chandelure
cobblemon.species.deltachandelure.desc: Its flames will never harm its trainer. On the contrary, being engulfed in its flames purifies both the body and soul while also increasing a person's lifespan.
cobblemon.species.deltaaxew.name: Axew
cobblemon.species.deltaaxew.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. It takes large bites out of docked boats, forcing local fishermen to invest in boats made of extremely strong metal.
cobblemon.species.deltafraxure.name: Fraxure
cobblemon.species.deltafraxure.desc: Growing bolder as it becomes stronger, it prefers to bite boats being used by fishermen. However, sometimes they are careless and are pierced by fish hooks.
cobblemon.species.deltahaxorus.name: Haxorus
cobblemon.species.deltahaxorus.desc: Its dorsal fin fuses with an anchor during evolution. Though it loses its ability to quickly navigate through water, it becomes a very fearsome foe on land.
cobblemon.species.deltagolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.deltagolett.desc: A Delta Species discovered by RuneBlad3. It battles in arenas every day, honing its skills in the hopes that it will one day become a champion.
cobblemon.species.deltagolurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.deltagolurk.desc: It fights barehanded even against armed foes, as no weapon is capable of piercing its armor. No one knows what its face looks like without wearing its helmet.
cobblemon.species.deltapawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.deltapawniard.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird and Zero_Breaker. It flies through the air and strikes at its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltabisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.deltabisharp.desc: It commands a large group of Pawniard. A single swing of its arm is enough to summon a hurricane.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltabisharp.name: DeltaBisharp
cobblemon.species.deltaheatmor.name: Heatmor
cobblemon.species.deltaheatmor.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Radryl and EchoTheThird. The mechanisms inside of its body allow it to churn acids at high velocity and fire them from its arms.
cobblemon.species.deltadeino.name: Deino
cobblemon.species.deltadeino.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. Being blind, they use their tongues to sense objects around them through different scents. They bite anything that moves.
cobblemon.species.deltazweilous.name: Zweilous
cobblemon.species.deltazweilous.desc: As its heads are quite competitive, it faces problems if both heads try to swallow its prey whole. It can spit venom over the length of an Olympic swimming pool.
cobblemon.species.deltahydreigon.name: Hydreigon
cobblemon.species.deltahydreigon.desc: It uses its smaller heads to scout out an area before dominating anything it considers prey. Though females of this species are shy, males should be avoided at all costs.
cobblemon.species.deltalarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.deltalarvesta.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. It prefers to remain in solitude, away from all forms of life. When its anger peaks, it is able to distort dimensions.
cobblemon.species.deltavolcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.deltavolcarona.desc: Contact with humans causes it to release lethal toxins into the air for miles. Experiments suggest that it can warp space and summon black holes.
cobblemon.species.deltameloetta.name: Meloetta
cobblemon.species.deltameloetta.desc: A Delta Species discovered by mushgloom. It became a mime after finding itself without a voice, but it is suspected that finding its voice would unlock its powers.
cobblemon.species.yamaskx.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.yamaskx.desc: Its calcareous shell resembles an ancient water jar. It is unknown if men's artifacts were inspired by this Pokemon or vice versa.
cobblemon.species.cofagrigusx.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.cofagrigusx.desc: Its limbs are made of pure cristalline water. Some people believe that a single sip of that water will give you everlasting life.
cobblemon.species.joltikx.name: Joltik
cobblemon.species.joltikx.desc: They sneak up falling from the sky in large groups, so they can overcome their small size. Then they bring the prey to Galvantula.
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.name: Galvantula
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.desc: It freezes the air around its nest. Then it traps prey in a thick ice web, slowly leading them to hypothermia.
cobblemon.species.bisharpx.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.bisharpx.desc: The Bisharp owned by Dimension Sergeant S. The consciences of both A & B's Bisharp coexist in this Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.hoennianmaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.hoennianmaractus.desc: Maractus were forced out of the desert due to competition with rival Cacturne. It's ability to survive nonetheless is a testament to its hardiness.
cobblemon.species.hoenniansolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.hoenniansolosis.desc: Solosis in Hoenn have adapted on a cellular level to resemble common berries. They avoid unwanted attention by hiding within fruit trees.
cobblemon.species.hoennianduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.hoennianduosion.desc: It constantly devours berries by absorbing them through it's jelly-like membrane. Their brilliant gold color glows brightly after they finish a meal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianreuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.hoennianreuniclus.desc: It constantly devours berries by absorbing them through it's jelly-like membrane. Their brilliant gold color glows brightly after they finish a meal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianemolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.hoennianemolga.desc: Emolga swoop down from the sky in an effort to frighten townsfolk. Due to their adorable appearance, however, they are rarely successful.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.hoenniantynamo.desc: It releases a foul odor to ward off any potential predators. They travel in large clusters, resulting in unbearable smells as they move from place to place.
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektrik.name: Eelektrik
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektrik.desc: Through frequent shedding of it's skin, this Pokemon grows in size at an incredible rate. It devours sand and leaves behind rare minerals as waste
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektross.des: An Eelektross is scarcely seen above ground. It's monstrous jaws can crush even the hardest materials beneath the surface of the earth.
cobblemon.species.hoennianpawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.hoennianpawniard.desc: Though clumsy and prone to error, a Pawniard will never give up on it's journey to grow stronger. It constantly seeks out new sparring partners.
cobblemon.species.hoennianbisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.hoennianbisharp.desc: Chivalrous to a fault, these Pokemon will defend their Trainers with unwavering loyalty. In the wild, they are often seen with a troupe of Pawniard in tow.
cobblemon.species.seviianblitzle.name: Blitzle
cobblemon.species.seviianzebstrika.name: Zebstrika
cobblemon.species.mythianzorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.mythianzorua.desc: Due to the overwhelming heat of the Mythan Desert, Zorua tried to seek shelter within the Catacombs of the Mythan Desert, eventually changing form.
cobblemon.species.mythianzoroark.name: Zoroark
cobblemon.species.mythianzoroark.desc: Due to the overwhelming heat of the Mythan Desert, Zorua tried to seek shelter within the Catacombs of the Mythan Desert, eventually changing form.
cobblemon.species.mythianlarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.mythianlarvesta.desc: The moonlight is attracted by Larvesta and it stores it all inside its chest, waiting to evolve.
cobblemon.species.mythianvolcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.mythianvolcarona.desc: Volcarona from Mythan have adapted to the rays ammitted from the moon at night, causing an outbreak of magical transformation once evolving.
cobblemon.species.alteranzorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.alteranzorua.desc: An old fable describes a ZORUA cloaked in so many illusions that it turned into one itself. This form is said to be its descendant.
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.name: Roggenrola
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.desc: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.desc: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.desc: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnivy.name: Snivy
cobblemon.species.ayreiansnivy.desc: When they're in good health, the liquid metal they cover themselves with doesn't stick to surfaces.
cobblemon.species.ayreianservine.name: Servine
cobblemon.species.ayreianservine.desc: The liquid metal its body is made of is so dense that its an incredibly heavy Pokemon, despite its minute size.
cobblemon.species.ayreianserperior.name: Serperior
cobblemon.species.ayreianserperior.desc: Its body is made up by more than 85% of liquid metal. To protect itself, it slowly exhales a noxious gas, even while sleeping.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantepig.name: Tepig
cobblemon.species.ayreiantepig.desc: It can be seen sleeping soundly in lava lakes. A sick Tepig can be dangerous, as it will drool the accumulated magma from its nostrils.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpignite.name: Pignite
cobblemon.species.ayreianpignite.desc: Completely different from its pre-evolution, this pokemon is savage and unruly. It stores high quantities of magma to prepare for evolution.
cobblemon.species.ayreianemboar.name: Emboar
cobblemon.species.ayreianemboar.desc: The metal shackles all over its body contain the otherwise unbridled fire energy of its core. Long ago, an Emboar with broken shackles made scorched earth of a metropolis.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidove.name: Pidove
cobblemon.species.ayreianpidove.desc: It snobs other Pokemon, even shoving them aside when there's food nearby. Due to its small size, most of the time it's sent running with its tail between its legs.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantranquill.name: Tranquill
cobblemon.species.ayreiantranquill.desc: Adored by old ladies, they are often found in videos online due to their grumpy nature. Seeing one in the wild is a rare sight.
cobblemon.species.ayreianunfezant.name: Unfezant
cobblemon.species.ayreianunfezant.desc: In the past, the commanding presence of Unfezant was enough to make entire civilizations bow to it. Those that stood in its way were showered by powerful toxins.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansandile.name: Sandile
cobblemon.species.ayreiansandile.desc: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing snow aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the tundra as if it's swimming.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrokorok.name: Krokorok
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrokorok.desc: Although this Pokmon has specialized eyes that allow it to see well in water, Krokorok aren't adept swimmers.
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrookodile.name: Krookodile
cobblemon.species.ayreiankrookodile.desc: This Pokmon is known as the Bully of the Tundra. Krookodile's mighty jaws can bite through permafrost with ease.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaxew.name: Axew
cobblemon.species.ayreianaxew.desc: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn't a concern.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfraxure.name: Fraxure
cobblemon.species.ayreianfraxure.desc: Fraxure uses it's blade like tusks to cut down anyone who threatens it's territory, and unlike it's predecessor, their tusks can grow back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaxorus.name: Haxorus
cobblemon.species.ayreianhaxorus.desc: With it's nearly indestructable blade like tusks, this Pokemon is able to take nearly any opponent head on without consequence.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.ayreiandruddigon.desc: Devious and opportunistic, it flies through Cyberspace in search of vulnerable files to infect. Unreliable sources say that they were made by a group of hackers that opposed the war.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantimburr.name: Timburr
cobblemon.species.ayreiantimburr.desc: Timburr seem to love the idea of building homes out of wood, but lose their mind at the site of steel.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.ayreiangurdurr.desc: It carries around a giant log for hours upon hours without rest.
cobblemon.species.ayreianconkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
cobblemon.species.ayreianconkeldurr.desc: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.desc: The plant on top of its back secretes a sticky substance similar to glue, which is why sometimes Dwebble will have items attached to it, like Heart Scales.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.name: Archen
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.desc: While its weight prevents it from flying, it can jump up to 30 feet in the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.name: Archeops
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.desc: Scientists believe this was the true form of Archeops, millions of years ago. Its legs are powerful enough to overturn a truck, but it is still unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.name: Minccino
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.desc: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.name: Cinccino
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.desc: Its body secretes oil that this Pokemon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.name: Ducklett
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.desc: They're always seen either dancing or sleeping if not soaring gracefully through the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswanna.name: Swanna
cobblemon.species.ayreianswanna.desc: Swanna start to dance at dawn. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillite.desc: Unable to survive in cold areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air to cause sandstorms. It burrows into the sand to sleep.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillish.desc: Unable to survive in cold areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air to cause sandstorms. It burrows into the sand to sleep.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanilluxe.name: Vanilluxe
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanilluxe.desc: Its outer shell is as hot as the inside of an active volcano. It obliviously burns everything in its vicinity to a crisp, be it friend or foe.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansolosis.desc: Kaskadian Solosis are powerful telepaths who can interact with other pokemon and even humans using only their minds. Their bodies are floating in a water-filled bubble that, unlike their Unovan counterparts, cannot be punctured.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.kaskadianduosion.desc: Their brains flop around in a thick watery liquid, shielded by one of their brains' psychic power. They're constantly conversing amongst themselves, which distracts them from whatever task they're working on.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.mysticsolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.mysticduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.mysticreuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.cefiranpetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.cefiranlilligant.name: Lilligant
cobblemon.species.cefirangothitelle.name: Gothitelle
cobblemon.species.cefirangolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.cefirangolurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.aromianspritzee.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.aromianaromatisse.name: Aromatisse
cobblemon.species.mahalianbunnelby.name: Bunnelby
cobblemon.species.mahaliandiggersby.name: Diggersby
cobblemon.species.ivrisianspritzee.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.ivrisianclauncher.name: Clauncher
cobblemon.species.epochfennekin.name: Fennekin
cobblemon.species.epochfennekin.desc: This little Pokemon has a plethora of potential hidden inside of it. However, it does not know yet whether to use it selflessly or not...
cobblemon.species.epochbraixen.name: Braixen
cobblemon.species.epochbraixen.desc: After undergoing rigorous training, this Pokemon is able to talk to the dead using any reflective surface, albeit for a short period of time.
cobblemon.species.epochdelphox.name: Delphox
cobblemon.species.epochdelphox.desc: This ancient Pokemon is thought to be only a myth. It stores so much power inside its glass orb it is said it can communicate with the underworld freely.
cobblemon.species.epochchespin.name: Chespin
cobblemon.species.epochchespin.desc: It burrows deep in the ground of caves. It will emerge when it needs to find food.
cobblemon.species.epochquilladin.name: Quilladin
cobblemon.species.epochquilladin.desc: It uses the crystals on its back as a light source to help it navigate through dark areas.
cobblemon.species.epochchesnaught.name: Chesnaught
cobblemon.species.epochchesnaught.desc: If one of its crystals are taken away without permission, it can go into a rampage that can cause nearby tremors.
cobblemon.species.epochfroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.epochfroakie.desc: When it thunder storms, this Pokemon attracts lightning and is not remotely fazed by it. In fact, it quite enjoys it!
cobblemon.species.epochfrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.epochfrogadier.desc: When this Pokemon hops, it gives off small sparks. It is very quick when it does dash around that can make it look like the ground is lit up with an electrical current.
cobblemon.species.epochgreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.epochgreninja.desc: This Pokemon is able to materialize and throw lightning bolts from a distance.
cobblemon.species.epochfletchling.name: Fletchling
cobblemon.species.epochfletchling.desc: As a small immature bird, it has not yet learned to control its built-in electricity and will sometimes periodically shock itself as it learns.
cobblemon.species.epochfletchinder.name: Fletchinder
cobblemon.species.epochfletchinder.desc: It is very territorial and can be reckless as it matures. As a young upstart, its ability to use electricity has made it impulsive and overconfident.
cobblemon.species.epochtalonflame.name: Talonflame
cobblemon.species.epochtalonflame.desc: Its favoured techniques is to charge itself up with electricity and dive into an enemy. The damage it deals is far more significant than the damage it sustains.
cobblemon.species.epochbergmite.name: Bergmite
cobblemon.species.epochbergmite.desc: It is made of extra jagged rock so when it launches itself in full-body tackles at its enemy, it can pierce and significantly damage them.
cobblemon.species.epochavalugg.name: Avalugg
cobblemon.species.epochavalugg.desc: Because it was formed in the earth's core, it has no trouble navigating because of its built-in magnetism.
cobblemon.species.epochamaura.name: Amaura
cobblemon.species.epochamaura.desc: It accompanies people that are lost in nightmares back to safety and away from danger. It uses its abilities to shield sleeping people from evil forces.
cobblemon.species.epochaurorus.name: Aurorus
cobblemon.species.epochaurorus.desc: Apparently, it is able to walk seamlessly between the waking world and the dream realm. Anyone seeing it while fast asleep will have good luck for a year.
cobblemon.species.epochskrelp.name: Skrelp
cobblemon.species.epochskrelp.desc: It is able to change its pigment colour to camouflage within beds of seaweed so that it is able to easily harvest and feed on algae on the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.epochdragalge.name: Dragalge
cobblemon.species.epochdragalge.desc: Its fins are made of seaweed so it is very limber and much faster. However, as a result, it is far more susceptible to physical damage.
cobblemon.species.epochlitleo.name: Litleo
cobblemon.species.epochlitleo.desc: From an early age, they are able to hunt on the snowy plains. Their fur allows them to blend into the snow making them excellent predators.
cobblemon.species.epochpyroar.name: Pyroar
cobblemon.species.epochpyroar.desc: A pride of Pyroars typically consist of one alpha male and several females. They are nomadic and frequently migrate across snowy plains in search of food.
cobblemon.species.epochskiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.epochskiddo.desc: It is very territorial and typically battles others in its herd from a young age, to sharpen its horn and assert dominance among its peers.
cobblemon.species.epochgogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.epochgogoat.desc: They have developed techniques to headbutt mountains and walls to toughen their horns and are very adept at scaling mountains.
cobblemon.species.epochswirlix.name: Swirlix
cobblemon.species.epochswirlix.desc: It is lightweight and easily blown around by a strong breeze. It enjoys travelling in small packs so that they can bounce off one another in strong winds.
cobblemon.species.epochslurpuff.name: Slurpuff
cobblemon.species.epochslurpuff.desc: It is said that the feathers from its wings grant wishes, so they are highly sought after Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochsylveon.name: Sylveon
cobblemon.species.epochsylveon.desc: Its rage is so palpable that the colour of its ribbons change colour to replicate the state of its emotion. It is almost impossible to soothe.
cobblemon.species.epochnoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.epochnoibat.desc: They emit high-pitched screeches as a means of stunning and disabling their foe in combat.
cobblemon.species.epochnoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.epochnoivern.desc: If their deafening sound waves are not enough to stop an enemy in its tracks, their jagged tails can also be used defensively as a last resort.
cobblemon.species.epochspritzee.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.epochspritzee.desc: It has an array of various poisons and salves at its disposal that it can use to either cure or infect its enemies.
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisse.name: Aromatisse
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisse.desc: It has been known to dabble in a variety of unethical and unsupported experiments in search of crafting the most deadly poison.
cobblemon.species.epochfurfrou.name: Furfrou
cobblemon.species.epochfurfrou.desc: These Pokemon are rumoured to be representations of various weather systems in the form of a Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedge.name: Honedge
cobblemon.species.epochhonedge.desc: It appears in multiple different weapon formats within the Orion region to allow its owner the flexibility in case they are not skilled in one specific weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgeone.name: Honedge
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgeone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgetwo.name: Honedge
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgetwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgethree.name: Honedge
cobblemon.species.epochhonedgethree.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochdoublade.name: Doublade
cobblemon.species.epochdoublade.desc: The different weapon formats it appears in is dependent on the inherent skill level of the person wielding them.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladeone.name: Doublade
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladeone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladetwo.name: Doublade
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladetwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochdoubladethree.des: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislash.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.epochaegislash.desc: Only the most skilled weapon masters will ever see an Aegislash in its true form as it is dependent on their proficiency in the use of the specific weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashone.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashone.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a bow in tune with nature.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashtwo.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashtwo.desc: This Pokemon masquerades as a blazing axe.
cobblemon.species.epochaegislashthree.de: This Pokemon masquerades as a charged mace.
cobblemon.species.epochespurr.name: Espurr
cobblemon.species.epochespurr.desc: A malicious spirit has possessed this poor Espurr. If it refuses any commands, the spirit will hurt it, compelling it into obedience.
cobblemon.species.epochmeowstic.name: Meowstic
cobblemon.species.epochmeowstic.desc: When it evolved, it submitted itself entirely to the spirit that had possessed it. It is unclear if it retained any semblance of its free will.
cobblemon.species.epochklefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.epochklefki.desc: It is a traditional Pokemon that is endowed with a number of protective charms and enchantments that help it shield their owner from evil spirits.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrunt.name: Tyrunt
cobblemon.species.epochtyrunt.desc: Despite its body being freezing cold to the touch, it is unclear how it is able to simultaneously have flames burning perpetually.
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrum.name: Tyrantrum
cobblemon.species.epochtyrantrum.desc: Its flames burn with a violent passion but the snow that has collected on its back never seems to melt. It is unclear how this is possible.
cobblemon.species.epochspritzeeone.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.epochspritzeeone.desc: It likes to carry around a lot of gold and shiny objects, although it's not clear how it does this given its small size.
cobblemon.species.epocharomatisseone.des: When it finds gold, it eats it, making its body larger. However, it is not clear if it is actually eating it or storing it as it is able to retrieve the gold at any time?
cobblemon.species.epochcarbink.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.epochcarbink.desc: Despite its small size, it is incredibly dense, exhibiting a gravitational force that it is able to attract small particles of rocks and mud to orbit around it.
cobblemon.species.epochgoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.epochgoomy.desc: These Pokemon appear in many different flavours: sour apple, cherry, blue razz, lemon, orange and grape. Can you collect them all?
cobblemon.species.epochsliggoo.name: Sliggoo
cobblemon.species.epochsliggoo.desc: This Pokemon is very sticky and will decompose if it stays under the sun for too long.
cobblemon.species.epochgoodra.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.epochgoodra.desc: Every step it takes leaves a small part of itself behind. Not to worry because it quickly regenerates itself.
cobblemon.species.epochbinacle.name: Binacle
cobblemon.species.epochbinacle.desc: Its latent psychic power allows it to levitate a number of rocks and sediment around it as a way to show off.
cobblemon.species.epochbarbaracle.name: Barbaracle
cobblemon.species.epochbarbaracle.desc: It has reached a level of psychic mastery that it is capable of attacking from afar and anticipating enemy attacks because it has seen into the future.
cobblemon.species.epochphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.epochphantump.desc: When this Pokemon was first seen burning, it was said to be a message from a god.
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.epochtrevenant.desc: This Pokemon is able to spontaneously start burning and suppress the flames at will.
cobblemon.species.epochhelioptile.name: Helioptile
cobblemon.species.epochhelioptile.desc: The small snakes on this Pokemon's head are an extension of its body. Their fangs seep venom and the poison can paralyze a foe ten times its size.
cobblemon.species.epochheliolisk.name: Heliolisk
cobblemon.species.epochheliolisk.desc: The snakes on this Pokemon's head are capable of turning their target to stone, significantly lowering their speed, making hunting easy.
cobblemon.species.epochdedenne.name: Dedenne
cobblemon.species.epochdedenne.desc: Poking this Pokemon in different places elicits different squeals. It is a toy that is highly coveted by small children, but very annoying for parents.
cobblemon.species.epochflabebe.name: Flabb
cobblemon.species.epochflabebe.desc: This Pokemon has made a sort of nest in a coral bed and gotten very attached to it but it can walk away at any time.
cobblemon.species.epochfloette.name: Floette
cobblemon.species.epochfloette.desc: This Pokemon carries around a part of its coral bed around with it wherever it goes.
cobblemon.species.epochflorges.name: Florges
cobblemon.species.epochflorges.desc: This Pokemon is rooted in place, so it prefers to not move around often as it is very onerous to move its entire coral bed around with it.
cobblemon.species.epochhoopa.name: Hoopa
cobblemon.species.epochhoopa.desc: This Pokemon will often prank people and then use its magic to disappear before being caught.
cobblemon.species.africanusanhonedge.des: Las espadas forjadas en tierra Hispana eran usadas por soldados, y una vez estos moran, si haban luchado con valor, se reencarnaban en estos pokmon.
cobblemon.species.africanusandoublade.de: Al adquirir almas de guerreros ms poderosos, se divide en dos espadas. Se comunican entre s mediante telepata y coordinan los ataques para rebanar al enemigo.
cobblemon.species.africanusanaegislash.d: Cuando consigue un alma de gran hreo,evoluciona. Siendo un Pokmon digno de cnsules durante generaciones.
cobblemon.species.lagoonanbinacle.name: Binacle
cobblemon.species.vesitanchespin.name: Chespin
cobblemon.species.vesitanchespin.desc: Es ist sehr schlfrig. Wenn es trumt, kann es fr kurze Zeit in die Zukunft schauen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanquilladin.name: Quilladin
cobblemon.species.vesitanquilladin.desc: Die Krone auf seinem Kopf schtzt es vor Ablenkungen, sodass es in Ruhe zur jeder Zeit meditieren kann. Das Auge auf dem Bauch dient zur Abschreckung.
cobblemon.species.vesitanchesnaught.name: Chesnaught
cobblemon.species.vesitanchesnaught.desc: Meditation hat diesem Pokmon erlaubt in seinen Trumen durch Zeit und Raum zu reisen. Man sagt es hat schon alles gesehen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanfennekin.name: Fennekin
cobblemon.species.vesitanfennekin.desc: Anstelle eines Snacks kaut es unterwegs auf einem Knochen herum. Knochensammeln ist seine grte Leidenschaft.
cobblemon.species.vesitanbraixen.name: Braixen
cobblemon.species.vesitanbraixen.desc: In seinem Schweif steckt ein Knochen, den es bei Bedarf zum Kampf einsetzt, um mehr Knochen zu sammeln.
cobblemon.species.vesitandelphox.name: Delphox
cobblemon.species.vesitandelphox.desc: Stolz prsentiert dieses Pokmon die Knochen seiner Gegner, die es als Schweif hinterher zieht.
cobblemon.species.vesitanfroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.vesitanfroakie.desc: Wenn sich dieses Pokmon bedroht fhlt, sondert es ein Gift ab, was schmerzt wie tausend Grad heie Flammen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanfrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.vesitanfrogadier.desc: Es ist unglaublich agil und schnell. Bei seiner Jagd auf Gegner spuckt es kleine Feuerblle auf sie, fr einen gersteten Snack.
cobblemon.species.vesitangreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.vesitangreninja.desc: Kaum hat man es erspht, verschwindet es auch schon wieder. Alles was man sieht ist das Lichtbild seiner Flamme, die an Sternschnuppen erinnert.
cobblemon.species.vesitanscatterbug.name: Scatterbug
cobblemon.species.vesitanscatterbug.desc: Es reguliert seine Krpertemperatur mit dem Puder, das seinen Krper bedeckt, und kommt deswegen in jedem Klima und jeder Region zurecht.
cobblemon.species.vesitanspewpa.name: Spewpa
cobblemon.species.vesitanspewpa.desc: Es lebt versteckt im schattigen Dickicht. Wird es von einem Feind angegriffen, stellt es sein Fell zur Abschreckung zu scharfen Spitzen auf.
cobblemon.species.vesitanvivillon.name: Vivillon
cobblemon.species.vesitanvivillon.desc: Vivillon kommen weltweit mit den unterschiedlichsten Flgelmusterungen vor. In Vesita entwickelte es heilende Krfte.
cobblemon.species.vesitanflabebe.name: Flabebe
cobblemon.species.vesitanflabebe.desc: Hat es eine Blume gefunden, die ihm gefllt, lebt es sein Leben lang in Symbiose mit ihr. Es lsst sich unbekmmert vom Wind treiben.
cobblemon.species.vesitanfloette.name: Floette
cobblemon.species.vesitanfloette.desc: Es fliegt auf Wiesen umher und kmmert sich um welkende Blumen. Es setzt deren geheime Krfte frei und nutzt diese zum Kmpfen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanflorges.name: Florges
cobblemon.species.vesitanflorges.desc: Wunderschne Blumengrten sind sein Revier. Sollte sich jemand ungewollt nhern, setzt es ein tdliches Giftgas frei.
cobblemon.species.vesitanskiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.vesitanskiddo.desc: Man sagt, es sei eines der ersten Pokmon, die mit Menschen zusammengelebt haben. Es ist sehr ruhig und friedfertig.
cobblemon.species.vesitangogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.vesitangogoat.desc: Durch ihr sehr robustes Fell knnen sie ganze Gebirgszge unbeschadet herunterrollen. Der Aufstieg dauert allerdings ewig.
cobblemon.species.vesitanspritzee.name: Spritzee
cobblemon.species.vesitanspritzee.desc: Der von ihm verstrmte Duft verzckt jeden, der ihn riecht. Es benutzt ihn um seine Gegner kurzzeitig zu kontrollieren.
cobblemon.species.vesitanaromatisse.name: Aromatisse
cobblemon.species.vesitanaromatisse.desc: Wie Pilzsporen breitet sich der vor ihm versprhte Duft im Krper des Gegners aus. Wenige Sekunden spter werden sie zu willenlosen Sklaven.
cobblemon.species.vesitanswirlix.name: Swirlix
cobblemon.species.vesitanswirlix.desc: Es stt weie Fden aus, die so s und klebrig wie Zuckerwatte sind, sich jedoch in Sekunden entznden lassen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanslurpuff.name: Slurpuff
cobblemon.species.vesitanslurpuff.desc: Die Flamme auf seinem Kopf kann bis zu 685C hei werden. Es hilft deshalb oft in Konditoreien aus.
cobblemon.species.vesitaninkay.name: Inkay
cobblemon.species.vesitaninkay.desc: Mit den blinkenden Punkten auf seinem Krper raubt es Gegnern den Kampfeswillen. Es nutzt diese Gelegenheit, um sich zu verstecken.
cobblemon.species.vesitanmalamar.name: Malamar
cobblemon.species.vesitanmalamar.desc: Mit seinen hypnotischen Krften lockt es Gegner an, hlt sie mit den Tentakeln an seinem Kopf fest und zersetzt sie dann mit Verdauungssekret.
cobblemon.species.vesitanbinacle.name: Binacle
cobblemon.species.vesitanbinacle.desc: Bithora bewohnen jeweils zu zweit einen Felsen. Entzweien sie sich im Streit, sucht sich eines der beiden einen neuen Felsen als Unterkunft.
cobblemon.species.vesitanbarbaracle.name: Barbaracle
cobblemon.species.vesitanbarbaracle.desc: Arme und Beine verfgen ber eigene Gehirne, was ihnen relative Bewegungsfreiheit gewhrt. Sie ordnen sich jedoch zumeist den Befehlen des Kopfes unter.
cobblemon.species.vesitanskrelp.name: Skrelp
cobblemon.species.vesitanskrelp.desc: Als verfaulter Seetang getarnt, lauert es auf Beute und bespritzt alles und jeden, der sich ahnungslos nhert, mit flssigem Gift, bevor es ihm den Rest gibt.
cobblemon.species.vesitandragalge.name: Dragalge
cobblemon.species.vesitandragalge.desc: Es heit, dass die Besatzung von Schiffen, die sich in Tandraks Hoheitsgebiet begeben, nicht mehr lebend zurckkehrt.
cobblemon.species.vesitanclauncher.name: Clauncher
cobblemon.species.vesitanclauncher.desc: Durch krpereigene metallartige Absonderungen feuert es wie eine Pistole kleine Kgelchen ab, die aus kurzer Distanz selbst Felsen zerschmettern.
cobblemon.species.vesitanclawitzer.name: Clawitzer
cobblemon.species.vesitanclawitzer.desc: Aus seinen gewaltigen Scheren feuert es riesige Stahlkugeln ab, die ganze Klippen zum Einsturz bringen knnen.
cobblemon.species.vesitanhelioptile.name: Helioptile
cobblemon.species.vesitanhelioptile.desc: Die Zellen der Hautlappen, die sich beidseitig an seinem Kopf befinden, erzeugen Strom, wenn sie von Sonnenstrahlen beschienen werden.
cobblemon.species.vesitanheliolisk.name: Heliolisk
cobblemon.species.vesitanheliolisk.desc: Die Strommenge, die ein Elezard mit ausgebreiteten Hautlappen durch Umwandlung von Sonnenstrahlen erzeugt, gengt zur Versorgung eines Wolkenkratzers.
cobblemon.species.vesitanhawlucha.name: Hawlucha
cobblemon.species.vesitanhawlucha.desc: Ungeachtet seines kleinen Wuchses, erweist es sich, dank seiner Kampftechnik, gegenber greren Gegnern wie Machomei oder Hariyama als ebenbrtig.
cobblemon.species.vesitandedenne.name: Dedenne
cobblemon.species.vesitandedenne.desc: Mit seinem Schwanz zapft es Lebenskraft von seinen Opfern ab, um Energie zu tanken, die es ber seine Schnurrhaare wieder entldt.
cobblemon.species.vesitangoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.vesitangoomy.desc: Sein Krper ist von einer schleimigen Schicht umhllt, an der gegnerische Tritte und Schlge abgleiten, ohne Schaden anzurichten.
cobblemon.species.vesitansliggoo.name: Sliggoo
cobblemon.species.vesitansliggoo.desc: Es verjagt Gegner durch Absonderung eines alles zersetzenden Schleims. Die zurckgebildeten Augpfel des Pokmon gewhren ihm keine Sicht.
cobblemon.species.vesitangoodra.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.vesitangoodra.desc: Es greift den Gegner mit ausfahrbaren Fhlern an. Aufgrund seiner Blindheit benutzt es diese ebenfalls zur Orientierung und Naruhngssuche.
cobblemon.species.vesitanbergmite.name: Bergmite
cobblemon.species.vesitanbergmite.desc: Es wehrt gegnerische Angriffe mit seinem in Eis gehllten Krper ab. Bruchstellen bessert es mit aus kalter Luft gewonnenem neuen Eis aus.
cobblemon.species.vesitanavalugg.name: Avalugg
cobblemon.species.vesitanavalugg.desc: Mit den zahlreichen Arktip auf seinem Rcken sieht es aus wie ein Flugzeugtrger aus Eis.
cobblemon.species.vesitannoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.vesitannoibat.desc: Selbst ein gestandener Ringer geht bei den 200 000 Hz hohen Ultraschallwellen dieses Pokmon unweigerlich in die Knie.
cobblemon.species.vesitannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.vesitannoivern.desc: Es fliegt in finsterer, mondloser Nacht umher und macht Jagd auf achtlose Beute. Ist bei Dunkelheit jedem Gegner berlegen.
cobblemon.species.novranskrelp.name: NovranSkrelp
cobblemon.species.novranskrelp.desc: Novrai's kelp forests are pristine and healthy, so Skrelp has evolved to blend in. Its body still contains deadly toxins, though, and even a single nibble can prove fatal.
cobblemon.species.novrandragalge.name: NovranDragalge
cobblemon.species.novrandragalge.desc: Its yellow flower, flowing fins, and cheerful expression makes it a popular tourist icon, but it is just as deadly as other Dragalge. The flower on its head blooms brightest after taking down its prey.
cobblemon.species.varitasianflabebe.name: Flabebe
cobblemon.species.varitasianflabebe.desc: They collect spores and keep them on their head for various uses. They will sit quietly on mushrooms if observed but are likely to do something mischeivious if you look away.
cobblemon.species.varitasianfloette.name: Floette
cobblemon.species.varitasianfloette.desc: It picks its favorite mushroom and uses it to shield itself from sunlight. If enraged, it swings the mushroom around madly spreading spores everywhere.
cobblemon.species.varitasianphantump.des: The stumps of Varitan Phantump are particularly overrun with fungus, giving them power over its growth. Though sometimes they exhibit odd behavior, believed to be an effect of the fungus.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantrevenant.de: It now appears to be fully under the control of the fungus on its body, often shambling around eerily as if being puppeted. Its only concern seems to be maintaing the fungus and spreading its spores at much as possible.
cobblemon.species.hizianlitleo.name: Litleo
cobblemon.species.hizianlitleo.desc: They usually can be seen playing and pouncing on thin air, its unknown if they are playing with the wind or unseen spirits.
cobblemon.species.hizianpyroar.name: Pyroar
cobblemon.species.hizianpyroar.desc: They hunt their prey accompained by strong wind currents, their swift movement alongside the wind allows it to become partially invisible.
cobblemon.species.deltafroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.deltafroakie.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. The leaves around its neck help keep its neck warm while jumping through the trees at high speed.
cobblemon.species.deltafrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.deltafrogadier.desc: It can hurl the leaves produced around its neck at alarming speed, even slicing through tree trunks.
cobblemon.species.deltagreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.deltagreninja.desc: It hides within the deepest of foliage, only appearing to intimidate intruders. It blocks its enemies easily using its armor before incinerating them.
cobblemon.species.deltaamaura.name: Amaura
cobblemon.species.deltaamaura.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. This Pokemon floats around unnoticed in the ocean until it comes into contact with humans and greets them.
cobblemon.species.deltaaurorus.name: Aurorus
cobblemon.species.deltaaurorus.desc: This Pokemon willingly offers rides to other Pokemon and ferries them to other islands. It can float in the ocean endlessly so long as the sun is shining.
cobblemon.species.deltagoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.deltagoomy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by AChosen_Username. Its body is mainly composed of mud and is extremely squishy when touched.
cobblemon.species.deltasliggoo.name: Sliggoo
cobblemon.species.deltasliggoo.desc: It requires water in order to maintain its shape and health. Dryness is a sign of a sick Sliggoo.
cobblemon.species.deltagoodra.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.deltagoodra.desc: It expels and absorbs water continually on a daily basis. The occasional pebble that makes its way into its body can be expelled by belching.
cobblemon.species.deltaphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.deltaphantump.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. It protects all woodland Pokemon as a spirit guardian of the forest.
cobblemon.species.deltatrevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.deltatrevenant.desc: It guards the forest and would lay down its life to protect weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.deltabergmite.name: Bergmite
cobblemon.species.deltabergmite.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. Nearly impervious to physical attacks, its rate of regeneration exceeds the damage that it does receive.
cobblemon.species.deltaavalugg.name: Avalugg
cobblemon.species.deltaavalugg.desc: The rocks covering its body are as hard as steel. Its rampage is ferocious enough to destroy an entire mountain range.
cobblemon.species.deltanoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.deltanoibat.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. It uses blades of grass to create earsplittingly high frequencies of sound which stun its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltanoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.deltanoivern.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. It uses camouflage to stalk its enemies, but its heavy metal prevents it from flying.
cobblemon.species.deltahoopa.name: Hoopa
cobblemon.species.deltahoopa.desc: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.deltahoopaunleashed.de: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.greninjax.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.greninjax.desc: It moves under cover of darkness. It throws knives of hell fire at its opponents, piercing their flesh and leaving them with atrocious burns.
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.desc: It's mentioned in legends as the companion of the First King. It uses its momentum to move at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.swirlixx.name: Swirlix
cobblemon.species.swirlixx.desc: The appealing sweet fragrance it releases vaguely resembles that of Leppa Berries. Behind its delicious appearence lies an acid filling.
cobblemon.species.slurpuffx.name: Slurpuff
cobblemon.species.slurpuffx.desc: Anyone who digests its sweets will feel a strong sense of nausea. The more you eat them, the bigger Slurpuff gets.
cobblemon.species.hoenniangoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.hoenniangoomy.desc: It uses it's horns to check out it's surroundings. They're very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
cobblemon.species.seviianclauncher.name: Clauncher
cobblemon.species.seviianclawitzer.name: Clawitzer
cobblemon.species.seviiannoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.seviiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.mythiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.mythiannoivern.desc: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.desc: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate smoke. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.desc: It can disappear within moments. Now you see it, now you don't.
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninjas grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements.
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.ayreianskiddo.desc: These Pokemon prefer to live in areas with harsh climate, as they can withstand most elements.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.ayreiangogoat.desc: Being incredibly defensive of their offspring, these Pokemon will purposely cause avalanches to scare away mountain climbers.
cobblemon.species.ayreianphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.ayreianphantump.desc: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit's rebirth as this Pokmon.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrevenant.desc: A collection of lost spirits, with the sole purpose of defending wildlife from those who seek to destroy it.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchling.name: Fletchling
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchling.desc: When this Pokemon gets excited, its body temperature lowers harshly. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might catch a cold.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchinder.des: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder's sharp talons finish it off.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpancham.name: Pancham
cobblemon.species.ayreianpancham.desc: Wanting to make sure it's taken seriously, Pancham's always giving others a glare. But if it's not focusing, it ends up smiling.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpangoro.name: Pangoro
cobblemon.species.ayreianpangoro.desc: Angrier than a raging inferno, it pummels opponents with a fiery might. The fire emanating from its body is hot enough to melt the metal of a jet plane.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancarbink.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.ayreiancarbink.desc: The bands of iron spinning around it's core protect it from almost every kind of attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianklefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.ayreianklefki.desc: Radiating with electricity, it was commonly used to access electronically locked facilities.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpumpkaboo.name: Pumpkaboo
cobblemon.species.ayreianpumpkaboo.desc: When taking spirits to the afterlife, small Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of children to those of adults.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangourgeist.name: Gourgeist
cobblemon.species.ayreiangourgeist.desc: Soft cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are resting in the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoibat.desc: It likes to think it has wings that allow it to fly when in reality it just floats around.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoivern.desc: While it may look intimidating, it has a gentle and caring disposition. That said, it will shoot down anyone threatening its protege with beams of light.
cobblemon.species.relicskiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.relicskiddo.desc: Locals in the surrounding area noticed that Relic Skiddo had reemerged, as many of the trees in the forest had been rammed down. This means a Skiddo is about to evolve, and wants to hone its skills.
cobblemon.species.relicgogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.relicgogoat.desc: Relic Gogoats DNA was altered, and rocky outcrops grew all over its body. Old records tell of a mounted Relic Gogoat ending a month-long siege in a matter of seconds, by turning the castle gates to splinters with a full-speed horn bash. No momentum was lost.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbunnelby.name: Bunnelby
cobblemon.species.kaskadianphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.kaskadianphantump.desc: Unlike its Kalosian counter parts, Kaskadian Phantump's leaves when brewed, can create a very harmful poison. Scientists have used it to create modern day antidotes.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantrevenant.des: Kaskadian Trevenant have a tough time following orders, the toxins that are in its body affect its brain, making it difficult to tell friends apart from foes. It takes an experienced trainer to control one.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandiancie.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandiancie.desc: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.cefiranklefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.cefiranklefki.desc: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
cobblemon.species.fabelianyungoos.name: Yungoos
cobblemon.species.fabeliangumshoos.name: Gumshoos
cobblemon.species.fabelianmudbray.name: Mudbray
cobblemon.species.fabelianminior.name: Minior
cobblemon.species.fabeliansandygast.name: Sandygast
cobblemon.species.fabelianpyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku
cobblemon.species.fabeliandhelmise.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.fabelianmimikyu.name: Mimikyu
cobblemon.species.mahaliansandygast.name: Sandygast
cobblemon.species.mahalianpalossand.name: Palossand
cobblemon.species.ivrisianpikipek.name: Pikipek
cobblemon.species.ivrisiantrumbeak.name: Trumbeak
cobblemon.species.masteniankomala.name: Komala
cobblemon.species.masteniankomala.desc: Ability: Sleepwalker. Always asleep and gains +1 speed each turn.
cobblemon.species.epochrowlet.name: Rowlet
cobblemon.species.epochrowlet.desc: The flames around its neck are a method it uses to keep itself warm.
cobblemon.species.epochdartrix.name: Dartrix
cobblemon.species.epochdartrix.desc: It is very particular about making the flames flare exactly evenly around its body as it is a way of showing off.
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueye.name: Decidueye
cobblemon.species.epochdecidueye.desc: When shooting its arrows, it will light them with the flame on its head and then shoot them at opponents.
cobblemon.species.epochlitten.name: Litten
cobblemon.species.epochlitten.desc: The scarf that is tied around its eyes is to help it enhance its other senses, making it a more adept fighter.
cobblemon.species.epochtorracat.name: Torracat
cobblemon.species.epochtorracat.desc: Its scarf has amplified its other senses and has gives foes the false sense of comfort that they are fighting a foe with a handicap.
cobblemon.species.epochincineroar.name: Incineroar
cobblemon.species.epochincineroar.desc: The time it spent meditating and honing its senses has unlocked an enhanced supernatural vision that allows it to easily spot the weak points of its foes.
cobblemon.species.epochpopplio.name: Popplio
cobblemon.species.epochpopplio.desc: Its collar is made from petals. The colour of the collar is said to change with the seasons.
cobblemon.species.epochbrionne.name: Brionne
cobblemon.species.epochbrionne.desc: Its mere presence is said to have restorative properties and can cleanse toxins out of the air.
cobblemon.species.epochprimarina.name: Primarina
cobblemon.species.epochprimarina.desc: It is said that as it grows older, the petals of the rose on its head will begin to wilt. When the final petal falls, this Pokemon passes away.
cobblemon.species.epochmorelull.name: Morelull
cobblemon.species.epochmorelull.desc: Its illuminating ability mixed with volcanic ash infected it, making its skin poisonous to the touch.
cobblemon.species.epochshiinotic.name: Shiinotic
cobblemon.species.epochshiinotic.desc: These kinds of Shiinotic truly live a miserable existence as they constantly cough up ash.
cobblemon.species.epochsandygast.name: Sandygast
cobblemon.species.epochsandygast.desc: The toque is the closest thing it has to a friend because when it tries to befriend children, they run away in fear.
