cobblemon.species.epochpalossand.name: Palossand
cobblemon.species.epochpalossand.desc: It disguises itself as a snow castle in hopes of attracting children to play with it. When they get close enough, it will consume them.
cobblemon.species.epochmareanie.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.epochmareanie.desc: This deceitful Pokemon pretends to be nothing more than a shrub to catch its prey off-guard. It oozes one of the most lethal poisons in the world.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxapex.name: Toxapex
cobblemon.species.epochtoxapex.desc: Riddled with malice and anger, this Pokemon tries to cause as much pain as possible to its foes using its potent venom.
cobblemon.species.epochdewpider.name: Dewpider
cobblemon.species.epochdewpider.desc: It flickers when it is upset or emotional. It will turn the light it emits off when it is in danger so predators cannot pursue it.
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanid.name: Araquanid
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanid.desc: It moves around with noisy clacking sounds because its legs do not allow it to retain much gracefulness or be able to sneak up on people.
cobblemon.species.epochcutiefly.name: Cutiefly
cobblemon.species.epochcutiefly.desc: It is so small that it is sometimes hard to see them. However, they are very quick and difficult to hit unless you have a specialized swatter.
cobblemon.species.epochribombee.name: Ribombee
cobblemon.species.epochribombee.desc: It hovers around dirty, urban areas most often. One of its favourite locations is the Orion Landfill.
cobblemon.species.epochpikipek.name: Pikipek
cobblemon.species.epochpikipek.desc: They are very messy birds and will frequently make nests in the roofs of hotels or resorts where numerous tourists frequent.
cobblemon.species.epochtrumbeak.name: Trumbeak
cobblemon.species.epochtrumbeak.desc: A vile nuisance, these Pokemon like to pick on unsuspecting tourists by carpet bombing their vehicles while they are relaxing on the beach.
cobblemon.species.epochtoucannon.name: Toucannon
cobblemon.species.epochtoucannon.desc: They are typically very aggressive and will outright steal food out of unsuspecting tourists hands and then mock you after outsmarting you.
cobblemon.species.epochstufful.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.epochstufful.desc: This Pokemon has haunted a carelessly discarded stuffed animal and enjoys scaring ungrateful or bratty children.
cobblemon.species.epochbewear.name: Bewear
cobblemon.species.epochbewear.desc: Parts of its body that were hanging together have torn further at its seams, revealing part of the ghost that possesses it.
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweet.name: Bounsweet
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweet.desc: It represents a perfect balance with good and evil. However, the forces are constantly at war with one another.
cobblemon.species.epochsteenee.name: Steenee
cobblemon.species.epochsteenee.desc: Steenee represents the folk saying of 'Within every bit of light, there is darkness; Within every bit of darkness there is light.'
cobblemon.species.epochtsareena.name: Tsareena
cobblemon.species.epochtsareena.desc: A folk tale says that Tsareena was actually an angel that was cast out of heaven by the Gods for attempting to lead a rebellion.
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweetone.name: Bounsweet
cobblemon.species.epochbounsweetone.desc: The flowers on its head secrete a noxious smelling liquid that can cause a variety of destabilizing effects from sleep to paralysis.
cobblemon.species.epochsteeneeone.name: Steenee
cobblemon.species.epochsteeneeone.desc: Its spikes can be launched like projectiles and are often used to break down obstacles or tree branches that have fruits.
cobblemon.species.epochtsareenaone.name: Tsareena
cobblemon.species.epochtsareenaone.desc: This Pokemon can remain perfectly still and pretend to be an innocuous flower. When its prey approaches, it can surprise it with its flower's large grip.
cobblemon.species.epochdewpiderone.name: Dewpider
cobblemon.species.epochdewpiderone.desc: It has eyes covering its entire body, which enables it to have a full 360-degree field of vision.
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanidone.name: Araquanid
cobblemon.species.epocharaquanidone.desc: When it chitters, it is able to further intimidate and scare its foe because it is able to project its voice so it makes it seem like there are more nearby.
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyu.name: Mimikyu
cobblemon.species.epochmimikyu.desc: Rumours have claimed that this is not a disguise of Munchlax at all, but the Mimikyu has actually possessed it altogether.
cobblemon.species.epochjangmoo.name: Jangmoo
cobblemon.species.epochjangmoo.desc: This Pokemon keeps a sword safely sheathed away near its tail that it can use as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.epochhakamoo.name: Hakamoo
cobblemon.species.epochhakamoo.desc: This Pokemon is an adept warrior that it is able to use its sword, its tail, or its claws as weapons, all with equal proficiency.
cobblemon.species.epochkommoo.name: Kommoo
cobblemon.species.epochkommoo.desc: This Pokemon adorns itself with a headress that reflects its triumphs in combat. The longer its headress, the more fearsome it is.
cobblemon.species.epochdhelmise.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.epochdhelmise.desc: This Pokemon has managed to infest a manmade satellite and use it as a host body to travel quickly throughout outer space.
cobblemon.species.epochmudbray.name: Mudbray
cobblemon.species.epochmudbray.desc: This Pokemon is often used to teach children how to ride horse Pokemon because they are smaller and easier to climb on.
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdale.name: Mudsdale
cobblemon.species.epochmudsdale.desc: This Pokemon are groomed to be race horses or for beauty competitions because their braids are some of the most beautiful of any other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.epochsalandit.name: Salandit
cobblemon.species.epochsalandit.desc: It is able to dim the fluorescent sacs on its skin to conceal itself from predators in deep sea and underwater caves.
cobblemon.species.epochsalazzle.name: Salazzle
cobblemon.species.epochsalazzle.desc: It is able to leap and surprise attack a foe, and electrocute its prey using those sacs on its skin.
cobblemon.species.epochwimpod.name: Wimpod
cobblemon.species.epochwimpod.desc: It scurries around leaving a trail of poison as it passes. People should be careful of where they step as it can burn through the soles of their shoes.
cobblemon.species.epochgolisopod.name: Golisopod
cobblemon.species.epochgolisopod.desc: It has evolved and become far more intimidating that the prey has now become the predator.
cobblemon.species.epochcomfey.name: Comfey
cobblemon.species.epochcomfey.desc: Comfey like collecting a variety of sea shells and other knick knacks on the beach. Thus, it often has conflicts with Crustles for the most alluring of objects.
cobblemon.species.africanusancomfey.name: Comfey
cobblemon.species.africanusancomfey.desc: Prende flores en su tallo, que es muy rico en nutrientes. Las flores se revitalizan y desprenden una agradable fragancia.
cobblemon.species.novranpyukumuku.name: Pyukumuku
cobblemon.species.novranpyukumuku.desc: Scientists are still unsure why Pyukumuku in the Novrai region are so aggressive. It spits its fist-shaped innards at foes with enough force to shatter steel.
cobblemon.species.qamoransandygast.name: Sandygast
cobblemon.species.nostanmorelull.name: Morelull
cobblemon.species.nostanshiinotic.name: Shiinotic
cobblemon.species.varitasianbounsweet.de: Heavy pollution of its habitat caused it to spoil and succumb to parasites, yet it still lives on somehow. It's unknown whether it controls the worm in its head or vice versa.
cobblemon.species.varitasiansteenee.name: Steenee
cobblemon.species.varitasiansteenee.desc: It can use the multiple worms from its head to attack foes. It has an uptight and cruel temperment so it does this often. Most stay away from it anyways because it doesn't smell particularly good.
cobblemon.species.mareaniex.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.mareaniex.desc: When frightened, it shoots fire and sparks from the top of its head. It appears to be pretty friendly with others of the same specie.
cobblemon.species.toxapexx.name: Toxapex
cobblemon.species.toxapexx.desc: The special toxin it secretes, when heated, shines brightly. It lures preys and traps tem, using its body as a cage.
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.name: Pyukumuku
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.desc: It is way bigger than the actual Pyukumuku. Expelling its internal organs, it propels itself to strike its opponent.
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.name: Tapu Koko
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Peyote.
cobblemon.species.tapulelex.name: Tapu Lele
cobblemon.species.tapulelex.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Niva.
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.name: Tapu Bulu
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Abraham.
cobblemon.species.tapufinix.name: Tapu Fini
cobblemon.species.tapufinix.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Chua.
cobblemon.species.hoennianmareanie.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.hoennianmareanie.desc: It protects its soft, viscous body with a thick layer of sturdy rock and debris. Prolonged exposure to dry air causes its skin to harden into brittle spines.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantoxapex.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.hoenniantoxapex.desc: It disguises itself as a simple rock to catch unsuspecting prey off guard. Toxapex then rams it's entire body into it's victim, paralyzing it with it's toxic spines.
cobblemon.species.seviianwishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
cobblemon.species.seviiandhelmise.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.deepwishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
cobblemon.species.deepwishiwashi.desc: A variant Wishiwashi that dwells in dark caves and deep oceans. It uses the lights from its scales to communicate with others in its school.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancutiefly.name: Cutiefly
cobblemon.species.ayreiancutiefly.desc: It propels itself forward by combusting its sweat, which creates a small explosion as it is similar to gunpowder.
cobblemon.species.ayreianribombee.name: Ribombee
cobblemon.species.ayreianribombee.desc: During the New Year night, multiple Ribombee can be seen fluttering in the sky, creating eye-striking explosions via their peculiar powder.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmimikyu.name: Mimikyu
cobblemon.species.ayreianmimikyu.desc: Said to be a furious spirit that inhabited a popular doll. When said doll is damaged, the hatred of the specter takes form.
cobblemon.species.ayreianyungoos.name: Yungoos
cobblemon.species.ayreianyungoos.desc: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangumshoos.name: Gumshoos
cobblemon.species.ayreiangumshoos.desc: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbruxish.name: Bruxish
cobblemon.species.mysticstufful.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.mysticbewear.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.fabelianwyrdeer.name: Wyrdeer
cobblemon.species.fabelianhatenna.name: Hatenna
cobblemon.species.fabelianhattrem.name: Hattrem
cobblemon.species.fabelianapplin.name: Applin
cobblemon.species.fabelianfalinks.name: Falinks
cobblemon.species.fabeliansinistea.name: Sinistea
cobblemon.species.fabelianwooloo.name: Wooloo
cobblemon.species.fabeliandubwool.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.fabelianmilcery.name: Milcery
cobblemon.species.fabelianimpidimp.name: Impidimp
cobblemon.species.fabelianmorgrem.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.mahaliansinistea.name: Sinistea
cobblemon.species.ferraniansinistea.name: Sinistea
cobblemon.species.ferranianapplin.name: Applin
cobblemon.species.ivrisiansinistea.name: Sinistea
cobblemon.species.epochsobble.name: Sobble
cobblemon.species.epochsobble.desc: During thunderstorms, this Pokemon will play its flute to soothe nearby Pokemon that get upset from the thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.epochdrizzile.name: Drizzile
cobblemon.species.epochdrizzile.desc: This Pokemon is looking for its big break, in the hope that someone will recognize its musical ability.
cobblemon.species.epochinteleon.name: Inteleon
cobblemon.species.epochinteleon.desc: There is a fable that this Pokemon used its flute to attract Rattata away from a town for a fee. When the town did not pay, it lured the children of the town away.
cobblemon.species.epochrookidee.name: Rookidee
cobblemon.species.epochrookidee.desc: It is said that whenever you see one of these, a thunder storm is close behind.
cobblemon.species.epochcorvisquire.name: Corvisquire
cobblemon.species.epochcorvisquire.desc: It flaps its wings to create small sparks to scare off potential predators and intimidate others.
cobblemon.species.epochcorviknight.name: Corviknight
cobblemon.species.epochcorviknight.desc: In older times, a Corviknight was seen as a harbinger of thunderstorms and chaotic weather systems.
cobblemon.species.epochyamper.name: Yamper
cobblemon.species.epochyamper.desc: This Pokemon has earned the nickname of Man's best friend because it is the most faithful Pokemon. Many humans have domesticated it for this reason.
cobblemon.species.epochboltund.name: Boltund
cobblemon.species.epochboltund.desc: Its favourite pastime is playing fetch with its owner. It is also very intelligent so can learn a lot of tricks.
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimp.name: Impidimp
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimp.desc: It likes playing in pools of mud so it finds itself right at home in swamps or damp forested areas.
cobblemon.species.epochmorgrem.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.epochmorgrem.desc: As it ages, it gets a very bad case of skin acne and greasy hair. It attempts to use mud to mask these imperfections and insecurities.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarl.desc: They often live under bridges so they can accost travelers into giving them food or money in exchange for safe passage across the bridge.
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimpone.name: Impidimp
cobblemon.species.epochimpidimpone.desc: It is rumoured to have spawned in the fires of the underworld and has somehow made its way to the mortal plane.
cobblemon.species.epochmorgremone.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.epochmorgremone.desc: It is very protective of the embers in its hand. It is rumoured that it is actually the soul it received from making a bargain with a greedy human.
cobblemon.species.epochgrimmsnarlone.des: They are rumoured to be the torturers of evil people when they make their way to the underworld. They enjoy using fire in their punishments.
cobblemon.species.epochgossifleur.name: Gossifleur
cobblemon.species.epochgossifleur.desc: The presence of it in a field is a forewarning of eventual rot and decay coming to the area.
cobblemon.species.epocheldegoss.name: Eldegoss
cobblemon.species.epocheldegoss.desc: It thrives in decaying or rotting environments. Whenever it is in such environments, the cotton on its head actually grows bigger.
cobblemon.species.epochsilicobra.name: Silicobra
cobblemon.species.epochsilicobra.desc: Certain bustlers have managed to train Silicobras to perform tricks with its buoy as a form of entertainment.
cobblemon.species.epochsandaconda.name: Sandaconda
cobblemon.species.epochsandaconda.desc: While initially it appears that this Pokemon is in distress from being trapped in a buoy, it actually seems to like it.
cobblemon.species.epochsinistea.name: Sinistea
cobblemon.species.epochsinistea.desc: The wine that it has isn't actually poisonous... it just is if you've had too much.
cobblemon.species.epochpolteageist.name: Polteageist
cobblemon.species.epochpolteageist.desc: Polteageist has definitely had too much to drink. It doesn't ever let go of its bottle as it's very attached to it.
cobblemon.species.epochskwovet.name: Skwovet
cobblemon.species.epochskwovet.desc: It often perches itself on frozen over trees to nibble on the fruits or leaves that have frozen over.
cobblemon.species.epochgreedent.name: Greedent
cobblemon.species.epochgreedent.desc: It hibernates in summer and emerges during winter. It prefers colder environments where it can easily find frozen food.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxel.name: Toxel
cobblemon.species.epochtoxel.desc: It lazes about for most of the day. It often uses a nearby branch to scratch itself rather than using its own hands.
cobblemon.species.epochtoxtricity.name: Toxtricity
cobblemon.species.epochtoxtricity.desc: This Pokemon is willing to challenge any Pokemon, even those much bigger to put on a spectacle. Are you not entertained?
cobblemon.species.epochapplin.name: Applin
cobblemon.species.epochapplin.desc: It would ordinarily be able to roll around quite easily, however it is very noisy in doing so because the clamp gets dragged along with it.
cobblemon.species.epochflapple.name: Flapple
cobblemon.species.epochflapple.desc: It is able to organize and mobilize other Pokemon towards a cause with little effort. Consequently, it was chained down because it is known to raise riots.
cobblemon.species.epochappletun.name: Appletun
cobblemon.species.epochappletun.desc: It is the brute force that is able to take a lot of hits. It acts as a sort of enforcer to threaten other Pokemon that annoy their leader.
cobblemon.species.epochwooloo.name: Wooloo
cobblemon.species.epochwooloo.desc: Its wool, if it can even be called that, is made of hardened boulders. The rocks are almost impenetrable.
cobblemon.species.epochdubwool.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.epochdubwool.desc: When this Pokemon is angry, it starts charging without control. The unfortunate victim of a hit will likely be permanently maimed.
cobblemon.species.epochwoolooone.name: Wooloo
cobblemon.species.epochwoolooone.desc: They are regularly farmed as the bushes on these Pokemon are constantly bearing berries and fruits.
cobblemon.species.epochdubwoolone.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.epochdubwoolone.desc: To diversify the type of berries it grows, a Dubwool will ram into trees that grow those kind until they fall into their bush, which they then learn to grow themselves.
cobblemon.species.epocharrokuda.name: Arrokuda
cobblemon.species.epocharrokuda.desc: This Pokemon is bitter tasting and any unfortunate bird Pokemon that ends up eating it will have to contend with a bad stomach ache that follows shortly after.
cobblemon.species.epochbarraskewda.name: Barraskewda
cobblemon.species.epochbarraskewda.desc: The aura that this Pokemon emanates serves as a bit of a warning to any bird Pokemon that fancies it a delicious snack.
cobblemon.species.epochfalinks.name: Falinks
cobblemon.species.epochfalinks.desc: The six of these Pokemon are somehow able to ignore gravity. Consequently, they tether themselves to prevent floating off into space.
cobblemon.species.epochindeedee.name: Indeedee
cobblemon.species.epochindeedee.desc: It is a creature that has been banished to isolated areas such as swamps and sewers. Apparently, simply touching it can result in catching a virulent plague.
cobblemon.species.epochpincurchin.name: Pincurchin
cobblemon.species.epochpincurchin.desc: They are soft to the touch, and and make a screeching sound when squeezed. Strangely, they are used to play the national anthem of a far off country.
cobblemon.species.epochrolycoly.name: Rolycoly
cobblemon.species.epochrolycoly.desc: Valuable minerals, gems and precious stones can be found in the rubble of its body.
cobblemon.species.epochcarkol.name: Carkol
cobblemon.species.epochcarkol.desc: This Pokemon enjoys adding various precious minerals to its pile that it engages in drilling of its own.
cobblemon.species.epochcoalossal.name: Coalossal
cobblemon.species.epochcoalossal.desc: This Pokemon is often used by mining companies to accumulate stone and minerals and for its ability to sense other precious ores which improves yields.
cobblemon.species.epochdreepy.name: Dreepy
cobblemon.species.epochdreepy.desc: This Pokemon has very small vents so it is unable to travel very long distances but more so sputters along the way.
cobblemon.species.epochdrakloak.name: Drakloak
cobblemon.species.epochdrakloak.desc: Rather than seeking out immense speed, Drakloaks much prefer to perform tricks in the air and create various pictures in the cloud trails they form.
cobblemon.species.epochdragapult.name: Dragapult
cobblemon.species.epochdragapult.desc: It draws in air from the vents on its head and expells it outward, creating a cloud trail that envelops its body while propelling it forwards.
cobblemon.species.epochstonjourner.name: Stonjourner
cobblemon.species.epochstonjourner.desc: It is constantly playing music from its loud speakers. It can be very obnoxious and disruptive for this reason.
cobblemon.species.epochsnom.name: Snom
cobblemon.species.epochsnom.desc: Due to its small stature, it hides under rocks to avoid detection. If it is found, it uses its adorable appearance to convince predators to spare it.
cobblemon.species.epochfrosmoth.name: Frosmoth
cobblemon.species.epochfrosmoth.desc: There is a fairytale about an old claymaker that fashioned this Frosmoth, and it was brought to life because of a wish he made during a shooting star.
cobblemon.species.epochcramorant.name: Cramorant
cobblemon.species.epochcramorant.desc: This Pokemon can drill into trees to find small bugs in the cores of trees. They have an annoying habit of starting their pecking very early in the morning.
cobblemon.species.epochsizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
cobblemon.species.epochsizzlipede.desc: Despite its small stature, it is feared by many predators because if it's going down, it will use its poison to take its predator down with it.
cobblemon.species.epochcentiskorch.name: Centiskorch
cobblemon.species.epochcentiskorch.desc: When confronted by a predator, it is able to move all of its legs to make it seem more imposing. If that doesn't work, it will resort to its poison.
cobblemon.species.epochmilcery.name: Milcery
cobblemon.species.epochmilcery.desc: This Pokmon is the toxic residue that manifests near locations rich in fossil fuels. Its body is very hot to the touch.
cobblemon.species.epochalcremie.name: Alcremie
cobblemon.species.epochalcremie.desc: This Pokemon typically loiters near oil drilling locations as it feeds on the tailings produced from mining activities to gradually become larger.
cobblemon.species.epochclobbopus.name: Clobbopus
cobblemon.species.epochclobbopus.desc: This Pokemon's tentacles are so strong that many other foes do not dare try to challenge it for food when hunting.
cobblemon.species.epochgrapploct.name: Grapploct
cobblemon.species.epochgrapploct.desc: This Pokemon lives deep in the ocean. With its tentacles, it has been able to crush smaller ships and bring them down to the sea floor.
cobblemon.species.epochcufant.name: Cufant
cobblemon.species.epochcufant.desc: This Pokemon is too lazy to reach for fruit in trees despite its long trunk so it instead uses its psychic powers to telepathically retrieve the fruit.
cobblemon.species.epochcopperajah.name: Copperajah
cobblemon.species.epochcopperajah.desc: In marital ceremonies among island tribes, this Pokemon often carries the bride and groom up and down the aisle.
cobblemon.species.epochhatenna.name: Hatenna
cobblemon.species.epochhatenna.desc: This Pokemon is known for living an isolated life in locations far away from civilization. For that reason, it is often misunderstood.
cobblemon.species.epochhattrem.name: Hattrem
cobblemon.species.epochhattrem.desc: This Pokemon is known for being able to sing haunting songs or cast spells that can inflict terror on their target rendering them immobile.
cobblemon.species.epochhatterene.name: Hatterene
cobblemon.species.epochhatterene.desc: This Pokemon's knowledge of the arcane arts dips into forbidden magic. It was cast out from society for practicing the dark arts.
cobblemon.species.epocheternatus.name: Eternatus
cobblemon.species.epocheternatus.desc: A Pokemon that passed away a long time ago. It was revived through the collection of its various bones that were scattered across the region.
cobblemon.species.epochmrrime.name: Mrrime
cobblemon.species.epochmrrime.desc: It uses its prop walking cane and prop hat to really elevate its act to the next level because it is no longer confined to just using its hands and feet.
cobblemon.species.epochcursola.name: Cursola
cobblemon.species.epochcursola.desc: It is unable to easily move away and free itself from garbage that accumulates on its surface. It is consequently forced to suffer.
cobblemon.species.epochobstagoon.name: Obstagoon
cobblemon.species.epochobstagoon.desc: It has finally become strong enough to mobilize a pack of Zigzagoons and Linoones. It acts as a type of alpha to lead their pack.
cobblemon.species.epochursaluna.name: Ursaluna
cobblemon.species.epochursaluna.desc: It is able to shift from a corporeal form to ethereal form at will, which it uses to its advantage for hunting.
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeer.name: Wyrdeer
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeer.desc: Despite the appearance of frost accumulating on its leaves, the berries it grows on its bushes are highly nutritious and sought after by berry enthusiasts.
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeerone.name: Wyrdeer
cobblemon.species.epochwyrdeerone.desc: It is often found on mountains or similar high elevation areas during thunderstorms because it enjoys attracting lightning with its antlers.
cobblemon.species.epochsneasler.name: Sneasler
cobblemon.species.epochsneasler.desc: This Pokemon is distrusting of outsiders. It is viewed as the tribal warrior leader that directs other Weaviles and Sneasels in battle.
cobblemon.species.epochbasculegion.name: Basculegion
cobblemon.species.epochbasculegion.desc: This Pokemon is able to blend into the water that the ripples it creates are indistinguishable from wind blowing across the water.
cobblemon.species.lagoonanhattena.name: Hattena
cobblemon.species.lagoonanhattrem.name: Hattrem
cobblemon.species.lagoonanhatterene.name: Hatterene
cobblemon.species.novranwooloo.name: Wooloo
cobblemon.species.novranwooloo.desc: This form of Wooloo was fed iron-rich plants to encourage the growth of metallic wool. This wool is sheared and then melted down to create all sorts of useful tools.
cobblemon.species.novrandubwool.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.novrandubwool.desc: The golden fleece it grows is valuable, but its twisted barbs make it difficult to shear. It is much more demanding than Wooloo, so owning one is often taken as a status symbol.
cobblemon.species.novranclobbopus.name: NovranClobbopus
cobblemon.species.novranclobbopus.desc: Its bright blue rings are an easily-recognizable sign of its venom. It often brawls with others of its kind, lashing out with powerful, toxin-laced punches.
cobblemon.species.novrangrapploct.name: NovranGrapploct
cobblemon.species.novrangrapploct.desc: The ends of its tentacles are swollen with venom. With a single punch, it can deliver enough poison into its enemy to incapacitate ten grown adults.
cobblemon.species.novranhatenna.name: Hatenna
cobblemon.species.novranhatenna.desc: Its wide brim of hair contains cells that absorb sunlight, so it never has to eat. It causes other plants to grow large so it can hide below their leaves when frightened.
cobblemon.species.novranhattrem.name: Hattrem
cobblemon.species.novranhattrem.desc: Farmers will employ this form of Hattrem to care for their crops. When Impidimp tries to steal from the harvest, it will unleash its wrath.
cobblemon.species.novranhatterene.name: Hatterene
cobblemon.species.novranhatterene.desc: Normally it is gentle, but it is highly aggressive towards thieves like Morgrem. Sometimes, it will enchant a plant so that it produces more Hatenna instead of fruit.
cobblemon.species.novranimpidimp.name: Impidimp
cobblemon.species.novranimpidimp.desc: Its claws are sharp and reinforced with iron. It can launch them from its fingers at high speeds, only for them to grow back the next day.
cobblemon.species.novranmorgrem.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.novranmorgrem.desc: Its greasy hair is strong and metallic, and forms natural barbs. It ties off a braid of this hair to loop around things it likes and drag them close to steal them.
cobblemon.species.novrangrimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
cobblemon.species.novrangrimmsnarl.desc: The hair on its body is thick enough to protect it from all attacks. Even a glancing brush with this rusty, abrasive hair can tear an opponent to shreds.
cobblemon.species.norheimanrookidee.name: NorheimanRookidee
cobblemon.species.norheimanfalinks.name: Falinks
cobblemon.species.varitasianimpidimp.des: Though incapable of flight, the large wing-like tuft of hair on Varitan Impidimp's head makes it more aerodynamic and able to leap between tall trees. By rapidly swinging its head around, it can whip up somewhat strong gusts of wind.
cobblemon.species.varitasianmorgrem.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.varitasianmorgrem.desc: Varitan Morgrem's hair has adapted to act as wings, allowing it to fly for short periods of time. It delights in swooping down suddenly and scaring people.
cobblemon.species.varitasianmilcery.name: Milcery
cobblemon.species.varitasianmilcery.desc: Living in areas with humid, salty air caused its body to curdle. This also effected its demeanor as it now acts much more mischieviously. It likes to create puddles from its own gooey body for others to slip and fall into.
cobblemon.species.varitasianalcremie.des: Milcery adorning itself with various savory dish toppings mysteriously causes evolution. Its body is now made of extremely strong-smelling cheese. The cheese's flavor can vary wildly and while most find it sickening overall, a few with an acquired taste consider it a delicacy.
cobblemon.species.hiziansilicobra.name: Silicobra
cobblemon.species.hiziansilicobra.desc: The volley of flames it spits can cover a impressive distance. Their overconfidence can lead them to take on much stronger Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.hiziansandaconda.name: Sandaconda
cobblemon.species.hiziansandaconda.desc: It swallows large amounts of molten magma. It then shoots out massive fireballs at its enemies through its mouth and nostrils.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandreepy.name: Dreepy
cobblemon.species.hoenniandreepy.desc: Dreepy are notorious pranksters. They often dart around in packs, looking for humans or Pokemon to play tricks on. It's den is littered with stolen valuables.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandrakloak.name: Drakloak
cobblemon.species.hoenniandrakloak.desc: Nurturing to a fault, this Pokemon will fervently watch over young Dreepy to keep them out of trouble. It becomes anxious if it has no Dreepy to care for.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandragapult.name: Dragapult
cobblemon.species.hoenniandragapult.desc: Explorers of old would often mistake the Dreepy it carries as additional heads. To this day, this Pokemon is still known as the 'Volcanic Hydra'
cobblemon.species.seviiansizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
cobblemon.species.mythiankleavor.name: Kleavor
cobblemon.species.mythiankleavor.desc: The minerals native to Mythan cause a weird outbreak that causes Scyther to react to the pure touch or aroma of the minerals.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrookey.name: Grookey
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrookey.desc: It attacks with rapid jolts of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more charged.
cobblemon.species.ayreianthwackey.name: Thwackey
cobblemon.species.ayreianthwackey.desc: When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrillaboom.name: Rillaboom
cobblemon.species.ayreianrillaboom.desc: Its ferocious drumming summons violent thunderstorms. It uses wind currents to direct its electric attacks.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
cobblemon.species.ayreiansizzlipede.desc: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they're well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancentiskorch.des: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokemon also has large and very sharp fangs.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhatenna.name: Hatenna
cobblemon.species.ayreianhatenna.desc: Aware of its cuteness, it invites itself in the dens of other Pokemon and slowly fills them with spider webs.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhattrem.name: Hattrem
cobblemon.species.ayreianhattrem.desc: Its leg-hairs have enough power to bend a metal pole in two. Because of this, they have no natural predators, and thrive in gloomy forests.
cobblemon.species.ayreianhatterene.name: Hatterene
cobblemon.species.ayreianhatterene.desc: It plays with its prey with unimaginable cruelty, as it feeds off of terror. Usually, it leaves the poor victim's life hanging on by a thread, literally.
cobblemon.species.ayreianobstagoon.name: Obstagoon
cobblemon.species.ayreianobstagoon.desc: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandubwool.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.aromiansmoliv.name: Smoliv
cobblemon.species.aromiandolliv.name: Dolliv
cobblemon.species.epochfuecoco.name: Fuecoco
cobblemon.species.epochfuecoco.desc: It tends to sleep on land at night, but will hunt for fish in ponds and rivers within jungles, swamps and desert oases.
cobblemon.species.epochcrocalor.name: Crocalor
cobblemon.species.epochcrocalor.desc: It often curls up into a ball to pretend to be a rock to attract unsuspecting bugs. It can then quickly spring into action to surprise its meal.
cobblemon.species.epochskeledirge.name: Skeledirge
cobblemon.species.epochskeledirge.desc: Its tail often betrays its ability to surprise its prey, thus it prefers to hunt in rivers where it won't be spotted until it's too late.
cobblemon.species.epochwattrel.name: Wattrel
cobblemon.species.epochwattrel.desc: It is very fast and is able to launch sharpened projectiles from its wings to maim its prey and close the distance on them quickly so they cannot escape.
cobblemon.species.epochkilowattrel.name: Kilowattrel
cobblemon.species.epochkilowattrel.desc: It is an endangered Pokemon but it has found refuge by nesting atop tall mountains in cold climates to discourage intruders from attacking its young.
cobblemon.species.epochfinizen.name: Finizen
cobblemon.species.epochfinizen.desc: Its curiosity often leads it to wander easily as it follows ships before it realizes that it has been separated from the rest of its pod.
cobblemon.species.epochpalafin.name: Palafin
cobblemon.species.epochpalafin.desc: It is often used by sailors to scout ahead and use its horn to help break down large ice formations to help assist ships navigate past hazardous areas.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmi.name: Pawmi
cobblemon.species.epochpawmi.desc: It is normally very reserved and doesn't like strangers, but when it warms up to a person, it will become one of its best friends.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmo.name: Pawmo
cobblemon.species.epochpawmo.desc: It is very skittish and loud noises tend to scare it easily. It tries to be brave but it often will run in fear.
cobblemon.species.epochpawmot.name: Pawmot
cobblemon.species.epochpawmot.desc: Petting this Pokemon on its tuft of hair is the best way to show it affection. It does not like being pet on its tail so avoid that at all costs.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatink.name: Tinkatink
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatink.desc: It likes to make various sculptures using the bones it collects. It's unclear where it finds all these bones to begin with.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatuff.name: Tinkatuff
cobblemon.species.epochtinkatuff.desc: It hunts in small parties for dragons. Individually, they are not very threatening, but in a small band, they can outnumber and overwhelm a foe.
cobblemon.species.epochtinkaton.name: Tinkaton
cobblemon.species.epochtinkaton.desc: It swings around the skeleton of an ancient dragon. Some say the skeleton itself is sentient.
cobblemon.species.epochgimmighoul.name: Gimmighoul
cobblemon.species.epochgimmighoul.desc: This Pokemon lives inside a mound of soil. As it grows, it collects more soil to build its mound.
cobblemon.species.epochgholdengo.name: Gholdengo
cobblemon.species.epochgholdengo.desc: It is made up of a number of Gimmighoul that live in a mound together. They work together in unison to both attack and defend the colony.
cobblemon.species.epochdudunsparce.name: Dudunsparce
cobblemon.species.epochdudunsparce.desc: While it has evolved and developed a longer body, if it finds a suitable host, it will not hesitate to abandon this carapace in favour of the new host body.
cobblemon.species.epochannihilape.name: Annihilape
cobblemon.species.epochannihilape.desc: It has become unstable and frayed from its relentless screeching. Its persistence is one of its most admirable but also most despised qualities.
cobblemon.species.epochdipplin.name: Dipplin
cobblemon.species.epochdipplin.desc: It will find crafty ways to escape its sentence, not limited to digging holes, or corroding away the steel bars that imprison it.
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.name: Rabsca
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.desc: Recover Normal Memento Dark Weather Ball Normal Cosmic Power Psychic
cobblemon.species.norheimanglimmora.name: Glimmora
cobblemon.species.seviiannymble.name: Nymble
cobblemon.species.seviianlokix.name: Lokix
cobblemon.species.ayreiansprigatito.name: Sprigatito
cobblemon.species.ayreiansprigatito.desc: When it knows it cannot win, it will messily summon a cloud of poisonous gas and attempt a quick getaway.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfloragato.name: Floragato
cobblemon.species.ayreianfloragato.desc: Floragato deftly wields the poisonous flower buds under its hoodie, throwing them at opponents like grenades.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeowscarada.des: While it may look innocent, it has a dangerous personality. It tricks other Pokemon into accepting its bouquet, which then erupts into a shower of venomous spikes.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxly.name: Quaxly
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxly.desc: They aim for a clean mind state, but they are still inexperienced, and will anger quickly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxwell.name: Quaxwell
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxwell.desc: They nest behind waterfalls, meditating for up to 10 hours a day. That said, the slightest mischief can send them into a frenzy.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaquaval.name: Quaquaval
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaquaval.desc: After reaching a crystal clear state of mind, this Pokemon can execute even the most head-spinning dance moves flawlessly.
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkatink.name: Tinkatink
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkatink.desc: It will scavenge shipwrecks for parts to make toys and play. Metalic objects that make noise are their favorites.
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkatuff.name: Tinkatuff
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkatuff.desc: They will tie scrap metal together with seaweed to make a huge hammer. Since the rusty metal is not durable, they are always looking for more.
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkaton.name: Tinkaton
cobblemon.species.lagoonantinkaton.desc: They share a symbiotic relationship with Dhelmise who takes over the seaweed in its body. In trade they are allowed to use its heavy anchor as a makeshift hammer.
cobblemon.species.cactussle.name: Cactussle
cobblemon.species.cactussle.desc: It has a notable resilienceeven under the intense desert sun, it never falters. If this Pokmon encounters Cacturne, the two will fight each other in a brutal standoff.
cobblemon.species.foliat.name: Foliat
cobblemon.species.foliat.desc: Although Foliat is unable to fly, it still has an extremely high metabolism. It's often found feeding on sugar-rich nectar and sap found in plants.
cobblemon.species.florabri.name: Florabri
cobblemon.species.florabri.desc: This energetic Pokemon zips around at speeds that make it nearly invisible to the naked eye. It is playful and competitive by nature.
cobblemon.species.floressum.name: Floressum
cobblemon.species.floressum.desc: Floressum can synthesize energy with its symbiotic flower. By rapidly flapping its wings, it can create gusts of wind comparable to a tropical storm.
cobblemon.species.kidling.name: Kidling
cobblemon.species.kidling.desc: Kidling headbutts humans and Pokemon as a sign of affection. When its head makes contact, even gently, the flame on its tail flares up briefly.
cobblemon.species.pyroat.name: Pyroat
cobblemon.species.pyroat.desc: Pyroats flaming hide can be seen streaking across mountainsides at night. When it collides with other Pyroat, the light and noise can be mistaken for an explosion.
cobblemon.species.flairees.name: Flairees
cobblemon.species.flairees.desc: The fire on Flairees' body propels it with enough force to break steel. It forms its territory by smashing apart and leveling mountaintops.
cobblemon.species.aguade.name: Aguade
cobblemon.species.aguade.desc: Aguade's face and hands are armored with rock-hard salt. It uses its fists like hammers to break open nuts and its head to block incoming attacks.
cobblemon.species.iguadium.name: Iguadium
cobblemon.species.iguadium.desc: The thick layer of salt on Iguadiums head and hands protects it in combat. It trains by throwing punches underwater for more resistance to build more muscle.
cobblemon.species.aguanaut.name: Aguanaut
cobblemon.species.aguanaut.desc: Aguanaut devastates its foes with savage blows from its fists and tail, as well as crushing grapples. Its body is armored with dense, impenetrable layers of salt.
cobblemon.species.harpee.name: Harpee
cobblemon.species.harpee.desc: Harpee's perseverance is unmatched. It purposely builds its nest in places with harsh weather and tough opponents, challenging itself to become stronger.
cobblemon.species.aquilor.name: Aquilor
cobblemon.species.aquilor.desc: Aquilor lives in treetops and watches its prey before swooping on it. Its sharp eyes can spot the faintest of movements, even through dense foliage.
cobblemon.species.warquila.name: Warquila
cobblemon.species.warquila.desc: Warquila is a fierce predator that uses its speed and maneuverability to outwit prey. Its powerful talons can tear through even the toughest hides.
cobblemon.species.capig.name: Capig
cobblemon.species.capig.desc: The pattern on Capig's fur is popularly mimicked by the woven hats of locals. It will sometimes sit on its trainer's head to keep them warm.
cobblemon.species.capabara.name: Capabara
cobblemon.species.capabara.desc: The thick fur on its arms and head keeps it warm as it tunnels through cold snow. Capabara are often found in groups, huddling together for warmth.
cobblemon.species.cubzero.name: Cubzero
cobblemon.species.cubzero.desc: The saliva in Cubzeros mouth freezes at an early age, forming sharp, icy fangs that will never melt. If shattered, new ones will freeze in mere hours.
cobblemon.species.avalynx.name: Avalynx
cobblemon.species.avalynx.desc: Avalynx excels at stalking its prey in heavy snowstorms. It can move through deep snow and ice effortlessly without making a sound.
cobblemon.species.fawning.name: Fawning
cobblemon.species.fawning.desc: When first born, Fawning is too weak to defend itself from predators, so it tends to stay near thorny bushes for protection until it joins the herd.
cobblemon.species.llamarsh.name: Llamarsh
cobblemon.species.llamarsh.desc: The wool around Llamarsh's neck keeps it warm, even in sub-zero temperatures. People in cold climates have used it as clothing for generations.
cobblemon.species.buckston.name: Buckston
cobblemon.species.buckston.desc: Proud of their power, Buckston constantly battle to test their strength. It is rumored that their migration herds can be seen from space.
cobblemon.species.pengliff.name: Pengliff
cobblemon.species.pengliff.desc: Pengliff's rock-hard head is solid enough to protect it from damage. Some Pengliff have been seen diving from ledges to crack open boulders for sport.
cobblemon.species.penglacier.name: Penglacier
cobblemon.species.penglacier.desc: Penglacier are adept tunnelers and make their nests by digging caves out of the mountain side. Some snowy mountains have vast cave networks as a result.
cobblemon.species.bluffin.name: Bluffin
cobblemon.species.bluffin.desc: Bluffin's wings aren't powerful enough for flight, so it wanders the snowy peaks on foot. Its long tail drags on the ground and frays at the end.
cobblemon.species.burrmudail.name: Burrmudail
cobblemon.species.burrmudail.desc: Burrmudail's beautiful, crystalline feathers are highly sought after by collectors. If a Burrmudail bestows one to you, it is a sign of good luck.
cobblemon.species.koblin.name: Koblin
cobblemon.species.koblin.desc: Koblin spends its entire life in tunnels deep underground. Because of this, it was long believed to be just a myth told by miners.
cobblemon.species.koberus.name: Koberus
cobblemon.species.koberus.desc: Often the cause of brush fires, Koberus will light its surroundings on fire, creating a thick cloud of smoke in order to disorient its opponents.
cobblemon.species.kobalt.name: Kobalt
cobblemon.species.kobalt.desc: By choosing to stay in the caves, Kobalt has lost its eyesight. This has enhanced its other senses, which it uses to excavate complex tunnel systems.
cobblemon.species.pebblosa.name: Pebblosa
cobblemon.species.pebblosa.desc: It loves to collect rocks from different mountains and caves by carrying them in its mouth. When threatened, Pebblosa will spit them at other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.terratetra.name: Terratetra
cobblemon.species.terratetra.desc: Terratetra use their claws to harvest rocks from deep-within the earth. They use these rocks to make walls and to hurl them at potential threats.
cobblemon.species.gigaard.name: Gigaard
cobblemon.species.gigaard.desc: It uses its claws to carve slabs of granite and crystals from cliff faces to wear as armor. No two Gigaard have the same armor plating.
cobblemon.species.cowatti.name: Cowatti
cobblemon.species.cowatti.desc: Cowatti uses its tail to detect signals of varying frequencies. It can hone in on these signals to locate food, water, and even shelter.
cobblemon.species.snome.name: Snome
cobblemon.species.snome.desc: Snome is very shy and often hides under the snow. When it hides on slopes, it may accidentally roll downhill, picking up more and more snow on the way down.
cobblemon.species.snogre.name: Snogre
cobblemon.species.snogre.desc: Snogre is incredibly reclusive, living in remote valleys and cliff-sides. Villages pass down stories of them appearing to save travelers lost in blizzards.
cobblemon.species.taomarin.name: Taomarin
cobblemon.species.taomarin.desc: Taomarin constantly stands and moves with perfect balance, even in strong winds or uneven ground. Nothing seems to distract it from deep meditation.
cobblemon.species.orangutao.name: Orangutao
cobblemon.species.orangutao.desc: Orangutao are often found solemnly meditating in the wilderness. It is thought that they seek to obtain inner and outer balance in all things.
cobblemon.species.larvabidae.name: Larvabidae
cobblemon.species.larvabidae.desc: Larvabidae follows orders given to it by fully evolved members of the swarm. Its evolution is determined by which role it is most successful in.
cobblemon.species.caranox.name: Caranox
cobblemon.species.caranox.desc: Caranox defends its home aggressively, attacking anything it sees as a threat. It often assaults bigger Pokemon and sprays them with burning acids.
cobblemon.species.carajoule.name: Carajoule
cobblemon.species.carajoule.desc: Carajoule tend to serve as sentries for the hive. It can use its tail to flash signals or warnings and to attack foes with powerful jolts of electricity.
cobblemon.species.caracrust.name: Caracrust
cobblemon.species.caracrust.desc: Because of its heavy carapace, it is a very slow mover. It uses its tough and sturdy defensive capabilities to protect fragile Larvabidae from harm.
cobblemon.species.musburry.name: Musburry
cobblemon.species.musburry.desc: Because this Pokemon grows delicious berries, it is often preyed upon by Berratel. Some Musburry try to exist with Berratel symbiotically.
cobblemon.species.musbushel.name: Musbushel
cobblemon.species.musbushel.desc: Musbushel does not give up the berries it grows easily. When it does, however, it is not only a sign of trust, but also one of friendship and staunch loyalty.
cobblemon.species.berratel.name: Berratel
cobblemon.species.berratel.desc: Berratel eats so many berries that its fur is permanently stained. It waits for other Pokemon to gather berries, and then mugs them for an easy meal.
cobblemon.species.growmeo.name: Growmeo
cobblemon.species.growmeo.desc: Growmeo scurry through flowerbeds in search of a Tuliep. However, they are painfully shy and rarely work up the courage to actually approach one.
cobblemon.species.montegrew.name: Montegrew
cobblemon.species.montegrew.desc: When Montegrew falls out of love, it turns bitter and spiteful. It will begin shunning the Capulilly it once loved, whom it now sees as vain and pompous.
cobblemon.species.tuliep.name: Tuliep
cobblemon.species.tuliep.desc: Tuliep loves nothing more than the attention of a Growmeo. If a Tuliep is seen blushing, it invariably means one is nearby.
cobblemon.species.capulilly.name: Capulilly
cobblemon.species.capulilly.desc: When a Capulilly ceases loving its partner, it becomes haughty and cruel. It treats its former love Montegrew with disrespect, believing it to be callous and unfeeling.
cobblemon.species.dreamdery.name: Dreamdery
cobblemon.species.dreamdery.desc: Despite its adorable looks, Dreamdery is a voracious predator. It devours the dreams of people, leaving its victims disoriented and fatigued.
cobblemon.species.macabra.name: Macabra
cobblemon.species.macabra.desc: Macabra hunts Dreamdery for their wool. It has developed an immunity to their attacks, making it popular among people dealing with Dreamdery problems.
cobblemon.species.kertruffle.name: Kertruffle
cobblemon.species.kertruffle.desc: Needing little more than water and air to live, Kertruffle can adapt to hostile environments where few other Pokemon would survive.
cobblemon.species.mosshroom.name: Mosshroom
cobblemon.species.mosshroom.desc: Mosshroom is commonly mistaken for a grass hill. When something bumps into it, it releases spores before shuffling off to find a quiet place to sleep.
cobblemon.species.lumishroom.name: Lumishroom
cobblemon.species.lumishroom.desc: The light from a Lumishrooms caps can illuminate even the darkest caverns. Lumishroom use these lights to talk with one another from far away.
cobblemon.species.perishroom.name: Perishroom
cobblemon.species.perishroom.desc: Perishroom never seems to need to eat or drink in order to survive, and rarely moves. The spores it releases when attacked are fatal in even small doses.
cobblemon.species.rocano.name: Rocano
cobblemon.species.rocano.desc: Rocano is able to store up pressure inside its body by eating ore. When it is startled, it will release it all at once in a jet of magma to scare away foes.
cobblemon.species.volcaroc.name: Volcaroc
cobblemon.species.volcaroc.desc: Volcaroc live very deep in the earth and are a rare sight close to the surface. While digging, they leave long tubes behind them as if formed by magma.
cobblemon.species.volcoalder.name: Volcoalder
cobblemon.species.volcoalder.desc: Volcoalder claim entire hotspots as their personal domains. The strongest Volcoalder use mighty eruptions to protect their lands.
cobblemon.species.pounther.name: Pounther
cobblemon.species.pounther.desc: Pounther plays with its siblings by sneaking up on them and then jumping them when they least expect it. This game serves as training for the hunt.
cobblemon.species.jaguile.name: Jaguile
cobblemon.species.jaguile.desc: Jaguile are incredibly patient hunters. They use specialized appendages to detect changes in the wind, and pounce on their prey with blinding speed.
cobblemon.species.neureka.name: Neureka
cobblemon.species.cerebrulb.name: Cerebrulb
cobblemon.species.cerebrulb.desc: Cerebrulb's light stimulates brain cell activity to an extraordinary degree. This trait makes it a common companion for scientists and academics.
cobblemon.species.peppit.name: Peppit
cobblemon.species.peppit.desc: Peppit seeks out the spiciest berries to make its Fire attacks burn hotter. Groups of Peppit love to play in dry leaves, often causing small fires.
cobblemon.species.hoppanero.name: Hoppanero
cobblemon.species.hoppanero.desc: Hoppanero has few natural predators due to its spicy fur. When Hoppanero gather in large groups, they have been known to cause heat waves.
cobblemon.species.scovalope.name: Scovalope
cobblemon.species.scovalope.desc: Scovalope is highly adept at evading detection. The fruits on its horns may fall off, and are considered both a lucky charm and a delicacy.
cobblemon.species.pawter.name: Pawter
cobblemon.species.pawter.desc: A loyal companion and a skilled swimmer, Pawter is a common partner for sailors and lifeguards. It can detect storms and warn others before they arrive.
cobblemon.species.hurricanine.name: Hurricanine
cobblemon.species.hurricanine.desc: Hurricanine becomes more and more energetic shortly before a storm hits. When angry, its growls are so loud and harsh, they evoke the rumble of thunder.
cobblemon.species.skullarva.name: Skullarva
cobblemon.species.skullarva.desc: Skullarva spends its early life hidden away in damp caves and crevasses. It tries to scare away predators and trainers by mimicking the cries of stronger Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.maskoon.name: Maskoon
cobblemon.species.maskoon.desc: It imitates the cries of other Pokemon, but warps them so they sound morbid and unnatural. The pattern on its back is used to scare off predators.
cobblemon.species.mortasque.name: Mortasque
cobblemon.species.mortasque.desc: It can make human-like sounds to scare away predators and unnerve those that enter its domain. Many 'haunted' houses are merely nests for Mortasque.
cobblemon.species.vectol.name: Vectol
cobblemon.species.vectol.desc: Vectol was a computer virus that had infected the PC storage system. The process that converts data into matter has given it a physical form.
cobblemon.species.vectol2.name: Vectol2
cobblemon.species.vectol2.desc: Exposed to an unknown code, Vectol has upgraded to Vectol.2. It feeds by using its stinger to download data, leaving computers a corrupt mess afterwards.
cobblemon.species.bouwee.name: Bouwee
cobblemon.species.bouwee.desc: Bouwee's tail lets it drift peacefully near the surface. However, the bright colors often attract predators, so it will release a jet of water to escape.
cobblemon.species.scubug.name: Scubug
cobblemon.species.scubug.desc: Scubug's sturdy exoskeleton protects it from crushing deep sea pressure. Its antennae emit powerful light that allows it to navigate the darkest depths.
cobblemon.species.totter.name: Totter
cobblemon.species.totter.desc: Totters skin requires constant moisture, so it makes its home near riverbanks. It likes to soak up water with its tail and splash other Pokemon with it.
cobblemon.species.cascotta.name: Cascotta
cobblemon.species.cascotta.desc: Wild Cascotta have been known to attract attention by leaping out of streams and performing displays of aerial acrobatics at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.lutrajet.name: Lutrajet
cobblemon.species.lutrajet.desc: Dwelling in the deepest reaches of the clearest pools, Lutrajet moves as if it were one with the water. There are few who have witnessed this elegant dance.
cobblemon.species.alpint.name: Alpint
cobblemon.species.alpint.desc: The sapling at the end of its trunk acts as a personal weathervane. By holding it up to the wind, Alpint can tell where the weather will be most favorable.
cobblemon.species.forusk.name: Forusk
cobblemon.species.forusk.desc: While normally peaceful when soaking up sunlight, Forusk is quick to anger if approached. It swings its hammer-like trunk with enough force to level houses.
cobblemon.species.platypow.name: Platypow
cobblemon.species.platypow.desc: Predators that dont pay heed to Platypow because of its tiny size are quickly surprised by its fiery nature and its remarkably strong punches.
cobblemon.species.platikhao.name: Platikhao
cobblemon.species.platikhao.desc: Platikhao has venomous barbs hidden on its elbows and knees. It uses them to hurl furious strikes against its foes, and then lets the poison do its work.
cobblemon.species.cuppy.name: Cuppy
cobblemon.species.cuppy.desc: Schools of Cuppy gather in circles when sleeping, burying their noses in the sea bed. Many poems have been written about these strange underwater tea parties.
cobblemon.species.fettlekish.name: Fettlekish
cobblemon.species.fettlekish.desc: Fettlekish stores water in its body and controls its temperature to let it sink or float underwater. It can also release the water in a scalding hot blast.
cobblemon.species.shibalbat.name: Shibalbat
cobblemon.species.shibalbat.desc: Legend states that Shibalbat guards the entrance to the Underworld. It appears to be a statue until exposed to moonlight.
cobblemon.species.nobunata.name: Nobunata
cobblemon.species.nobunata.desc: Nobunata fights fearlessly and honorably, standing up for the weak and defenseless. When defeat seems inevitable, it will explode in a flurry of treats.
cobblemon.species.psybex.name: Psybex
cobblemon.species.psybex.desc: Psybex takes long journeys to mountain tops, searching for inner peace. Through meditation, it is able to see into the hearts of humans and Pokemon alike.
cobblemon.species.gnuru.name: Gnuru
cobblemon.species.gnuru.desc: Its horn amplifies its psychic powers, allowing Gnuru to communicate with parts unknown. It meditates daily to commune with these voices from afar.
cobblemon.species.flowger.name: Flowger
cobblemon.species.flowger.desc: When Flowger gather in great numbers, their songs form a joyous symphony. Many romantics believe that hearing a Flowger sing means one will find true love.
cobblemon.species.blue_flowger.name: Flowger
cobblemon.species.blue_flowger.desc1: When Flowger gather in great numbers, their songs form a joyous symphony. Many romantics believe that hearing a Flowger sing means one will find true love.
cobblemon.species.bullotus.name: Bullotus
cobblemon.species.bullotus.desc: Bullotuss booming cry can be heard for miles around. When resting, it floats on the water and looks up, absorbing sunlight with the petals around its neck.
cobblemon.species.blue_bullotus.name: Bullotus
cobblemon.species.blue_bullotus.desc1: Bullotuss booming cry can be heard for miles around. When resting, it floats on the water and looks up, absorbing sunlight with the petals around its neck.
cobblemon.species.burrowl.name: Burrowl
cobblemon.species.burrowl.desc: Burrowls heavy wings prevent it from flying, but it uses them as shovels to dig underground. It also uses its wings to protect small Pokemon from sandstorms.
cobblemon.species.magowl.name: Magowl
cobblemon.species.magowl.desc: Its wings are broad and powerful, yet it never flies. It is said that Magowl is weighed down by the arcane secrets hidden within its cloak of feathers.
cobblemon.species.craliber.name: Craliber
cobblemon.species.craliber.desc: Hatched near undersea mineral deposits, this Pokemon develops a sturdy shell. Its body rotates, helping it maintain course at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.crawglock.name: Crawglock
cobblemon.species.crawglock.desc: Crawglock hides underneath rocks to guard its offspring. A rapid click of its claws releases explosive blasts of heat and light with a loud bang.
cobblemon.species.leafish.name: Leafish
cobblemon.species.leafish.desc: When food is scarce, it floats sideways on the water's surface and absorbs sunlight for energy. Bug Pokemon often land on it, mistaking Leafish for a real leaf.
cobblemon.species.chlorofin.name: Chlorofin
cobblemon.species.chlorofin.desc: Chlorofin's natural camouflage makes it difficult to find in the wild, but once encountered, it'll display the playful, friendly attitude for which it's known.
cobblemon.species.quibble.name: Quibble
cobblemon.species.quibble.desc: Irascible and immature, Quibble squawks loudly when it doesn't get its way. It picks on smaller Pokemon but it's quick to flee when its targets fight back.
cobblemon.species.fowattle.name: Fowattle
cobblemon.species.fowattle.desc: As Fowattle grows bigger and bolder, it becomes somewhat of a bully. Rather than foraging on its own, it prefers to steal food from weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.turkistador.name: Turkistador
cobblemon.species.turkistador.desc: Turkistador often moves into other Pokemon's nests, stubbornly refusing to leave until the old inhabitant gives up and flees.
cobblemon.species.sedirrot.name: Sedirrot
cobblemon.species.sedirrot.desc: Sedirrot cleaves chunks of stone and clay from cliffsides using its axe-like beak. The excavated minerals are then consumed to strengthen its rigid hide.
cobblemon.species.condesa.name: Condesa
cobblemon.species.condesa.desc: Condesa is known to make entire canyons its territory. It has been found to carve images of things it likes into cliffsides.
cobblemon.species.cardinite.name: Cardinite
cobblemon.species.cardinite.desc: Though it can fly, Cardinite prefers to chase its prey around on foot, where it is more comfortable. It leaves a trail of small, scorched tracks as it runs.
cobblemon.species.chardinal.name: Chardinal
cobblemon.species.chardinal.desc: Chardinal routinely sets its own nest on fire to keep the eggs at the right temperature. When it takes off, it looks like the blazing streak of a comet.
cobblemon.species.skurrow.name: Skurrow
cobblemon.species.skurrow.desc: Skurrow digs itself underground to find shelter from the desert heat in a series of tunnels. It hisses to alert other Skurrow when danger is approaching.
cobblemon.species.somberado.name: Somberado
cobblemon.species.somberado.desc: Legend has it that Somberado was born of souls that got lost in the vast emptiness of the desert. Now it is forced to wander the badlands endlessly.
cobblemon.species.phlask.name: Phlask
cobblemon.species.phlask.desc: Laboratory glassware possessed by a playful but frightening spirit. It is known to spew chemicals onto random objects to see what happens.
cobblemon.species.noxial.name: Noxial
cobblemon.species.noxial.desc: Noxial have been discovered in both endothermic and exothermic forms. The more extreme the temperature, the more volatile the Noxial.
cobblemon.species.exothermic_noxial.name: Noxial
cobblemon.species.exothermic_noxial.desc: Noxial have been discovered in both endothermic and exothermic forms. The more extreme the temperature, the more volatile the Noxial.
cobblemon.species.fumighast.name: Fumighast
cobblemon.species.fumighast.desc: Within Fumighast are residual chemicals from its time as a Noxial. Using them as catalysts, Fumighast can recreate spontaneous, volatile reactions at will.
cobblemon.species.atomite.name: Atomite
cobblemon.species.atomite.desc: Atomite is the smallest known Pokemon. Sometimes a big group of Atomite will group together to mimic the shape of something else.
cobblemon.species.orbatom.name: Orbatom
cobblemon.species.orbatom.desc: Orbatom is able to discern objects as small as subatomic particles. It has enabled scientists to understand nuclear physics at a fundamental level.
cobblemon.species.squink.name: Squink
cobblemon.species.squink.desc: When confronted, Squink sprays its foes with noxious black ink to escape. While toxic in high doses, it has a distinct flavor and is used in a variety of dishes.
cobblemon.species.squidrift.name: Squidrift
cobblemon.species.squidrift.desc: Squidrift is able to fly by expelling noxious gases at high pressure. Its tentacles are delicacies, but highly toxic if prepared incorrectly.
cobblemon.species.boarealis.name: Boarealis
cobblemon.species.boarealis.desc: Boarealis' psychic powers produce vivid light shows when they interact with magnetic fields. The brilliance of the mane indicates an individual's strength.
cobblemon.species.chelonite.name: Chelonite
cobblemon.species.chelonite.desc: Chelonite uses its psychic control over gravity to levitate itself above the ground. It will sometimes get confused which way is up and float upside-down.
cobblemon.species.galaxagos.name: Galaxagos
cobblemon.species.galaxagos.desc: Galaxagos shell is so dense, it exudes a gravitational pull. At night, Chelonite swarm around it, orbiting in a spiral pattern for safety.
cobblemon.species.magnitogre.name: Magnitogre
cobblemon.species.magnitogre.desc: Magnitogre was first discovered when factories became commonplace. It feeds on leftover industrial waste, providing a safe environment for other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.minarac.name: Minarac
cobblemon.species.minarac.desc: Minarac digs elaborate tunnels to confuse its prey. Its constant search for gemstones also makes it a valuable companion for treasure-hunters.
cobblemon.species.trenchula.name: Trenchula
cobblemon.species.trenchula.desc: Trenchula uses its powerful mandibles to drill into the earth, forming a pitfall trap to ensnare its prey. It often work alongside miners underground.
cobblemon.species.pottle.name: Pottle
cobblemon.species.pottle.desc: It deviously infiltrates homes and fools unwary humans into caring for it. If discovered, Pottle will resist removal by stubbornly rooting into place.
cobblemon.species.trikotta.name: Trikotta
cobblemon.species.trikotta.desc: Trikotta actively seeks out the soil with the most nutrients. It will uproot crops from farmland and then defend its stolen land against angered farmers.
cobblemon.species.terrorcotta.name: Terrorcotta
cobblemon.species.terrorcotta.desc: Terrorcotta is too huge for standard containers. In order to not have their houses carried away, locals make giant clay pots for it to inhabit instead.
cobblemon.species.pueblant.name: Pueblant
cobblemon.species.pueblant.desc: The sprawling colonies built by Pueblant have inspired human architects for millennia. These structures are harder than concrete, lasting for generations.
cobblemon.species.cahokisect.name: Cahokisect
cobblemon.species.cahokisect.desc: Cahokisect's bejeweled carapace made it a symbol of wealth in ancient times. As a result, it is commonly found in the tombs of nobility and royalty.
cobblemon.species.cobrasket.name: Cobrasket
cobblemon.species.cobrasket.desc: Its resting, coiled body resembles a basket. Many unsuspecting merchants have been startled when they reached for one, only to be met with loud hissing.
cobblemon.species.charmbra.name: Charmbra
cobblemon.species.charmbra.desc: Charmbra passes air through the holes on its body to create a melody that hypnotizes its prey. The dazed targets are unable to escape its toxic fangs.
cobblemon.species.cairup.name: Cairup
cobblemon.species.cairup.desc: When it thinks nobody is looking, Cairup has been known to have one-sided talks with its tail. The eye on its forehead stays closed until it's fully developed.
cobblemon.species.kairoglyph.name: Kairoglyph
cobblemon.species.kairoglyph.desc: Kairoglyph values secrets and riddles above all else. The eye on its tail can reveal the innermost secrets of both humans and Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.necronite.name: Necronite
cobblemon.species.necronite.desc: Necronite emits a strange frequency as it floats about the ancient ruins it inhabits. Making contact with this Pokemon can leave one lightheaded.
cobblemon.species.gravollum.name: Gravollum
cobblemon.species.gravollum.desc: Gravollum will sleep motionless for thousands of years, only to awaken and relocate. This has led to ancient monuments seemingly vanishing overnight.
cobblemon.species.diloweed.name: Diloweed
cobblemon.species.diloweed.desc: As food in the desert is scarce, the plates on Diloweed's back absorb solar energy. It curls itself up into a ball and lets the wind carry it if it is tired.
cobblemon.species.pangolash.name: Pangolash
cobblemon.species.pangolash.desc: The plates on Pangolash's back have not only hardened to be highly durable, but also developed sharp edges capable of shredding nearly anything to pieces.
cobblemon.species.ignishell.name: Ignishell
cobblemon.species.ignishell.desc: Ignishell is still young, so its shell has not completely formed. In battle it worriedly covers its soft underbelly, which is very susceptible to attacks.
cobblemon.species.shelosene.name: Shelosene
cobblemon.species.shelosene.desc: Shelosene proudly displays its carapace to show its endurance. The Shelosene with the least damaged shell is idolised by the nest.
cobblemon.species.flarrapin.name: Flarrapin
cobblemon.species.flarrapin.desc: Flarrapin exposes its shell to extreme heat to repair and strengthen it. It is said that the average Flarrapins shell has been completely reforged 5 times.
cobblemon.species.desoula.name: Desoula
cobblemon.species.desoula.desc: Desoula feeds on the souls of creatures who have become exhausted by the desert. This nimble Pokemon zips around the desert sands in search of food.
cobblemon.species.necrow.name: Necrow
cobblemon.species.necrow.desc: Necrow has been known to lure people into the desert in an attempt to make them get lost. It then quietly watches from afar, awaiting its prey's demise.
cobblemon.species.vultergyst.name: Vultergyst
cobblemon.species.vultergyst.desc: Vultergyst is considered a harbinger of death. It scours the desert skies in search of fading souls then puts them to rest in its cloak of black feathers.
cobblemon.species.dinkywink.name: Dinkywink
cobblemon.species.dinkywink.desc: While Dinkywink's mouth contains huge, razor sharp teeth, it has yet to develop the strength to utilize them. As such, it prefers to hunt by ramming into prey.
cobblemon.species.dunkywunkr.name: Dunkywunkr
cobblemon.species.dunkywunkr.desc: After its legs had fully developed, Dunkywunkr was able to become the apex predator not only in the seas from which it emerged, but also on dry land.
cobblemon.species.calphite.name: Calphite
cobblemon.species.calphite.desc: Calphite spent many of its early years with its mother. Despite its massive size, it scared easily and trampled much in its path when running in fear.
cobblemon.species.indrolith.name: Indrolith
cobblemon.species.indrolith.desc: Very few things can penetrate Indrolith's impervious hide. This earthen behemoth ferociously defends its own when under attack.
cobblemon.species.solacari.name: Solacari
cobblemon.species.solacari.desc: Ancient peoples venerated Solacari as the herald of the rising sun. Kings would keep many of them in hopes of a long reign.
cobblemon.species.nurshary.name: Nurshary
cobblemon.species.nurshary.desc: Nursharys maternal instinct extends beyond its own children. It will often adopt sick or injured Pokemon, caring for them until they return to health.
cobblemon.species.loneleaf.name: Loneleaf
cobblemon.species.loneleaf.desc: Loneleaf considers itself to be ugly and creepy. It carves a wooden mask with a large smile on it to make friends. Sadly, this only alienates it even further.
cobblemon.species.forthorn.name: Forthorn
cobblemon.species.forthorn.desc: Forthorn masquerades as a guardian of the forest, scaring off intruders to awe its fellow Pokemon. In reality, it is quite bashful and desires acceptance.
cobblemon.species.coltergeist.name: Coltergeist
cobblemon.species.coltergeist.desc: The icy blue gazes of Coltergeist herds can often be seen in thick fog patches. Their eerie cries not only cause chills, but also strange, indescribable dreams.
cobblemon.species.fantasmare.name: Fantasmare
cobblemon.species.fantasmare.desc: Fantasmare wanders in the mountains and hills where it stalks lone travellers. It is said to haunt the dreams of those who have seen it.
cobblemon.species.chihaha.name: Chihaha
cobblemon.species.chihaha.desc: Chihaha loves nothing more than to make people laugh. It may look silly and clumsy to some, but in reality, it takes fake pratfalls for the sake of humor.
cobblemon.species.howlequin.name: Howlequin
cobblemon.species.howlequin.desc: Despite lacking thumbs, its dexterity is superior to humans'. Wild Howlequin often taunt trainers by juggling the balls that were too weak to catch it.
cobblemon.species.chegrin.name: Chegrin
cobblemon.species.chegrin.desc: Chegrin takes delight in playing tricks on smaller Pokemon, scaring them with its flexible tail, but all too often, it ends up accidentally scaring itself.
cobblemon.species.cheshade.name: Cheshade
cobblemon.species.cheshade.desc: Cheshade's mane resembles a toothy smile. Hunting in the dark, it appears only as a sinister grin, striking prey with its shadowy claws as they are transfixed.
cobblemon.species.doppole.name: Doppole
cobblemon.species.doppole.desc: Doppole wears a half of a broken Poke Ball as a sturdy improvised helmet. Whilst it might act bold and spunky, in reality, it loves being coddled.
cobblemon.species.artifish.name: Artifish
cobblemon.species.artifish.desc: Despite its predator-like appearance, Artifish is very kind and laid back. It uses its Poke Ball bait to play with other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.thoraxe.name: Thoraxe
cobblemon.species.pomparunt.name: Pomparunt
cobblemon.species.pomparunt.desc: Pomparunt is commonly found skulking around densely populated cities. It scavenges for food in small packs and often fights with others over scraps.
cobblemon.species.pompagoon.name: Pompagoon
cobblemon.species.pompagoon.desc: Being much stronger and bolder, gangs of Pompagoon will bully Pomparunt out of food. Oftentimes they will then fight among themselves for the stolen loot.
cobblemon.species.hyekuza.name: Hyekuza
cobblemon.species.hyekuza.desc: Fiercely proud and protective of its hairdo, the Hyekuza with the largest and most extravagant pompadour is considered the leader of the pack.
cobblemon.species.erycoon.name: Erycoon
cobblemon.species.erycoon.desc: Erycoon is constantly taking care of the forest it calls its home. It carries seeds and berries in its pouch-like tail to be planted or fed to weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.leukoon.name: Leukoon
cobblemon.species.leukoon.desc: Scientists call Leukoon the immune system of nature. It is able to engulf any threat to its habitat using its massive, void-like maw.
cobblemon.species.toxito.name: Toxito
cobblemon.species.toxito.desc: Toxito are commonly seen at night, looking for their next prey to suck on. They suck up air to appear intimidating, but instead often become slow and sluggish, making them a less formidable foe.
cobblemon.species.sanguito.name: Sanguito
cobblemon.species.sanguito.desc: Sanguito's antennae can sense warmth, helping it find prey in its dimly-lit swamp habitat. It emits a numbing toxin that keeps it undetected while it feeds.
cobblemon.species.orett.name: Orett
cobblemon.species.orett.desc: Born deep underground, Orett feeds on ore to keep its metallic shell strong. The composition of its body depends on what kind of ore it feeds on.
cobblemon.species.anvelid.name: Anvelid
cobblemon.species.anvelid.desc: Anvelid incubates inside mineral-rich cave walls in order to grow. However, it will ferociously attack any Pokemon or people who disturb its hibernation.
cobblemon.species.magroplex.name: Magroplex
cobblemon.species.magroplex.desc: Notoriously protective of its community, Magroplex will go so far as to collapse mines approaching its nests. Its durable body allows it to dig miles underground.
cobblemon.species.viipii.name: Viipii
cobblemon.species.viipii.desc: Although they are friendly to most Pokemon, in the wild, groups of Viipii are known to bicker and fight over nothing for days on end.
cobblemon.species.chilloth.name: Chilloth
cobblemon.species.chilloth.desc: Chilloth floats calmly in the water by connecting its arms to make an inner tube. It lets swimmers hold on when they need to catch their breath.
cobblemon.species.soakoth.name: Soakoth
cobblemon.species.soakoth.desc: Soakoth drifts nonchalantly along river rapids as if they were a gentle stream. Pokemon that can't swim sometimes climb on its belly to cross bodies of water.
cobblemon.species.chayan.name: Chayan
cobblemon.species.chayan.desc: Chayan is a born fighter, sparring with others mere hours after birth. It competes with others in challenges of skill and strength, striving to improve.
cobblemon.species.macuarrior.name: Macuarrior
cobblemon.species.macuarrior.desc: The edges of Macuarrior's blades are extremely sharp. Through constant honing, these blades can effortlessly cut through concrete.
cobblemon.species.ocerumi.name: Ocerumi
cobblemon.species.ocerumi.desc: Ocerumi encases its hands in special clay, baking them in harsh sun. When dried, these stone gauntlets can resist even Ocerumi's earth-shattering punch.
cobblemon.species.fortifry.name: Fortifry
cobblemon.species.fortifry.desc: Only Fortifry that learn to care for others will evolve. Though they are numerous and hardy, few Fortifry evolve due to their inherently selfish nature.
cobblemon.species.oarwish.name: Oarwish
cobblemon.species.oarwish.desc: Oarwish is known to emerge only to help people in need. This has gained it a reputation amongst sailors that it is a sign of luck and can grant wishes.
cobblemon.species.smashiary.name: Smashiary
cobblemon.species.smashiary.desc: Smashiary's reckless fighting style makes use of its long legs and aerial superiority to swoop onto enemies in a flurry of bone-shattering kicks.
cobblemon.species.slatic.name: Slatic
cobblemon.species.slatic.desc: Slatic has not yet mastered its powers of light distortion. As a result, its body parts will suddenly appear out of nowhere as its camouflage falters.
cobblemon.species.telsion.name: Telsion
cobblemon.species.telsion.desc: Telsion's lightning fast tongue carries an impressive electric current that cooks small bugs alive and can stun even the heftiest of opponents.
cobblemon.species.chameleohm.name: Chameleohm
cobblemon.species.chameleohm.desc: By using its ability to manipulate electromagnetic waves, Chameleohm can disrupt the light around it and render itself invisible to the naked eye.
cobblemon.species.glauqua.name: Glauqua
cobblemon.species.glauqua.desc: Even though Glauqua is highly venomous, it is known to be playful and enjoy making new friends. Still, one should try to stay away from its poisonous horns.
cobblemon.species.hydranticus.name: Hydranticus
cobblemon.species.hydranticus.desc: Hydranticus is a curious Pokemon that loves soaring behind ships for weeks on end, happily absorbing the toxic runoff left in their wakes.
cobblemon.species.lintle.name: Lintle
cobblemon.species.lintle.desc: The luster of Lintle's mane is indicative of its health. From birth, it always travels as part of a pair, and remain with its partner its whole life.
cobblemon.species.silkinder.name: Silkinder
cobblemon.species.silkinder.desc: The ribbons on Silkinder's neck are very sensitive, and shine in the moonlight. Silkinder often entwine ribbons as an affectionate gesture.
cobblemon.species.paramoth.name: Paramoth
cobblemon.species.paramoth.desc: On rare occasions, Paramoth will cloud together and perform a complicated, colorful dance. Some say this is related to the movements of the moon.
cobblemon.species.parapy.name: Parapy
cobblemon.species.parapy.desc: Parapy grows inside the mouth of a fish and replaces the tongue of its host. It uses its host's body as a trojan horse, attacking unwitting prey as it swims by.
cobblemon.species.mawasite.name: Mawasite
