Despite being quite rude, a true bond will emerge within the crew members. Cycaroon live both on land and in ocean depths, in some cases inside wrecked ships. They can swim at 200 km/h.
cobblemon.species.argoceane.name: Argoceane
cobblemon.species.argoceane.desc: It's been credited with the creation of all ocean life. Whenever there is a mass extinction, it pours out with recovery and diversification. Its large, cornucopian shell is always brimming with life energy.
cobblemon.species.dreadtyde.name: Dreadtyde
cobblemon.species.dreadtyde.desc: Feared throughout history as the cause for all mass extinctions, it seeps a red algae from its spines that dyes entire oceans red and deprives everything of life. It slumbers, biding its time until the next extinction.
cobblemon.species.abysside.name: Abysside
cobblemon.species.abysside.desc: Lord of the Underworld, Abysside can unhinge its jaws to swallow entire submarines, crew included. It wanders the deepest, darkest, most unexplored depths, endlessly hungering for drowned souls to collect.
cobblemon.species.capillar.name: Capillar
cobblemon.species.capillar.desc: Despite their small size, Capillar have a very tough attitude and will rear up and puff out their antenna when threatened. Ancient civilizations once held festivals to honor their bravery and ornate bodies.
cobblemon.species.beacoon.name: Beacoon
cobblemon.species.beacoon.desc: Large amounts of energy stored for evolution cause Beacoon to glow slightly. Large groups of them often hang from branches, lighting the way of people and pokemon travelling through forests.
cobblemon.species.fulgoryu.name: Fulgoryu
cobblemon.species.fulgoryu.desc: They have large heads with a set of fake teeth to intimidate foes. A strange draconic power burns deep within their bodies, causing their heads, wings and underside to occasionally glow vibrantly
cobblemon.species.feebleg.name: Feebleg
cobblemon.species.feebleg.desc: Feebleg are quite timid, often hiding in dark places. Many people and pokemon are scared of their large fangs, but their bite is actually relatively weak and harmless.
cobblemon.species.webbind.name: Webbind
cobblemon.species.webbind.desc: Webbind's body is covered in incredibly sticky webbing. Large clumps of them can often be found stuck together along with various debris.
cobblemon.species.taranterror.name: Taranterror
cobblemon.species.taranterror.desc: It's always in a state of agitation, quick to deliver an extremely painful bite. The prickly hair covering its body stands on end to make it look more intimidating and can also be fired off as an attack
cobblemon.species.dorsel.name: Dorsel
cobblemon.species.dorsel.desc: Dorsel thrive in rivers, often ignored by predators because they are so small and meager. They feed primarily on the dead skin of other river pokemon, who are not bothered by it in the slightest.
cobblemon.species.riverous.name: Riverous
cobblemon.species.riverous.desc: Riverous have a short temper and large appetite, often dominating rivers and lakes to the point of complete desolation. They can even chase prey outside of water for a short time.
cobblemon.species.stalacbite.name: Stalacbite
cobblemon.species.stalagoyle.name: Stalagoyle
cobblemon.species.claggy.name: Claggy
cobblemon.species.claggy.desc: Its shape and demeanor are very similar to Scraggy. It builds mud and sharp twigs into a nest around itself to feel protected and confident. If the nest is destroyed, it flees in a panic
cobblemon.species.scrachty.name: Scrachty
cobblemon.species.scrachty.desc: As long as the nest of mud and thorns around its lower half is in good shape, it struts around confidently and carefree. When it's not spending time maintaining its nest, it tends to the comb on its head instead.
cobblemon.species.meansprout.name: Meansprout
cobblemon.species.meansprout.desc: Meansprout are laughably weak in battle, so they instead toy with foes psychologically, sprouting up and whispering behind their back or using vines to trip them up.
cobblemon.species.meanstalk.name: Meanstalk
cobblemon.species.meanstalk.desc: They constantly do things like covertly stealing or misplacing people's belongings or using their vines to tamper with outdoor equipment. They yield beans that are extremely bitter, said to be indicative of their true inner rage and malice.
cobblemon.species.sinistalk.name: Sinistalk
cobblemon.species.sinistalk.desc: Sinistalk are extremely cruel and tricky fighters, adept at dodging due to their highly flexible bodies. They delight in wrapping foes tightly in their thorny vines and watching them suffer. They oddly dislike bright sunlight and prefer to slowly creep and overtake objects in the shade or at night.
cobblemon.species.hoofin.name: Hoofin
cobblemon.species.wardrab.name: Wardrab
cobblemon.species.wardrab.desc: Wardrab are said to be created by spirits possessing old clothes. They tend to avoid contact with people, although their somewhat cute appearance has caused a resurgence of antique fashion trends in some places.
cobblemon.species.menasuit.name: Menasuit
cobblemon.species.menasuit.desc: Menasuit often lurk in places like abandoned houses and dark alleys. They never attack, but rather stalk people persistently and feed off of their fear and uncertainty. If you're alone and see a figure out of the corner of your eye, chances are it's a Menasuit.
cobblemon.species.dapperition.name: Dapperition
cobblemon.species.dapperition.desc: Dapperition's body is made of shadows, allowing it to move freely just about anywhere. Don't be fooled by their armless appearance. They can easily hypnotize someone using the pattern on their chest and suddenly form eerie arms to snatch them up.
cobblemon.species.plumplasm.name: Plumplasm
cobblemon.species.plumplasm.desc: Plumplasm are very messy eaters, loving any food they can get their hands on. One can see the shadow of whatever they eat through their bodies, slowly disappearing as it gets digested
cobblemon.species.phantomnom.name: Phantomnom
cobblemon.species.phantomnom.desc: Phantomnom can store many things inside their bodies, but anything that get stored becomes covered in drool. This drool is incredibly slimy and gives anyone touched by it extreme chills and a feeling of immense disgust and nausea, even if they felt perfectly fine beforehand.
cobblemon.species.germite.name: Germite
cobblemon.species.germite.desc: Germite are believed to be a particular type of germ that eventually evolved into a pokemon. They can fire off the growths on their body, coating whatever they hit in gooey slime that causes mild sickness if touched.
cobblemon.species.gastropox.name: Gastropox
cobblemon.species.gastropox.desc: They look for companionship but unfortunately spread sickness wherever they go. Their flat, mucus-coated bodies allow them to slip into many places where they're usually not wanted.
cobblemon.species.agitwin.name: Agitwin
cobblemon.species.agitwin.desc: It is made up of two separate entities that share a psychic link. Despite this, they oddly constantly act against each other in a struggle for dominance.
cobblemon.species.naeglerium.name: Naeglerium
cobblemon.species.naeglerium.desc: Naeglerium has the ability to psychically feed on thoughts and emotions. It also often acts very unpredictably. Because of these qualities, long-term exposure to Naeglerium is usually not recommended.
cobblemon.species.dicell.name: Dicell
cobblemon.species.minicule.name: Minicule
cobblemon.species.minicule.desc: A strange pokemon that can freely alter its own size. They are extremely social with their own kind, almost as if drawn to each other by some unknown force.
cobblemon.species.atomix.name: Atomix
cobblemon.species.atomix.desc: After evolution, Atomix often exhibit strange, unstable behavior such as vanishing into thin air, phasing through solid objects and even spontaneously exploding in some cases.
cobblemon.species.kwiklik.name: Kwiklik
cobblemon.species.kwiklik.desc: It was originally created as a means of transporting data across cyberspace. Since then, it unfortunately became popular with unsavory types due to its ability to slip into hard to reach places, both physical and digital.
cobblemon.species.binarray.name: Binarray
cobblemon.species.binarray.desc: Tampering from various parties caused an unexpected evolution in its code. It eats data and gives off a powerful electric shock which makes it very problematic in technology-heavy areas.
cobblemon.species.purradox.name: Purradox
cobblemon.species.purradox.desc: Purradox were originally created as an artificial domestic companion pokemon. However at some point, the data used to create them became corrupted and the project was abandoned. They eventually escaped and multiplied, exhibiting very strange and erratic behavior due to the corruption like inexplicably vanishing in an instant.
cobblemon.species.grimpire.name: Grimpire
cobblemon.species.grimpire.desc: The majority of Grimpire's hair acts as wings, easily carrying its light skinny frame. It swoops down and ensnares foes in its hair, magically draining their life force. It dislikes the sun for some reason and often hides away during the day.
cobblemon.species.volcamone.name: Volcamone
cobblemon.species.tanklang.name: Tanklang
cobblemon.species.tanklang.desc: Varitan Klink and Klang have seemingly developed the ability to join together and create Tanklang. Upon evolving, Tanklang gains a specialized cannon attachment on its right side with a yellow core. Similarly to Klinklang's red core and spiked wheel, Tanklang stores its energy in the yellow core which can then be fired from its cannon with immense power
cobblemon.species.goopipe.name: Goopipe
cobblemon.species.goopipe.desc: Its body is made of loose sludge so it seeks refuge in old bits of pipe to give it a more solid form. It is currently being investigated if it has any kind of relation to Grimer & Muk.
cobblemon.species.piplex.name: Piplex
cobblemon.species.piplex.desc: Its main body is made up of two pipe pieces that it can freely turn in different orientations. Piplex mainly live in sewers and will link up with eachother to hide themselves from maintenance workers.
cobblemon.species.sinklutter.name: Sinklutter
cobblemon.species.sinklutter.desc: Now sporting a sink, seemingly endless sludge spews forth from it. It can fire off the sludge of its body from the top faucet with enough force to dent a ship's hull.
cobblemon.species.dustout.name: Dustout
cobblemon.species.kirinirik.name: Kirinirik
cobblemon.species.kirinirik.desc: Kirinirik's lighter head prefers to approach situations calmly and analytically, while its darker head is much more brash and violent so they don't often get along. However, if Kirinirik's heads both focus their energy in tandem, they are capable of unleashing tremendous mystic power.
cobblemon.species.concealeon.name: Concealeon
cobblemon.species.concealeon.desc: It still cannot make its red stripes invisible upon evolving. However, it can now change the color of them based on its mood.
cobblemon.species.pestilint.name: Pestilint
cobblemon.species.pestilint.desc: They often live in largely populated areas, creating nests out of dust and other soft materials. These pokemon are often considered a problem because their nests can cause breathing difficulties and become a major fire hazard
cobblemon.species.carvesta.name: Carvesta
cobblemon.species.carvesta.desc: Once mistaken for Larvesta for its shape, it normally lies at the bottom of the ocean and ensnares passing prey with its tentacles. It can also propel itself backwards to skewer foes with its pointed shell
cobblemon.species.molcarona.name: Molcarona
cobblemon.species.molcarona.desc: Its shape and illuminative abilities are oddly similar to Volcarona. It appears as a hypnotically beautiful nebula in the ocean abyss as it surrounds the onlooker with its tentacles to attack
cobblemon.species.grimire.name: Grimire
cobblemon.species.grimire.desc: A creature made of mud and bones that mysteriously came to life similarly to Grimer, hence its name. Through only recently discovered, research suggests that it has actually existed before Grimer which has caused some debate over its naming.
cobblemon.species.stuk.name: Stuk
cobblemon.species.stuk.desc: Its tar-like body has seeped into the bones stuck in it which allows it to control them. It subdues prey with its clawed arm and drags them in with its other sticky arm to absorb them and add their bones to itself.
cobblemon.species.fretal.name: Fretal
cobblemon.species.fretal.desc: A forest-dwelling pokemon that for some reason searches for a flower to cover its head with. It has an extremely reclusive and meek demeanor and becomes greatly distraught if the flower is blown off of its head.
cobblemon.species.canopeace.name: Canopeace
cobblemon.species.canopeace.desc: It has a very friendly, easygoing personality that makes it a great companion for anyone. It often sits quietly to meditate and absorb sun rays with the flowers on its head which helps its long grassy hair grow.
cobblemon.species.grassola.name: Grassola
cobblemon.species.grassola.desc: It slowly moves along the forest floor, camougoomyed among old pieces of wood. It was initially mistaken for Corsola due to the way branches sprout from it
cobblemon.species.graceola.name: Graceola
cobblemon.species.graceola.desc: They normally stay very still to absorb sunlight but every year groups of them will come together and do beautiful dances to welcome the coming of spring.
cobblemon.species.severm.name: Severm
cobblemon.species.severm.desc: They like to make their homes in old stumps. Because of this, they can be dangerous to Phantump if the two meet.
cobblemon.species.infesteed.name: Infesteed
cobblemon.species.infesteed.desc: Despite their gruesome appearance, they are relatively docile worms living in old wood. The worms work in tandem to puppet the wood in a way that's still not well-known to researchers.
cobblemon.species.frankensteen.name: Frankensteen
cobblemon.species.frankensteen.desc: Most of its body is hollowed out, dead plant matter using controlled worms as hair and appendages. It uses its long, sleeve-like arms to ensnare victims and slowly suck away their life force.
cobblemon.species.sporges.name: Sporges
cobblemon.species.sporges.desc: Sporges use the sticky fungus they wear around their necks to both ensnare prey and poison it at the same time. They often have a vain attitude despite being covered in fungus most pokemon find to be repulsive.
cobblemon.species.mirrorigus.name: Mirrorigus
cobblemon.species.mirrorigus.desc: Mirrorigus appear as an ornate mirror that oddly doesn't seem to reflect its surroundings. Looking into one will show a person their ideal self. Once they are distracted, Mirrorigus springs to life and attacks with razor-sharp mirror shards.
cobblemon.species.porygon0.name: Porygon-0
cobblemon.species.porygon0.desc: Interfacing with official Silph Co. software caused it to unexpectedly evolve into this new unknown form. It seems to have stabilized but posseses the ability to spread computer viruses at will as well as an actively malicious AI.
cobblemon.species.snarlax.name: Snarlax
cobblemon.species.snarlax.desc: They are extremely bad-tempered and light sleepers. They will eat anything that comes into their territory without hesitation so they must be met with extreme caution when exploring.
cobblemon.species.lasaur.name: Lasaur
cobblemon.species.lasaur.desc: It can concentrate a weak electric charge in the crest on its head. Though this only produces minor electric attacks, it also stimulates its brain, heightening its reflexes.
cobblemon.species.lectrosaur.name: Lectrosaur
cobblemon.species.lectrosaur.desc: It can fire off powerful electrical attacks using its antenna-like horn. Massive groups of them were believed to congregate during thunderstorms in prehistoric times.
cobblemon.species.confectious.name: Confectious
cobblemon.species.confectious.desc: It is a being of discarded candy that somehow gained sentience and now roams the fairgrounds searching for more sweets to eat. It ensnares opponents in a sticky sugary goo that's nearly impossible to escape by force.
cobblemon.species.garbadjinn.name: Garbadjinn
cobblemon.species.garbadjinn.desc: The large Garbadjinn springs to life from its small trashcan to rain sickeningly-sweet junk food on foes. Despite its size, its body is light and covered in sugar that sparkles like stars.
cobblemon.species.togetect.name: Togetect
cobblemon.species.togetect.desc: It does not tolerate antagonism and will defend those it befriends with its life. Just spreading its wings and showing off its gold armor is enough to put onlookers in speechless awe.
cobblemon.species.petiolis.name: Petiolis
cobblemon.species.petiolis.desc: Este pokmon es muy juguetn y mortfero, la leyenda dice que es descendiente de la loba que amamant a los fundadores de Roma.
cobblemon.species.virilis.name: Virilis
cobblemon.species.virilis.desc: Se dice que aquellos entrenadores que cuentan con un Virilis son bendecidos por los dioses a hacer grandes hazaas en la vida.
cobblemon.species.lupercalis.name: Lupercalis
cobblemon.species.lupercalis.desc: La leyenda cuenta que fue uno de sus ascendientes fue la que amamant a Rmulo y Remo, los fundadores de Roma.
cobblemon.species.harregg.name: Harregg
cobblemon.species.harregg.desc: Este pokmon es un pequeo ave imperial que no ha llegado an de salir del cascarn,aunque parezca adorable hay que tener mucho cuidado con l,podra calcinarte en cuestin de segundos. Necesita el calor para vivir y su huevo est a ms de 300 C,no sobrevivira fuera de l en esta fase. Siempre ha sido un smbolo de Roma y estos adoran la lnea evolutiva de este pokmon.
cobblemon.species.igneagle.name: Igneagle
cobblemon.species.igneagle.desc: Igneagle es la evolucin de Harreg, es un pokmon muy activo, cmo consecuencia suele robar armas y montar jaleo, pero si est de tu lado, ser una gran ayuda.
cobblemon.species.imperiavem.name: Imperiavem
cobblemon.species.imperiavem.desc: Imperiavem es un majestuoso pokmon y los soldados suelen llevarlo en sus estandartes. Su velocidad ha llegado a compararse con la del dios Mercurio.
cobblemon.species.hipporos.name: Hipporos
cobblemon.species.hipporos.desc: Hipporos es un pequeo hipocampo, le gusta jugar y come insectos y pequeos peces, sus escamas le protegen y sus bigote le avisan de peligros, usa su veneno para debilitar a sus presas, suelen ser pasivos y agradables con los humanos.
cobblemon.species.equxic.name: Equxic
cobblemon.species.equxic.desc: Equxic es la evolucin de Hipporos, usa su veneno para cazar, en esta forma empieza a usar el poder de sus devastadores coletazos, aunque an no sabe controlarlos.
cobblemon.species.marecampus.name: Marecampus
cobblemon.species.marecampus.desc: Marecampus es un fiero pokmon enviado por Neptuno,sus devastadores coletazos pueden provocar olas de hasta 7 metros.
cobblemon.species.houndplut.name: Houndplut
cobblemon.species.houndplut.desc: Creado por Plutn, protegen los mundos infernales con sus temibles colmillos.
cobblemon.species.fawniae.name: Fawniae
cobblemon.species.fawniae.desc: Ser mstico, se dice que vino a Occidentis gracias al dios Fauno, en agradecimiento a los hombres.
cobblemon.species.lanidos.name: Lanidos
cobblemon.species.lanidos.desc: An advantage of Lanidos' slim body is being able to swiftly catch prey without having to restrain it with threads. The thick fur covering its body absorbs hard-hitting blows.
cobblemon.species.ramvolt.name: Ramvolt
cobblemon.species.ramvolt.desc: The immense amount of electrical energy Ramvolt can store makes it aggressive. Lightning strikes unleashed in anger calm it down, but the energy restores in no time.
cobblemon.species.achiefd.name: Achief'd
cobblemon.species.kamurados.name: Kamurados
cobblemon.species.goobae.name: Goobae
cobblemon.species.weeduza.name: Weeduza
cobblemon.species.weeduza.desc: It is very proud of the curly vines that cover its head and it's common to see it wearing different coiffures, though it is unknown how it changes them.
cobblemon.species.tangorgon.name: Tangorgon
cobblemon.species.kangazad.name: Kangazad
cobblemon.species.epp_v11.name: EPP_v1.1
cobblemon.species.kvadract.name: Kvadract
cobblemon.species.kvadract.desc: One of the mysterious Ultra Beasts. It rapidly spins its four-eyed head to hypnotize its prey while tangling it with tentacles.
cobblemon.species.navatoria.name: Navatoria
cobblemon.species.navatoria.desc: According to rumors it guides sailors who lost their way at sea, only to crash their boats into rocks and wail as they drown. It's one of the Ultra Beasts.
cobblemon.species.sabroast.name: Sabroast
cobblemon.species.sabroast.desc: One kind of Ultra Beast, it absorbs solar energy and stores it in its body. If provoked it can heat up its body and shoot fire from its spines, according to witnesses.
cobblemon.species.orchynx.name: Orchynx
cobblemon.species.orchynx.desc: Metal plates underneath its fur protect it from harm. It replenishes its energy by basking in the sun's rays.
cobblemon.species.metalynx.name: Metalynx
cobblemon.species.metalynx.desc: METALYNX stalk their prey in packs. Their brutally sharp tail blades are their main weapon.
cobblemon.species.raptorch.name: Raptorch
cobblemon.species.raptorch.desc: Raptorch's diet consists of meat and iron-ore. When it has eaten enough ore, it will evolve. This Pokmon has great eyesight and a vicious appetite.
cobblemon.species.archilles.name: Archilles
cobblemon.species.archilles.desc: With a specialized saddle and reins, ARCHILLES can be ridden. Make sure that you have earned its trust first.
cobblemon.species.eletux.name: Eletux
cobblemon.species.eletux.desc: ELETUX is capable of generating strong magnetic fields around its feet and tail that allow it to walk on water.
cobblemon.species.electruxo.name: Electruxo
cobblemon.species.electruxo.desc: ELECTRUXO can use the magnetic waves they generate as radar. This allows them to see even in pitch darkness.
cobblemon.species.chyinmunk.name: Chyinmunk
cobblemon.species.chyinmunk.desc: The length of a CHYINMUNK's stripes determines its authority in a group. If it spots a predator, it shrieks loudly to warn the others.
cobblemon.species.kinetmunk.name: Kinetmunk
cobblemon.species.kinetmunk.desc: Kinetmunk digs intricate tunnels that can stretch for miles underground. They use small electrical pulses to relax their muscles, allowing them to run faster.
cobblemon.species.birbie.name: Birbie
cobblemon.species.birbie.desc: It defends itself by dazzling opponents by flashing its brightly colored plumage. They are known for their elaborate mating dances.
cobblemon.species.aveden.name: Aveden
cobblemon.species.aveden.desc: The blue feathers on its chest reflect light. They use flashes to communicate with one another in the forest canopy.
cobblemon.species.splendifowl.name: Splendifowl
cobblemon.species.splendifowl.desc: Its spectacular plumage makes it a frequent target of poachers. However, due to the heavy feathers, it's not a great flyer.
cobblemon.species.cubbug.name: Cubbug
cobblemon.species.cubbug.desc: It shares characteristics with bug and mammal Mon. Being in its presence has a calming effect.
cobblemon.species.cubblfly.name: Cubblfly
cobblemon.species.cubblfly.desc: It scatters pollen and seeds in order to help flowers grow. It always smells like flower petals.
cobblemon.species.nimflora.name: Nimflora
cobblemon.species.nimflora.desc: It scatters pollen and seeds in order to help flowers grow. It always smells like flower petals.
cobblemon.species.barewl.name: Barewl
cobblemon.species.barewl.desc: Incredibly dense metals make up BAREWL's body. They are much heavier than they look. They live in dark caves and feed on rocks and metal ore.
cobblemon.species.dearewl.name: Dearewl
cobblemon.species.dearewl.desc: It is a stubborn Pokemon that will always stand its ground, even against a much larger opponent. it uses its horn to dig for metal ore.
cobblemon.species.gararewl.name: Gararewl
cobblemon.species.gararewl.desc: A gentle giant, GARAREWL are peaceful herbivores but won't hesitate to defend themselves if attacked. they whip foes using the razor wire on their head.
cobblemon.species.grozard.name: Grozard
cobblemon.species.grozard.desc: Its snakelike body is almost always partially underground. The tunnels they dig can serve as pitfalls for the unwary traveler.
cobblemon.species.terlard.name: Terlard
cobblemon.species.terlard.desc: Terlard's two heads have completely independent brains and are prone to argument. That they ever manage to coordinate at all is a miracle.
cobblemon.species.tonemy.name: Tonemy
cobblemon.species.tonemy.desc: New trainers traveling through caves are advised to bring along antidotes against a TONEMY's poison, which causes great pain if it isn't treated immediately.
cobblemon.species.tofurang.name: Tofurang
cobblemon.species.tofurang.desc: Unable to fly or move swiftly like TONEMY, TOFURANG instead catch their prey by exhaling a poison gas that makes Mon sluggish.
cobblemon.species.dunseraph.name: Dunseraph
cobblemon.species.dunseraph.desc: Said to be descended from a DUNSPARCE that climbed Sky Pillar. It is a powerful flyer and can alter the air pressure at will.
cobblemon.species.fortog.name: Fortog
cobblemon.species.fortog.desc: This Pokemon is rarely seen walking because of its weight. Rather, it rolls to get anywhere. They are often found at the bottoms of ponds.
cobblemon.species.folerog.name: Folerog
cobblemon.species.folerog.desc: FOLEROG can't swim but they need to remain damp to survive, so they are found in grasslands next to rivers and lakes.
cobblemon.species.blubelrog.name: Blubelrog
cobblemon.species.blubelrog.desc: BLUBELROG are the masters of the calm water. They are very social and form communities in and around freshwater lakes.
cobblemon.species.feleng.name: Feleng
cobblemon.species.feleng.desc: Although FELENG is small and weak, it can manipulate other Mon just by giving them a pleading look and meowing cutely.
cobblemon.species.felunge.name: Felunge
cobblemon.species.felunge.desc: FELUNGE are expert hunters, able to see in very low light and move without a sound. Many people keep them to deter pests such as CHYINMUNK.
cobblemon.species.feliger.name: Feliger
cobblemon.species.feliger.desc: Many trainers are disappointed when FELUNGE evolves because it gets fat and lazy. It can crush foes under its enormous body mass.
cobblemon.species.empirilla.name: Empirilla
cobblemon.species.empirilla.desc: When PRIMEAPE beats its rivals, it wins the right to wear the Jungle Crown, evolving it to the noble EMPIRILLA, much stronger and more intelligent. A natural leader of other Mon, EMPIRILLA have learned to control their rage and use it to increase their power in battle.
cobblemon.species.owten.name: Owten
cobblemon.species.owten.desc: OWTEN are mainly seen at night, when they are looking for berries and other individuals of its species. Their eyes reflect light and appear as red dots in the darkness. They are known for their lovely singing voice.
cobblemon.species.eshouten.name: Eshouten
cobblemon.species.eshouten.desc: ESHOUTEN are shy and elusive, found only at night around mountains. Their incredible eyesight allows them to see clearly up to three miles away. If you see red circles in a tree at night, it is light reflected from their eyes.
cobblemon.species.alteranowten.name: AlteranOwten
cobblemon.species.alteranowten.desc: Alteran OWTEN is beloved by many due to its cute appearance and lovely singing voice. It knows this, and is not above using cuteness to get what it wants
cobblemon.species.alteraneshouten.name: AlteranEshouten
cobblemon.species.alteraneshouten.desc: People and Mon of all sorts follow it around to hear it sing. Analyzing its songs has determined that it views these hangers-on with disdain.
cobblemon.species.smore.name: Smore
cobblemon.species.smore.desc: If a SMORE approaches your picnic, it's not trying to steal your food, it just wants attention. Still, some people are afraid of them.
cobblemon.species.firoke.name: Firoke
cobblemon.species.firoke.desc: Its belly is filled with super hot lava that it sprays at its opponent through the nozzle on its abdomen. Its aim is precise.
cobblemon.species.brailip.name: Brailip
cobblemon.species.brailip.desc: This Mon is known for its intelligence. It can't swim fast, but it hides among coral reefs, using its psychic powers to detect others.
cobblemon.species.brainoar.name: Brainoar
cobblemon.species.brainoar.desc: Called 'The sage of the sea', BRAINOAR is said to posses all the wisdom of the ocean. It is calm and dislikes fighting.
cobblemon.species.sponee.name: Sponee
cobblemon.species.sponee.desc: The sponge-like skin of this Mon is found in all parts of the ocean. How this Mon survives in salt water is a mystery. It fills its sponge-like skin with water and carries it into its hive. It can release all the stored water at once.
cobblemon.species.sponaree.name: Sponaree
cobblemon.species.sponaree.desc: SPONEE are covered by a bizarre sponge-like material. When dropped, they bounce.
cobblemon.species.pahar.name: Pahar
cobblemon.species.pahar.desc: PAHAR are intelligent and are commonly kept as pets. They can even be taught to talk, although not to the degree of CHATOT.
cobblemon.species.palij.name: Palij
cobblemon.species.palij.desc: PALIJ's curiously-shaped feathers allow it to create friction in the air as it flaps its wings. Sparks trail off of its feathers when it flies.
cobblemon.species.pajay.name: Pajay
cobblemon.species.pajay.desc: Every year, massive flocks of PAHAR and PALIJ migrate from Tandor to the Sevii Islands. A PAJAY leads each one.
cobblemon.species.baashaun.name: Baashaun
cobblemon.species.baashaun.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.baaschaf.name: Baaschaf
cobblemon.species.baaschaf.desc: Now that it is able to stand on two legs, it can use more kicking and punching attacks. It loves to fight dirty and use underhanded tactics. Unlike its previous evolution, however, it is rather playful.
cobblemon.species.baariette.name: Baariette
cobblemon.species.baariette.desc: A master at fighting dirty, BAARIETTE like to ensure that their foes can never oppose them again.
cobblemon.species.tricwe.name: Tricwe
cobblemon.species.tricwe.desc: Related to SMORE and SPONEE, TRICWE is very hyperactive and loves nothing better than sneaking up behind trainers and scaring them.
cobblemon.species.harylect.name: Harylect
cobblemon.species.harylect.desc: HARYLECT gather near sources of electricity and therefore are drawn to human dwellings and power plants. They can plug their antennae into a wall socket to recharge.
cobblemon.species.costraw.name: Costraw
cobblemon.species.costraw.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.trawpint.name: Trawpint
cobblemon.species.trawpint.desc: It loves to fight dirty, and uses dark-type attacks to destroy its foes. They are found in gangs of 20 or more. Its wool is prized as a fiber for extra-rugged clothing. However, it is much harder to raise than its docile cousin Mareep.
cobblemon.species.modrille.name: Modrille
cobblemon.species.modrille.desc: MODRILLE hate being confined within any space and will always drill their way out of it. Trainers are advised to keep spare Pokeballs on hand.
cobblemon.species.drilgann.name: Drilgann
cobblemon.species.drilgann.desc: Often used as beasts of burden, a Drilgann can tunnel many miles in a single day without getting tired. Their claws can be spun separately to drill with precision.
cobblemon.species.cocaran.name: Cocaran
cobblemon.species.cocaran.desc: When Cocaran retracts its eyes and legs, it is almost indistinguishable from a coconut. Their shells are very buoyant, so they float in water.
cobblemon.species.cararalm.name: Cararalm
cobblemon.species.cararalm.desc: Unlike their preevolutions, Cararalm cannot swim, so they stay on land. The height of their palm tree indicates how close they are to evolving.
cobblemon.species.cocancer.name: Cocancer
cobblemon.species.cocancer.desc: Cocancer bury themselves in the sand and are indistinguishable from ordinary palm trees. When prey walks by, they leap out and crush it with massive claws.
cobblemon.species.corsoreef.name: Corsoreef
cobblemon.species.corsoreef.desc: Their bodies are a host to a wide variety of other species. In return for a home, they give Corsoreef the ability to inflict status effects on its foes.
cobblemon.species.tubjaw.name: Tubjaw
cobblemon.species.tubjaw.desc: TUBJAW are able to unhinge their jaws in order to swallow prey larger than their head. Their teeth are sharper than razors.
cobblemon.species.tubareel.name: Tubareel
cobblemon.species.tubareel.desc: A fierce, deep-sea hunter, this Mon is particularly vengeful towards humankind and will tear up fishing nets.
cobblemon.species.cassnail.name: Cassnail
cobblemon.species.cassnail.desc: It dissolves minerals in sand and uses them to form a hard carapace on its back. It lives in coastal regions.
cobblemon.species.sableau.name: Sableau
cobblemon.species.sableau.desc: The colorful patterns on its shell makes them desirable to collectors. Their cast-off shells are often used in jewelry.
cobblemon.species.escartress.name: Escartress
cobblemon.species.escartress.desc: Its shell has hardened into a nearly unbreakable fortress. It shoots water from the turrets on its back.
cobblemon.species.nupin.name: Nupin
cobblemon.species.nupin.desc: Nupin is the largest single-celled organism on the planet. It obtains energy from photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.gellin.name: Gellin
cobblemon.species.gellin.desc: Nupin is the largest single-celled organism on the planet. It obtains energy from photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.barand.name: Barand
cobblemon.species.barand.desc: The appendage at the end of its tail is its primary form of attack, and it is able to deftly manipulate objects with it as if it were a hand.
cobblemon.species.glaslug.name: Glaslug
cobblemon.species.glaslug.desc: A Mon highly sensitive to the changes in seasons, Glaslug come and go with the warm undersea currents.
cobblemon.species.glavinug.name: Glavinug
cobblemon.species.glavinug.desc: GLAVINUG are rare but not hard to trace, due to the ice crystals they leave behind when they swim.
cobblemon.species.s51.name: S51
cobblemon.species.s51.desc: A peculiar life-form that hovers above the ground with a mysterious force. Rumors say they came from outer space.
cobblemon.species.s51a.name: S51-A
cobblemon.species.s51a.desc: Some people suspect that S51-A, Beeheyem, and Clefable are conspiring to invade the planet. No one is safe.
cobblemon.species.paraudio.name: Paraudio
cobblemon.species.paraudio.desc: It is highly sensitive to sound and can perfectly replicate any sound it hears, even human speech. It loves to hear fast, rhythmic music.
cobblemon.species.avalossianparaudio.des: It is highly sensitive to sound and can perfectly replicate any sound it hears, even human speech. It loves to hear fast, rhythmic music.
cobblemon.species.paraboom.name: Paraboom
cobblemon.species.paraboom.desc: It uses massive sonic booms to attack from a distance. An encounter with one will leave your ears ringing for days.
cobblemon.species.chimical.name: Chimical
cobblemon.species.chimical.desc: A Mon said to be the product of genetic testing. The white spot on its back is its weak point.
cobblemon.species.chimaconda.name: Chimaconda
cobblemon.species.chimaconda.desc: Normally passive unless provoked, Chimaconda inject their prey with a paralytic venom and then wrap it in their tails, squeezing the life out.
cobblemon.species.tikiki.name: Tikiki
cobblemon.species.tikiki.desc: It hides its true face behind a wooden mask. They will often convene in order to dance elaborate dances.
cobblemon.species.frikitiki.name: Frikitiki
cobblemon.species.frikitiki.desc: It produces deep bellows and thumps from within its mask that can be heard for miles. It can summon all the Tikiki in an area and together they make music by drumming on their masks.
cobblemon.species.unymph.name: Unymph
cobblemon.species.unymph.desc: They inhabit mucky bogs and swamps. Although they are somewhat slow and weak in battle, they can extend their jaws rapidly to deliver a powerful blow.
cobblemon.species.harptera.name: Harptera
cobblemon.species.harptera.desc: A swift and fierce hunter. They can vibrate their wings at supersonic speeds in flight. They use their harpoon-shaped tails to skewer prey.
cobblemon.species.chicoatl.name: Chicoatl
cobblemon.species.chicoatl.desc: Chicoatl are shy, but can be affectionate. They are said to be related to both dragon and bird Mon.
cobblemon.species.quetzoral.name: Quetzoral
cobblemon.species.quetzoral.desc: Quetzoral often wrap themselves around long branches of trees and fall asleep. They dine on nectar from flowers.
cobblemon.species.coatlith.name: Coatlith
cobblemon.species.coatlith.desc: Early natives of Baykal worshipped Coatlith as gods. They are fiercely devoted to protecting nature, and will attack anyone who defiles it.
cobblemon.species.tracton.name: Tracton
cobblemon.species.tracton.desc: A mechanical dragon Mon that is often used to help construction workers. Its jaws can crumple steel with ease.
cobblemon.species.snopach.name: Snopach
cobblemon.species.snopach.desc: A Mon that roamed the tundra thousands of years ago. They used their small tusks to dig up berries and roots under the ice.
cobblemon.species.dermafrost.name: Dermafrost
cobblemon.species.dermafrost.desc: It charges forward with the unstoppable force of a glacier, and its punch can shatter solid rock. They were hunted to extinction by early humans.
cobblemon.species.slothohm.name: Slothohm
cobblemon.species.slothohm.desc: A very lazy Mon that lived thousands of years ago. They would climb to the top of trees and wait to be struck by lightning.
cobblemon.species.theriamp.name: Theriamp
cobblemon.species.theriamp.desc: A very lazy Mon that lived thousands of years ago. They would climb to the top of trees and wait to be struck by lightning.
cobblemon.species.titanice.name: Titanice
cobblemon.species.frynai.name: Frynai
cobblemon.species.frynai.desc: A favored Mon of ninja clans. They propel themselves backwards through the water to attack with their sharp tails.
cobblemon.species.saidine.name: Saidine
cobblemon.species.saidine.desc: They are the bane of many fishermen as their bladed tails often cut fishing lines. They can change direction rapidly in the water.
cobblemon.species.daikatuna.name: Daikatuna
cobblemon.species.daikatuna.desc: It often wields Frynai or Saidine as weapons. The sword on its head is made from steel folded 10,000 times.
cobblemon.species.miasmedic.name: Miasmedic
cobblemon.species.miasmedic.desc: It has the ability to both cause and cure disease. Using its claws, it injects pathogens into its foes.
cobblemon.species.jackdeary.name: Jackdeary
cobblemon.species.jackdeary.desc: It is related to BUNEARY, but far more crafty. It conceals itself using trickery, so many people don't believe it exists.
cobblemon.species.winotinger.name: Winotinger
cobblemon.species.winotinger.desc: It combines illusion and trickery with physical strength. Because it only reveals itself to drunk people, it was considered an imaginary Mon until very recently.
cobblemon.species.duplicat.name: Duplicat
cobblemon.species.duplicat.desc: This Mon has the ability to create and identical copy of itself or its opponent. These copies only last a few minutes before fading away.
cobblemon.species.nucleon.name: Nucleon
cobblemon.species.nucleon.desc: One of the only non-feral nuclear Mon. It's theorized that its bond with its trainer when it was an Eevee allows it to stay in control.
cobblemon.species.ratsy.name: Ratsy
cobblemon.species.ratsy.desc: They use the paint-like substance on their tails to mark their territory. They are considered pests as they will paint over brand new buildings.
cobblemon.species.raffiti.name: Raffiti
cobblemon.species.raffiti.desc: They spray paint to create signs that only Raffiti can understand. Their knowledge of color theory has led some to consider them artists on par with humans.
cobblemon.species.gargryph.name: Gargryph
cobblemon.species.gargryph.desc: They spend most of their time standing so still they are often mistaken for statues. They perch on the rooftops of Venisi, guarding it from outside attackers.
cobblemon.species.masking.name: Masking
cobblemon.species.masking.desc: It is capable of disguising itself as anything it likes. Although it appears to be a bird Mon, this is just an illusion. No one has seen its true form.
cobblemon.species.dramsama.name: Dramsama
cobblemon.species.dramsama.desc: A sinister and vengeful Mon, it puts its foes into an eternal sleep and steals their souls to add to its tail.
cobblemon.species.antarki.name: Antarki
cobblemon.species.antarki.desc: Said to be the ghost of a Mon that died before its time. It guides lost souls into the afterlife using the light of its small star.
cobblemon.species.chupacho.name: Chupacho
cobblemon.species.chupacho.desc: It comes out at night to suck the blood from sleeping prey. Its needles contain a numbing toxin that can incapacitate an enemy in minutes.
cobblemon.species.luchabra.name: Luchabra
cobblemon.species.luchabra.desc: It comes out at night to suck the blood from sleeping prey. Its needles contain a numbing toxin that can incapacitate an enemy in minutes.
cobblemon.species.linkite.name: Linkite
cobblemon.species.linkite.desc: The spirit of a Mon that died inside its Pokeball. It has forgotten its original appearance so it takes the form of a Substitute decoy.
cobblemon.species.chainite.name: Chainite
cobblemon.species.chainite.desc: A malicious and dangerous Mon, it seeks revenge against the trainer who abandoned it. Its shackles were reinforced in order to keep its violence in check.
cobblemon.species.pufluff.name: Pufluff
cobblemon.species.pufluff.desc: It constantly wraps itself in its long tail to protect it from the cold. Despite this, it always seems to shiver as if it is freezing.
cobblemon.species.alpico.name: Alpico
cobblemon.species.alpico.desc: Its two tails are coated with a waxy material that allows it to glide over snow and ice. They are often seen hurtling down mountains at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.anderind.name: Anderind
cobblemon.species.anderind.desc: Its eyes are covered by a shield that protects it from blowing snow and ice. The one that can perform the wildest flips and tricks is deemed the leader.
cobblemon.species.colarva.name: Colarva
cobblemon.species.colarva.desc: The older they get, the sharper the ice spikes on their back become. Stepping on one buried under the snow is an unpleasant experience.
cobblemon.species.frosulo.name: Frosulo
cobblemon.species.frosulo.desc: It encases itself in a hard shell of unmelting ice and hangs upside-down from the ceilings of Lanthanite Cave, awaiting evolution.
cobblemon.species.frosthra.name: Frosthra
cobblemon.species.frosthra.desc: They leave a shimmering trail of ice crystals behind them as they fly. They are prized in many regions for their rarity and beauty.
cobblemon.species.fafurr.name: Fafurr
cobblemon.species.fafurr.desc: This Mon's shaggy coat keeps it warm in freezing weather. They are sought after by hunters for their silky fur.
cobblemon.species.fafninter.name: Fafninter
cobblemon.species.fafninter.desc: A gentle guardian of the mountains, this Mon will often escort lost travelers and Mon to safety by giving them a ride on its back.
cobblemon.species.shrimputy.name: Shrimputy
cobblemon.species.shrimputy.desc: It is able to fire a barrage of super-heated blasts from its cannon. Despite its small size, it is a very capable predator.
cobblemon.species.krilvolver.name: Krilvolver
cobblemon.species.krilvolver.desc: Called 'the ranger of the sea'. Its reaction times are nigh-instantaneous and its aim with its pistol is excellent due to its highly advanced eyesight.
cobblemon.species.lavent.name: Lavent
cobblemon.species.lavent.desc: It lives within igneous crevasses at the bottom of the sea and absorbs geothermal energy. When prey comes close, it spits out scalding hot water.
cobblemon.species.swabone.name: Swabone
cobblemon.species.swabone.desc: A favorite Mon of pirates. The bandanna it wears indicates which ship's crew it belongs to. It craves treasure and will hoard any gold and jewels it finds.
cobblemon.species.skelerogue.name: Skelerogue
cobblemon.species.skelerogue.desc: It requires seemingly no sustenance such as food or air. Although it can't swim, it will walk across the bottom of the sea until it makes it to shore.
cobblemon.species.navighast.name: Navighast
cobblemon.species.navighast.desc: Said to be the spirit of a mad pirate captain reincarnated as a Mon. Its spectral flames are icy cold to the touch.
cobblemon.species.stenowatt.name: Stenowatt
cobblemon.species.stenowatt.desc: It flaps its wings to generate electricity, which it stores in its tail. It channels the stored energy into its legs to run faster.
cobblemon.species.jungore.name: Jungore
cobblemon.species.jungore.desc: Its hide is studded with pieces of solid gold. Because of how valuable this Mon is on the black market, its population dwindled until it became extinct in the wild.
cobblemon.species.majungold.name: Majungold
cobblemon.species.majungold.desc: Its enormously heavy arms are made of solid gold. This Mon has developed extraordinarily strong muscles to hold them up.
cobblemon.species.hagoop.name: Hagoop
cobblemon.species.hagoop.desc: Its body exudes a sticky slime that protects its soft flesh. It traps prey in the slime and delivers a lightning shock through its whiskers.
cobblemon.species.haagross.name: Haagross
cobblemon.species.haagross.desc: The slime covering its body is toxic and corrosive. Between that and its electric bite, it has no known predators. They proliferate in contaminated areas.
cobblemon.species.xenomite.name: Xenomite
cobblemon.species.xenomite.desc: A species that spontaneously appeared in irradiated zones. It is thought to have hatched from a corrupt egg.
cobblemon.species.xenogen.name: Xenogen
cobblemon.species.xenogen.desc: A bizarre life form which thrives in irradiated locations. It is a parasitic creature that latches on to any prey and absorb its life force.
cobblemon.species.xenoqueen.name: Xenoqueen
cobblemon.species.xenoqueen.desc: It is known to spit radioactive acid capable of melting through steel. It is a ruthless predator that will attack any living creature, human or Mon.
cobblemon.species.hazma.name: Hazma
cobblemon.species.hazma.desc: They Appear in the afterMath of nuclear fallOut. They sponGe Up radiation and can rinSe an irradiated area over time.
cobblemon.species.geigeroach.name: Geigeroach
cobblemon.species.geigeroach.desc: Its simple body structure allows it survive intense levels of radiation. They multiply rapidly and will eat anything in sight.
cobblemon.species.minicorn.name: Minicorn
cobblemon.species.minicorn.desc: Its small stature, gentle demeanor and delicate features make it beloved by young children. A popular line of toys is based on it.
cobblemon.species.kiricorn.name: Kiricorn
cobblemon.species.kiricorn.desc: The hair in its mane is made of gossamer-thin threads and is impossibly soft. It will only allow those it trusts to touch it.
cobblemon.species.oblivicorn.name: Oblivicorn
cobblemon.species.oblivicorn.desc: Its powers are strongest at night when the moon is not visible. Only a veteran trainer can tame one well enough to ride it.
cobblemon.species.luxi.name: Luxi
cobblemon.species.luxi.desc: Simply being around a Luxi is said to increase one's fortune. Ceramic statues of them are good luck charms.
cobblemon.species.luxor.name: Luxor
cobblemon.species.luxor.desc: It polishes its jade tail until it glimmers with lustrous sheen. A clipping of this Mon's hair is said to bring good luck for 30 days.
cobblemon.species.luxelong.name: Luxelong
cobblemon.species.luxelong.desc: A Mon so rare and gentle, simply seeing one is said to bless someone with good fortune for a whole year.
cobblemon.species.praseopunk.name: Praseopunk
cobblemon.species.praseopunk.desc: A mysterious life-form that emerged one day out of a computer. When it unites with its twin, its powers multiply in strength.
cobblemon.species.neopunk.name: Neopunk
cobblemon.species.neopunk.desc: A highly intelligent Mon capable of traveling through cyberspace. Found in pairs alongside its twin, Praseopunk.
cobblemon.species.sheebit.name: Sheebit
cobblemon.species.sheebit.desc: These Mon live in packs in mountainous regions. They will often headbutt each other to improve their strength.
cobblemon.species.terrabbit.name: Terrabbit
cobblemon.species.terrabbit.desc: It uses its large, flexible tails to balance itself while it deals a series of rapid kicks and punches to its opponent.
cobblemon.species.laissure.name: Laissure
cobblemon.species.laissure.desc: A mighty Mon that is spoken of in legends. It causes earthquakes by pounding the ground with its massive tails.
cobblemon.species.volchik.name: Volchik
cobblemon.species.volchik.desc: They gather together during thunderstorms. Their chirping sounds like static electricity.
cobblemon.species.voltasu.name: Voltasu
cobblemon.species.voltasu.desc: It perches on rocky outcropping and looks at the sky for many hours. They can fortell changes in the weather.
cobblemon.species.yatagaryu.name: Yatagaryu
cobblemon.species.yatagaryu.desc: A fearsome Mon told about in legends. It has the power to summon thunderstorms at will.
cobblemon.species.devimp.name: Devimp
cobblemon.species.devimp.desc: A Mon that is said to come from a separate plane of existence. It is very curious about the world around it and often gets into mischief as a result.
cobblemon.species.fallengel.name: Fallengel
cobblemon.species.fallengel.desc: It acts like a soldier, obeying orders without hesitation. It seems to have no moral compass and will do whatever its master commands.
cobblemon.species.beliaddon.name: Beliaddon
cobblemon.species.beliaddon.desc: Its kind came out of a fiery chasm which contained an otherworldly portal. A furnace hotter than the sun burns within its chest. If it burns you, the pain will never fade.
cobblemon.species.seikamater.name: Seikamater
cobblemon.species.seikamater.desc: Its belly is filled with super hot lava that it sprays at its opponent through the nozzle on its abdomen. Its aim is precise.
cobblemon.species.garlikid.name: Garlikid
cobblemon.species.garlikid.desc: Garlikid believes itself to be a savior of all Monkind. It will pick fights with anyone it considers villainous.
cobblemon.species.baitatao.name: Baitatao
cobblemon.species.baitatao.desc: Called the Boiling Wrath. Heat from its scales cause the water around it to boil. It attacks ships, melting the hull on contact.
cobblemon.species.leviathao.name: Leviathao
cobblemon.species.leviathao.desc: Called the Unstoppable Spear. The ice horn on its head can easily penetrate solid steel. It battles Baitatao and Krakanao for dominance over the sea.
cobblemon.species.krakanao.name: Krakanao
cobblemon.species.krakanao.desc: Called the Inescapable Malestrom. It causes massive whirlpools that drag everything - ships, Mon and people alike - into its bottomless maw.
cobblemon.species.lanthan.name: Lanthan
cobblemon.species.lanthan.desc: Legends say that it helped form part of the Tandor region. Along with its brothers Actan and Heatran, it placed metallic ores in the planet's crust.
cobblemon.species.actan.name: Actan
cobblemon.species.actan.desc: One of the Legendary Mon that formed the Tandor Region. It taught humans about the use of radioactive metals.
cobblemon.species.urayne.name: Urayne
cobblemon.species.urayne.desc: An artificial Mon created to be a source of unlimited energy. The more radioactive fuel it consumes, the greater its power becomes. At max potential, it can split atoms.
cobblemon.species.betaurayne.name: Urayne
cobblemon.species.betaurayne.desc: An artificial Mon created to be a source of unlimited energy. The more radioactive fuel it consumes, the greater its power becomes. At max potential, it can split atoms.
cobblemon.species.aotius.name: Aotius
cobblemon.species.aotius.desc: W h i t e l i g h t s h i n e s
cobblemon.species.mutios.name: Mutios
cobblemon.species.mutios.desc: B l a c k s h a d e p r o t e c t s
cobblemon.species.zephy.name: Zephy
cobblemon.species.zephy.desc: A mysterious Mon that appears to be a cross between Plusle and Articuno. In legends, it visited artists and gave them ideas for their next masterpiece.
cobblemon.species.mozz.name: Mozz
cobblemon.species.mozz.desc: It munches on leaves to absorb their photosynthetic properties. Its mossy coat allows it to camouflage among the treetops.
cobblemon.species.mosseer.name: Mosseer
cobblemon.species.mosseer.desc: Its PSI powers allow it a glimpse into the futures of those around it. It shares this knowledge in vague psychic visions and dreams.
cobblemon.species.daemoth.name: Daemoth
cobblemon.species.daemoth.desc: It's said that the eyes on DAEMOTH's wings can see many different futures. It hides from people to protect them from the fate it foresees.
cobblemon.species.chiklit.name: Chiklit
cobblemon.species.chiklit.desc: A poor flyer, it glides and hops from branch to branch to traverse the forests where it lives. It uses tiny bursts of fire to prey on smaller bug-type Pokemon and fend off attackers.
cobblemon.species.burnychus.name: Burnychus
cobblemon.species.burnychus.desc: A primal bird Pokemon that fights fiercely with barbed talons and fire breath. They are highly protective of their young.
cobblemon.species.pyropteryx.name: Pyropteryx
cobblemon.species.pyropteryx.desc: Descended from a common ancestor of bird and dinosaur Pokemon. Its developed feathers allow it to glide, leaving scorching flames in its wake.
cobblemon.species.findolf.name: Findolf
cobblemon.species.findolf.desc: A resilient Pokemon that thrives on land as well as it does in the water. To defend itself, it sprays a forceful water jet from the blowhole on its head.
cobblemon.species.delfender.name: Delfender
cobblemon.species.delfender.desc: The tanks on its shoulders can store water as well as air. This allows it to navigate many environments. It has a helpful and brave personality.
cobblemon.species.hydrocean.name: Hydrocean
cobblemon.species.hydrocean.desc: They are adept at putting out fires and conducting search-and-rescue operations. Its palms produce freezing rays that can douse a burning building.
cobblemon.species.minyan.name: Minyan
cobblemon.species.minyan.desc: Called the 'tiny master of evil', it tries to cause discord but often ends up messing up and fleeing in embarrassment.
cobblemon.species.vilucard.name: Vilucard
cobblemon.species.vilucard.desc: It constantly plots dastardly schemes to spread chaos and fear. However, its plans are always foiled by Herolune.
cobblemon.species.lunapup.name: Lunapup
cobblemon.species.lunapup.desc: Although small, it is very brave. it won't hesitate to protect weaker pokemon in danger. they can often be heard howling at the moon.
cobblemon.species.herolune.name: Herolune
cobblemon.species.herolune.desc: t rises with the moon to do battle with its sworn nemesis, Vilucard. it has a strong sense of justice and will protect those who cannot defend themselves.
cobblemon.species.selkid.name: Selkid
cobblemon.species.selkid.desc: They gather together on rocky shoals and sing together in harmony. Their human-like voices can be misleading because they sound like a child.
cobblemon.species.syrentide.name: Syrentide
cobblemon.species.syrentide.desc: Their song is hypnotic, and all who hear it are immobilized. Legends tell of shipwrecks that were caused by sailors who were captivated by their song.
cobblemon.species.cavamie.name: Cavamie
cobblemon.species.cavamie.desc: A cheerful, mild-natured Pokemon that is agreeable and affectionate to all. Their friendly attitude makes them popular as family pets.
cobblemon.species.capymigo.name: Capymigo
cobblemon.species.capymigo.desc: It has a tranquil nature and cannot be bothered by anything, even the most persistent annoyance. Just being near it is said to have a calming effect.
cobblemon.species.humborb.name: Humborb
cobblemon.species.humborb.desc: It harvests nectar all day, which its belly converts into a high-powered fuel. If one is low on energy, others will share their nectar reserves.
cobblemon.species.navibri.name: Navibri
cobblemon.species.navibri.desc: It has a flawless sense of direction, and can memorize migratory routes across hundreds of miles. They act as scouts for the flock.
cobblemon.species.turbolibri.name: Turbolibri
cobblemon.species.turbolibri.desc: It has a flawless sense of direction, and can memorize migratory routes across hundreds of miles. They act as scouts for the flock.
cobblemon.species.squrmy.name: Squrmy
cobblemon.species.squrmy.desc: Underestimated by many, this little worm dreams of greatness. However, its body is soft and vulnerable, so it hides underground most of the time.
cobblemon.species.durtwurm.name: Durtwurm
cobblemon.species.durtwurm.desc: It secretes a sticky substance that it uses to attach clods of dirt to its body as protection. It rolls its body like a wheel to get around quickly.
cobblemon.species.wurmiterra.name: Wurmiterra
cobblemon.species.wurmiterra.desc: It secretes a sticky substance that it uses to attach clods of dirt to its body as protection. It rolls its body like a wheel to get around quickly.
cobblemon.species.tanupy.name: Tanupy
cobblemon.species.tanupy.desc: TANUPY have a keen sense of smell, and use it to locate food. They have been known to get into mischief stealing food from traveling Trainers.
cobblemon.species.tanscure.name: Tanscure
cobblemon.species.tanscure.desc: TANSCURE are sharp-eyed hunters known for traveling in packs. When raised carefully, they are loyal, but wild ones can be dangerous with their sharp fangs.
cobblemon.species.sluchuu.name: Sluchuu
cobblemon.species.sluchuu.desc: Although its appearance resembles PIKACHU, it is in fact a mollusk Pokemon more closely related to SHELLOS and GOOMY. It prefers a solitary lifestyle, and will not hesitate to shock those that disturb it.
cobblemon.species.gullitt.name: Gullitt
cobblemon.species.gullitt.desc: GULLITT will obsessively seek out and consume garbage, even when it has healthier options. Due to its toxic diet, no predators will touch it.
cobblemon.species.garbagull.name: Garbagull
cobblemon.species.garbagull.desc: It gluts itself on garbage until it grows too heavy to fly. It is one of the only known species that preys upon TRUBBISH and GARBODOR.
cobblemon.species.nidorimewintercoat.des: By migrating from colder regions to more temperate regions, this Mon can find better food and shelter to prepare for evolution.
cobblemon.species.nidorimesummercoat.des: From its usual arid habitat, it traverses long distances to temperate regions in order to find a more hospitable environment to evolve.
cobblemon.species.nidoregina.name: Nidoregina
cobblemon.species.nidoregina.desc: It dwells in palaces of snow, its striking white coat gleaming even brighter than its surroundings. Its greatest rival is NIDOREGUS.
cobblemon.species.nidoregus.name: Nidoregus
cobblemon.species.nidoregus.desc: Those with the largest horns lead armies of NIDORIME. It clashes with NIDOREGINA on the borders between hot and cold regions.
cobblemon.species.roadillo.name: Roadillo
cobblemon.species.roadillo.desc: It travels great distances by rolling its body into a wheel-like shape. Its durable outer shell allows it to roll over rough, uneven surfaces with ease.
cobblemon.species.armarauder.name: Armarauder
cobblemon.species.armarauder.desc: Aggressively territorial, they claim large stretches of highway as their turf. Known to travel in gangs, they will even run large trucks off the road.
cobblemon.species.pouchelet.name: Pouchelet
cobblemon.species.pouchelet.desc: Lately, more and more of them have made cities their home. It has the unfortunate habit of playing dead, even in the middle of the road.
cobblemon.species.grimmposs.name: Grimmposs
cobblemon.species.grimmposs.desc: Ever the survivalist, some departed POUCHELET rise as ghost Pokemon. Having lost its fear of collisions, it floats through everything with glee.
cobblemon.species.salmini.name: Salmini
cobblemon.species.salmini.desc: When it finds things on the riverbed, it tends to carry them around in its mouth. Some think its preferences can help predict how it evolves.
cobblemon.species.salmosaultfreshwater.d: SALMINI that mature in fresh water evolve into this form. It's fierce and territorial, and loves throwing stones as much as collecting them.
cobblemon.species.salmosaultsaltwater.de: SALMINI that mature in salty water evolve into this form. It carries a shell that it plays like a trumpet. Getting interrupted infuriates it.
cobblemon.species.taroot.name: Taroot
cobblemon.species.taroot.desc: It buries itself in the ground to avoid being eaten, but its leaf always sticks out. It is highly nutritious and targeted by many for food.
cobblemon.species.daikongus.name: Daikongus
cobblemon.species.daikongus.desc: It uses its hefty body to crush opponents. It is so heavy that its stomp attacks create tremors in the ground, scaring off predators to TAROOT.
cobblemon.species.magief.name: Magief
cobblemon.species.magief.desc: They are perceptive Pokemon able to see shiny objects from several miles away. They are known to horde treasures for the leaders of their flock.
cobblemon.species.corsuave.name: Corsuave
cobblemon.species.corsuave.desc: CORSUAVE are intelligent Pokemon employing cunning strategies to defeat enemies or evade threats. This nature makes them difficult to work with.
cobblemon.species.zorotsune.name: Zorotsune
cobblemon.species.zorotsune.desc: Illusory beings constantly waft from the smoke that billows from this Mon's body. When its tricks get exposed, it slinks away into its pipe.
cobblemon.species.nursa.name: Nursa
cobblemon.species.nursa.desc: The mild shocks it delivers through its paw pads have a healing effect. It can use slightly stronger shocks to revive fainted Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.cuspide.name: Cuspide
cobblemon.species.cuspide.desc: Scientists have found that its exoskeleton has a similar composition to tooth enamel. For good health, it should be brushed twice daily.
cobblemon.species.tarandible.name: Tarandible
cobblemon.species.tarandible.desc: It lies still during the day, disguised as a Pokemon's skull. As it prowls at night, it makes an eerie noise that sounds like rattling bones.
cobblemon.species.gunafix.name: Gunafix
cobblemon.species.gunafix.desc: In the wild, it picks apart rocks deep underground to feed on rare ores. It has adapted to urban environments by taking refuge in factories.
cobblemon.species.fixinit.name: Fixinit
cobblemon.species.fixinit.desc: When properly trained, it can easily troubleshoot machinery. However, it loves to take things apart, so it can't be left unsupervised.
cobblemon.species.comite.name: Comite
cobblemon.species.comite.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.cometeor.name: Cometeor
cobblemon.species.cometeor.desc: It levitates in the air with powerful psychic energy. The crystals on its body flash many colors when it meets another of its kind.
cobblemon.species.astronite.name: Astronite
cobblemon.species.astronite.desc: It levitates in the air with powerful psychic energy. The crystals on its body flash many colors when it meets another of its kind.
cobblemon.species.spelotl.name: Spelotl
cobblemon.species.spelotl.desc: A bubble serves as a lens to amplify its psychic powers, letting it perceive the pitch-dark caves it lives in with perfect clarity.
cobblemon.species.salamancer.name: Salamancer
cobblemon.species.salamancer.desc: By focusing its power through a stalactite, SALAMANCER can manipulate water. It blocks passage into its lair by putting up watery barriers.
cobblemon.species.ledlite.name: Ledlite
cobblemon.species.ledlite.desc: When it draws in electric current through its tail, its head starts glowing. It can stay lit for a whole month on an hour's worth of charge.
cobblemon.species.insulatex.name: Insulatex
cobblemon.species.insulatex.desc: Its entire body is a battery that can store and discharge power at 99% efficiency. If it overcharges, it enters a wild frenzy.
cobblemon.species.negawatt.name: Negawatt
cobblemon.species.negawatt.desc: Its ruptured head constantly leaks power, requiring it to consume large amounts of electricity. It causes blackouts by attacking power lines.
cobblemon.species.sputya.name: Sputya
cobblemon.species.sputya.desc: It was created to assist in space exploration. Instead of rocket fuel, it converts sunlight into psychic energy for propulsion.
cobblemon.species.flager.name: Flager
cobblemon.species.flager.desc: A playful and somewhat feisty species that can often be a challenge for inexperienced trainers due to how energetic they are. FLAGER use their large paws to bat at any small moving object, including their own burning tails.
cobblemon.species.inflagetah.name: Inflagetah
cobblemon.species.inflagetah.desc: Its slim body is streamlined to be as aerodynamic as possible. It moves faster than the eye can follow, leaving a blazing trail behind.
cobblemon.species.jerbolta.name: Jerbolta
cobblemon.species.jerbolta.desc: The spines on its back stand rigid when charged with electricity. It is popular with children and young trainers due to its gentle demeanor.
cobblemon.species.karmilarie.name: Karmilarie
cobblemon.species.karmilarie.desc: When hunting, it generates inaudible but highly destructive sound waves. If it can't feed on life energy, it subsists on electricity.
cobblemon.species.cactana.name: Cactana
cobblemon.species.cactana.desc: It burrows into the ground to avoid the sun, its tail peeking out so it can still photosynthesize. It looks just like a regular cactus this way.
cobblemon.species.emberge.name: Emberge
cobblemon.species.emberge.desc: This Pokemon is born at sites of calamitous fires. Though still hot to the touch, its flames only burn at 200 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.aerapin.name: Aerapin
cobblemon.species.aerapin.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.albashell.name: Albashell
cobblemon.species.albashell.desc: It has a calm demeanor and enjoys ferrying passengers on its back. They are commonly employed as an airborne taxi service throughout Altera.
cobblemon.species.grizzlet.name: Grizzlet
cobblemon.species.grizzlet.desc: It can retract its legs into its body and appear to be an ordinary rock. Stories say they arrived on an asteroid hundreds of years ago.
cobblemon.species.geogriff.name: Geogriff
cobblemon.species.geogriff.desc: When the tiny crystals that continuously grow from beneath its fur shatter, it enters a state of hibernation, and emerges months later with a sharper set.
cobblemon.species.diastryx.name: Diastryx
cobblemon.species.diastryx.desc: A powerful apex predator. It claims entire mountains as its territory, gliding high above and using its keen eyesight to detect any intruders or threats.
cobblemon.species.shelliphant.name: Shelliphant
cobblemon.species.shelliphant.desc: This pokemon uses its long, flexible trunk to forage for nuts and berries on the ground and in small bushes. This pokemon has a certain fondness for peanuts and will become extra friendly when gifted one as a treat.
cobblemon.species.tusknut.name: Tusknut
cobblemon.species.pachipeanut.name: Pachipeanut
cobblemon.species.peppercoon.name: Peppercoon
cobblemon.species.peppercoon.desc: he source of Peppercoon's firey attacks come from its bushy tail, which glows a bright amber as it heats up. Trainers often have a hard time keeping a Peppercoons as they are always running off to explore their surroundings.
cobblemon.species.krakoon.name: Krakoon
cobblemon.species.coonkaboom.name: Coonkaboom
cobblemon.species.anemini.name: Anemini
cobblemon.species.anemini.desc: Anemini are always full of energy, much to the dismay of people and pokemon around it. The tips of the tendrils above their heads cause a mild irritation to the touch.
cobblemon.species.juggljelly.name: Juggljelly
cobblemon.species.comictini.name: Comictini
cobblemon.species.kernelkit.name: Kernelkit
cobblemon.species.kernelkit.desc: When this pokemon is threatened, it can charge up power in the kernel on the end of its tail to create a loud popping sound. Contact with a Kernelkit's tail may produce a small, static shock.
cobblemon.species.maizent.name: Maizent
cobblemon.species.bigpop.name: Bigpop
cobblemon.species.silkrinkle.name: Silkrinkle
cobblemon.species.snugbug.name: Snugbug
cobblemon.species.clothmoff.name: Clothmoff
cobblemon.species.mothmother.name: Mothmother
cobblemon.species.poachick.name: Poachick
cobblemon.species.poachick.desc: Poachicks are often predated on by various other species of pokemon, putting guardian Omeledoodles and trainers on high alert when caring for them.
cobblemon.species.scrambird.name: Scrambird
cobblemon.species.scrambird.desc: This pokemon is cloaked in a warm, pleasant aroma that often attracts the attention of small bug-type pokemon, making finding food for Scrambirds relatively easy.
cobblemon.species.omeledoodle.name: Omeledoodle
cobblemon.species.omeledoodle.desc: The call of this pokemon can awake a pokemon from even the deepest of slumbers. For this reason, farmers keep this pokemon around to make sure they wake up on time.
cobblemon.species.shaginny.name: Shaginny
cobblemon.species.shaginny.desc: The tangled, upkept formation of their fur makes Shaginnies exceedingly hard to groom. These pokemon are often prone to skin problems because of their inability to access the skin underneath their hair.
cobblemon.species.cavicurl.name: Cavicurl
cobblemon.species.waddlepod.name: Waddlepod
cobblemon.species.platypod.name: Platypod
cobblemon.species.rashie.name: Rashie
cobblemon.species.rashie.desc: The fully developed tusks of Rashies make their playfighting incredibly dangerous. Rashies who bond at birth become lifelong hunting partners, never leaving one another's side.
cobblemon.species.gnashrasher.name: Gnashrasher
cobblemon.species.gnashrasher.desc: The heat that eminates from this pokemon's bright orange markings can be altered, allowing them to burn opponents by ramming into them when competing for mates or provide their young with a warm place to sleep during colder months.
cobblemon.species.skuhboom.name: Skuhboom
cobblemon.species.skuhboom.desc: Skuhbooms store lethal amounts of stinky chemicals in their tails. When threatened, This pokemon sprays those chemicals at its foes.
cobblemon.species.poshlug.name: Poshlug
cobblemon.species.poshlime.name: Poshlime
cobblemon.species.plumplete.name: Plumplete
cobblemon.species.lassolid.name: Lassolid
cobblemon.species.burrogue.name: Burrogue
cobblemon.species.leapfrogs.name: Leapfrogs
cobblemon.species.leapfrogs.desc: Leapfrogs are paired together at birth and share an unbreakable bond. If one Leapfrog falls, the other will take its place in battle.
cobblemon.species.pecktock.name: Pecktock
cobblemon.species.pecktock.desc: The tails of Pecktocks keep a consistent rhythm. In ancient times, these pokemon were used to measure short lengths of time.
cobblemon.species.peckdulum.name: Peckdulum
cobblemon.species.peckdulum.desc: Scientists still question how this pokemon is able to fly with its hefty steel tail. At the stroke of midnight, Peckdulums will send out a call that is comparable to the chime of a large bell.
cobblemon.species.questnut.name: Questnut
cobblemon.species.priestachio.name: Priestachio
cobblemon.species.barbalmond.name: Barbalmond
cobblemon.species.naturaecorn.name: Naturaecorn
cobblemon.species.kitteepy.name: Kitteepy
cobblemon.species.groggymog.name: Groggymog
cobblemon.species.moustiny.name: Moustiny
cobblemon.species.moustiny.desc: Despite the lack of an observed grooming behaviour, Moustiny's bristles always maintain a glossy sheen. Moustiny who reside in areas with a large human population will look slightly different to wild Moustiny as they will imitate popular moustache styles in their environment.
cobblemon.species.monstache.name: Monstache
cobblemon.species.monstache.desc: In the wild, Monstache are very aggressive and territorial. In-fighting within Monstache groups often happen between members with differing Moustache styles.
cobblemon.species.kippsie.name: Kippsie
cobblemon.species.kippsie.desc: Kippsie use their fins to propel themselves out of the water. It is all Kippsie's dreams to fly and they will spend their entire lives trying.
cobblemon.species.soarine.name: Soarine
cobblemon.species.squigment.name: Squigment
cobblemon.species.rattolone.name: Rattolone
cobblemon.species.avidatto.name: Avidatto
cobblemon.species.spongebit.name: Spongebit
cobblemon.species.spongebit.desc: This pokemon breathes seawater through the sizeable pores in its skin. Spongebits make their homes in discarded fruits that have sunken to the bottom of the ocean.
cobblemon.species.squarepair.name: Squarepair
cobblemon.species.underssey.name: Underssey
cobblemon.species.underssey.desc: Despite this pokemon's towering size, Their personality is comparable to a small child. To keep themselves entertained, Undersseys create bubbles from the large instrument atop their heads.
cobblemon.species.spungabunga.name: Spungabunga
cobblemon.species.creehee.name: Creehee
cobblemon.species.slapsticky.name: Slapsticky
cobblemon.species.tomatoss.name: Tomatoss
cobblemon.species.heckchup.name: Heckchup
cobblemon.species.pebbowl.name: Pebbowl
cobblemon.species.bowlder.name: Bowlder
cobblemon.species.spudspark.name: Spudspark
cobblemon.species.spudspark.desc: Underneath their rough, earthy exterior, this pokemon is packed with electrical charge. The heat caused by the sheer amount of electricity in their system cooks them from the inside.
cobblemon.species.deepfried.name: Deepfried
cobblemon.species.deepfried.desc: The metallic armour that develops on Deepfried helps them control their unstable amounts of electricity. The electrical follicles protruding from their tops are highly dangerous when touched.
cobblemon.species.chippole.name: Chippole
cobblemon.species.chippole.desc: Chippole's shiny metallic tails help them quickly get away from potential predators. Their sweet flesh makes them a popular target for fisherman and campers.
cobblemon.species.frogolate.name: Frogolate
cobblemon.species.frogolate.desc: Frogolates are often skittish, keeping a safe distance from any threats that come their way. It is a common folktale that if you follow a Frogolate's tracks, it will lead to a flowing river of chocolate.
cobblemon.species.freddophibian.name: Freddophibian
cobblemon.species.freddophibian.desc: The lumps on Freddophibian's back can be detached from their bodies rather easily. The liquid produced inside them is used to make most commercially made chocolate delicacies in the Kuulkid region.
cobblemon.species.binchickin.name: Binchickin
cobblemon.species.binchickin.desc: Skittish by nature, these pokemon will scrounge up the scraps left by people and other pokemon. They are most common in urban areas and landfills.
cobblemon.species.garbagegutz.name: Garbagegutz
cobblemon.species.gundoru.name: Gundoru
cobblemon.species.slidy.name: Slidy
cobblemon.species.burgogre.name: Burgogre
cobblemon.species.brattimp.name: Brattimp
cobblemon.species.dival.name: Dival
cobblemon.species.flopperoni.name: Flopperoni
cobblemon.species.puppetickle.name: Puppetickle
cobblemon.species.monstermash.name: Monstermash
cobblemon.species.toxedary.name: Toxedary
cobblemon.species.bactoxin.name: Bactoxin
cobblemon.species.huskie.name: Huskie
cobblemon.species.cocolobo.name: Cocolobo
cobblemon.species.frostytop.name: Frostytop
cobblemon.species.zerebro.name: Zerebro
cobblemon.species.zerebro.desc: Zerebros have harnessed the headaches caused by the ice-cold syrup that secretes from their heads to fire off powerful psychic attacks. Migrating Zerebros leave a distinct red trail behind them wherever they go.
cobblemon.species.crashlad.name: Crashlad
cobblemon.species.crashlad.desc: It is a widely accepted theory that Crashlads came from another planet. It is still unclear to scientists if the metal plating worn by this pokemon is part of their skin.
cobblemon.species.tinvader.name: Tinvader
cobblemon.species.tinvader.desc: Tinvaders seem to communicate in a language unintelligible to humans. They can fire a pulse from their arm cannons that can scan their surroundings for potential threats.
cobblemon.species.jungljunior.name: Jungljunior
cobblemon.species.barrelape.name: Barrelape
cobblemon.species.barrelape.desc: As an act of aggression, this pokemon will violently beat its chest with its sturdy armoured hands, creating a sound similar to bongos. This pokemon will hoard large amounts of Nanab berries in their dens which they will defend with their life.
cobblemon.species.bubblbite.name: Bubblbite
cobblemon.species.bubblbite.desc: Even at a young age, venom from a Bubblbite bite can be lethal. Wild pokemon are easily able to spot this pokemon's vibrant colouration and steer clear from them and its evolution.
cobblemon.species.gumbarachnid.name: Gumbarachnid
cobblemon.species.gumbarachnid.desc: Don't be fooled, the bright-coloured balls inside this pokemon's abdomen are its eggs and young. Gumbarachnids violently shake their abdomens when threatened, creating a disorienting rattling sound.
cobblemon.species.snowbull.name: Snowbull
cobblemon.species.abominabull.name: Abominabull
cobblemon.species.whiskitty.name: Whiskitty
cobblemon.species.gourmeow.name: Gourmeow
cobblemon.species.decapichook.name: Decapichook
cobblemon.species.decapichook.desc: Despite seemingly having eyes, this pokemon is completely blind to its surroundings. Even after this pokemon fully passes, its ghostly head still remains.
cobblemon.species.doubrawl.name: Doubrawl
cobblemon.species.widowisp.name: Widowisp
cobblemon.species.widowisp.desc: When a person enters a period of mourning, their grief manifests into a Widowisp. These pokemon are inconsolable and will tear up over even the smallest disturbances.
cobblemon.species.nibubble.name: Nibubble
cobblemon.species.marshnap.name: Marshnap
cobblemon.species.vascare.name: Vascare
cobblemon.species.pottergeist.name: Pottergeist
cobblemon.species.kittycomb.name: Kittycomb
cobblemon.species.wrinklsphinx.name: Wrinklsphinx
cobblemon.species.bilbysit.name: Bilbysit
cobblemon.species.macarton.name: Macarton
cobblemon.species.squatchelor.name: Squatchelor
cobblemon.species.snowalone.name: Snowalone
cobblemon.species.parashroom.name: Parashroom
cobblemon.species.paracelium.name: Paracelium
cobblemon.species.oprock.name: Oprock
cobblemon.species.oproar.name: Oproar
cobblemon.species.hazmoz.name: Hazmoz
cobblemon.species.chemisquito.name: Chemisquito
cobblemon.species.baitensnatch.name: Baitensnatch
cobblemon.species.noknok.name: Noknok
cobblemon.species.longjohn.name: Longjohn
cobblemon.species.straydaway.name: Straydaway
cobblemon.species.hallowpepo.name: Hallowpepo
cobblemon.species.decaith.name: Decaith
cobblemon.species.rummadge.name: Rummadge
cobblemon.species.badgzerker.name: Badgzerker
