cobblemon.species.sombearo.name: Sombearo
cobblemon.species.pandamoley.name: Pandamoley
cobblemon.species.forseeth.name: Forseeth
cobblemon.species.tellerpath.name: Tellerpath
cobblemon.species.clobstrich.name: Clobstrich
cobblemon.species.flamingle.name: Flamingle
cobblemon.species.sirmingo.name: Sirmingo
cobblemon.species.madamingo.name: Madamingo
cobblemon.species.shiverchick.name: Shiverchick
cobblemon.species.pengblok.name: Pengblok
cobblemon.species.pengloo.name: Pengloo
cobblemon.species.citpig.name: Citpig
cobblemon.species.boaracle.name: Boaracle
cobblemon.species.splodent.name: Splodent
cobblemon.species.blockyguard.name: Blockyguard
cobblemon.species.mineymole.name: Mineymole
cobblemon.species.mightymine.name: Mightymine
cobblemon.species.slycitachi.name: Slycitachi
cobblemon.species.metanuki.name: Metanuki
cobblemon.species.marblock.name: Marblock
cobblemon.species.chiselchip.name: Chiselchip
cobblemon.species.statchamp.name: Statchamp
cobblemon.species.pupeppy.name: Pupeppy
cobblemon.species.jitterbuddy.name: Jitterbuddy
cobblemon.species.ursaroid.name: Ursaroid
cobblemon.species.rubbamunki.name: Rubbamunki
cobblemon.species.gummigibbon.name: Gummigibbon
cobblemon.species.funguru.name: Funguru
cobblemon.species.lullabaa.name: Lullabaa
cobblemon.species.sheeptight.name: Sheeptight
cobblemon.species.insomnibaa.name: Insomnibaa
cobblemon.species.nibblet.name: Nibblet
cobblemon.species.fondoom.name: Fondoom
cobblemon.species.beachu.name: Beachu
cobblemon.species.kickachu.name: Kickachu
cobblemon.species.faichu.name: Faichu
cobblemon.species.lala.name: Lala
cobblemon.species.toilengobble.name: Toilengobble
cobblemon.species.pollymouth.name: Pollymouth
cobblemon.species.squealie.name: Squealie
cobblemon.species.hogrod.name: Hogrod
cobblemon.species.bloboon.name: Bloboon
cobblemon.species.bubbowl.name: Bubbowl
cobblemon.species.attawatta.name: Attawatta
cobblemon.species.nillamean.name: Nillamean
cobblemon.species.freezepunk.name: Freezepunk
cobblemon.species.kaichew.name: Kaichew
cobblemon.species.packit.name: Packit
cobblemon.species.cardpawd.name: Cardpawd
cobblemon.species.sugarat.name: Sugarat
cobblemon.species.kandiking.name: Kandiking
cobblemon.species.laddiebug.name: Laddiebug
cobblemon.species.muleseye.name: Muleseye
cobblemon.species.muleseye.desc: A Pokmon in a constant state of melancholy. These Pokmon were once hunted for sport, with hunters aiming for the red target-like marking on their rear.
cobblemon.species.dartypooper.name: Dartypooper
cobblemon.species.dartypooper.desc: The thick, leathery hide on this Pokmon's rear makes it near-impermeable to attacks. When threatened, this Pokmon will thrash its sharp horn and whip-like tail around to ward off any potential threats.
cobblemon.species.galactot.name: Galactot
cobblemon.species.scorptrooper.name: Scorptrooper
cobblemon.species.xenoscorp.name: Xenoscorp
cobblemon.species.kernequine.name: Kernequine
cobblemon.species.nightknight.name: Nightknight
cobblemon.species.regitoasty.name: Regitoasty
cobblemon.species.dradical.name: Dradical
cobblemon.species.tubedude.name: Tubedude
cobblemon.species.stummacake.name: Stummacake
cobblemon.species.stummacake.desc: This Pokmon makes its home in the fabled chocolate river of the Kuulkid region. It consumes unhealthy amounts of candy each day, causing it to have constant stomach pains.
cobblemon.species.gnabling.name: Gnabling
cobblemon.species.gnabling.desc: Their scent attracts swarms of small insects as source of food. They seem to be always hungry, and constantly growing.
cobblemon.species.beastalk.name: Beastalk
cobblemon.species.beastalk.desc: When it lost its signature scent, it was forced to move around more to find food, enhancing its predatorial instincts.
cobblemon.species.morassic.name: Morassic
cobblemon.species.morassic.desc: A proud lone hunter who dwells deep in the jungle. Their berries are highly valuable due to how dangerous they are.
cobblemon.species.kerodillo.name: Kerodillo
cobblemon.species.kerodillo.desc: Its shell gets sturdier with higher temperatures. It is able to curl into a ball and roll up steep slopes.
cobblemon.species.voladillo.name: Voladillo
cobblemon.species.voladillo.desc: It tends to make their home in volcanic areas, due to its shell being able to safely endure explosions.
cobblemon.species.flamaggedon.name: Flamaggedon
cobblemon.species.flamaggedon.desc: When its body gets too hot, they spill out ferocious flames to cool its internal temperature, that way their metallic shell never expands with the heat.
cobblemon.species.bubbalo.name: Bubbalo
cobblemon.species.bubbalo.desc: The fur collar around its neck acts as a buoy, allowing it freely cross riverbanks.
cobblemon.species.bullfount.name: Bullfount
cobblemon.species.bullfount.desc: With horns and muscles developed to defend against predators, they spend most of their time near water banks with no fear.
cobblemon.species.hydrotaur.name: Hydrotaur
cobblemon.species.hydrotaur.desc: As the biggest and strongest of their packs, they dedicate their lives to protect the weak ones of their kind.
cobblemon.species.chicaw.name: Chicaw
cobblemon.species.chicaw.desc: It learns how to fly when it still is very young. Its colors made it extremely popular among tourists.
cobblemon.species.cawlor.name: Cawlor
cobblemon.species.cawlor.desc: The vibrant colours of its plumes are used to attract a mate. They have grown to not fear humans, often stealing food.
cobblemon.species.cawptain.name: Cawptain
cobblemon.species.cawptain.desc: It has built a fame as a thief for taking miscellaneous objects to build its nest. They are rarely seen in the skies, therefore viewed as a symbol of either good fortune.
cobblemon.species.termunch.name: Termunch
cobblemon.species.termunch.desc: They eat nothing but wood, for that reason, building homes in certain areas of Hiza is not adviced.
cobblemon.species.chainmaw.name: Chainmaw
cobblemon.species.chainmaw.desc: Despite the fierce look, they aren't aggressive towards people or pokemon, however they are reckless when hungry and might injure those near its food.
cobblemon.species.colibeak.name: Colibeak
cobblemon.species.colibeak.desc: Colibeak are so small and quick that are hard to keep track of. The dust they leave behind have powerful healing properties.
cobblemon.species.hummintale.name: Hummintale
cobblemon.species.hummintale.desc: By flapping their large wings at high speeds, they appear to be bigger than they really are. They are very protective of their home and the pokemon inhabiting.
cobblemon.species.porcupin.name: Porcupin
cobblemon.species.porcupin.desc: It is not afraid of larger pokemon thanks to its poisonous quills, however its soft belly is a well known weakpoint.
cobblemon.species.anniquil.name: Anniquil
cobblemon.species.anniquil.desc: Anniquil can shoot out quills from its back like arrows at its opponents. The quills lost in combat are replaced immediately.
cobblemon.species.lemunk.name: Lemunk
cobblemon.species.lemunk.desc: Its arms are too weak and frail to properly use punching moves, so it uses its powerful tail to strike its foes like a weapon.
cobblemon.species.skirmaki.name: Skirmaki
cobblemon.species.skirmaki.desc: It is really smart and won't back away from a fight. If one seeN running away, its most likely luring its foe into an ambush.
cobblemon.species.murcenary.name: Murcenary
cobblemon.species.murcenary.desc: The size of Murcenary's scarf indicates its age. The ringed arms are as flexible as its long tail, giving it even more mobility around treetops.
cobblemon.species.socklett.name: Socklett
cobblemon.species.socklett.desc: Socklett has an incredible sense of smell, making it easy to find its food. It coverts anything it eats into electric power.
cobblemon.species.hogawatt.name: Hogawatt
cobblemon.species.hogawatt.desc: Once it gets angry, Hogawatt will rampage until its fully out of energy. It is almost impossible to calm this Pokemon down.
cobblemon.species.cragoat.name: Cragoat
cobblemon.species.cragoat.desc: A stubborn Pokemon that is particularly hard to train. Their rock hard horns never break no matter how hard they are hit.
cobblemon.species.mountam.name: Mountam
cobblemon.species.mountam.desc: Mountam will not move unless it wishes to. A clash between two Mountam can last days till one finally decides gives up.
cobblemon.species.heaxen.name: Heaxen
cobblemon.species.heaxen.desc: Their fantastic hearing allow them to never be caught by surprise, they can hear the whole forest even while asleep.
cobblemon.species.aurinel.name: Aurinel
cobblemon.species.aurinel.desc: Aurinel were kept by kings as pets in the past. Despite disliking loud noises, they grew accustomed living close to people.
cobblemon.species.neeten.name: Neeten
cobblemon.species.neeten.desc: A shy Pokemon that lives inside small caves. Their venom is not very potent but they are always under protection of their mother.
cobblemon.species.needlion.name: Needlion
cobblemon.species.needlion.desc: Needlion's venom was used to poison weapons during ancient times. Its venom is the only cure to those inflicted with it.
cobblemon.species.manecore.name: Manecore
cobblemon.species.manecore.desc: It slowly soars under the moonlight to heal its wounds. Manecore's venom has different symptoms with each and every sting.
cobblemon.species.tingillar.name: Tingillar
cobblemon.species.tingillar.desc: It can produce two kinds of silk. The dark silk is harmless, however the lighter silk contains powerful tranquilizer agents.
cobblemon.species.covkoon.name: Maskoon
cobblemon.species.covkoon.desc: It wraps itself into its own silk preparing for a metamorphosis. The silk's properties causes it to be in a semi-asleep state.
cobblemon.species.mesmoth.name: Mesmoth
cobblemon.species.mesmoth.desc: The patterns on Mesmoth's wings can make those who look directly fall into trance. Anything wrapped into its silk will be put into a short coma.
cobblemon.species.tasmimp.name: Tasmimp
cobblemon.species.tasmimp.desc: Even though they live in packs, they don't get along well with eachother. Loud screeches can be heard at night as they fight among themselves.
cobblemon.species.tasmevil.name: Tasmevil
cobblemon.species.tasmevil.desc: They are known to attack even when unprovoked, however due to their nocturnal nature they are mostly passive during the day.
cobblemon.species.teslither.name: Teslither
cobblemon.species.teslither.desc: They like to hide inside underwater holes which most creatures can't fit. When startled they create a paralysing field to run away.
cobblemon.species.aampeel.name: Aampeel
cobblemon.species.aampeel.desc: It travels underwater at incredibly high speed. Its electric discharges are capable of boiling the water.
cobblemon.species.sandray.name: Sandray
cobblemon.species.sandray.desc: Sandray can change its color to blend with the ambient. Finding one in the shore is almost impossible.
cobblemon.species.sandozer.name: Sandozer
cobblemon.species.sandozer.desc: When on land it absorbs water from the ground to power up its water moves. Once the ground is dry, it will return to the water.
cobblemon.species.pogoroo.name: Pogoroo
cobblemon.species.pogoroo.desc: They use their spring like tail to move around at impressive speeds, their feet barely ever touch the ground and is mostly used for combat.
cobblemon.species.kangaloop.name: Kangaloop
cobblemon.species.kangaloop.desc: They usually mistake other small pokemon for one of their offsprings and carry them in their bags. They use their spring like legs to bounce off walls and build up speed.
cobblemon.species.quaboom.name: Quaboom
cobblemon.species.quaboom.desc: It hides around rocks where it spends most of the days sleeping. If provoked it will shoot out poisonous barbs from its back in all directions.
cobblemon.species.poppamo.name: Poppamo
cobblemon.species.poppamo.desc: Poppamo can be seen floating around riverbanks. A large concentration of Poppamo is a sign that the water is warm.
cobblemon.species.soappo.name: Soappo
cobblemon.species.soappo.desc: Soappo are great swimmers, but very sluggish on land. This Pokemon relies on its slippery skin and bubbles to move around.
cobblemon.species.tubalord.name: Tubalord
cobblemon.species.tubalord.desc: The foam mantle on its back protects its skin from the harsh sunbeams. Smaller Pokemon like to wash themselves with the bubbles it creates.
cobblemon.species.sprocko.name: Sprocko
cobblemon.species.sprocko.desc: It carries seeds in its mouth whenever it finds them. When confronted by enemies, it will spit them all at once in a powerful burst.
cobblemon.species.scalivid.name: Scalivid
cobblemon.species.scalivid.desc: It uses its long tail as whip. It is quicker and more confortable when moving through the dense treetops than on the land
cobblemon.species.taquana.name: Taquana
cobblemon.species.taquana.desc: A large reptile who lives in dense tropical forests. The feathers on its forelegs suggests it had wings in the past.
cobblemon.species.pachynesis.name: Pachynesis
cobblemon.species.pachynesis.desc: Pachynesis are said to be able to float using their large ears as wings, but they actually float using their telekinetic powers.
cobblemon.species.sagephant.name: Sagephant
cobblemon.species.sagephant.desc: They have poor eyesight, but all their other senses are acute. Sagephant can look into the future to avoid conflict before it happens.
cobblemon.species.ganera.name: Ganera
cobblemon.species.ganera.desc: Ganera can live up to 200 years. The elders never forget a face or event that happened in the past.
cobblemon.species.buover.name: Buover
cobblemon.species.buover.desc: They live around rivers but aren't good swimmers, they use driftwood to carry them around the water.
cobblemon.species.bearver.name: Bearver
cobblemon.species.bearver.desc: They spend the spring building large dams so they can have a private pond for their lodge, a place where they hibernate for long periods.
cobblemon.species.behitle.name: Behitle
cobblemon.species.behitle.desc: They are commonly seem running at high speeds during the day. They move slower during rainy days with the fear of slipping and flipping upside down.
cobblemon.species.hotroach.name: Hotroach
cobblemon.species.hotroach.desc: The large vents besides it spill flames at will. When Hotroach runs it leaves trails of fire wherever it passes.
cobblemon.species.fowlkly.name: Fowlkly
cobblemon.species.fowlkly.desc: Its not very intelligent but has impressive psychic abilities. Its own psychic moves will often cause it to get confused.
cobblemon.species.lunatiken.name: Lunatiken
cobblemon.species.lunatiken.desc: Upon evolving, its intelligence and psychic powers grew too much for its small brain to support, causing its behaviour to sometimes be unpredicable.
cobblemon.species.melant.name: Melant
cobblemon.species.melant.desc: Melant's body cools down and hardens as it sleeps. When its active it can reach extreme temperatures.
cobblemon.species.moltank.name: Moltank
cobblemon.species.moltank.desc: Moltank lives deep underground inside fiery hot caves, when the herds move too much they can cause small tremors on the surface.
cobblemon.species.slibbit.name: Slibbit
cobblemon.species.slibbit.desc: Its body is covered in a thick toxic slime that poisons those who touch it. This slime cannot be contained as it will corrode anything over time.
cobblemon.species.caustibian.name: Caustibian
cobblemon.species.caustibian.desc: They mark their territory by leaving toxic slime puddles behind. This slime dries out over a short time and becomes safe to touch.
cobblemon.species.canimble.name: Canimble
cobblemon.species.canimble.desc: During rainy days, Canimble comes out of its den to play. If its struck by a lightning, its fluffy fur will absorb and store electricity.
cobblemon.species.hunder.name: Hunder
cobblemon.species.hunder.desc: They live in small packs lead by the strongest one. Those packs are known to invade powerplants to chew on cables and other electricity sources.
cobblemon.species.voyote.name: Voyote
cobblemon.species.voyote.desc: Voyote claws are developed to tear up metal and find power cables. Its saliva can shock and paralyze on contact.
cobblemon.species.hedgit.name: Hedgit
cobblemon.species.hedgit.desc: It loves trimming with its precise shear-like claw. This Pokemon is quite popular between gardeners and even hairdressers.
cobblemon.species.tropiary.name: Tropiary
cobblemon.species.tropiary.desc: The bush on its back is shapped like its body to confuse its foes in combat. It spends most of its day sunbathing.
cobblemon.species.musipede.name: Musipede
cobblemon.species.musipede.desc: They emit sounds as the move which can be easily distinguished in the forest. With a great variation of pitch and volume, its rare to find two Musipedes that sound the same.
cobblemon.species.velopard.name: Velopard
cobblemon.species.velopard.desc: Its roar can create thunderbolts, so it lives high up in the mountains to avoid forest fires. It is an extremely furtive Pokemon and its cubs are never seen.
cobblemon.species.babrat.name: Babrat
cobblemon.species.babrat.desc: They dislike people and other Pokemon that are not part of their group. They make loud noises to scare intruders away.
cobblemon.species.babreak.name: Babreak
cobblemon.species.babreak.desc: Babreak will intimidate and pick on smaller Pokemon to steal their food, however if they attempt to fight back they are quick to run away.
cobblemon.species.babroote.name: Babroote
cobblemon.species.babroote.desc: They prefer living alone and train to strengthen their body. Their powerful forearms are made of 90% pure muscle.
cobblemon.species.bravelry.name: Bravelry
cobblemon.species.bravelry.desc: Despite not being very strong it prefers to live alone, in hopes of growing strong and fully independent.
cobblemon.species.barbavelry.name: Barbavelry
cobblemon.species.barbavelry.desc: It is very proud of its abilities and competitive. It will dash past other running Pokemon to boast about its speed.
cobblemon.species.jestreat.name: Jestreat
cobblemon.species.jestrick.name: Jestrick
cobblemon.species.shepatrol.name: Shepatrol
cobblemon.species.shepatrol.desc: Shepatrol are stubborn but loyal, and will only ever listen to one person. Bandits used to train shepatrol to guard their treasure.
cobblemon.species.yuffin.name: Yuffin
cobblemon.species.yuffin.desc: Often found in large groups near colder waters. They can glide as close to the water as possible, usually mistaken as if they are skiing.
cobblemon.species.speather.name: Speather
cobblemon.species.speather.desc: Being able to pierce the water, they can drop down from high altitudes and dive up to 15 meters deep to catch their prey.
cobblemon.species.gobidus.name: Gobidus
cobblemon.species.gobidus.desc: With its mighty size it tends to cause sandstorms as it jumps out of the ground. The scars on its face are signs of past encounters with Tombarach.
cobblemon.species.kookabill.name: Kookabill
cobblemon.species.kookabill.desc: Kookabill's beak is one of the few things capable piercing Termunch nests. While the weight of their beaks make them really poor fliers, it protects Kookabill from inevitable impact.
cobblemon.species.terrobalt.name: Terrobalt
cobblemon.species.terrobalt.desc: While being capable of short flights, it spends most of its time on the ground. Its powerful legs allow it to run several miles without taking a rest.
cobblemon.species.rockabill.name: Rockabill
cobblemon.species.rockabill.desc: Its powerful large beaks are utilized in intense aerial jousts against eachother. Those fights are mostly endurance contests as nothing can scratch their beaks.
cobblemon.species.meowster.name: Meowster
cobblemon.species.meowster.desc: A feral pokemon with gigantic claws that can cut through trees. It seems to be stuck inside a cage, but the cage acts like shell to protect both its weakspots and other pokemon from Meowster itself.
cobblemon.species.seevile.name: Seevile
cobblemon.species.seevile.desc: One may never pluck Seevile out of the ground during daytime or it won't stop crying. The sound of its cry is enough to drive one insane.
cobblemon.species.dryath.name: Dryath
cobblemon.species.dryath.desc: It mimics a little girl who is lost in the forest to lure kind hearted people. Those who try to help it end up lost in the forest too.
cobblemon.species.bloomare.name: Bloomare
cobblemon.species.bloomare.desc: It is easily startled so it isolates itself very deep into the woods. Bloomare's piercing scream is able shatter all windows of a house.
cobblemon.species.banup.name: Banup
cobblemon.species.banup.desc: Banup are small and energetic Pokemon who live deep in the jungle. Their excellent sense of smell allows them to always find their home no matter how far away they go.
cobblemon.species.barkana.name: Barkana
cobblemon.species.barkana.desc: Using its mane, it scares bird Pokemon attracted by its sweet scent. They are able to precisely identify any Pokemon around the area by their smell.
cobblemon.species.purrwess.name: Purrwess
cobblemon.species.purrwess.desc: With their regal look and attitude, most Pokemon respect Purrwess, they will never attempt to confront and keep their distance from it.
cobblemon.species.bufierce.name: Bufierce
cobblemon.species.bufierce.desc: Small and clumsy, Bufierce it has difficulty running, so it tends to stick next to bigger Pokemon to feel safe.
cobblemon.species.beefierce.name: Beefierce
cobblemon.species.beefierce.desc: Beefierce are large and strong but are easily startled by loud noises. A stampede of Beefierce will completely destroy anything in its way.
cobblemon.species.fortuller.name: Fortuller
cobblemon.species.fortuller.desc: They gather all sorts of rare minerals to roll up and fuse into a crystal ball, those who look into the ball will see their future.
cobblemon.species.mysteele.name: Mysteele
cobblemon.species.mysteele.desc: Because it concentrates all its power on its crystal ball, if it loses its crystal it will lose all its psychic powers. The crystal can awaken the power contained in other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.slushling.name: Slushling
cobblemon.species.slushling.desc: The younglings have difficulty walking, they prefer to move by sliding accross the slippery mud.
cobblemon.species.mudian.name: Mudian
cobblemon.species.mudian.desc: Mudian will cover its body with mud before leaving their swamps, the mud protects their body against the harsh sunlight.
cobblemon.species.goosmire.name: Goosmire
cobblemon.species.goosmire.desc: They constantly patrol their nest area from high above, when Goosmire spots an invader it will attack them by dropping mud from its body.
cobblemon.species.frazzelle.name: Frazzelle
cobblemon.species.frazzelle.desc: They can store electricity in their antlers. They protect the forest by guiding lightnings away from the trees.
cobblemon.species.knocust.name: Knocust
cobblemon.species.knocust.desc: Swarms of Knocust come flying to devour the vegetation during the dry season, If anything else is caught in the swarm it is delivered a flurry of punches.
cobblemon.species.forsect.name: Forsect
cobblemon.species.forsect.desc: When in combat it will push its body to the limit, even if its badly injured it will only stop fighting when knocked out cold.
cobblemon.species.heathling.name: Heathling
cobblemon.species.heathling.desc: Their eggs are hatched with no assistance thanks to Heathling's body temperature. They learn to be highly social ever since their youth.
cobblemon.species.flaringo.name: Flaringo
cobblemon.species.flaringo.desc: Its feathers combust into flames as they fall off. The ones with the most vivid colors are the most respected in the flock.
cobblemon.species.infermingo.name: Infermingo
cobblemon.species.infermingo.desc: A burmyy and narcissist Pokemon that puts its appearance above all. If its fiery hair-like feathers get messy, it will refuse to be seen.
cobblemon.species.eruwana.name: Eruwana
cobblemon.species.eruwana.desc: Eruwana lives exclusively in scalding hot waters or even molten magma. It needs to keep its body temperature extremely high or else it will freeze.
cobblemon.species.erupaima.name: Erupaima
cobblemon.species.erupaima.desc: As its body gets hotter its fins grow bigger allowing it be more agile. It lays its eggs deep inside volcanoes where no predators can survive.
cobblemon.species.luvanguish.name: Luvanguish
cobblemon.species.luvanguish.desc: Its sole presense causes extreme discomfort. A myth tells that the one unlucky to fish a Luvanguish will never find happiness.
cobblemon.species.sweetinel.name: Sweetinel
cobblemon.species.sweetinel.desc: The glutton Sweetinel hoards insane ammounts of food and will fiercely guard its stock till it's all finished.
cobblemon.species.stunooki.name: Stunooki
cobblemon.species.stunooki.desc: It uses the tip of its tail to paralyze those touched by it. If a bigger and stronger foe gets paralyzed, it won't lose the chance to taunt them before fleeing.
cobblemon.species.blitzchief.name: Blitzchief
cobblemon.species.blitzchief.desc: They are mostly nocturnal and can be seen searching for food in dumpsters. It specifically looks for discarded batteries and electronics to chew on.
cobblemon.species.crocmire.name: Crocmire
cobblemon.species.crocmire.desc: Despite the size, it is practically invisible in its natural habitat. The stone hard hide lets it shrug off even the most powerful hits.
cobblemon.species.luradune.name: Luradune
cobblemon.species.luradune.desc: Its abdomen is bioluminescent. At night, Luradune will burrow the rest of its body in the sand to attract and ambush small insects.
cobblemon.species.tombarach.name: Tombarach
cobblemon.species.tombarach.desc: By covering itself with sandstone, it protects its frail body. Tombarach's silk was prized by ancient kings and used in mummification.
cobblemon.species.buzzover.name: Buzzover
cobblemon.species.buzzover.desc: Buzzover's weak wings make it unable to fly 5 feet above the ground, even a small breeze can knock them off the air.
cobblemon.species.chopteran.name: Chopteran
cobblemon.species.chopteran.desc: It perfected its flight ability to the point it never needs to land. When asleep it gracefully hovers high in the air.
cobblemon.species.gunkile.name: Gunkile
cobblemon.species.gunkile.desc: Gunkile can inject a powerful poison by latching onto larger fish and take them down. They can also use this technique to cross strong currents by using other fish's strenght.
cobblemon.species.crocoxic.name: Crocoxic
cobblemon.species.crocoxic.desc: Its skin spills a toxin that causes a terrible burning sensation. It enjoys murky and poluted waters, where its the only creature capable of surviving.
cobblemon.species.solarelo.name: Solarelo
cobblemon.species.solarelo.desc: These mysterious Pokemon are believed to have been created by an ancient civilization. When the sun sets, they all vanish in the sands till the next day.
cobblemon.species.dfinn.name: Dfinn
cobblemon.species.gargross.name: Gargross
cobblemon.species.gargross.desc: Gargross can be often seem carrying rocks as they fly. They select the best looking ones to build their nests.
cobblemon.species.ruthedral.name: Ruthedral
cobblemon.species.ruthedral.desc: They like to pretend to be statues to hide in plain sight. They can comfortably stand still for hours without moving a single muscle.
cobblemon.species.rabbeti.name: Rabbeti
cobblemon.species.rabbeti.desc: During the warmer season, its fur turns into a darker color, allowing to blend in netter with the vegetation.
cobblemon.species.haresquatch.name: Haresquatch
cobblemon.species.haresquatch.desc: It leaves massive footprints as it walks, intimidating predators that would attempt to track them. Its large claws allow it to dig underground at an impressive speed.
cobblemon.species.petrawl.name: Petrawl
cobblemon.species.petrawl.desc: Even a powerful explosion won't scratch its skin. Petrawl fences with other Pokemon twice its size to in an attempt to grow stronger.
cobblemon.species.cycrush.name: Cycrush
cobblemon.species.cycrush.desc: Cycrush is known for lifting boulders out of roads to help out travelers. As its muscles get bigger its stone armor will crack.
cobblemon.species.gargulchan.name: Gargulchan
cobblemon.species.gargulchan.desc: Its fearful size and strength frightens Pokemon, it grows rare minerals on its back to attract people so it won't be lonely.
cobblemon.species.falcher.name: Falcher
cobblemon.species.falcher.desc: When enraged it will swiftly spin with its sharp blade arms, becoming completely unapproachable.
cobblemon.species.greapper.name: Greapper
cobblemon.species.greapper.desc: The two sharp horns beside its head protect it from any attack. It appears in deflorested areas seeking to punish those responsable.
cobblemon.species.hairubb.name: Hairubb
cobblemon.species.hairubb.desc: Hairubb was once a really popular pet due to its cuddly appearance and behaviour. The fad died down when many of them grew to be not so cuddly.
cobblemon.species.horrifluff.name: Horrifluff
cobblemon.species.horrifluff.desc: Horrifluff uses its body to nest and carry Hairubbs. Despite its size, its capable of silently creeping behind its prey for a deadly pounce.
cobblemon.species.reflic.name: Reflic
cobblemon.species.reflic.desc: It is said that those who touch their reflection in Reflic become trapped inside the mirror, meanwhile a doppelganger controlled by Reflic will take their place outside.
cobblemon.species.hauntlass.name: Hauntlass
cobblemon.species.hauntlass.desc: The broken mirror displays a distorted version of those who stare at it, bringing life to their worst nightmares.
cobblemon.species.venodle.name: Venodle
cobblemon.species.venodle.desc: Its fangs are still too small and fragile to be used to bite. It will instead spit poison and try to blind its foes.
cobblemon.species.rattletack.name: Rattletack
cobblemon.species.rattletack.desc: It shakes its rattle tail to warn predators that its poisonous and dangerous. Its rattle grows bigger, harder and louder as it sheds, it can eventually become as hard as a diamond.
cobblemon.species.najaconda.name: Najaconda
cobblemon.species.najaconda.desc: It silently lurks inside narrow desert caves, if it sets its eyes on a prey it will never stop chasing it.
cobblemon.species.diamamba.name: Diamamba
cobblemon.species.diamamba.desc: Rattletack who didn't shed its skin enough will have it harden and become Diamamba. Its fangs are hard as diamond and can pierce through the hardest armor.
cobblemon.species.skelevera.name: Skelevera
cobblemon.species.skelevera.desc: This Pokemon was at first believed to be a human brought back to life through dark magic. The colored parts of its body are actually a sticky goop that hold the bones it collects together.
cobblemon.species.orcleton.name: Orcleton
cobblemon.species.orcleton.desc: It carefully picks apart the bones it finds to strenghten its armor. if one of its limbs falls off it can easily be reconnected.
cobblemon.species.bonemancer.name: Bonemancer
cobblemon.species.bonemancer.desc: Being able to control their limbs even when not attached to their body, they are able to split themselves in two to fight multiple opponents at once.
cobblemon.species.venarch.name: Venarch
cobblemon.species.vempress.name: Vempress
cobblemon.species.helmarine.name: Helmarine
cobblemon.species.helmarine.desc: Stories tell the tale of a knight whose soul was corrupted by a curse, the knight ended up drowning in one of his travels and his armor turned into a school of Helmarine.
cobblemon.species.trouterror.name: Trouterror
cobblemon.species.trouterror.desc: The sound of its clanking armor terrorizes any sea creature. To this day it was not able to conclude if this Pokemon is sentient.
cobblemon.species.moluschant.name: Moluschant
cobblemon.species.moluschant.desc: Its shell gives it power to use several elemental moves. If the shell is cracked those moves may backfire or come out as the wrong element.
cobblemon.species.fulgnash.name: Fulgnash
cobblemon.species.fulgnash.desc: A pack of tamed Fulgnash were brought into the region of Hiza to protect the fortress from the wild Voyotes, once the fortress was abandoned they made the area their lair.
cobblemon.species.scorchion.name: Scorchion
cobblemon.species.scorchion.desc: Its claws and tail heat up as it uses them in combat, getting stronger and eventually being able to cut through anything.
cobblemon.species.bludgion.name: Bludgion
cobblemon.species.bludgion.desc: It utilizes its powerful tail to break through thick layers of ice. If one of the tail spikes break, it eventually regenerates.
cobblemon.species.pomegrenade.name: Pomegrenade
cobblemon.species.pomegrenade.desc: Due to looking similar to a delicious pomeg berry, is is chasen by hungry Pokemon. When badly hurt, as a last resort it will burst into flames like a bomb.
cobblemon.species.artreelery.name: Artreelery
cobblemon.species.artreelery.desc: It is able to shoot out fruits with its cannon, including Pomegrenade. When fighting a rival Artreelery, their battlefield usually end completely destroyed.
cobblemon.species.brambeat.name: Brambeat
cobblemon.species.brambeat.desc: Brambeat are small but feisty, they are often fighting each other for a good spot near the waterhole.
cobblemon.species.baobash.name: Baobash
cobblemon.species.baobash.desc: Its huge fists are almost indestructible, it is capable of punching through a steel beam without feeling a thing.
cobblemon.species.larvozer.name: Larvozer
cobblemon.species.larvozer.desc: Larvozer's body has atleast 3 layers of armor protecting its body, the armor is so hard it can shrug off a direct hit from a cannonball.
cobblemon.species.armophant.name: Armanzer
cobblemon.species.armophant.desc: It can fire rocks out of its cannon horn, those rocks are coated on a grainy substance similar to gunpowder that explodes on heavy impact.
cobblemon.species.bountius.name: Bountius
cobblemon.species.bountius.desc: The large fruit on its back will never stop growing as long as they don't fall off. There are records of Bountius with sails as big as their body.
cobblemon.species.hollotite.name: Hollotite
cobblemon.species.hollotite.desc: They like to sleep upside down in dark caves. Their sturdy rock shell protects them if one happens to fall down on the floor.
cobblemon.species.stalacpace.name: Stalacpace
cobblemon.species.stalacpace.desc: It utilizes its sharp rock shell as horn by ramming into its foes in combat. Its eyes are adapted to see in the dark, allowing it to live in the deepest caves.
cobblemon.species.stalagoliath.name: Stalagoliath
cobblemon.species.stalagoliath.desc: Its massive rock shell is not for protection but used as a weapon. When in combat it tackles its foes at full force with no fear of damaging itself.
cobblemon.species.chompal.name: Chompal
cobblemon.species.chompal.desc: It's huge sharp teeth tend to scare people away, but its actually very docile. Whenever it sees people or Pokemon drowning it will urge to help them.
cobblemon.species.luminay.name: Luminay
cobblemon.species.luminay.desc: Their bright lights can be seem all the way from the surface. They used to guide ships traveling accross intense fog.
cobblemon.species.shroudra.name: Shroudra
cobblemon.species.shroudra.desc: Luminay becomes Shroudra after it can no longer shine, it seeks other light sources to absorb and strenghten its own.
cobblemon.species.fawniler.name: Fawniler
cobblemon.species.fawniler.desc: Poached by hunters for the antlers since old times, Fawniler has grown to fear humans. Their appearance in forests indicate the coming of a cold front.
cobblemon.species.mawribou.name: Mawribou
cobblemon.species.mawribou.desc: A hyper aggressive Pokemon that can snap its antlers together like a jaw. Many stories say his antlers are conscious and encourage its behaviour.
cobblemon.species.highraffe.name: Highraffe
cobblemon.species.highraffe.desc: Their necks grow so their heads can reach higher altitudes where the temperature is lower. In the coldest areas of the region they are actually shorter than average.
cobblemon.species.matriwi.name: Matriwi
cobblemon.species.matriwi.desc: Living in harsh cold mountains, smaller Matriwi hide within the bigger's feathers to warm up, till they fully develop their white feathery coat.
cobblemon.species.ballosh.name: Ballosh
cobblemon.species.ballosh.desc: Its body is full of toxic gases that keep it floating in the air. It rolls on the snow to increase its size when threatened.
cobblemon.species.blowzzard.name: Blowzzard
cobblemon.species.blowzzard.desc: When in combat the fake head will take hits for it, just so it can get a close distance to strike with its deadly poisonous barbs.
cobblemon.species.smalldering.name: Smalldering
cobblemon.species.smalldering.desc: Those affected by its poison will feel an intense fever afterwards, however it is not an aggressive Pokemon and won't attack unless its cornered.
cobblemon.species.urchar.name: Urchar
cobblemon.species.urchar.desc: It travels on the ocean floor searching warmer waters and hydrothermal vents. Its super potent venom is its greatest weapon against Kalamark that dominate those areas.
cobblemon.species.sharkaic.name: Sharkaic
cobblemon.species.sharkaic.desc: Revived from the Teeth Fossil, a Pokemon that is surprisingly large for its age. It can eat over 90 pounds of food in a single day.
cobblemon.species.ripwreck.name: Ripwreck
cobblemon.species.ripwreck.desc: Known as one of the largest aquatic predators that ever lived. It is theorized it went extinct once its food sources became more scarce.
cobblemon.species.stegosear.name: Stegosear
cobblemon.species.stegosear.desc: Believed to have lived in harsh environments thousands of years ago. The plates on its back regulate the extreme heat of its body.
cobblemon.species.kentrocious.name: Kentrocious
cobblemon.species.kentrocious.desc: Its huge back plates detonate when struck too hard, this defense mechanism protected them from large Pokemon who hunted them down in the past.
cobblemon.species.pterai.name: Pterai
cobblemon.species.pterai.desc: By flapping its wings it shocks small insects that it feeds on. It is able to fly close to the floor at high speeds even with its poor eyesight
cobblemon.species.zaptera.name: Zaptera
cobblemon.species.zaptera.desc: As it flies above the sea it strikes fish with powerful lightning bolts, its long sharp beak lets it pick them up without touching the water
cobblemon.species.beestical.name: Beestical
cobblemon.species.beestical.desc: A rare Pokemon that only shows up during the spring. The sweet honey they make is said to be able to rejuvenate those who eat.
cobblemon.species.mediscis.name: Mediscis
cobblemon.species.mediscis.desc: Its hollow body is full of venom which it injects on those it stabs with its snout. While this venom by itself is dangerous, it can be used to treat other kinds of venomous bites.
cobblemon.species.moscryo.name: Moscryo
cobblemon.species.moscryo.desc: Moscryo lives inside frozen lakes under freezing temperatures. Once they are mature enough, they use their sting to break out of the ice layers.
cobblemon.species.mosfrigid.name: Mosfrigid
cobblemon.species.mosfrigid.desc: It drains the warmth of people and Pokemon it stings. The warmer its own body gets, the better it can fly.
cobblemon.species.skiito.name: Skiito
cobblemon.species.skiito.desc: They soar down steep mountains very close to the ground. By using their arms they can maneuver around rocks and trees.
cobblemon.species.umbette.name: Umbette
cobblemon.species.umbette.desc: They usually live in the deep sea till they mature enough to leave. Their tentacles glow so they can find eachother in the dark.
cobblemon.species.parabella.name: Parabella
cobblemon.species.parabella.desc: During their mating season, people are advised to stay out of the water. Their tentacles can deliver a powerful sting that instantly paralyzes.
cobblemon.species.drizzella.name: Drizzella
cobblemon.species.drizzella.desc: They can be seem floating above the sea during stormy days. Their watery veil allows them to breath outside the water.
cobblemon.species.rhyferal.name: Rhyferal
cobblemon.species.rhyferal.desc: Its loud roar will agitate any Rhydon who hears and have them come to aid it in combat. It is strong enough to flip and carry war ship on its back.
cobblemon.species.wombopass.name: Wombopass
cobblemon.species.wombopass.desc: Its body is rich in various different minerals such as cooper and gold, it utilizes magnetic fields to lift its heavy weight off the floor.
cobblemon.species.brainby.name: Brainby
cobblemon.species.brainby.desc: Brainby started showing up once a meteor hit the planet. Many people argue about whether their home was destroyed on impact or they came from said meteor.
cobblemon.species.invoider.name: Invoider
cobblemon.species.invoider.desc: Its brain makes up for most its body and is its only internal organ. It is able to send out shock waves to disable electronic devices.
cobblemon.species.cereblast.name: Cereblast
cobblemon.species.cereblast.desc: Most records about this Pokemon were burned down in a fire. However it is known that Cereblast can control multiples of its own species as a hivemind.
cobblemon.species.lurkitopi.name: Lurkitopi
cobblemon.species.lurkitopi.desc: By covers its body with black ink it becomes completely invisible in the dark waters, it's said that those sprayed with this ink will slowly disappear forever.
cobblemon.species.kalamark.name: Kalamark
cobblemon.species.kalamark.desc: It strikes the eyes of its foes trying to blind them with ink, it then happily watches its blinded victims struggle in panic.
cobblemon.species.vultox.name: Vultox
cobblemon.species.vultox.desc: They learn to survive alone when they are still very young. Unable to digest fresh fruit, Vultox uses acid to melt its food before eating.
cobblemon.species.carriotten.name: Carriotten
cobblemon.species.carriotten.desc: Carriotten will often search leftovers in the trash of populated towns. The rotten food it eats strengthens the potency of its poison.
cobblemon.species.doomture.name: Doomture
cobblemon.species.doomture.desc: Each sharp part of its body contains a different kind of toxin. Due to fear they were almost poached into extinction.
cobblemon.species.pupsicle.name: Pupsicle
cobblemon.species.pupsicle.desc: They make large icebergs their home. Their skin is so cold it can freeze on contact.
cobblemon.species.frozeal.name: Frozeal
cobblemon.species.frozeal.desc: The icy chunks on its body can never melt. It uses its icy breath to freeze alive fish that are too fast for it.
cobblemon.species.hauntberg.name: Hauntberg
cobblemon.species.hauntberg.desc: It purposely swims towards ships in an attempt to sink them. Large ship graveyards are how it marks its territory.
cobblemon.species.narspike.name: Narspike
cobblemon.species.narspike.desc: The large horn on its head is used to drill through layers of ice in order to surface. They like digging underwater making large submerged caves.
cobblemon.species.hornaval.name: Hornaval
cobblemon.species.hornaval.desc: The sturdy ice coating on its horn is surprisingly sturdy, making it safer to use it in combat. Because of this, it is not afraid to get into fights.
cobblemon.species.armust.name: Armust
cobblemon.species.armust.desc: It lives in hard-to-reach underwater caves, making it a very rare Pokemon. It molts multiple times during a year, trying to get the perfect armor.
cobblemon.species.crustitan.name: Crustitan
cobblemon.species.crustitan.desc: An incredibly strong Pokemon that leaves the waters and wanders the land searching for strong opponents to fight. They are an invasive species that originate from a distant region.
cobblemon.species.grivern.name: Grivern
cobblemon.species.grivern.desc: A rare Pokemon, that can be seem zooming inside caverns. It is moderately weak, however it transforms into a terrifying beast at night.
cobblemon.species.folicero.name: Folicero
cobblemon.species.folicero.desc: The playful Folicero is more than often unnaware of its size and ends up scaring smaller creatures. When the wind blows through its wooden horn it produces a calming sound.
cobblemon.species.verblunt.name: Verblunt
cobblemon.species.verblunt.desc: A laid back Pokemon that spends most of its day sunbathing. Smaller bird Pokemon eventually build their nests on its back.
cobblemon.species.coloceros.name: Coloceros
cobblemon.species.coloceros.desc: This huge Pokemon exclusively eats a special fruit which it guards the tree with its life. The sturdy horn on its nose cannot be cut or broken no matter what.
cobblemon.species.burstich.name: Burstich
cobblemon.species.burstich.desc: A small bird Pokemon that can spark flames by hiting its flint-like beak on the floor. Their wings are too small to allow it to take flight.
cobblemon.species.pyrebolt.name: Pyrebolt
cobblemon.species.pyrebolt.desc: Its body will constantly convert heat into electricity. If hit by a lightning bolt, it will overcharge and become almost unstoppable.
cobblemon.species.aviterate.name: Aviterate
cobblemon.species.aviterate.desc: As it dashes through the land it leaves behind a trail of flames. It casts lightning from the skies, incinerating the land bellow.
cobblemon.species.sliterfall.name: Sliterfall
cobblemon.species.sliterfall.desc: Sliterfall are born exclusively at river springs. As they grow too big they start making their journey to the ocean.
cobblemon.species.rivestic.name: Rivestic
cobblemon.species.rivestic.desc: It can be seem at river mouths or wetlands. Its sole presence will calm down the water torrents.
cobblemon.species.serpentidal.name: Serpentidal
cobblemon.species.serpentidal.desc: Not much is known about Serpentidal other than them showing on land during stormy nights. It is believed that they have total control of the waves crashing on the ocean.
cobblemon.species.duomeleon.name: Duomeleon
cobblemon.species.duomeleon.desc: It is said that in the past it was only able to control one of the two elements, but after several climate changes its body became unstable.
cobblemon.species.twydra.name: Twydra
cobblemon.species.twydra.desc: Twydra's two heads are capable of perfectly synchronizing their moves, when their breath attacks cross together it results in a violent explosion.
cobblemon.species.cometile.name: Cometile
cobblemon.species.cometile.desc: What was thought to be a meteor that fell on the planet was actually a Cometile egg, nobody knows its true origin.
cobblemon.species.orbitalon.name: Orbitalon
cobblemon.species.orbitalon.desc: It is surprisingly intelligent and adaptive, being able to survive in practically any kind of known environment.
cobblemon.species.novagon.name: Novagon
cobblemon.species.novagon.desc: The energy that spills out of its body causes all sorts of strange effects in the atmosphere. At the end of its life cycle, it will fall from the space like a shooting star.
cobblemon.species.ogrelisk.name: Ogrelisk
cobblemon.species.ogrelisk.desc: It is believed to have used its psychic powers to travel from an unfavorable distant future to today's past, having lived two or more different lives.
cobblemon.species.catastropod.name: Catastropod
cobblemon.species.catastropod.desc: The waters near its lair are boiling hot, whenever it comes on land it evaporates any lakes and scorches whole forests into dust.
cobblemon.species.harvinger.name: Harvinger
cobblemon.species.harvinger.desc: A gloomy fog accompanies Harvinger wherever it wanders. It preys on other ghost type Pokemon and is said to be sighted during near-death experiences.
cobblemon.species.vintera.name: Vintera
cobblemon.species.vintera.desc: The Pokemon that caused a 100 years of winter in a distant past. The gases spewing out of its body instantly freeze anything that touches it.
cobblemon.species.gaierth.name: Gaierth
cobblemon.species.gaierth.desc: By flapping its majestic wings, it constantly spreads various seeds that fully grow in mere seconds. It is deeply connected with the region of Hiza and all Pokemon that inhabit it.
cobblemon.species.hellsire.name: Hellsire
cobblemon.species.hellsire.desc: A legendary Pokemon that lives deep in the planet's core. A single flap of its wings can burn whole continents to a crisp.
cobblemon.species.eucuwala.name: Eucuwala
cobblemon.species.eucuwala.desc: Eucuwala spends the day collecting leaves in the forest canopy. If two Eucuwalas encounter each other, they swap leaves to taste different parts of the forest.
cobblemon.species.gulacuff.name: Gulacuff
cobblemon.species.gulacuff.desc: Gulacuff eats leaves from the trees in its territory. If it runs into another Gulacuff, it will fight, and the winner gets all the leaves the loser has collected.
cobblemon.species.timberawl.name: Timberawl
cobblemon.species.timberawl.desc: Timberawl's punch is so hard, it can knock over a large tree. It whacks trees with its large fists and collects the leaves that fall, until it has eaten its weight in foliage.
cobblemon.species.reptling.name: Reptling
cobblemon.species.reptling.desc: Reptling possesses both reptilian and avian traits. Some say that, millions of years ago, it gained its feathers and wings to survive the attacks of predators.
cobblemon.species.rapteror.name: Rapteror
cobblemon.species.rapteror.desc: Rapteror circles its foe from the sky, and strikes when the enemy is looking away. Its body is made of tightly packed foliage, so it is very light and can make amazing maneuvers in the air.
cobblemon.species.velosaur.name: Velosaur
cobblemon.species.velosaur.desc: Velosaur's wings and scales are made from tough bark that is hard enough to protect it, but light enough to allow it to fly. The scales on Velosaur's back resemble the markings on many poisonous plants near its nesting grounds.
cobblemon.species.yetini.name: Yetini
cobblemon.species.yeteen.name: Yeteen
cobblemon.species.yetitan.name: Yetitan
cobblemon.species.yetitan.desc: 41 Crystal Defense Ice 44 Giga DrainSTAB Grass 47 Roar Normal 51 Ice HammerSTAB Ice 58 Wood HammerSTAB Grass
cobblemon.species.kindlemur.name: Kindlemur
cobblemon.species.kindlemur.desc: Kindlemur swings through the trees searching for dead wood, which it uses to make large fires on the ground. It does this to keep itself warm at night.
cobblemon.species.burmurly.name: Burmurly
cobblemon.species.burmurly.desc: Burmurly swings though the trees with such speed that it has been nicknamed 'the Flaming Flash'. It's very careful not to set the branches from which it swings aflame.
cobblemon.species.merculey.name: Merculey
cobblemon.species.merculey.desc: Merculey's body is filled with a hot acid that makes it very light. It is able to flip and spin to dodge enemy attacks, but it can also use the liquid for hot acid attacks.
cobblemon.species.woolvry.name: Woolvry
cobblemon.species.woolvry.desc: Woolvry has a scarf around its body which keeps its body warm to make fire come out. If the scarf is removed it will die.
cobblemon.species.clokruel.name: Clokruel
cobblemon.species.smoldrine.name: Smoldrine
cobblemon.species.smoldrine.desc: It has thick bands of hair wrapped around its body for protection. It can be vicious and dangerous in the wild, but it is rarely seen outside of captivity.
cobblemon.species.batorch.name: Batorch
cobblemon.species.batrix.name: Batrix
cobblemon.species.vamfire.name: Vamfire
cobblemon.species.vamfire.desc: Lash Out Dark Blast BurnSTAB Fire Burning JealousySTAB Fire Fire PledgeSTAB Fire Heat WaveSTAB Fire Dual Wingbeat Flying Scorching Sands Ground Endeavor Normal Snore Normal Uproar Normal Iron Defense Steel Steel BeamSTAB Steel Steel RollerSTAB Steel U-turn Bug X-Scissor Bug Brutal Swing Dark Nasty Plot Dark Thief Dark Dragon Claw Dragon Charge Beam Electric Thunder Electric Thunderbolt Electric Thunder Wave Electric Cuddle Fairy Brick Break Fighting Focus Blast Fighting Rock Smash Fighting Fire BlastSTAB Fire FlamethrowerSTAB Fire Sunny Day Fire Acrobatics Flying Aerial Ace Flying Shadow Ball Ghost Solar Beam Grass Bulldoze Ground Dig Ground Earthquake Ground Landslide Ground Attract Normal Confide Normal Cut Normal Double Team Normal Double-Edge Normal Facade Normal Frustration Normal Giga Impact Normal Heartfelt Pulse Normal Hidden Power Normal Hyper Beam Normal Protect Normal Return Normal Round Normal Safeguard Normal Sleep Talk Normal Strength Normal Substitute Normal Swagger Normal Swords Dance Normal Work Up Normal Toxic Poison Psyshock Psychic Rest Psychic Rock Slide Rock Rock Tomb Rock Sandstorm Rock Stone Edge Rock Gyro BallSTAB Steel
cobblemon.species.dimetrus.name: Dimetrus
cobblemon.species.dimetrus.desc: Dimetrus uses its large fin to catch currents in the ocean. It can travel many miles using very little energy by doing this, but it is very slow on land.
cobblemon.species.permidon.name: Permidon
cobblemon.species.permidon.desc: Permidon has large fins on its arms which it uses to swim upstream. Permidon can do amazing tricks underwater, but on land it is very slow.
cobblemon.species.lividon.name: Lividon
cobblemon.species.lividon.desc: Lividon is known for its bad temper. It often sleeps on the ocean floor, and if it is awoken it will become furious and attack anything in the area.
cobblemon.species.liqueel.name: Liqueel
cobblemon.species.liqueel.desc: Liqueel's long tail whips through the water as it swims, making it very fast. Some Liqueel use their tails to fight while trying to protect others.
cobblemon.species.electeel.name: Electeel
cobblemon.species.electeel.desc: The electrical current that runs through its body is very powerful. When in danger, Electeel load electricity into their dorsal fins, then discharge it as a powerful shock wave.
cobblemon.species.emporeel.name: Emporeel
cobblemon.species.emporeel.desc: Emporeel's body is so long that when it walks on land, it curls up into very tight coils, which they also do when preparing to launch an electrical attack. The longer the Emporeel, the more powerful its electricity is.
cobblemon.species.lochsea.name: Lochsea
cobblemon.species.nesshoal.name: Nesshoal
cobblemon.species.psyren.name: Psyren
cobblemon.species.aromutt.name: Aromutt
cobblemon.species.aromutt.desc: Aromutt has an amazing sense of smell that lets it seek out lost people and things. It is known as the Domestic Pokemon because it can only be found in captivity. It only lives with humans in cities and towns.
cobblemon.species.odorog.name: Odorog
cobblemon.species.odorog.desc: Odorog has such an amazing sense of smell that it can always smell its way home, hence it never gets lost. It is said that once Odorog smells you, it can track you down anywhere within a 200 mile-radius (320 kilometer-radius).
cobblemon.species.chinchul.name: Chinchul
cobblemon.species.chinchul.desc: Chinchul is treasured by many trainers because of its soft fur, so the softer the fur, the more desired the Chinchul. Even some trainers give it food for its soft fur.
cobblemon.species.chilleap.name: Chilleap
cobblemon.species.chilleap.desc: Though Chilleap's bushy tail is made of fur, it packs a powerful punch. The tail is both thick and heavy, so using the leverage Chilleap gets from its body, it can knock out a foe.
cobblemon.species.chiquail.name: Chiquail
cobblemon.species.chiquail.desc: Chiquail uses the feather on its head to feel which way the wind is blowing. It cannot fly very well but if it catches the wind just right it can sashay into the sky.
cobblemon.species.mavriquail.name: Mavriquail
cobblemon.species.mavriquail.desc: Mavriquail glides through the air with amazing precision by using the feather on its head. From 100 feet in the air it can land on a twig going at top speeds.
cobblemon.species.jayzul.name: Jayzul
cobblemon.species.jayzul.desc: Jayzul's song is very beautiful, so they are loved by many Trainers. They make their nests in trees along paths and pick up crumbs left behind by wandering adventurers.
cobblemon.species.jayzure.name: Jayzure
cobblemon.species.jayzure.desc: Jayzure's blue feathers help it blend into the sky so that it can sneak up on its prey. It also often sneaks up on trainers passing through its territory and pecks them until they leave. It is very aggressive, especially if it's protecting its eggs.
cobblemon.species.hoppiler.name: Hoppiler
cobblemon.species.hoppiler.desc: Hoppiler can jump very high because of its powerful legs. This enables it to escape many foes and breed plentifully.
cobblemon.species.cobworm.name: Cobworm
cobblemon.species.cobworm.desc: When Hoppiler gets caught in a web, it evolves into a form with a hard outer shell to protect itself. Cobworm uses the net as a thick shield against attacking Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.hoppereign.name: Hoppereign
cobblemon.species.hoppereign.desc: Hoppereign has extremely powerful legs, which allow it to spring into the air at any moment, where it can then glide using its large wings. A hard shell covers its body and protects it from many harsh physical attacks.
cobblemon.species.rollip.name: Rollip
cobblemon.species.rollip.desc: Rollip can roll up into a tight ball. It uses this ability to attack and defend itself. Though it is slow on foot, it can roll very fast as a ball.
cobblemon.species.rollipod.name: Rollipod
cobblemon.species.rollipod.desc: Rollipod is curled up into a ball. Its body is changing and growing stronger. When it gets strong enough it will open back up and evolve.
cobblemon.species.isopanzer.name: Isopanzer
cobblemon.species.isopanzer.desc: Evo Barrage Normal - Defense Curl Normal - Scuttle HopSTAB Bug - Bug BiteSTAB Bug - Tackle Normal - PinchSTAB Bug - Harden Normal - Quick Attack Normal - Lock-On Normal - Mud Bomb Ground - Mud Shot Ground 11 Thread LashSTAB Bug 15 Bide Normal 19 Barrage Normal 23 Struggle BugSTAB Bug 29 Iron Defense Steel 32 SteamrollerSTAB Bug 35 Focus Energy Normal 38 Gyro BallSTAB Steel 42 Rolling Press Fighting 45 Rebound StrikeSTAB Steel 49 Leech LifeSTAB Bug 54 Flash CannonSTAB Steel 59 Zap Cannon Electric
cobblemon.species.ploworm.name: Ploworm
cobblemon.species.ploworm.desc: Ploworm digs through the soil underground using the large tooth on its head. It is more commonly seen during the rainy season because it dislikes the wet soil. It has also been spotted in...
cobblemon.species.lumbrill.name: Lumbrill
cobblemon.species.lumbrill.desc: Lumbrill digs through thick layers of stone underground. Its hard steel body protects it from intense pressure and magma streams that it may run into. It is often used by treasure hunters...
cobblemon.species.baybolt.name: Baybolt
cobblemon.species.baybolt.desc: Baybolt lives in the canopy of the Junnin trees. In certain areas it has become the cause of forest fires because it sometimes attracts lightning, which strikes the trees around it.
cobblemon.species.bolteen.name: Bolteen
cobblemon.species.bolteen.desc: Bolteen's ears build up and store electricity, which it then uses for powerful attacks. Small amounts of the stored electricity is also spread through Bolteen's body while it swings through trees.
cobblemon.species.dandyseed.name: Dandyseed
cobblemon.species.dandyseed.desc: Dandyseed is so light it is almost always being carried by the wind. It only stops when it lands and sticks into the ground.
cobblemon.species.dandylie.name: Dandylie
cobblemon.species.dandylie.desc: It is known as the weed Pokemon because after one Dandylie is seen, others start to appear all over in the area. The large buds on its hands and tail are good for physical attacks.
cobblemon.species.withereen.name: Withereen
cobblemon.species.withereen.desc: When the wind blows, seeds fall from Withereen's dried gray body. Some say a wish is granted every time Withereen's seeds are blown into the air.
cobblemon.species.quartzac.name: Quartzac
cobblemon.species.quartzac.desc: Quartzac has a shiny, almost transparent body composed completely of quartz. There are several different colours of Quartzac made from different types of quartz.
cobblemon.species.equazar.name: Equazar
cobblemon.species.equazar.desc: Equazar refracts light in its body causing its enemy to become confused. It can also equalize the light to make itself shine brightly.
cobblemon.species.campyre.name: Campyre
cobblemon.species.campyre.desc: Campyres typically are born from a trainer burning a special type of wood. They love to provide warmth to others and are generally very well-mannered when looked over regularly.
cobblemon.species.wildyre.name: Wildyre
cobblemon.species.wildyre.desc: Campyres typically grow out of control when left unattended, thus causing an evolution into Wildyre. Wildyre are much more fierce and chaotic than their previous evolution, and only want to spread flame.
cobblemon.species.bloatick.name: Bloatick
cobblemon.species.bloatick.desc: Bloatick sucks the energy from its foe until it is blown up like a balloon. It can either use the energy to heal itself, or send back a powerful attack.
cobblemon.species.suckeeto.name: Suckeeto
cobblemon.species.suckeeto.desc: Suckeeto has a large needle on its face which it uses to drain the energy from its enemies. It also sucks the nutrients from trees when it is deep in the forest.
cobblemon.species.stalad.name: Stalad
cobblemon.species.stelimight.name: Stelimight
cobblemon.species.cavernight.name: Cavernight
cobblemon.species.sandstrum.name: Sandstrum
cobblemon.species.sandstrum.desc: Sandstrum hides under the sand on the beach. Trainers sometimes step on it and are surprised when the ground starts to move from under their feet.
cobblemon.species.sanderon.name: Sanderon
cobblemon.species.sanderon.desc: Sanderon's body is made of hard compacted sand. It often sleeps under the sand on a beach and and waits for unsuspecting people or Pokemon to step on its large horn.
cobblemon.species.shoreking.name: Shoreking
cobblemon.species.antini.name: Antini
cobblemon.species.insignel.name: Insignel
cobblemon.species.stagnel.name: Stagnel
cobblemon.species.stagnel.desc: There have been many sightings of Stagnel gathered in the deserts in large quantities, standing still and looking up at the sky. It's completely unknown why they do this.
cobblemon.species.buffhilla.name: Buffhilla
cobblemon.species.buffhilla.desc: Slow and peaceful, Buffhila spend their lives ruminating on the foot hills and fields below large mountains. They stay in groups and protect weaker siblings with their rock hard bodies.
cobblemon.species.bisommit.name: Bisommit
cobblemon.species.bisommit.desc: Easily spooked, their thunderous hooves on the plain can be heard from miles off. Many believe that Bisommit has a connection to the mountains and can cause earthquakes.
cobblemon.species.coyoco.name: Coyoco
cobblemon.species.coyoco.desc: When Coyoco howl, their body compresses and fire spews from their mouth. Its body acts as a bag coated with a fireproof lining filled with hot coals.
cobblemon.species.stuckarp.name: Stuckarp
cobblemon.species.stuckarp.desc: Stuckarp fastens itself to rocks and other objects by using its suction cup mouth. Its hold is so strong that it can stick to a surface for several days.
cobblemon.species.stuckry.name: Stuckry
cobblemon.species.stuckry.desc: Stuckry's flat body has tiny suction cups that allow it to stick to any surface. If in danger, Stuckry will lay flat and protect itself with its hard plated back.
cobblemon.species.plubus.name: Plubus
cobblemon.species.plubus.desc: Because it lives in dark cave water, Publus has no eyes. It can feel vibrations to make its way through the caverns while searching for food.
cobblemon.species.salamink.name: Salamink
cobblemon.species.salamink.desc: Salamink uses the gills on its side to feel the flow of water so it can navigate its way through dark cave water. It is sometimes seen in deep parts of the ocean.
cobblemon.species.frostoss.name: Frostoss
cobblemon.species.frostoss.desc: Frostoss loves to throw snowballs. It has an amazing aim, which is unfortunate for people or Pokemon passing by, but it only does this for fun and never gets mad.
cobblemon.species.kaboo.name: Kaboo
cobblemon.species.kaboo.desc: A grenade Pokemon who mourns the death from past battles at battle grounds.
cobblemon.species.membry.name: Membry
cobblemon.species.fawntia.name: Fawntia
cobblemon.species.reindolph.name: Reindolph
cobblemon.species.reindolph.desc: Reindolph can fly through the air for short distances. No one knows how it can do this, but some suspect it has to do with its crystal hooves.
cobblemon.species.bansheet.name: Bansheet
cobblemon.species.bansheet.desc: Bansheet resembles a sheet. If someone were to lift it, there would be nothing underneath. It was first spotted in the workshop of a tailor.
cobblemon.species.teepolter.name: Teepolter
cobblemon.species.hoodloom.name: Hoodloom
cobblemon.species.hoodloom.desc: Hoodloom typically hides in dark alleyways, and always looking for stuff to loot. They don't like working together, but will team up if it needs to.
cobblemon.species.cloacover.name: Cloacover
cobblemon.species.cloacover.desc: Cloacover are a preferred Pokemon amongst criminal organizations due to their innate evilness. They command Hoodloom, making them collect all sorts of shiny objects in exchange for poffins.
cobblemon.species.indascent.name: Indascent
cobblemon.species.lamplume.name: Lamplume
cobblemon.species.bottoil.name: Bottoil
cobblemon.species.cuncoldron.name: Cuncoldron
cobblemon.species.tarift.name: Tarift
cobblemon.species.tarift.desc: It was believed that Tarift was a different Pokemon millions of years ago, but got stuck in the tar pits and turned into what it is today. Its body is composed mainly of a thick tar that absorbs physical attacks quite well.
cobblemon.species.tarzorus.name: Tarzorus
cobblemon.species.tarzorus.desc: Tarzorus lives deep in tar pits and rarely comes up unless it is disturbed. Legend says it used to be a land dwelling Pokemon that sunk into the tar pits and transformed.
cobblemon.species.tuttby.name: Tuttby
cobblemon.species.tuttby.desc: Tuttby has two dots on its head that act as eyes. Some say the eyes can see into the afterlife and allow it to communicate with passed spirits.
cobblemon.species.whiscleo.name: Whiscleo
cobblemon.species.whiscleo.desc: Whiscleo has large ears that can hear from many miles away. Ancient writings say that it can hear the voices of the past and future as well.
cobblemon.species.pharoar.name: Pharoar
cobblemon.species.pharoar.desc: Pharoar is known as the king of the desert. Ancient writings say it once controlled human beings, who would build giant shrines in honour of their master.

cobblemon.species.lakanlinog.name: Lakan linog
cobblemon.species.ekopi.name: Ekopi
cobblemon.species.ekopi.desc: Ekopi love to climb up trees and eat the leaves that make up most of its diet. They like to craft various objects and weapons with leaves and twigs.
cobblemon.species.ekoraft.name: Ekoraft
cobblemon.species.ekoraft.desc: Ekoraft are skilled at crafting weapons and tools with tree branches. The tools they craft help them perform daily tasks such as collecting food and building shelter for them. They are very protective of their group and will defend its home with its life.
cobblemon.species.expertri.name: Expertri
cobblemon.species.expertri.desc: Expertri have mastered every form of tool making. For centuries, it has taught people how to craft all kinds of tools and weapons. It is said that a single Expertri is responsible for the protection of a whole forest.
cobblemon.species.flaero.name: Flaero
cobblemon.species.flaero.desc: The tips of its horn glows as guides its way into the darkness. In the dark, it likes to communicate with glowing signals from its horns. They dart themselves from place to place, almost looking like flaming arrows, which its name was derived from.
cobblemon.species.impferno.name: Impferno
cobblemon.species.impferno.desc: An avid hunter, Impferno can control the light emitted from its ear tips to confuse its prey. When agitated, its horns can reach dangerously high temperatures and attacks its foes with them. They communicate with each other by displaying light signals from its horns.
cobblemon.species.pyrovern.name: Pyrovern
cobblemon.species.pyrovern.desc: The mighty shriek of a Pyrovern is said to spread fear even to the bravest of souls.
cobblemon.species.kelpony.name: Kelpony
cobblemon.species.kelpony.desc: Thought to be extinct, a large group was recently found in the Havai region. Kelpony can be found near lively reefs, feeding on algae and seaweed. They are likely to stay in the reef where they are born and never leave.
cobblemon.species.maritide.name: Maritide
cobblemon.species.maritide.desc: Maritide are protective of the reef it was born in. They are very helpful towards their community in the reefs. It helps to clean the area and get rid of trash and pollution. They are very friendly and noble Pokemon and will look out for its Trainer.
cobblemon.species.reefallion.name: Reefallion
cobblemon.species.reefallion.desc: Any coral reef that is inhabited by a Reefallion is said to be of pristine beauty. Its rock-like appendages become harder as it ages. They are known to be loyal and protective Pokemon of their Trainers.
cobblemon.species.chenileaf.name: Chenileaf
cobblemon.species.chenileaf.desc: It will aid and bandage the wounds of their allies using the silk it produces on its tail. There is a farm in eastern Havai that collect and breed Chenileaf for their silk.
cobblemon.species.cottoon.name: Cottoon
cobblemon.species.cottoon.desc: Their soft bodies cushions itself if it may fall. With its wings, it can only fly a little. Strong winds often carry them far away from their breeding grounds.
cobblemon.species.sedavlin.name: Sedavlin
cobblemon.species.sedavlin.desc: The more quality nectar it consumes, the finer the quality of the silk it produces. Clothes made from their silk used to be all the rage among kings and queens.
cobblemon.species.warblu.name: Warblu
cobblemon.species.warblu.desc: It appears that Warblu and the Winvern in the Avoris Region are at odds. They frequently quarrel over food. Unfortunately, its talons are no match to those of Winvern, and it surrenders its food to them.
cobblemon.species.territore.name: Territore
cobblemon.species.territore.desc: These Pokemon are aggressive and territorial with Arctalon. Despite the fact that Arctalon's Ice-type moves put them at a disadvantage, they are incredibly skilled and shrewd in combat.
cobblemon.species.warshrike.name: Warshrike
cobblemon.species.warshrike.desc: They have a rivalry with Falcryo. A flock of Warshrike will seek vengeance on those who cause harm to their colony. With their skillful and carefully planned attacks, they can take down their foes.
cobblemon.species.goosea.name: Goosea
cobblemon.species.goosea.desc: It was discovered that Goosea migrate from Orohn-Havai to Avoris in the autumn season. Many of them get lost during their migration because they are clumsy and have short attention spans.
cobblemon.species.neinei.name: Neinei
cobblemon.species.neinei.desc: For nesting purposes, Neinei migrate from Orohn-Havai to Avoris in the fall. They return to Orohn-Havai in the spring after raising their hatchlings. Given their maternal nature, they may care for any lost hatchling.
cobblemon.species.zapillar.name: Zapillar
cobblemon.species.zapillar.desc: Zapillar share energy with each other through the touch of their antennae. Groups of Zapillar will crawl over an enemy, electrocuting it until it is paralyzed.
cobblemon.species.zapcoon.name: Zapcoon
cobblemon.species.zapcoon.desc: Hanging in the trees during the night, Zapcoon display beautiful light shows by glowing using the stored electrical energy from within their bodies. These performances can sometimes illuminate an entire forest.
cobblemon.species.zaptenna.name: Zaptenna
cobblemon.species.zaptenna.desc: Zaptenna communicate with one another via a specific series of flashes on the wings and eyes. It stores electricity in its body via friction created by its fur. Zaptenna have been troublesome as they are known for causing an interference with signals of many electronics.
cobblemon.species.thistling.name: Thistling
cobblemon.species.thistling.desc: They are most commonly found during the Spring and Summer seasons. Winds will often scatter their highly allergic pollen into the air.
cobblemon.species.withettle.name: Withettle
cobblemon.species.withettle.desc: They defend themselves with their spiky leaves and heads. Be careful not to come in contact with the fluff around their neck as it may release spores into the air, causing allergic reactions. Their leaves, however, do more good than harm. They are used in herbal medicines as they provide many nutrients which were proven to have many health benefits. The leaves are crushed into powders and even used for tea.
cobblemon.species.bonzumi.name: Bonzumi
cobblemon.species.bonzumi.desc: Bonzumi are almost never tired and can go days without sleep due to their hyperactive energy. Known for their playful and hyper nature, they are the perfect companion for little children.
cobblemon.species.bonzire.name: Bonzire
cobblemon.species.bonzire.desc: Bonzire are always heated up for a battle. With the addition of its Electric-type, it is able to deliver powerful attacks onto its foes.
cobblemon.species.imbumi.name: Imbumi
cobblemon.species.imbumi.desc: Imbumi love to help others. They will provide water to Pokemon and people when needed. Known for their playful and calm nature, they are the perfect companion for little children.
cobblemon.species.frossit.name: Frossit
cobblemon.species.frossit.desc: With the addition of its Ice-type, it is able to deliver powerful attacks at freezing temperatures. It will freeze a foe when threatened.
cobblemon.species.petumi.name: Petumi
cobblemon.species.petumi.desc: Its sweet fragrance grows stronger during the Spring. When gathered in groups, Petumi can leave a town smelling pleasantly for weeks.
cobblemon.species.fleuroma.name: Fleuroma
cobblemon.species.fleuroma.desc: When threatened it has the ability to alter the aroma into a less pleasant one that causes dizzyness. Flowers tended by Fleuroma have a strong, pleasant aroma that can be detected from miles away.
cobblemon.species.dorentu.name: Dorentu
cobblemon.species.dorentu.desc: They live in pairs or in large groups. During summer they gather food and store it in the trunks of trees, preparing for the scarcity of winter.
cobblemon.species.grandorent.name: Grandorent
cobblemon.species.grandorent.desc: They spend most of their time up in trees where they build their homes. They enjoy just sitting atop trees and enjoying the view.
cobblemon.species.eriegle.name: Eriegle
cobblemon.species.eriegle.desc: Born with fairly weak wings, Eriegle love to stay in their nest and be nurtured by their parents until it's strong enough to fly from its roost. They become more hostile as they grow.
cobblemon.species.albivore.name: Albivore
cobblemon.species.albivore.desc: Albivore are known to be great hunters, due to their keen eyesight. They often perch high on treetops and cliffs, waiting to spot their next prey.
cobblemon.species.emperiegle.name: Emperiegle
cobblemon.species.emperiegle.desc: With their fatal talons and razor sharp beaks, Emperiegle patrol the skies protecting their territory and young. If anyone dares to come too close, there's the possibility they may lose their life.
cobblemon.species.elfini.name: Elfini
cobblemon.species.elfini.desc: Elfini and Flabebe live in a colony somewhere deep in Umbropine Woods. Elfini and Flabebe like to dance at night in secret. Rings of flowers sprout unnaturally fast where they dance.
cobblemon.species.aidelf.name: Aidelf
cobblemon.species.aidelf.desc: Many colonies of Aidelf can be found in different sections of the same forest living in harmony, helping it grow along with nurturing their young.
cobblemon.species.mousense.name: Mousense
cobblemon.species.mousense.desc: A common sight throughout the Havai region. Its whiskers allow it to sense any changes in its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.sensarat.name: Sensarat
cobblemon.species.sensarat.desc: Nearly blind, it uses its whiskers, nose and ears to help guide its way. It can literally eat anything; from leftovers to garbage. Its acute senses allow it to scavenge unnoticed.
cobblemon.species.spartzle.name: Spartzle
cobblemon.species.spartzle.desc: Spartzle rub their tails against each other to charge. Its fur generally becomes very static and can be dangerous to handle.
cobblemon.species.eletize.name: Eletize
cobblemon.species.eletize.desc: Eletize are very quick and can easily escape an attack. Their speed can almost match that of a Velocikat.
cobblemon.species.slickitty.name: Slickitty
cobblemon.species.slickitty.desc: These energetic speedy Pokemon love to chase after others. The static it generates in its fur is sure to shock whoever pets it.
cobblemon.species.axeleraze.name: Axeleraze
cobblemon.species.axeleraze.desc: The speed of Axeleraze is quite remarkable. They run all day, generating electricity, which is stored in their fur. They can store up to an amount of 1 million volts. By sleeping and licking itself, it discharges electricity.
cobblemon.species.kroach.name: Kroach
cobblemon.species.kroach.desc: Kroach are nasty bugs that infest and raid kitchens of unaware trainers, and sometimes restaurants. Their numbers flourish in dark places. Behind the cloak of night, they quickly amass and overrun any location they choose to colonize.
cobblemon.species.kloakroach.name: Kloakroach
cobblemon.species.kloakroach.desc: Kloakroach are some of the most devious Bug-type Pokemon, as they command legions of Kroach with absolute authority. They prefer having Kroach battle for it instead of taking part directly. They're thought to be solitary yet conniving, often blamed for mischief and theft in small towns.
cobblemon.species.timiby.name: Timiby
cobblemon.species.timiby.desc: Sometimes it will cry and wimp out from any conflict or anxious situation. But don't let its weak looks fool you, it can be aggressive and fight back.
cobblemon.species.nervreck.name: Nervreck
cobblemon.species.nervreck.desc: Nervreck intimidate its foes by puffing up its chest. It will not back down from a battle no matter what. It releases its anger and tension by wrecking its surroundings. It is thecleffautic for them.
cobblemon.species.wreckore.name: Wreckore
cobblemon.species.wreckore.desc: Wreckore are one of the bravest, daring Pokemon out there and are very protective of its allies and trainers. They easily knockout their foes with a strike from their powerful arms. They still have anger issues.
cobblemon.species.lilabaa.name: Lilabaa
cobblemon.species.lilabaa.desc: Listening to its soothing lullaby is said to bring instant calmness and positivity.
cobblemon.species.lulabaa.name: Lulabaa
cobblemon.species.lulabaa.desc: Lulabaa are popular among mothers. Their melodic lullabies can soothe and calm even the fussiest of babies. Listening to its soothing lullaby is said to bring instant happiness and relaxation.
cobblemon.species.glumence.name: Glumence
cobblemon.species.glumence.desc: The trails they leave behind is a mixture of toxins and a glue-like substance containing electricity. Touching the trail will shock you, and the toxins along with it may make you very ill. Many Glumence set trails around their area to prevent intruders. They illuminate forests, disrupting the natural cycles of the plants and Pokemon that live there.
cobblemon.species.glumexin.name: Glumexin
cobblemon.species.glumexin.desc: With evolution, its brain drastically increased in size, and its shell now covers its head to protect it. It emits strange, sickening radio waves from its antennae to direct Glumence, making them leave sticky trails in unnerving patterns along the ground.
cobblemon.species.nursee.name: Nursee
