cobblemon.species.reparine.name: Reparine
cobblemon.species.reparine.desc: The barnacles that cover Reparine's body are able to fire hypersaline water. Reparine make their homes on jagged, rocky shorelines, and being able to swim in even the roughest of seas, they seem to be the only Pokemon able to withstand the constant battering of crushing waves.
cobblemon.species.orbranch.name: Orbranch
cobblemon.species.orbranch.desc: They hide among trees, leaving only their lantern-like appendage to be seen, and proceed to guide unsuspecting travelers into treacherous forests and swamps.
cobblemon.species.juraseed.name: Juraseed
cobblemon.species.juraseed.desc: Juraseed are considered living fossils. Though uncommon today, they used to cover the entire earth and can live up to 1,000 years. Scientists estimate they may contain memories of over 500 previous Trainers.
cobblemon.species.carnaceous.name: Carnaceous
cobblemon.species.carnaceous.desc: Carnaceous root themselves, hiding their faces behind their foliage, before ambushing their prey. They can lie sleeping for months before being accidentally awakened by unwary explorers.
cobblemon.species.carnibble.name: Carnibble
cobblemon.species.carnosteus.name: Carnosteus
cobblemon.species.carnosteus.desc: Carnosteus's ferocious and devilish appearance is masked by an even more horrific exoskeleton that not only terrifies small prey, but acts as a powerful barrier when trading blows with other mighty predators.
cobblemon.species.dilophang.name: Dilophang
cobblemon.species.dilophright.name: Dilophright
cobblemon.species.dilophright.desc: Dilophright are vicious, cornering their prey and then spraying them with strong acid that has the power to melt flesh. Although brave and downright brutal in one-on-one confrontations, they are known to retreat as soon as they're outnumbered.
cobblemon.species.mampth.name: Mampth
cobblemon.species.mampth.desc: Mampth fossils were discovered on the mountain tops of Vahno. Their fur keeps them warm even in -50 weather. Mampth's flappy ears are used to blow harsh cold gales at their opponents.
cobblemon.species.mammolaya.name: Mammolaya
cobblemon.species.mammolaya.desc: Mammolaya use their tusks to charge into rivals and foes during disputes. They ruled the land during the Ice Age, with full grown Maulethal as their only threats. When viewed from a distance, Mammolaya look like snow covered mountains, giving them the name 'Walking Glaciers'.
cobblemon.species.mesoth.name: Mesoth
cobblemon.species.megatherice.name: Megatherice
cobblemon.species.megatherice.desc: Megatherice thrive in cold climates, usually prowling only during the night for it's prey. It's coat manages to keep it warm, and also give it proper camouflage. It still retains it's laziness from it's unevolved from.
cobblemon.species.paow.name: Paow
cobblemon.species.paow.desc: A Chinese princess once brought down an entire army with just a single Paow. They are found high up on mountains, blowing out ash and smoke from their gaping mouths.
cobblemon.species.ganpaow.name: Ganpaow
cobblemon.species.ganpaow.desc: Evolution gives Ganpaow an explosive personality. The draconic energy that was dormant bursts open its old shell, but it is still unable to manifest completely.
cobblemon.species.yanpaow.name: Yanpaow
cobblemon.species.yanpaow.desc: Rarely seen, Yanpaow are attracted to celebrations and festivals all over the world. New colour variations are always being discovered.
cobblemon.species.beaniscule.name: Beaniscule
cobblemon.species.beaniscule.desc: Beaniscule are very easy to frighten due to their small size. They're rumored to be delicious, but no one knows due to them being protected by the Atlas government, as they're an endangered species.
cobblemon.species.beanormous.name: Beanormous
cobblemon.species.beanormous.desc: Beanormous are typically absent minded, having their heads figuratively and literally in the clouds. Despite their size, they're tremendously easy to scare.
cobblemon.species.visclaw.name: Visclaw
cobblemon.species.visclaw.desc: Visclaw stand next to one another when defending their home, acting as a sort of border to let other Pokemon know that they aren't welcome. If a Pokemon slips past them, they'll face the wrath of Visclaw's evolution...
cobblemon.species.edifierce.name: Edifierce
cobblemon.species.edifierce.desc: Edifierce thrives in quiet ruins, despite hardly moving. This can be attributed to it not needing to consume food to survive. Its walls are sculpted from ultra-hard mud. It defends the remains of a long-gone kingdom.
cobblemon.species.aurorelk.name: Aurorelk
cobblemon.species.phanfrica.name: Phanfrica
cobblemon.species.penguinsula.name: Penguinsula
cobblemon.species.phanta.name: Phanta
cobblemon.species.lepiterros.name: Lepiterros
cobblemon.species.lepiterros.desc: This Pokemon appears in legends, where its wings were said to contain the secrets of the world. Its said it would share this knowledge with those who sought it out with kind and pure intent.
cobblemon.species.orotolas.name: Orotolas
cobblemon.species.orotolas.desc: This Pokemon appears in legends, where it's said to have ripped the wings from another legendary Pokemon. It sleeps in a pile of gold, in a mountain deep within the Atlas Region.
cobblemon.species.devilicious.name: Devilicious
cobblemon.species.devilicious.desc: Devilicious spends its days sleeping, hiding out among plush toys in children's rooms. At night, it awakens and the fun begins.

cobblemon.species.stelysium.name: Stelysium
cobblemon.species.stelysium.desc: The counterpart of Bohemolock. Stelysium clandestinely travels village to village search for those who perform beneficent deeds for others to ascend with her to another world after they have passed in this one.
cobblemon.species.rocabayo.name: Rocabayo
cobblemon.species.coltroy.name: Coltroy
cobblemon.species.bronkilles.name: Bronkilles
cobblemon.species.coocluck.name: Coocluck
cobblemon.species.cavitaery.name: Cavitaery
cobblemon.species.cavitaery.desc: 'Cavitaery crave sweet things to attract plaque and bacteria - it's favorite treat of all!'
cobblemon.species.enamirth.name: Enamirth
cobblemon.species.enamirth.desc: 'Enamirth symbiotically remove rotten teeth, consume them, and regrow healthy teeth for others. It loves eating bacteria and it makes its enamel armor strong.'
cobblemon.species.larvley.name: Larvley
cobblemon.species.purrbal.name: Purrbal
cobblemon.species.papillow.name: Papillow
cobblemon.species.volvolt.name: Volvolt
cobblemon.species.volvyrm.name: Volvyrm
cobblemon.species.nerincess.name: Nerincess
cobblemon.species.equeena.name: Equeena
cobblemon.species.amphreina.name: Amphreina
cobblemon.species.scyllagon.name: Scyllagon
cobblemon.species.molit.name: Molit
cobblemon.species.molit.desc: 'Molite's nascent light powers only allow it to emit a weak glow to call for help when in danger.'
cobblemon.species.luminose.name: Luminose
cobblemon.species.luminose.desc: Early-Route Normal Rodent Pokemon ------'Luminose strains during evolution from Molit. Its exposed skull and star-nose finally enable it to use its psychic powers when evolved.'
cobblemon.species.damsleros.name: Damsleros
cobblemon.species.ribbidi.name: Ribbidi
cobblemon.species.froggidi.name: Froggidi
cobblemon.species.bogidiboo.name: Bogidiboo
cobblemon.species.vampint.name: Vampint
cobblemon.species.vasquito.name: Vasquito
cobblemon.species.mosveratu.name: Mosveratu
cobblemon.species.kelpumpf.name: Kelpump
cobblemon.species.dispariot.name: Dispariot
cobblemon.species.kelpumpm.name: Kelpump-m
cobblemon.species.trickabod.name: Trickabod
cobblemon.species.wendevour.name: Wendevour
cobblemon.species.miragtra.name: Miragtra
cobblemon.species.inchard.name: Inchard
cobblemon.species.pupanel.name: Pupanel
cobblemon.species.prismarch.name: Prismarch
cobblemon.species.magester.name: Magester
cobblemon.species.bornith.name: Bornith
cobblemon.species.nurstork.name: Nurstork
cobblemon.species.stilbird.name: Stilbird
cobblemon.species.scurley.name: Scurley
cobblemon.species.scurley.desc: Scurley likes hopping around in fields and forests. It loves to occasionally dig holes and bury things in them.
cobblemon.species.burramble.name: Burramble
cobblemon.species.burramble.desc: Burramble often play in fields. As they pounce around, they stomp the ground to see who is the strongest.
cobblemon.species.bramboom.name: Bramboom
cobblemon.species.bramboom.desc: Bramboom have the strength to easily pick up any tree and swing it around. They're known to love to dig tunnels and nest underground.
cobblemon.species.lamber.name: Lamber
cobblemon.species.lamber.desc: Lamber are commonly kept for their wool. It is said that nothing is warmer than a pair of Lamber wool socks.
cobblemon.species.volpaca.name: Volpaca
cobblemon.species.volpaca.desc: - Tackle Normal 4 Tail Whip Normal 9 Cotton Spore Grass 11 EmberSTAB Fire 15 Stomp Normal 18 Safeguard Normal 22 Flame WheelSTAB Fire 27 Body Slam Normal 34 Flame Wool Fire 40 Lava PlumeSTAB Fire 45 Cotton Guard Grass 49 Double-Edge Normal 56 Heal Bell Normal 61 Fire BlastSTAB Fire
cobblemon.species.sheruption.name: Sheruption
cobblemon.species.sheruption.desc: Sheruption are gentle, especially happy when surrounded by children and babies. Their wool is incredibly soft, being used in self-heating bedding.
cobblemon.species.grubble.name: Grubble
cobblemon.species.pupive.name: Pupive
cobblemon.species.pupive.desc: Pupive often find themselves rattled around by Pokemon who think there's a tasty treat within it's husk. However, if Pupive are disturbed when they're close to evolving, then-
cobblemon.species.waspen.name: Waspen
cobblemon.species.waspen.desc: Waspen will burst from their pre-evolution's husk, and strike with ferocity at whatever might've been disturbing it. Though they're aggressive to any other Pokemon, Waspen collect food for Grubble wanting to evolve.
cobblemon.species.glittle.name: Glittle
cobblemon.species.glittle.desc: During the darkest nights with little moonlight, Glittle will crawl out and glow with the faintest light to guide trainers along who might be lost. Glittle love the company of it's own kind, making bright lights when happy.
cobblemon.species.lupupa.name: Lupupa
cobblemon.species.lupupa.desc: Lupupa hang from trees, absorbing sunlight during the day and storing it in their bodies. They do this to act as a lamp at night for any Pokemon scared of the dark.
cobblemon.species.fluminux.name: Fluminux
cobblemon.species.fluminux.desc: Trainers say that the sky will light up with stars when the moon is at it's darkest, but that's merely Fluminux shooting off it's glowrays to try and find a mate it can truly love.
cobblemon.species.aegle.name: Aegle
cobblemon.species.aegle.desc: Though incredibly simple, Aegle have a honorable sense of what's right and wrong. They love to bring food they catch to their nests, which they perch on the highest cliff faces.
cobblemon.species.eaglory.name: Eaglory
cobblemon.species.eaglory.desc: Putting honor first before anything else, Eaglory defend their nests with valor and justice. Eaglory were almost decided to be a mascot of a region before being told that a regular flag might be a better idea.
cobblemon.species.cavole.name: Cavole
cobblemon.species.cavole.desc: Cavole are some of the most common household Pokemon to keep from how lovable and cute they are. They love nothing more than to eat food all day.
cobblemon.species.cavident.name: Cavident
cobblemon.species.cavident.desc: ??? go through a rebellious phase in the later years of their lives. They make a mess of their living spaces when their trainers aren't around. Though they may seem mean-spirited, they still very much love their owners.
cobblemon.species.quetzap.name: Quetzap
cobblemon.species.quetzap.desc: As a storm brews, Quetzap swarm around it to gather electricity. You can view how charged it is by the tensity of its tails.
cobblemon.species.shockatoo.name: Shockatoo
cobblemon.species.shockatoo.desc: Rival Shockatoos are typically seen in lightning storms, building up energy and racing to see which is the strongest. Merely tapping their body can lead to brief electric shocks.
cobblemon.species.kotukoatl.name: Kotukoatl
cobblemon.species.kotukoatl.desc: Kotukoatl move at incredible speeds through the clouds, stirring up electrical storms as they pass through them. They often have little mercy for their prey, and pride themselves on a successful hunt.
cobblemon.species.grainum.name: Grainum
cobblemon.species.grainum.desc: Grainum are very timid pokemon and are rarely seen in the wild. This is due to the fact that they usually remain underground only showing the sprout on their head.
cobblemon.species.tomabi.name: Tomabi
cobblemon.species.tomabi.desc: Tomabi are sometimes seen extremely happy and playful. Other times, they're completely motionless or rolling around for no apparent reason.
cobblemon.species.otamot.name: Otamot
cobblemon.species.otamot.desc: Otamot usually inhabit areas with bright sunshine and a water source. They absorb water into their bodies everyday in order to stay healthy.
cobblemon.species.smulb.name: Smulb
cobblemon.species.lillusion.name: Lillusion
cobblemon.species.putrigeist.name: Putrigeist
cobblemon.species.bommy.name: Bommy
cobblemon.species.wubunny.name: Wubunny
cobblemon.species.wubunny.desc: Wubunny are absolute joys to be around, typically bringing snacks to share with nearby Pokemon and trainers when they leave their dens. They often are found scavenging for whatever they can get their hands on, as they hate to waste.
cobblemon.species.froskie.name: Froskie
cobblemon.species.froskie.desc: Froskie is energetic and hyper, and enjoy being around people. Because of this, many are seen along the snowy routes of Cyare.
cobblemon.species.alpaline.name: Alpaline
cobblemon.species.alpaline.desc: Alpaline is a diehard fighter, and never gives up. It uses its claws, paws, mouth, and tail in battle.
cobblemon.species.musiquail.name: Musiquail
cobblemon.species.orphestra.name: Orphestra
cobblemon.species.flurrilli.name: Flurrilli
cobblemon.species.daffochil.name: Daffochil
cobblemon.species.frigivine.name: Frigivine
cobblemon.species.pekpek.name: Pek-Pek
cobblemon.species.pekpek.desc: Pek-Pek are extremely common in dark caves where nothing can be seen. They have supersonic hearing and night vision and use this to their advantage against others in the caves.
cobblemon.species.vampeka.name: Vampeka
cobblemon.species.zeta.name: Zeta
cobblemon.species.gizeta.name: Gizeta
cobblemon.species.shogizeta.name: Shogizeta
cobblemon.species.panboo.name: Panboo
cobblemon.species.panboo.desc: Panboo are very possessive. Many girl trainers think they are cute, until they lose a watch or hairpin to one.
cobblemon.species.bansenbu.name: Bansenbu
cobblemon.species.bansenbu.desc: Bansebu hold a stick of Bamboo, which they munch on constantly. If someone attempts to steal it, Bansebu goes into a blind rage which does not end until it is holding Bamboo again.
cobblemon.species.vyrat.name: Vyrat
cobblemon.species.miasflow.name: Miasflow
cobblemon.species.gumla.name: Gumla
cobblemon.species.eucowala.name: Eucowala
cobblemon.species.kooragant.name: Kooragant
cobblemon.species.mockaburra.name: Mockaburra
cobblemon.species.pebblet.name: Pebblet
cobblemon.species.peccarock.name: Peccarock
cobblemon.species.dasypudge.name: Dasypudge
cobblemon.species.dasypudge.desc: Dasypudge's armor is not fully developed, so if it is attacked, it will curl into a ball and roll away.
cobblemon.species.armordillo.name: Armordillo
cobblemon.species.armordillo.desc: Armordillo uses its hard head and large tail to damage the opponent in battle. It has one of the highest defenses of all Pokmon.
cobblemon.species.quafer.name: Quafer
cobblemon.species.quafer.desc: Nocturnal and colorblind, Quafer is rarely seen during daytime. They dig mazes of tunnels deep under the ground and burrow in deep in order to sleep undisturbed.
cobblemon.species.orycterra.name: Orycterra
cobblemon.species.orycterra.desc: Orycterra are confident Pokmon who love a challenging fight. Even if their foe has a high advantage, they will not stop until they've won the battle.
cobblemon.species.pygnite.name: Pygnite
cobblemon.species.pygnite.desc: Pygnite still haven't mastered using the fire from their tails. They can't control their tail flames and may harm themselves using them.
cobblemon.species.pocinder.name: Pocinder
cobblemon.species.pocinder.desc: Pocinder uses its tail like a whip and has the ability to cut trees down in one slash.
cobblemon.species.quolcano.name: Quolcano
cobblemon.species.quolcano.desc: Quolcano are very territorial and burn trees to mark territory. They are known as arsons to many people.
cobblemon.species.chimpunk.name: Chimpunk
cobblemon.species.snoosect.name: Snoosect
cobblemon.species.snoosect.desc: Snoosect spend most of their time asleep. Even when in a deep slumber, their antennae can sense incoming danger.
cobblemon.species.lumibuzz.name: Lumibuzz
cobblemon.species.lumibuzz.desc: Lumibuzz are very docile Pokemon. They often use the lights on the tips of their antennae to show lost travelers the way.
cobblemon.species.loticus.name: Loticus
cobblemon.species.lotiluna.name: Lotiluna
cobblemon.species.avipip.name: Avipip
cobblemon.species.avipip.desc: Avipip are rarely seen in the wild because they usually stay in their hidden nests, close to their mother. They don't leave until they evolve into Parasquack.
cobblemon.species.parasquack.name: Parasquack
cobblemon.species.peasicant.name: Peasicant
cobblemon.species.florita.name: Florita
cobblemon.species.floraia.name: Floraia
cobblemon.species.bunoo.name: Bunoo
cobblemon.species.bunoo.desc: Buudoo is a spirit finding peace in a doll. Although cute, it likes to poke people.
cobblemon.species.boobun.name: Boobun
cobblemon.species.boobun.desc: Although small, Boobun has been known to hug amazingly strong which is thought to be given strength by the ghost inside it.
cobblemon.species.wizarda.name: Wizarda
cobblemon.species.wizarda.desc: Wizarda is found in dark and stranded places, it's very shy to humans and mostly hides in dark places.
cobblemon.species.wizadow.name: Wizadow
cobblemon.species.wizadow.desc: Wizadow can disappear any time and leave his cloath floating.
cobblemon.species.ghouster.name: Banshriek
cobblemon.species.fenetic.name: Fenetic
cobblemon.species.voltient.name: Voltient
cobblemon.species.tricity.name: Tricity
cobblemon.species.curray.name: Curray
cobblemon.species.cubet.name: Cubet
cobblemon.species.haildeer.name: Haildeer
cobblemon.species.haildeer.desc: Haildeer are amongst some children's favourite Pokmon, as they are said to be the ones who pull Santa's sleigh every Christmas Eve. Their noses light up and act like beacons during tough blizzards.
cobblemon.species.littull.name: Littull
cobblemon.species.littull.desc: Littull is a kind, tame pokemon, loved especially by younger trainers. Many give it an Everstone so it retains its cuteness.
cobblemon.species.nobull.name: Nobull
cobblemon.species.nobull.desc: Nobull have had a bad reputation in the past due to appearance, but have proved themselves to be quite kind.
cobblemon.species.irritabull.name: Irritabull
cobblemon.species.irritabull.desc: Irritabull were formerly confused with Nobull, causing Nobull's bad reputation. Irritabull angers easily and is difficult to tame.
cobblemon.species.orukul.name: Orukul
cobblemon.species.orukul.desc: Orukul are peaceful Pokemon, composed completely of sentient ore. Because they don't age, they've been around longer than every Pokemon As such, are incredibly intelligent and have boundless wisdom of the past.
cobblemon.species.tinguano.name: Tinguano
cobblemon.species.tinguano.desc: Although clumsy, their hardened fists and thumb spikes allow them to fight off predators larger than them. Tinguano lived 125 million years ago, and was revived by modern science.
cobblemon.species.donguano.name: Donguano
cobblemon.species.donguano.desc: A Pokemon that first lived 125 million years ago, Donguano strive to be the best in one-on-one combat, usually challenging stronger Donguano both inside and outside their social circles.
cobblemon.species.khepharoh.name: Khepharoh
cobblemon.species.khepharoh.desc: Khepharoh is said to be the deity of the sun itself. It's fabled for its legendary treasure. Those who seek and find it will not live to tell the tale, or so the myth says.
cobblemon.species.poisstone.name: Poisstone
cobblemon.species.conium.name: Conium
cobblemon.species.conium.desc: Conium can be found all along the sea floor, even down below 30,000 feet. Their shells can withstand enormous pressure.
cobblemon.species.conchorn.name: Conchorn
cobblemon.species.conchorn.desc: This Pokemon can create a powerful venom it uses to subdue its prey. It fires venom-laced spikes and then grasps with its tentacles to pull the target underwater.
cobblemon.species.liquion.name: Liquion
cobblemon.species.cocopow.name: Cocopow
cobblemon.species.cocopow.desc: Cocopow travel by floating across the ocean, and can often be found miles from mainland. Contrary to popular belief, Cocopow don't have tasty juice inside their body.
cobblemon.species.chemko.name: Chemko
cobblemon.species.kiwern.name: Kiwern
cobblemon.species.wetaket.name: Wetaket
cobblemon.species.tuatria.name: Tuatria
cobblemon.species.angemini.name: Angemini
cobblemon.species.urnada.name: Urnada
cobblemon.species.urnada.desc: Urnada are said to be fountain statues that came to live by a magic spell. Many great powers house in their urns and they have never been spotted without.
cobblemon.species.caprikid.name: Caprikid
cobblemon.species.cascaprine.name: Cascaprine
cobblemon.species.flaries.name: Flaries
cobblemon.species.vipetro.name: Vipetro
cobblemon.species.serpentide.name: Serpentide
cobblemon.species.moorling.name: Moorling
cobblemon.species.pukana.name: Pukana
cobblemon.species.armorca.name: Armorca
cobblemon.species.armorca.desc: Every spring, Armorca would swim to warmer waters to lay hundreds of eggs. They can be extremely aggresive while looking after their young and would do anything to protect them.
cobblemon.species.shiverish.name: Shiverish
cobblemon.species.shiverish.desc: Shiverish usually dwell beneath frozen lakes and occasionally jump out of holes in the ice to catch sunlight. They use the sunlight to keep warm.
cobblemon.species.glacuda.name: Glacuda
cobblemon.species.glacuda.desc: Glacuda uses its fins as sensors to guide itself while swimming through the darkest frozen lakes. They're also used to communicate with others.
cobblemon.species.cryodra.name: Cryodra
cobblemon.species.cryodra.desc: Cryodra occasionally emit a soft aura containg the seven colours of the rainbow. It is said that they are able to create massive auroras during the night.
cobblemon.species.slimug.name: Slimug
cobblemon.species.segnapod.name: Segnapod
cobblemon.species.brumbolt.name: Brumbolt
cobblemon.species.incendaur.name: Incendaur
cobblemon.species.sukoi.name: Sukoi
cobblemon.species.plecoast.name: Plecoast
cobblemon.species.aquana.name: Aquana
cobblemon.species.sakano.name: Sakano
cobblemon.species.sakanodon.name: Draphin
cobblemon.species.crebb.name: Crebb
cobblemon.species.crustocean.name: Crustocean
cobblemon.species.crustocean.desc: Crustoceans are ominous and lethal, waiting around at the bottom of shallow water. They wait for prey to be attracted by its giant pearl, where Crustocean will then lock them in a tight grip, and attempt to drown them.
cobblemon.species.impie.name: Impie
cobblemon.species.impie.desc: Impie was one of the first Pokemon created in a lab, but its genome is highly unstable. It has the tendency to transform upon any small disturbance in its physical state.
cobblemon.species.impulso.name: Impulso
cobblemon.species.impulso.desc: Electricity pulses through Impulso's veins. It constantly shocks itself.
cobblemon.species.impers.name: Impers
cobblemon.species.impers.desc: Toxins have caused Impers' genes to fall apart, so it is unable to keep itself in one shape. Its genes are extremely toxic to other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.imploda.name: Imploda
cobblemon.species.imploda.desc: Imploda produces large amounts of methane, which cause it to balloon. Any spark can cause it to detonate.
cobblemon.species.impac.name: Impac
cobblemon.species.impac.desc: Impac is unable to control its reflexes. Because of this, it is known to often unfortunately punch itself in the face.
cobblemon.species.imprism.name: Imprism
cobblemon.species.imprism.desc: Imprism is unable to keep itself warm. It is so cold that anything that touches it will freeze almost instantaneously.
cobblemon.species.solare.name: Solare
cobblemon.species.glaciare.name: Glaciare
cobblemon.species.pluvare.name: Pluvare
cobblemon.species.caecare.name: Caecare
cobblemon.species.caligulare.name: Caligulare
cobblemon.species.sollis.name: Sollis
cobblemon.species.sollis.desc: The power to control the sun gives it a very unsure nature. The orbs on its legs glow brightly whenever it uses these powers. The knobs on its head expand when they catch sunlight.
cobblemon.species.sollord.name: Sollord
cobblemon.species.sollord.desc: Sollord, nicknamed King of the Sun, use their heads to fend off any predators. Its connection with the sun is legendary, and it's often used in rainy seasons to prevent plants from drowning.
cobblemon.species.velosickle.name: Velosickle
cobblemon.species.velosickle.desc: Velosickle can jump over 6 meters high. It will jump any creature it sees, in order to survive the harsh lands near volcanos. This highly dangerous predator is sometimes hard to control.
cobblemon.species.lophi.name: Lophi
cobblemon.species.lophi.desc: Lophi enjoys itself by blowing bubbles. The jewel on its forehead senses ultrasonic waves and thus impending danger. It will use its dolphin-like tail to propel itself into safety.
cobblemon.species.ocephus.name: Ocephus
cobblemon.species.ocephus.desc: With nice melodies they blow with their horns, Ocephus indicate that they are ready to mate. They are among the fastest marine creatures, reaching an astonishing 60 miles per hour.
cobblemon.species.mamby.name: Mamby
cobblemon.species.mamroth.name: Mamroth
cobblemon.species.frospine.name: Frospine
cobblemon.species.phasmyst.name: Phasmyst
cobblemon.species.spectrice.name: Spectrice
cobblemon.species.chibiryu.name: Chibiryu
cobblemon.species.midryu.name: Midryu
cobblemon.species.ryurai.name: Ryurai

cobblemon.species.greequine.name: Greequine
cobblemon.species.orequine.name: Orequine
cobblemon.species.draquados.name: Draquados
cobblemon.species.chamaerol.name: Chamaerol
cobblemon.species.chamaelik.name: Chamaelik
cobblemon.species.chamaelec.name: Chamaelec

cobblemon.species.capernoir.name: Capernoir
cobblemon.species.casanoistra.name: Casanoistra
cobblemon.species.viras.name: Viras
cobblemon.species.viradle.name: Viradle
cobblemon.species.tracoon.name: Tracoon
cobblemon.species.garbagoon.name: Garbagoon
